original: śriyaḥ kurūṇām adhipasya pālanīṃ prajāsu vṛttiṃ yam ayuṅkta veditum /
analyzed: śriyaḥ kurūṇām adhipasya pālanīm prajāsu vṛttim yam ayuṅkta veditum

original: sa varṇiliṅgī viditaḥ samāyayau yudhiṣṭhiraṃ dvaitavane vanecaraḥ // BhKir_1.1 //
analyzed: sa varṇi liṅgī viditaḥ samāyayau yudhiṣṭhiram dvaitavane vanecaraḥ

original: kṛtapraṇāmasya mahīṃ mahībhuje jitāṃ sapatnena nivedayiṣyataḥ /
analyzed: kṛta praṇāmasya mahīm mahībhuje jitām sapatnena nivedayiṣyataḥ

original: na vivyathe tasya mano na hi priyaṃ pravaktum icchanti mṛṣā hitaiṣiṇaḥ // BhKir_1.2 //
analyzed: na vivyathe tasya manaḥ na hi priyam pravaktum icchanti mṛṣā hita eṣiṇaḥ

original: dviṣāṃ vighātāya vidhātum icchato rahasy anujñām adhigamya bhūbhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: dviṣām vighātāya vidhātum icchataḥ rahasi anujñām adhigamya bhūbhṛtaḥ

original: sa sauṣṭhavaudāryaviśeṣaśālinīṃ viniścitārthām iti vācam ādadhe // BhKir_1.3 //
analyzed: sa sauṣṭhava audārya viśeṣa śālinīm viniścita arthām iti vācam ādadhe

original: kriyāsu yuktair nṛpa cāracakṣuṣo na vañcanīyāḥ prabhavo 'nujīvibhiḥ /
analyzed: kriyāsu yuktaiḥ nṛpa cāra cakṣuṣaḥ na vañcanīyāḥ prabhavaḥ

original: ato 'rhasi kṣantum asādhu sādhu vā hitaṃ manohāri ca durlabhaṃ vacaḥ // BhKir_1.4 //
analyzed: atas rhasi kṣantum asādhu sādhu vā hitam manohāri ca durlabham vacaḥ

original: sa kiṃsakhā sādhu na śāsti yo 'dhipaṃ hitān na yaḥ saṃśṛṇute sa kiṃprabhuḥ /
analyzed: sa kiṃsakhā sādhu na śāsti yaḥ dhipam hitāt na yaḥ saṃśṛṇute sa kiṃprabhuḥ

original: sadānukūleṣu hi kurvate ratiṃ nṛpeṣv amātyeṣu ca sarvasampadaḥ // BhKir_1.5 //
analyzed: sadā anukūleṣu hi kurvate ratim nṛpeṣu amātyeṣu ca sarva sampadaḥ

original: nisargadurbodham abodhaviklavāḥ kva bhūpatīnāṃ caritaṃ kva jantavaḥ /
analyzed: nisarga durbodham abodha viklavāḥ kva bhūpatīnām caritam kva jantavaḥ

original: tavānubhāvo 'yam abodhi yan mayā nigūḍhatattvaṃ nayavartma vidviṣām // BhKir_1.6 //
analyzed: tava anubhāvaḥ yam abodhi yat mayā nigūḍha tattvam naya vartma vidviṣām

original: viśaṅkamāno bhavataḥ parābhavaṃ nṛpāsanastho 'pi vanādhivāsinaḥ /
analyzed: viśaṅkamānaḥ bhavataḥ parābhavam vana adhivāsinaḥ

original: durodaracchadmajitāṃ samīhate nayena jetuṃ jagatīṃ suyodhanaḥ // BhKir_1.7 //
analyzed: durodara chadma jitām samīhate nayena jetum jagatīm suyodhanaḥ

original: tathāpi jihmaḥ sa bhavajjigīṣayā tanoti śubhraṃ guṇasampadā yaśaḥ /
analyzed: tathā api jihmaḥ sa bhavat jigīṣayā tanoti śubhram guṇa sampadā yaśaḥ

original: samunnayan bhūtim anāryasaṃgamād varaṃ virodho 'pi samaṃ mahātmabhiḥ // BhKir_1.8 //
analyzed: samunnayan bhūtim anārya saṃgamāt varam samam mahātmabhiḥ

original: kṛtāriṣaḍvargajayena mānavīm agamyarūpāṃ padavīṃ prapitsunā /
analyzed: kṛta ari ṣaḍvarga jayena mānavīm agamya rūpām padavīm prapitsunā

original: vibhajya naktaṃdinam astatandriṇā vitanyate tena nayena pauruṣam // BhKir_1.9 //
analyzed: vibhajya naktaṃdinam asta tandriṇā vitanyate tena nayena pauruṣam

original: sakhīn iva prītiyujo 'nujīvinaḥ samānamānān suhṛdaś ca bandhubhiḥ /
analyzed: sakhīn iva prīti yujaḥ nu jīvinaḥ samāna mānān suhṛdaḥ ca bandhubhiḥ

original: sa santataṃ darśayate gatasmayaḥ kṛtādhipatyām iva sādhu bandhutām // BhKir_1.10 //
analyzed: sa santatam darśayate gata smayaḥ kṛta ādhipatyām iva sādhu bandhu tām

original: asaktam ārādhayato yathāyathaṃ vibhajya bhaktyā samapakṣapātayā /
analyzed: asaktam ārādhayataḥ yathāyatham vibhajya bhaktyā sama pakṣapātayā

original: guṇānurāgād iva sakhyam īyivān na bādhate 'sya trigaṇaḥ parasparam // BhKir_1.11 //
analyzed: guṇa anurāgāt iva sakhyam īyivān na bādhate sya trigaṇaḥ parasparam

original: niratyayaṃ sāma na dānavarjitaṃ na bhūri dānaṃ virahayya satkriyām /
analyzed: niratyayam sāma na dāna varjitam na bhūri dānam virahayya satkriyām

original: pravartate tasya viśeṣaśālinī guṇānurodhena vinā na satkriyā // BhKir_1.12 //
analyzed: pravartate tasya viśeṣa śālinī guṇa anurodhena vinā na satkriyā

original: vasūni vāñchan na vaśī na manyunā svadharma ity eva nivṛttakāraṇaḥ /
analyzed: vasūni vāñchan na vaśī na manyunā svadharmaḥ iti eva nivṛtta kāraṇaḥ

original: gurūpadiṣṭena ripau sute 'pi vā nihanti daṇḍena sa dharmaviplavam // BhKir_1.13 //
analyzed: guru upadiṣṭena ripau sute vā nihanti daṇḍena sa dharma viplavam

original: vidhāya rakṣān paritaḥ paretarān aśaṅkitākāram upaiti śaṅkitaḥ /
analyzed: vidhāya rakṣān paritas para itarān a śaṅkita ākāram upaiti śaṅkitaḥ

original: kriyāpavargeṣv anujīvisātkṛtāḥ kṛtajñatām asya vadanti sampadaḥ // BhKir_1.14 //
analyzed: kriyā apavargeṣu anujīvi sāt kṛtāḥ kṛtajña tām asya vadanti sampadaḥ

original: anārataṃ tena padeṣu lambhitā vibhajya samyag viniyogasatkriyām /
analyzed: anāratam tena padeṣu lambhitā vibhajya samyak viniyoga satkriyām

original: phalanty upāyāḥ paribṛṃhitāyatīr upetya saṃgharṣam ivārthasampadaḥ // BhKir_1.15 //
analyzed: phalanti upāyāḥ paribṛṃhita āyatīḥ upetya saṃgharṣam iva artha sampadaḥ

original: anekarājanyarathāśvasaṃkulaṃ tadīyam āsthānaniketanājiram /
analyzed: aneka rājanya ratha aśva saṃkulam tadīyam āsthāna niketana ajiram

original: nayaty ayugmacchadagandhir ārdratāṃ bhṛśaṃ nṛpopāyanadantināṃ madaḥ // BhKir_1.16 //
analyzed: nayati ayugmacchada gandhiḥ ārdra tām bhṛśam nṛpa upāyana dantinām madaḥ

original: sukhena labhyā dadhataḥ kṛṣīvalair akṛṣṭapacyā iva sasyasampadaḥ /
analyzed: sukhena labhyāḥ dadhataḥ kṛṣīvalaiḥ a kṛṣṭa pacyāḥ iva sasya sampadaḥ

original: vitanvati kṣemam adevamātṛkāś cirāya tasmin kuravaś cakāsati // BhKir_1.17 //
analyzed: vitanvati kṣemam a deva mātṛkāḥ cirāya tasmin kuravaḥ cakāsati

original: mahaujaso mānadhanā dhanārcitā dhanurbhṛtaḥ saṃyati labdhakīrtayaḥ /
analyzed: mahā ojasaḥ māna dhanāḥ dhana arcitāḥ dhanuḥ bhṛtaḥ saṃyati labdha kīrtayaḥ

original: na saṃhatās tasya na bhedavṛttayaḥ priyāṇi vāñchanty asubhiḥ samīhitum // BhKir_1.18 //
analyzed: na saṃhatāḥ tasya na bheda vṛttayaḥ priyāṇi vāñchanti asubhiḥ samīhitum

original: udārakīrter udayaṃ dayāvataḥ praśāntabādhaṃ diśato 'bhirakṣayā /
analyzed: udāra kīrteḥ udayam dayāvataḥ praśānta bādham diśataḥ bhirakṣayā

original: svayaṃ pradugdhe 'sya guṇair upasnutā vasūpamānasya vasūni medinī // BhKir_1.19 //
analyzed: svayam pradugdhe sya guṇaiḥ upasnutā vasu upamānasya vasūni medinī

original: mahībhujāṃ saccaritaiś caraiḥ kriyāḥ sa veda niḥśesam aśeṣitakriyaḥ /
analyzed: mahībhujām sat caritaiḥ caraiḥ kriyāḥ sa veda niḥśesam a śeṣita kriyaḥ

original: mahodayais tasya hitānubandhibhiḥ pratīyate dhātur ivehitaṃ phalaiḥ // BhKir_1.20 //
analyzed: mahodayaiḥ tasya hita anubandhibhiḥ pratīyate dhātuḥ iva īhitam phalaiḥ

original: na tena sajyaṃ kvacid udyataṃ dhanur na vā kṛtaṃ kopavijihmam ānanam /
analyzed: na tena sajyam kvacid udyatam dhanuḥ na vā kṛtam kopa vijihmam ānanam

original: guṇānurāgeṇa śirobhir uhyate narādhipair mālyam ivāsya śāsanam // BhKir_1.21 //
analyzed: guṇa anurāgeṇa śirobhiḥ uhyate narādhipaiḥ mālyam iva asya śāsanam

original: sa yauvarājye navayauvanoddhataṃ nidhāya duḥśāsanam iddhaśāsanaḥ /
analyzed: sa yauvarājye nava yauvana uddhatam nidhāya duḥśāsanam iddha śāsanaḥ

original: makheṣv akhinno 'numataḥ purodhasā dhinoti havyena hiraṇyaretasam // BhKir_1.22 //
analyzed: makheṣu a khinnaḥ numataḥ purodhasā dhinoti havyena hiraṇyaretasam

original: pralīnabhūpālam api sthirāyati praśāsad āvāridhi maṇḍalaṃ bhuvaḥ /
analyzed: pralīna bhūpālam api sthirāyati praśāsat āvāridhi maṇḍalam bhuvaḥ

original: sa cintayaty eva bhiyas tvad eṣyatīr aho durantā balavadvirodhitā // BhKir_1.23 //
analyzed: sa cintayati eva bhiyaḥ tvat eṣyatīḥ aho durantā balavat virodhi tā

original: kathāprasaṅgena janair udāhṛtād anusmṛtākhaṇḍalasūnuvikramaḥ /
analyzed: kathā prasaṅgena janaiḥ udāhṛtāt anusmṛta ākhaṇḍala sūnu vikramaḥ

original: tavābhidhānād vyathate natānanaḥ sa duḥsahān mantrapadād ivoragaḥ // BhKir_1.24 //
analyzed: tava abhidhānāt vyathate nata ānanaḥ sa duḥsahāt mantra padāt iva uragaḥ

original: tad āśu kartuṃ tvayi jihmam udyate vidhīyatāṃ tatra vidheyam uttaram /
analyzed: tat āśu kartum tvayi jihmam udyate vidhīyatām tatra vidheyam uttaram

original: parapraṇītāni vacāṃsi cinvatāṃ pravṛttisārāḥ khalu mādṛśāṃ dhiyaḥ // BhKir_1.25 //
analyzed: para praṇītāni vacāṃsi cinvatām pravṛtti sārāḥ khalu mādṛśām dhiyaḥ

original: itīrayitvā giram āttasatkriye gate 'tha patyau vanasaṃnivāsinām /
analyzed: iti īrayitvā giram ātta satkriye gate tha patyau vana saṃnivāsinām

original: praviśya kṛṣṇā sadanaṃ mahībhujā tad ācacakṣe 'nujasannidhau vacaḥ // BhKir_1.26 //
analyzed: praviśya kṛṣṇā sadanam mahībhujā tat ācacakṣe nuja sannidhau vacaḥ

original: niśamya siddhiṃ dviṣatām apākṛtīs tatas tatastyā viniyantum akṣamā /
analyzed: niśamya siddhim dviṣatām apākṛtīḥ tatas tatastyāḥ viniyantum akṣamā

original: nṛpasya manyuvyavasāyadīpinīr udājahāra drupadātmajā giraḥ // BhKir_1.27 //
analyzed: nṛpasya manyu vyavasāya dīpinīḥ udājahāra drupada ātmajā giraḥ

original: bhavādṛśeṣu pramadājanoditaṃ bhavaty adhikṣepa ivānuśāsanam /
analyzed: bhavādṛśeṣu pramadā jana uditam bhavati adhikṣepaḥ iva anuśāsanam

original: tathāpi vaktuṃ vyavasāyayanti māṃ nirastanārīsamayā durādhayaḥ // BhKir_1.28 //
analyzed: tathā api vaktum vyavasāyayanti mām nirasta nārī samayāḥ durādhayaḥ

original: akhaṇḍam ākhaṇḍalatulyadhāmabhiś ciraṃ dhṛtā bhūpatibhiḥ svavaṃśajaiḥ /
analyzed: akhaṇḍam ākhaṇḍala tulya dhāmabhiḥ ciram dhṛtāḥ bhūpatibhiḥ sva vaṃśa jaiḥ

original: tvayā svahastena mahī madacyutā mataṅgajena srag ivāpavarjitā // BhKir_1.29 //
analyzed: tvayā sva hastena mahī mada cyutā mataṅga jena sraj iva apavarjitā

original: vrajanti te mūḍhadhiyaḥ parābhavaṃ bhavanti māyāviṣu ye na māyinaḥ /
analyzed: vrajanti te mūḍha dhiyaḥ parābhavam bhavanti māyāviṣu ye na māyinaḥ

original: praviśya hi ghnanti śaṭhās tathāvidhān asaṃvṛtāṅgān niśitā iveṣavaḥ // BhKir_1.30 //
analyzed: praviśya hi ghnanti śaṭhāḥ tathāvidhān asaṃvṛta aṅgān niśitāḥ iva iṣavaḥ

original: guṇānuraktām anuraktasādhanaḥ kulābhimānī kulajāṃ narādhipaḥ /
analyzed: guṇa anuraktām anurakta sādhanaḥ kula abhimānī kula jām narādhipaḥ

original: parais tvadanyaḥ ka ivāpahārayen manoramām ātmavadhūm iva śriyam // BhKir_1.31 //
analyzed: paraiḥ tvad anyaḥ kaḥ iva apahārayet manoramām ātma vadhūm iva śriyam

original: bhavantam etarhi manasvigarhite vivartamānaṃ naradeva vartmani /
analyzed: bhavantam etarhi manasvi garhite vivartamānam naradeva vartmani

original: kathaṃ na manyur jvalayaty udīritaḥ śamītaruṃ śuṣkam ivāgnir ucchikhaḥ // BhKir_1.32 //
analyzed: katham na manyuḥ jvalayati udīritaḥ śamī tarum śuṣkam iva agniḥ ucchikhaḥ

original: avandhyakopasya nihantur āpadāṃ bhavanti vaśyāḥ svayam eva dehinaḥ /
analyzed: avandhya kopasya nihantuḥ āpadām bhavanti vaśyāḥ svayam eva dehinaḥ

original: amarṣaśūnyena janasya jantunā na jātahārdena na vidviṣādaraḥ // BhKir_1.33 //
analyzed: amarṣa śūnyena janasya jantunā na jāta hārdena na vidviṣā ādaraḥ

original: paribhramaṃl lohitacandanocitaḥ padātir antargiri reṇurūṣitaḥ /
analyzed: paribhraman lohita candana ucitaḥ padātiḥ antargiri reṇu rūṣitaḥ

original: mahārathaḥ satyadhanasya mānasaṃ dunoti te kaccid ayaṃ vṛkodaraḥ // BhKir_1.34 //
analyzed: mahā rathaḥ satya dhanasya mānasam dunoti te kaccit ayam vṛkodaraḥ

original: vijitya yaḥ prājyam ayacchad uttarān kurūn akupyaṃ vasu vāsavopamaḥ /
analyzed: vijitya yaḥ prājyam ayacchat uttarān kurūn akupyam vasu vāsava upamaḥ

original: sa valkavāsāṃsi tavādhunāharan karoti manyuṃ na kathaṃ dhanaṃjayaḥ // BhKir_1.35 //
analyzed: sa valka vāsāṃsi tava adhunā āharan karoti manyum na katham dhanaṃjayaḥ

original: vanāntaśayyākaṭhinīkṛtākṛtī kacācitau viṣvag ivāgajau gajau /
analyzed: vanānta śayyā kaṭhinīkṛta ākṛtī kaca ācitau iva agajau gajau

original: kathaṃ tvam etau dhṛtisaṃyamau yamau vilokayann utsahase na bādhitum // BhKir_1.36 //
analyzed: katham tvam etau dhṛti saṃyamau yamau vilokayan utsahase na bādhitum

original: imām ahaṃ veda na tāvakīṃ dhiyaṃ vicitrarūpāḥ khalu cittavṛttayaḥ /
analyzed: imām aham veda na tāvakīm dhiyam vicitra rūpāḥ khalu citta vṛttayaḥ

original: vicintayantyā bhavadāpadaṃ parāṃ rujanti cetaḥ prasabhaṃ mamādhayaḥ // BhKir_1.37 //
analyzed: vicintayantyāḥ bhavat āpadam parām rujanti cetaḥ prasabham mama ādhayaḥ

original: purādhirūḍhaḥ śayanaṃ mahādhanaṃ vibodhyase yaḥ stutigītimaṅgalaiḥ /
analyzed: purā adhirūḍhaḥ śayanam mahādhanam vibodhyase yaḥ stuti gīti maṅgalaiḥ

original: adabhradarbhām adhiśayya sa sthalīṃ jahāsi nidrām aśivaiḥ śivārutaiḥ // BhKir_1.38 //
analyzed: adabhra darbhām adhiśayya sa sthalīm jahāsi nidrām aśivaiḥ śivā rutaiḥ

original: puropanītaṃ nṛpa rāmaṇīyakaṃ dvijātiśeṣeṇa yad etad andhasā /
analyzed: purā upanītam nṛpa rāmaṇīyakam dvija ati śeṣeṇa yat etat andhasā

original: tad adya te vanyaphalāśinaḥ paraṃ paraiti kārśyaṃ yaśasā samaṃ vapuḥ // BhKir_1.39 //
analyzed: tat adya te vanya phala āśinaḥ param paraiti kārśyam yaśasā samam vapuḥ

original: anārataṃ yau maṇipīṭhaśāyināv arañjayad rājaśiraḥsrajāṃ rajaḥ /
analyzed: anāratam yau maṇi pīṭha śāyinau arañjayat rāja śiraḥ srajām rajaḥ

original: niṣīdatas tau caraṇau vaneṣu te mṛgadvijālūnaśikheṣu barhiṣām // BhKir_1.40 //
analyzed: niṣīdataḥ tau caraṇau vaneṣu te mṛga dvija ālūna śikheṣu barhiṣām

original: dviṣannimittā yad iyaṃ daśā tataḥ samūlam unmūlayatīva me manaḥ /
analyzed: dviṣat nimittā yat iyam daśā tatas sa mūlam unmūlayati iva me manaḥ

original: parair aparyāsitavīryasampadāṃ parābhavo 'py utsava eva māninām // BhKir_1.41 //
analyzed: paraiḥ a paryāsita vīrya sampadām parābhavaḥ u pi utsavaḥ eva māninām

original: vihāya śāntiṃ nṛpa dhāma tat punaḥ prasīda saṃdhehi vadhāya vidviṣām /
analyzed: vihāya śāntim nṛpa dhāma tat punar prasīda saṃdhehi vadhāya vidviṣām

original: vrajanti śatrūn avadhūya niḥspṛhāḥ śamena siddhiṃ munayo na bhūbhṛtaḥ // BhKir_1.42 //
analyzed: vrajanti śatrūn avadhūya niḥspṛhāḥ śamena siddhim munayaḥ na bhūbhṛtaḥ

original: puraḥsarā dhāmavatāṃ yaśodhanāḥ suduḥsahaṃ prāpya nikāram īdṛśam /
analyzed: puraḥsarāḥ dhāmavatām yaśaḥ dhanāḥ su duḥsaham prāpya nikāram īdṛśam

original: bhavādṛśāś ced adhikurvate parān nirāśrayā hanta hatā manasvitā // BhKir_1.43 //
analyzed: bhavādṛśāḥ ced adhikurvate parān nirāśrayā hanta hatā manasvi tā

original: atha kṣamām eva nirastasādhanaś cirāya paryeṣi sukhasya sādhanam /
analyzed: atha kṣamām eva nirasta sādhanaḥ cirāya paryeṣi sukhasya sādhanam

original: vihāya lakṣmīpatilakṣma kārmukaṃ jaṭādharaḥ sañ juhudhīha pāvakam // BhKir_1.44 //
analyzed: vihāya lakṣmīpati lakṣma kārmukam jaṭā dharaḥ sam juhudhi iha pāvakam

original: na samayaparirakṣaṇaṃ kṣamaṃ te nikṛtipareṣu pareṣu bhūridhāmnaḥ /
analyzed: na samaya parirakṣaṇam kṣamam te nikṛti pareṣu pareṣu bhūri dhāmnaḥ

original: ariṣu hi vijayārthinaḥ kṣitīśā vidadhati sopadhi saṃdhidūṣaṇāni // BhKir_1.45 //
analyzed: ariṣu hi vijaya arthinaḥ kṣitīśāḥ vidadhati sa upadhi saṃdhi dūṣaṇāni

original: vidhisamayaniyogād dīptisaṃhārajihmaṃ śithilabalam agādhe magnam āpatpayodhau /
analyzed: vidhi samaya niyogāt dīpti saṃhāra jihmam śithila balam agādhe magnam āpad payodhau

original: riputimiram udasyodīyamānaṃ dinādau dinakṛtam iva lakṣmīs tvāṃ samabhyetu bhūyaḥ // BhKir_1.46 //
analyzed: ripu timiram udasya udīyamānam dina ādau dinakṛtam iva lakṣmīḥ tvām samabhyetu bhūyas

original: vihitāṃ priyayā manaḥpriyām atha niścitya giraṃ garīyasīm /
analyzed: vihitām priyayā manaḥ priyām atha niścitya giram garīyasīm

original: upapattimad ūrjitāśrayaṃ nṛpam ūce vacanaṃ vṛkodaraḥ // BhKir_2.1 //
analyzed: upapattimat ūrjita āśrayam nṛpam ūce vacanam vṛkodaraḥ

original: yad avocata vīkṣya māninī paritaḥ snehamayena cakṣuṣā /
analyzed: yat avocata vīkṣya māninī paritas sneha mayena cakṣuṣā

original: api vāgadhipasya durvacaṃ vacanaṃ tad vidadhīta vismayam // BhKir_2.2 //
analyzed: api vāc adhipasya durvacam vacanam tat vidadhīta vismayam

original: viṣamo 'pi vigāhyate nayaḥ kṛtatīrthaḥ payasām ivāśayaḥ /
analyzed: viṣamaḥ u pi vigāhyate nayaḥ kṛta tīrthaḥ payasām iva āśayaḥ

original: sa tu tatra viśeṣadurlabhaḥ sad upanyasyati kṛtyavartma yaḥ // BhKir_2.3 //
analyzed: sa tu tatra viśeṣa durlabhaḥ sat upanyasyati kṛtya vartma yaḥ

original: pariṇāmasukhe garīyasi vyathake 'smin vacasi kṣataujasām /
analyzed: pariṇāma sukhe garīyasi vyathake smin vacasi kṣata ojasām

original: ativīryavatīva bheṣaje bahur alpīyasi dṛśyate guṇaḥ // BhKir_2.4 //
analyzed: ati vīryavati iva bheṣaje bahuḥ alpīyasi dṛśyate guṇaḥ

original: iyam iṣṭaguṇāya rocatāṃ rucirārthā bhavate 'pi bhāratī /
analyzed: iyam iṣṭa guṇāya rocatām rucira arthā bhavate bhāratī

original: nanu vaktṛviśeṣaniḥspṛhā guṇagṛhyā vacane vipaścitaḥ // BhKir_2.5 //
analyzed: nanu vaktṛ viśeṣa niḥspṛhāḥ guṇa gṛhyāḥ vacane vipaścitaḥ

original: catasṛṣv api te vivekinī nṛpa vidyāsu nirūḍhim āgatā /
analyzed: catasṛṣu api te vivekinī nṛpa vidyāsu nirūḍhim āgatā

original: katham etya matir viparyayaṃ kariṇī paṅkam ivāvasīdati // BhKir_2.6 //
analyzed: katham etya matiḥ viparyayam kariṇī paṅkam iva avasīdati

original: vidhuraṃ kim ataḥ paraṃ parair avagītāṃ gamite daśām imām /
analyzed: vidhuram kim atas param paraiḥ avagītām gamite daśām imām

original: avasīdati yat surair api tvayi sambhāvitavṛtti pauruṣam // BhKir_2.7 //
analyzed: avasīdati yat suraiḥ api tvayi sambhāvita vṛtti pauruṣam

original: dviṣatām udayaḥ sumedhasā gurur asvantataraḥ sumarṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: dviṣatām udayaḥ sumedhasā guruḥ asvantataraḥ sumarṣaṇaḥ

original: na mahān api bhūtim icchatā phalasampatpravaṇaḥ parikṣayaḥ // BhKir_2.8 //
analyzed: na mahān api bhūtim icchatā phala sampad pravaṇaḥ parikṣayaḥ

original: acireṇa parasya bhūyasīṃ viparītāṃ vigaṇayya cātmanaḥ /
analyzed: acireṇa parasya bhūyasīm viparītām vigaṇayya ca ātmanaḥ

original: kṣayayuktim upekṣate kṛtī kurute tatpratikāram anyathā // BhKir_2.9 //
analyzed: kṣaya yuktim upekṣate kṛtī kurute tad pratikāram anyathā

original: anupālayatām udeṣyatīṃ prabhuśaktiṃ dviṣatām anīhayā /
analyzed: anupālayatām udeṣyatīm prabhu śaktim dviṣatām anīhayā

original: apayānty acirān mahībhujāṃ jananirvādabhayād iva śriyaḥ // BhKir_2.10 //
analyzed: apayānti acirāt mahībhujām jana nirvāda bhayāt iva śriyaḥ

original: kṣayayuktam api svabhāvajaṃ dadhataṃ dhāma śivaṃ samṛddhaye /
analyzed: kṣaya yuktam api svabhāva jam dadhatam dhāma śivam samṛddhaye

original: praṇamanty anapāyam utthitaṃ pratipaccandram iva prajā nṛpam // BhKir_2.11 //
analyzed: praṇamanti anapāyam utthitam pratipad candram iva prajāḥ nṛpam

original: prabhavaḥ khalu kośadaṇḍayoḥ kṛtapañcāṅgavinirṇayo nayaḥ /
analyzed: prabhavaḥ khalu kośa daṇḍayoḥ kṛta pañcāṅga vinirṇayaḥ nayaḥ

original: sa vidheyapadeṣu dakṣatāṃ niyatiṃ loka ivānurudhyate // BhKir_2.12 //
analyzed: sa vidheya padeṣu dakṣa tām niyatim lokaḥ iva anurudhyate

original: abhimānavato manasvinaḥ priyam uccaiḥ padam ārurukṣataḥ /
analyzed: abhimānavataḥ manasvinaḥ priyam uccais padam ārurukṣataḥ

original: vinipātanivartanakṣamaṃ matam ālambanam ātmapauruṣam // BhKir_2.13 //
analyzed: vinipāta nivartana kṣamam matam ālambanam ātma pauruṣam

original: vipado 'bhibhavanty avikramaṃ rahayaty āpadupetam āyatiḥ /
analyzed: vipadaḥ bhibhavanti avikramam rahayati āpad upetam āyatiḥ

original: niyatā laghutā nirāyater agarīyān na padaṃ nṛpaśriyaḥ // BhKir_2.14 //
analyzed: niyatā laghu tā nirāyateḥ agarīyān na padam nṛpa śriyaḥ

original: tad alaṃ pratipakṣam unnater avalambya vyavasāyavandhyatām /
analyzed: tat alam pratipakṣam unnateḥ avalambya vyavasāya vandhya tām

original: nivasanti parākramāśrayā na viṣādena samaṃ samṛddhayaḥ // BhKir_2.15 //
analyzed: nivasanti parākrama āśrayāḥ na viṣādena samam samṛddhayaḥ

original: atha ced avadhiḥ pratīkṣyate katham āviṣkṛtajihmavṛttinā /
analyzed: atha ced avadhiḥ pratīkṣyate katham āviṣkṛta jihma vṛttinā

original: dhṛtarāṣṭrasutena sutyajyāś ciram āsvādya narendrasampadaḥ // BhKir_2.16 //
analyzed: dhṛtarāṣṭra sutena su tyajyāḥ ciram āsvādya narendra sampadaḥ

original: dviṣatā vihitaṃ tvayāthavā yadi labdhā punar ātmanaḥ padam /
analyzed: dviṣatā vihitam tvayā athavā yadi labdhā punar ātmanaḥ padam

original: jananātha tavānujanmanāṃ kṛtam āviṣkṛtapauruṣair bhujaiḥ // BhKir_2.17 //
analyzed: jananātha tava anujanmanām kṛtam āviṣkṛta pauruṣaiḥ bhujaiḥ

original: madasiktamukhair mṛgādhipaḥ karibhir vartayati svayaṃ hataiḥ /
analyzed: mada sikta mukhaiḥ mṛgādhipaḥ karibhiḥ vartayati svayam hataiḥ

original: laghayan khalu tejasā jagan na mahān icchati bhūtim anyataḥ // BhKir_2.18 //
analyzed: laghayan khalu tejasā jagat na mahān icchati bhūtim anyatas

original: abhimānadhanasya gatvarair asubhiḥ sthāsnu yaśaś cicīṣataḥ /
analyzed: abhimāna dhanasya gatvaraiḥ asubhiḥ sthāsnu yaśaḥ cicīṣataḥ

original: acirāṃśuvilāsacañcalā nanu lakṣmīḥ phalam ānuṣaṅgikam // BhKir_2.19 //
analyzed: acira aṃśu vilāsa cañcalā nanu lakṣmīḥ phalam ānuṣaṅgikam

original: jvalitaṃ na hiraṇyaretasaṃ cayam āskandati bhasmanāṃ janaḥ /
analyzed: jvalitam na hiraṇyaretasam cayam āskandati bhasmanām janaḥ

original: abhibhūtibhayād asūn ataḥ sukham ujjhanti na dhāma māninaḥ // BhKir_2.20 //
analyzed: abhibhūti bhayāt asūn atas sukham ujjhanti na dhāma māninaḥ

original: kim avekṣya phalaṃ payodharān dhvanataḥ prārthayate mṛgādhipaḥ /
analyzed: kim avekṣya phalam payodharān dhvanataḥ prārthayate mṛgādhipaḥ

original: prakṛtiḥ khalu sā mahīyasaḥ sahate nānyasamunnatiṃ yayā // BhKir_2.21 //
analyzed: prakṛtiḥ khalu sā mahīyasaḥ sahate na anya samunnatim yayā

original: kuru tan matim eva vikrame nṛpa nirdhūya tamaḥ pramādajam /
analyzed: kuru tat matim eva vikrame nṛpa nirdhūya tamaḥ pramāda jam

original: dhruvam etad avehi vidviṣāṃ tvadanutsāhahatā vipattayaḥ // BhKir_2.22 //
analyzed: dhruvam etat avehi vidviṣām tvad anutsāha hatāḥ vipattayaḥ

original: dviradān iva digvibhāvitāṃś caturas toyanidhīn ivāyataḥ /
analyzed: dviradān iva diś vibhāvitān caturaḥ toyanidhīn iva āyataḥ

original: prasaheta raṇe tavānujān dviṣatāṃ kaḥ śatamanyutejasaḥ // BhKir_2.23 //
analyzed: prasaheta raṇe tava anujān dviṣatām kaḥ śatamanyu tejasaḥ

original: jvalatas tava jātavedasaḥ satataṃ vairikṛtasya cetasi /
analyzed: jvalataḥ tava jātavedasaḥ satatam vairi kṛtasya cetasi

original: vidadhātu śamaṃ śivetarā ripunārīnayanāmbusantatiḥ // BhKir_2.24 //
analyzed: vidadhātu śamam śivā itarā ripu nārī nayana ambu santatiḥ

original: iti darśitavikriyaṃ sutaṃ marutaḥ kopaparītamānasam /
analyzed: iti darśita vikriyam sutam marutaḥ kopa parīta mānasam

original: upasāntvayituṃ mahīpatir dviradaṃ duṣṭam ivopacakrame // BhKir_2.25 //
analyzed: upasāntvayitum mahīpatiḥ dviradam duṣṭam iva upacakrame

original: apavarjitaviplave śucay hṛdayagrāhiṇi maṅgalāspade /
analyzed: apavarjita viplave śucau hṛdaya grāhiṇi maṅgala āspade

original: vimalā tava vistare girāṃ matir ādarśa ivābhidṛśyate // BhKir_2.26 //
analyzed: vimalā tava vistare girām matiḥ ādarśe iva abhidṛśyate

original: sphuṭatā na padair apākṛtā na ca na svīkṛtam arthagauravam /
analyzed: sphuṭatā na padaiḥ apākṛtāḥ na ca na svīkṛtam artha gauravam

original: racitā pṛthagarthatā girāṃ na ca sāmarthyam apohitaṃ kvacit // BhKir_2.27 //
analyzed: racitā pṛthak artha tā girām na ca sāmarthyam apohitam kvacid

original: upapattir udāhṛtā balād anumānena na cāgamaḥ kṣataḥ /
analyzed: upapattiḥ udāhṛtā balāt anumānena na ca āgamaḥ kṣataḥ

original: idam īdṛg anīdṛgāśayaḥ prasabhaṃ vaktum upakrameta kaḥ // BhKir_2.28 //
analyzed: idam īdṛś an īdṛś āśayaḥ prasabham vaktum upakrameta kaḥ

original: avitṛptatayā tathāpi me hṛdayaṃ nirṇayam eva dhāvati /
analyzed: a vitṛpta tayā tathā api me hṛdayam nirṇayam eva dhāvati

original: avasāyayituṃ kṣamāḥ sukhaṃ na vidheyeṣu viśeṣasampadaḥ // BhKir_2.29 //
analyzed: avasāyayitum kṣamāḥ sukham na vidheyeṣu viśeṣa sampadaḥ

original: sahasā vidadhīta na kriyām avivekaḥ param āpadāṃ padam /
analyzed: sahasā vidadhīta na kriyām avivekaḥ param āpadām padam

original: vṛṇate hi vimṛśyakāriṇaṃ guṇalubdhāḥ svayam eva sampadaḥ // BhKir_2.30 //
analyzed: vṛṇate hi vimṛśyakāriṇam guṇa lubdhāḥ svayam eva sampadaḥ

original: abhivarṣati yo 'nupālayan vidhibījāni vivekavāriṇā /
analyzed: abhivarṣati yaḥ nupālayan vidhi bījāni viveka vāriṇā

original: sa sadā phalaśālinīṃ kriyāṃ śaradaṃ loka ivādhitiṣṭhati // BhKir_2.31 //
analyzed: sa sadā phala śālinīm kriyām śaradam loke iva adhitiṣṭhati

original: śuci bhūṣayati śrutaṃ vapuḥ praśamas tasya bhavaty alaṃkriyā /
analyzed: śuci bhūṣayati śrutam vapuḥ praśamaḥ tasya bhavati alaṃkriyā

original: praśamābharaṇaṃ parākramaḥ sa nayāpāditasiddhibhūṣaṇaḥ // BhKir_2.32 //
analyzed: praśama ābharaṇam parākramaḥ sa naya āpādita siddhi bhūṣaṇaḥ

original: matibhedatamastirohite gahane kṛtyavidhau vivekinām /
analyzed: mati bheda tamaḥ tirohite gahane kṛtya vidhau vivekinām

original: sukṛtaḥ pariśuddha āgamaḥ kurute dīpa ivārthadarśanam // BhKir_2.33 //
analyzed: su kṛtaḥ pariśuddhaḥ āgamaḥ kurute dīpaḥ iva artha darśanam

original: spṛhaṇīyaguṇair mahātmabhiś carite vartmani yacchatāṃ manaḥ /
analyzed: spṛhaṇīya guṇaiḥ mahātmabhiḥ carite vartmani yacchatām manaḥ

original: vidhihetur ahetur āgasāṃ vinipāto 'pi samaḥ samunnateḥ // BhKir_2.34 //
analyzed: vidhi hetuḥ ahetuḥ āgasām vinipātaḥ samaḥ samunnateḥ

original: śivam aupayikaṃ garīyasīṃ phalaniṣpattim adūṣitāyatim /
analyzed: śivam aupayikam garīyasīm phala niṣpattim a dūṣita āyatim

original: vigaṇayya nayanti pauruṣaṃ vijitakrodharayā jigīṣavaḥ // BhKir_2.35 //
analyzed: vigaṇayya nayanti pauruṣam vijita krodha rayāḥ jigīṣavaḥ

original: apaneyam udetum icchatā timiraṃ roṣamayaṃ dhiyā puraḥ /
analyzed: apaneyam udetum icchatā timiram roṣa mayam dhiyā puras

original: avibhidya niśākṛtaṃ tamaḥ prabhayā nāṃśumatāpy udīyate // BhKir_2.36 //
analyzed: a vibhidya niśākṛtam tamaḥ prabhayā na aṃśumatā api udīyate

original: balavān api kopajanmanas tamaso nābhibhavaṃ ruṇaddhi yaḥ /
analyzed: balavān api kopa janmanaḥ tamasaḥ nā abhibhavam ruṇaddhi yaḥ

original: kṣayapakṣa ivaindavīḥ kalāḥ sakalā hanti sa śaktisampadaḥ // BhKir_2.37 //
analyzed: kṣaya pakṣe iva aindavīḥ kalāḥ sakalāḥ hanti sa śakti sampadaḥ

original: samavṛttir upaiti mārdavaṃ samaye yaś ca tanoti tigmatām /
analyzed: sama vṛttiḥ upaiti mārdavam samaye yaḥ ca tanoti tigma tām

original: adhitiṣṭhati lokam ojasā sa vivasvān iva medinīpatiḥ // BhKir_2.38 //
analyzed: adhitiṣṭhati lokam ojasā sa vivasvān iva medinīpatiḥ

original: kva cirāya parigrahaḥ śriyāṃ kva ca duṣṭendriyavājivaśyatā /
analyzed: kva cirāya parigrahaḥ śriyām kva ca duṣṭa indriya vāji vaśya tā

original: śaradabhracalāś calendriyair asurakṣā hi bahucchalāḥ śriyaḥ // BhKir_2.39 //
analyzed: śarad abhra calāḥ cala indriyaiḥ asu rakṣāḥ hi bahu chalāḥ śriyaḥ

original: kim asāmayikaṃ vitanvatā manasaḥ kṣobham upāttaraṃhasaḥ /
analyzed: kim asāmayikam vitanvatā manasaḥ kṣobham upātta raṃhasaḥ

original: kriyate patir uccakair apāṃ bhavatā dhīratayādharīkṛtaḥ // BhKir_2.40 //
analyzed: kriyate patiḥ uccakais apām bhavatā dhīra tayā adharīkṛtaḥ

original: śrutam apy adhigamya ye ripūn vinayante sma na śarīrajanmanaḥ /
analyzed: śrutam api adhigamya ye ripūn vinayante sma na śarīrajanmanaḥ

original: janayanty acirāya sampadām ayaśas te khalu cāpalāśrayam // BhKir_2.41 //
analyzed: janayanti acirāya sampadām ayaśaḥ te khalu cāpala āśrayam

original: atipātitakālasādhanā svaśarīrendriyavargatāpanī /
janavan na bhavantam akṣamā nayasiddher apanetum arhati // BhKir_2.42 //
analyzed: jana vat na bhavantam akṣamā naya siddheḥ apanetum arhati

original: upakārakam āyater bhṛśaṃ prasavaḥ karmaphalasya bhūriṇaḥ /
analyzed: upakārakam āyateḥ bhṛśam prasavaḥ karma phalasya bhūriṇaḥ

original: anapāyi nibarhaṇaṃ dviṣāṃ na titikṣāsamam asti sādhanam // BhKir_2.43 //
analyzed: anapāyi nibarhaṇam dviṣām na titikṣā samam asti sādhanam

original: praṇatipravaṇān vihāya naḥ sahajasnehanibaddhacetasaḥ /
analyzed: praṇati pravaṇān vihāya naḥ sahaja sneha nibaddha cetasaḥ

original: praṇamanti sadā suyodhanaṃ prathame mānabhṛtāṃ na vṛṣṇayaḥ // BhKir_2.44 //
analyzed: praṇamanti sadā suyodhanam prathame māna bhṛtām na vṛṣṇayaḥ

original: suhṛdaḥ sahajās tathetare matam eṣāṃ na vilaṅghayanti ye /
analyzed: suhṛdaḥ sahajāḥ tathā itare matam eṣām na vilaṅghayanti ye

original: vinayād iva yāpayanti te dhṛtarāṣṭrātmajam ātmasiddhaye // BhKir_2.45 //
analyzed: vinayāt iva yāpayanti te dhṛtarāṣṭra ātmajam ātma siddhaye

original: abhiyoga imān mahībhujo bhavatā tasya tataḥ kṛtāvadheḥ /
analyzed: abhiyoge imān mahībhujaḥ bhavatā tasya tatas kṛta avadheḥ

original: pravighāṭayitā samutpatan haridaśvaḥ kamalākarān iva // BhKir_2.46 //
analyzed: pravighāṭayitā samutpatan haridaśvaḥ kamala ākarān iva

original: upajāpasahān vilaṅghayan sa vidhātā nṛpatīn madoddhataḥ /
analyzed: upajāpa sahān vilaṅghayan sa vidhātā nṛpatīn mada uddhataḥ

original: sahate na jano 'py adhaḥkriyāṃ kim u lokādhikadhāma rājakam // BhKir_2.47 //
analyzed: sahate na janaḥ pi adhaḥkriyām kim u loka adhika dhāma rājakam

original: asamāpitakṛtyasampadāṃ hatavegaṃ vinayena tāvatā /
analyzed: a samāpita kṛtya sampadām hata vegam vinayena tāvatā

original: prabhavanty abhimānaśālināṃ madam uttambhayituṃ vibhūtayaḥ // BhKir_2.48 //
analyzed: prabhavanti abhimāna śālinām madam uttambhayitum vibhūtayaḥ

original: madamānasamuddhataṃ nṛpaṃ na viyuṅkte niyamena mūḍhatā /
analyzed: mada mānasam uddhatam nṛpam na viyuṅkte niyamena mūḍha tā

original: atimūḍha udasyate nayān nayahīnād aparajyate janaḥ // BhKir_2.49 //
analyzed: ati mūḍhaḥ udasyate nayāt naya hīnāt aparajyate janaḥ

original: aparāgasamīraṇeritaḥ kramaśīrṇākulamūlasantatiḥ /
sukaras taruvat sahiṣṇunā ripur unmūlayituṃ mahān api // BhKir_2.50 //
analyzed: sukaraḥ taru vat sahiṣṇunā ripuḥ unmūlayitum mahān api

original: aṇur apy upahanti vigrahaḥ prabhum antaḥprakṛtiprakopajaḥ /
analyzed: aṇuḥ api upahanti vigrahaḥ prabhum antar prakṛti prakopa jaḥ

original: akhilaṃ hi hinasti bhūdharaṃ taruśākhāntanigharṣajo 'nalaḥ // BhKir_2.51 //
analyzed: akhilam hi hinasti bhūdharam taru śākhā anta nigharṣa jaḥ nalaḥ

original: matimān vinayapramāthinaḥ samupekṣeta samunnatiṃ dviṣaḥ /
analyzed: matimān vinaya pramāthinaḥ samupekṣeta samunnatim dviṣaḥ

original: sujayaḥ khalu tādṛg antare vipadantā hy avinītasampadaḥ // BhKir_2.52 //
analyzed: sujayaḥ khalu tādṛś antare vipad antāḥ hi avinīta sampadaḥ

original: laghuvṛttitayā bhidāṃ gataṃ bahir antaś ca nṛpasya maṇḍalam /
analyzed: laghu vṛtti tayā bhidām gatam bahis antar ca nṛpasya maṇḍalam

original: abhibhūya haraty anantaraḥ śithilaṃ kūlam ivāpagārayaḥ // BhKir_2.53 //
analyzed: abhibhūya harati anantaraḥ śithilam kūlam iva apagārayaḥ

original: anuśāsatam ity anākulaṃ nayavartmākulam arjunāgrajam /
analyzed: anuśāsatam iti an ākulam naya vartma ākulam arjuna agrajam

original: svayam artha ivābhivāñchitas tam abhīyāya parāśarātmajaḥ // BhKir_2.54 //
analyzed: svayam arthaḥ iva abhivāñchitaḥ tam abhīyāya parāśara ātmajaḥ

original: madhurair avaśāni lambhayann api tiryañci śamaṃ nirīkṣitaiḥ /
analyzed: madhuraiḥ avaśāni lambhayan api tiryañci śamam nirīkṣitaiḥ

original: paritaḥ paṭu bibhrad enasāṃ dahanaṃ dhāma vilokanakṣamam // BhKir_2.55 //
analyzed: paritas paṭu bibhrat enasām dahanam dhāma vilokana kṣamam

original: sahasopagataḥ savismayaṃ tapasāṃ sūtir asūtir enasām /
analyzed: sahasā upagataḥ sa vismayam tapasām sūtiḥ a sūtiḥ enasām

original: dadṛśe jagatībhujā muniḥ sa vapuṣmān iva puṇyasaṃcayaḥ // BhKir_2.56 //
analyzed: dadṛśe jagatībhujā muniḥ sa vapuṣmān iva puṇya saṃcayaḥ

original: athoccakair āsanataḥ parārdhyād udyan sa dhūtāruṇavalkalāgraḥ /
analyzed: atha uccakais āsanataḥ parārdhyāt udyan sa dhūta aruṇa valkala agraḥ

original: rarāja kīrṇākapiśāṃśujālaḥ śṛṅgāt sumeror iva tigmaraśmiḥ // BhKir_2.57 //
analyzed: rarāja kīrṇā kapiśa aṃśu jālaḥ śṛṅgāt sumeroḥ iva tigmaraśmiḥ

original: avahitahṛdayo vidhāya sa arhām ṛṣivad ṛṣipravare gurūpadiṣṭām /
analyzed: avahita hṛdayaḥ vidhāya sa arhām ṛṣi vat ṛṣi pravare guru upadiṣṭām

original: tadanumatam alaṃcakāra paścāt praśama iva śrutam āsanaṃ narendraḥ // BhKir_2.58 //
analyzed: tad anumatam alaṃcakāra paścāt praśame iva śrutam āsanam narendraḥ

original: vyaktoditasmitamayūkhavibhāsitoṣṭhas tiṣṭhan muner abhimukhaṃ sa vikīrṇadhāmnaḥ /
analyzed: vyakta udita smita mayūkha vibhāsita uṣṭhaḥ tiṣṭhan muneḥ abhimukham sa vikīrṇa dhāmnaḥ

original: tanvantam iddham abhito gurum aṃśujālaṃ lakṣmīm uvāha sakalasya śaśāṅkamūrteḥ // BhKir_2.59 //
analyzed: tanvantam iddham abhitas gurum aṃśu jālam lakṣmīm uvāha sakalasya śaśāṅka mūrteḥ

original: tataḥ śaraccandrakarābhirāmair utsarpibhiḥ prāṃśum ivāṃśujālaiḥ /
analyzed: tatas śarad candra kara abhirāmaiḥ utsarpibhiḥ prāṃśum iva aṃśu jālaiḥ

original: bibhrāṇam ānīlarucaṃ piśaṅgīr jaṭās taḍitvantam ivāmbuvāham // BhKir_3.1 //
analyzed: bibhrāṇam ānīla rucam piśaṅgīḥ jaṭāḥ taḍitvantam iva ambuvāham

original: prasādalakṣmīṃ dadhataṃ samagrāṃ vapuḥprakarṣeṇa janātigena /
analyzed: prasāda lakṣmīm dadhatam samagrām vapuḥ prakarṣeṇa jana atigena

original: prasahya cetaḥsu samāsajantam asaṃstutānām api bhāvam ārdram // BhKir_3.2 //
analyzed: prasahya cetaḥsu samāsajantam a saṃstutānām api bhāvam ārdram

original: anuddhatākāratayā viviktāṃ tanvantam antaḥkaraṇasya vṛttim /
analyzed: anuddhata ākāra tayā viviktām tanvantam antaḥkaraṇasya vṛttim

original: mādhuryavisrambhaviśeṣabhājā kṛtopasambhāṣam ivekṣitena // BhKir_3.3 //
analyzed: mādhurya visrambha viśeṣa bhājā kṛta upasambhāṣam iva īkṣitena

original: dharmātmajo dharmanibandhinīnāṃ prasūtim enaḥpraṇudāṃ śrutīnām /
analyzed: dharma ātmajaḥ dharma nibandhinīnām prasūtim enaḥ praṇudām śrutīnām

original: hetuṃ tadabhyāgamane parīpsuḥ sukhopaviṣṭaṃ munim ābabhāṣe // BhKir_3.4 //
analyzed: hetum tad abhyāgamane parīpsuḥ sukha upaviṣṭam munim ābabhāṣe

original: anāptapuṇyopacarair durāpā phalasya nirdhūtarajāḥ savitrī /
analyzed: an āpta puṇya upacaraiḥ durāpā phalasya nirdhūta rajāḥ savitrī

original: tulyā bhavaddarśanasampad eṣā vṛṣṭer divo vītabalāhakāyāḥ // BhKir_3.5 //
analyzed: tulyā bhavat darśana sampad eṣā vṛṣṭeḥ divaḥ vīta balāhakāyāḥ

original: adya kriyāḥ kāmadughāḥ kratūnāṃ satyāśiṣaḥ samprati bhūmidevāḥ /
analyzed: adya kriyāḥ kāmadughāḥ kratūnām satya āśiṣaḥ samprati bhūmidevāḥ

original: ā saṃsṛter asmi jagatsu jātas tvayy āgate yad bahumānapātram // BhKir_3.6 //
analyzed: ā saṃsṛteḥ asmi jagatsu jātaḥ tvayi āgate yat bahu māna pātram

original: śriyaṃ vikarṣaty apahanty aghāni śreyaḥ parisnauti tanoti kīrtim /
analyzed: śriyam vikarṣati apahanti aghāni śreyaḥ parisnauti tanoti kīrtim

original: saṃdarśanaṃ lokaguror amogham amoghaṃ tavātmayoner iva kiṃ na dhatte // BhKir_3.7 //
analyzed: saṃdarśanam loka guroḥ amogham amogham tava ātmayoneḥ iva kim na dhatte

original: ścyotanmayūkhe 'pi himadyutau me nanirvṛtaṃ nirvṛtim eti cakṣuḥ /
analyzed: ścyotat mayūkhe pi himadyutau me na nirvṛtam nirvṛtim eti cakṣuḥ

original: samujjhitajñātiviyogakhedaṃ tvatsaṃnidhāv ucchvasatīva cetaḥ // BhKir_3.8 //
analyzed: samujjhita jñāti viyoga khedam tvad saṃnidhau ucchvasati iva cetaḥ

original: nirāspadaṃ praśnakutūhalitvam asmāsv adhīnaṃ kim u niḥspṛhāṇām /
analyzed: nirāspadam praśna kutūhali tvam asmāsu adhīnam kim niḥspṛhāṇām

original: tathāpi kalyāṇakarīṃ giraṃ te māṃ śrotum icchā mukharīkaroti // BhKir_3.9 //
analyzed: tathā api kalyāṇa karīm giram te mām śrotum icchā mukharīkaroti

original: ity uktavān uktiviśeṣaramyaṃ manaḥ samādhāya jayopapattau /
analyzed: iti uktavān ukti viśeṣa ramyam manaḥ samādhāya jaya upapattau

original: udāracetā giram ity udārāṃ dvaipāyanenābhidadhe narendraḥ // BhKir_3.10 //
analyzed: udāra cetāḥ giram iti udārām dvaipāyanena abhidadhe narendraḥ

original: cicīṣatāṃ janmavatām alaghvīṃ yaśovataṃsām ubhayatra bhūtim /
analyzed: cicīṣatām janmavatām a laghvīm yaśaḥ vataṃsām ubhayatra bhūtim

original: abhyarhitā bandhuṣu tulyarūpā vṛttir viśeṣeṇa tapodhanānām // BhKir_3.11 //
analyzed: abhyarhitā bandhuṣu tulya rūpā vṛttiḥ viśeṣeṇa tapodhanānām

original: tathāpi nighnaṃ nṛpa tāvakīnaiḥ prahvīkṛtaṃ me hṛdayaṃ guṇaughaiḥ /
analyzed: tathā api nighnam nṛpa tāvakīnaiḥ prahvīkṛtam me hṛdayam guṇa oghaiḥ

original: vītaspṛhāṇām api muktibhājāṃ bhavanti bhavyeṣu hi pakṣapātāḥ // BhKir_3.12 //
analyzed: vīta spṛhāṇām api mukti bhājām bhavanti bhavyeṣu hi pakṣapātāḥ

original: sutā na yūyaṃ kim u tasya rājñaḥ suyodhanaṃ vā na guṇair atītāḥ /
analyzed: sutāḥ na yūyam kim u tasya rājñaḥ suyodhanam vā na guṇaiḥ atītāḥ

original: yas tyaktavān vaḥ sa vṛthā balād vā mohaṃ vidhatte viṣayābhilāṣaḥ // BhKir_3.13 //
analyzed: yaḥ tyaktavān vaḥ sa vṛthā balāt vā moham vidhatte viṣaya abhilāṣaḥ

original: jahātu nainaṃ katham arthasiddhiḥ saṃśayya karṇādiṣu tiṣṭhate yaḥ /
analyzed: jahātu nā enam katham artha siddhiḥ saṃśayya karṇa ādiṣu tiṣṭhate yaḥ

original: asādyuyogā hi jayāntarāyāḥ pramāthinīnāṃ vipadāṃ padāni // BhKir_3.14 //
analyzed: hi jaya antarāyāḥ pramāthinīnām vipadām padāni

original: pathaś cyutāyāṃ samitau ripūṇāṃ dharmyāṃ dadhānena dhuraṃ cirāya /
analyzed: pathaḥ cyutāyām samitau ripūṇām dharmyām dadhānena dhuram cirāya

original: tvayā vipatsv apy avipatti ramyam āviṣkṛtaṃ prema paraṃ guṇeṣu // BhKir_3.15 //
analyzed: tvayā vipatsu api a vipatti ramyam āviṣkṛtam prema param guṇeṣu

original: vidhāya vidhvaṃsanam ātmanīnaṃ śamaikavṛtter bhavataś chalena /
analyzed: vidhāya vidhvaṃsanam ātmanīnam śama eka vṛtteḥ bhavataḥ chalena

original: prakāśitatvanmatiśīlasārāḥ kṛtopakārā iva vidviṣas te // BhKir_3.16 //
analyzed: prakāśita tvad mati śīla sārāḥ kṛta upakārāḥ iva vidviṣaḥ te

original: labhyā dharitrī tava vikrameṇa jyāyāṃś ca vīryāstrabalair vipakṣaḥ /
analyzed: labhyā dharitrī tava vikrameṇa jyāyān ca vīrya astra balaiḥ vipakṣaḥ

original: ataḥ prakarṣāya vidhir vidheyaḥ prakarṣatantrā hi raṇe jayaśrīḥ // BhKir_3.17 //
analyzed: atas prakarṣāya vidhiḥ vidheyaḥ prakarṣa tantrā hi raṇe jaya śrīḥ

original: triḥsaptakṛtvo jagatīpatīnāṃ hantā gurur yasya sa jāmadagnyaḥ /
analyzed: tris sapta kṛtvas jagatīpatīnām hantā guruḥ yasya sa jāmadagnyaḥ

original: vīryāvadhūtaḥ sma tadā viveda prakarṣam ādhāravaśaṃ guṇānām // BhKir_3.18 //
analyzed: vīrya avadhūtaḥ sma tadā viveda prakarṣam ādhāra vaśam guṇānām

original: yasminn anaiśvaryakṛtavyalīkaḥ parābhavaṃ prāpta ivāntako 'pi /
analyzed: yasmin an aiśvarya kṛta vyalīkaḥ parābhavam prāptaḥ iva antakaḥ pi

original: dhunvan dhanuḥ kasya raṇe na kuryān mano bhayaikapravaṇaṃ sa bhīṣmaḥ // BhKir_3.19 //
analyzed: dhunvan dhanuḥ kasya raṇe na kuryāt manaḥ bhaya eka pravaṇam sa bhīṣmaḥ

original: sṛjantam ājāviṣusaṃhatīr vaḥ saheta kopajvalitaṃ guruṃ kaḥ /
analyzed: sṛjantam ājau iṣu saṃhatīḥ vaḥ saheta kopa jvalitam gurum kaḥ

original: parisphurallolaśikhāgrajihvaṃ jagaj jighatsantam ivāntavahnim // BhKir_3.20 //
analyzed: parisphurat lola śikhā agra jihvam jagat jighatsantam iva anta vahnim

original: nirīkṣya saṃrambhanirastadhairyaṃ rādheyam ārādhitajāmadagnyam /
analyzed: nirīkṣya saṃrambha nirasta dhairyam rādheyam ārādhita jāmadagnyam

original: asaṃstuteṣu prasabhaṃ bhayeṣu jāyeta mṛtyor api pakṣapātaḥ // BhKir_3.21 //
analyzed: a saṃstuteṣu prasabham bhayeṣu jāyeta mṛtyoḥ api pakṣapātaḥ

original: yayā samāsāditasādhanena suduścarām ācaratā tapasyām /
analyzed: yayā samāsādita sādhanena su duścarām ācaratā tapasyām

original: ete durāpaṃ samavāpya vīryam unmīlitāraḥ kapiketanena // BhKir_3.22 //
analyzed: ete durāpam samavāpya vīryam unmīlitāraḥ kapiketanena

original: mahattvayogāya mahāmahimnām ārādhanīṃ tāṃ nṛpa devatānām /
analyzed: mahat tva yogāya mahā mahimnām ārādhanīm tām nṛpa devatānām

original: dātuṃ pradānocita bhūridhāmnīm upāgataḥ siddhim ivāsmi vidyām // BhKir_3.23 //
analyzed: dātum pradāna ucita bhūri dhāmnīm upāgataḥ siddhim iva asmi vidyām

original: ity uktavantaṃ vraja sādhayeti pramāṇayan vākyam ajātaśatroḥ /
analyzed: iti uktavantam vraja sādhaya iti pramāṇayan vākyam ajātaśatroḥ

original: prasedivāṃsaṃ tam upāsasāda vasann ivānte vinayena jiṣṇuḥ // BhKir_3.24 //
analyzed: prasedivāṃsam tam upāsasāda vasan iva ante vinayena jiṣṇuḥ

original: niryāya vidyā+tha dinādiramyād bimbād ivārkasya mukhān maharṣeḥ /
analyzed: niryāya vidyā atha dina ādi ramyāt bimbāt iva arkasya mukhāt mahā ṛṣeḥ

original: pārthānanaṃ vahnikaṇāvadātā dīptiḥ sphuratpadmam ivābhipede // BhKir_3.25 //
analyzed: pārtha ānanam vahni kaṇā avadātā dīptiḥ sphurat padmam iva abhipede

original: yogaṃ ca taṃ yogyatamāya tasmai tapaḥprabhāvād vitatāra sadyaḥ /
analyzed: yogam ca tam yogyatamāya tasmai tapaḥ prabhāvāt vitatāra sadyas

original: yenāsya tattveṣu kṛte 'vabhāse samunmimīleva cirāya cakṣuḥ // BhKir_3.26 //
analyzed: yena asya tattveṣu kṛte vabhāse samunmimīla iva cirāya cakṣuḥ

original: ākāram āśaṃsitabhūrilābhaṃ dadhānam antaḥkaraṇānurūpam /
analyzed: ākāram āśaṃsita bhūri lābham dadhānam antaḥkaraṇa anurūpam

original: niyojayiṣyan vijayodaye taṃ tapaḥsamādhau munir ity uvāca // BhKir_3.27 //
analyzed: niyojayiṣyan vijaya udaye tam tapaḥ samādhau muniḥ iti uvāca

original: anena yogena vivṛddhatejā nijāṃ parasmai padavīm ayacchan /
analyzed: anena yogena vivṛddha tejāḥ nijām parasmai padavīm a yacchan

original: samācarācāram upāttaśastro japopavāsābhiṣavair munīnām // BhKir_3.28 //
analyzed: samācara ācāram upātta śastraḥ japa upavāsa abhiṣavaiḥ munīnām

original: kariṣyase yatra suduścarāṇi prasattaye gotrabhidas tapāṃsi /
analyzed: kariṣyase yatra su duścarāṇi prasattaye gotrabhidaḥ tapāṃsi

original: śiloccayaṃ cāruśiloccayaṃ tam eṣa kṣaṇān neṣyati guhyakas tvām // BhKir_3.29 //
analyzed: śiloccayam cāru śilā uccayam tam eṣa kṣaṇāt neṣyati guhyakaḥ tvām

original: iti bruvāṇena mahendrasūnuṃ maharṣiṇā tena tirobabhūve /
analyzed: iti bruvāṇena mahā indra sūnum mahā ṛṣiṇā tena tirobabhūve

original: taṃ rājarājānucaro 'sya sākṣāt pradeśam ādeśam ivādhitasthau // BhKir_3.30 //
analyzed: tam rāja rāja anucaraḥ sya sākṣāt pradeśam ādeśam iva adhitasthau

original: kṛtānatir vyāhṛtasāntvavāde jātaspṛhaḥ puṇyajanaḥ sa jiṣṇau /
analyzed: kṛta ānatiḥ vyāhṛta sāntva vāde jāta spṛhaḥ puṇya janaḥ sa jiṣṇau

original: iyāya sakhyāv iva samprasādaṃ viśvāsayaty āśu satāṃ hi yogaḥ // BhKir_3.31 //
analyzed: iyāya sakhyau iva samprasādam viśvāsayati āśu satām hi yogaḥ

original: athoṣṇabhāseva sumerukuñjān vihīyamānān udayāya tena /
analyzed: atha uṣṇa bhāsā iva sumeru kuñjān vihīyamānān udayāya tena

original: bṛhaddyutīn duḥkhakṛtātmalābhaṃ tamaḥ śanaiḥ pāṇḍusutān prapede // BhKir_3.32 //
analyzed: bṛhat dyutīn duḥkha kṛta ātma lābham tamaḥ śanais pāṇḍu sutān prapede

original: asaṃśayālocitakāryanunnaḥ premṇā samānīya vibhajyamānaḥ /
analyzed: asaṃśaya ālocita kārya nunnaḥ premṇā samānīya vibhajyamānaḥ

original: tulyād vibhāgād iva tanmanobhir duḥkhātibhāro 'pi laghuḥ sa mene // BhKir_3.33 //
analyzed: tulyāt vibhāgāt iva tad manobhiḥ duḥkha atibhāraḥ laghuḥ sa mene

original: dhairyeṇa viśvāsyatayā maharṣes tīvrād arātiprabhavāc ca manyoḥ /
analyzed: dhairyeṇa viśvāsya tayā mahā ṛṣeḥ tīvrāt arāti prabhavāt ca manyoḥ

original: vīryaṃ ca vidvatsu sute maghonaḥ sa teṣu na sthānam avāpa śokaḥ // BhKir_3.34 //
analyzed: vīryam ca vidvatsu sute maghonaḥ sa teṣu na sthānam avāpa śokaḥ

original: tān bhūridhāmnaś caturo 'pi dūraṃ vihāya yāmān iva vāsarasya /
analyzed: tān bhūri dhāmnaḥ caturaḥ pi dūram vihāya yāmān iva vāsarasya

original: ekaughabhūtaṃ tad aśarma kṛṣṇāṃ vibhāvarīṃ dhvāntam iva prapede // BhKir_3.35 //
analyzed: eka ogha bhūtam tat a śarma kṛṣṇām vibhāvarīm dhvāntam iva prapede

original: tuṣāralekhākulitotpalābhe paryaśruṇī maṅgalabhaṅgabhīruḥ /
analyzed: tuṣāra lekhā ākulita utpala ābhe paryaśruṇī maṅgala bhaṅga bhīruḥ

original: agūḍhabhāvāpi vilokane sā na locane mīlayituṃ viṣehe // BhKir_3.36 //
analyzed: agūḍha bhāvā api vilokane sā na locane mīlayitum viṣehe

original: akṛtrimapremarasābhirāmaṃ rāmārpitaṃ dṛṣṭivilobhi dṛṣṭam /
analyzed: akṛtrima prema rasa abhirāmam rāma arpitam dṛṣṭi vilobhi dṛṣṭam

original: manaḥprasādāñjalinā nikāmaṃ jagrāha pātheyam ivendrasūnuḥ // BhKir_3.37 //
analyzed: manaḥ prasāda añjalinā nikāmam jagrāha pātheyam iva indrasūnuḥ

original: dhairyāvasādena hṛtaprasādā vanyadvipeneva nidāghasindhuḥ /
analyzed: dhairya avasādena hṛta prasādā vanya dvipena iva nidāgha sindhuḥ

original: niruddhabāṣpodayasannakaṇṭham uvāca kṛcchrād iti rājaputrī // BhKir_3.38 //
analyzed: niruddha bāṣpa udaya sannakaṇṭham uvāca kṛcchrāt iti rāja putrī

original: magnāṃ dviṣacchadmani paṅkabhūte sambhavānāṃ bhūtim ivoddhariṣyan /
analyzed: magnām dviṣat chadmani paṅka bhūte sambhavānām bhūtim iva uddhariṣyan

original: ādhidviṣām ā tapasāṃ prasiddher asmad vinā mā bhṛśam unmanībhūḥ // BhKir_3.39 //
analyzed: ā adhidviṣām ā tapasām prasiddheḥ asmat vinā mā bhṛśam unmanībhūḥ

original: yaśo 'dhigantuṃ sukhalipsayā vā manuṣyasaṃkhyām ativartituṃ vā /
analyzed: yaśaḥ dhigantum sukha lipsayā vā manuṣya saṃkhyām ativartitum vā

original: nirutsukānām abhiyoggabhājāṃ samutsukevāṅkam upaiti siddhiḥ // BhKir_3.40 //
analyzed: nirutsukānām abhiyogga bhājām samutsukā iva aṅkam upaiti siddhiḥ

original: lokaṃ vidhātrā vihitasya goptuṃ kṣattrasya muṣṇan vasu jaitram ojaḥ /
analyzed: lokam vidhātrā vihitasya goptum kṣattrasya muṣṇan vasu jaitram ojaḥ

original: tejasvitāyā vijayaikavṛtter nighnan priyaṃ prāṇam ivābhimānam // BhKir_3.41 //
analyzed: tejasvi tāyāḥ vijaya eka vṛtteḥ nighnan priyam prāṇam iva abhimānam

original: vrīḍānatair āptajanopanītaḥ saṃśayya kṛcchreṇa nṛpaiḥ prapannaḥ /
analyzed: vrīḍā nataiḥ āpta jana upanītaḥ saṃśayya kṛcchreṇa nṛpaiḥ prapannaḥ

original: vitānabhūtaṃ vitataṃ pṛthivyāṃ yaśaḥ samūhann iva digvikīrṇam // BhKir_3.42 //
analyzed: vitāna bhūtam vitatam pṛthivyām yaśaḥ samūhan iva diś vikīrṇam

original: vīryāvadāneṣu kṛtāvamarṣas tanvann abhūtām iva sampratītim /
analyzed: vīrya avadāneṣu kṛta avamarṣaḥ tanvan a bhūtām iva sampratītim

original: kurvan prayāmakṣayam āyatīnām arkatviṣām ahna ivāvaśeṣaḥ // BhKir_3.43 //
analyzed: kurvan prayāma kṣayam āyatīnām arka tviṣām ahnaḥ iva avaśeṣaḥ

original: prasahya yo 'smāsu paraiḥ prayuktaḥ smartuṃ na śakyaḥ kim utādhikartum /
analyzed: prasahya yaḥ smāsu paraiḥ prayuktaḥ smartum na śakyaḥ kim uta adhikartum

original: navīkariṣyaty upaśuṣyad ārdraḥ sa tvad vinā me hṛdayaṃ nikāraḥ // BhKir_3.44 //
analyzed: navīkariṣyati upaśuṣyat ārdraḥ sa tvat vinā me hṛdayam nikāraḥ

original: prāpto 'bhimānavyasanād asahyaṃ dantīva dantavyasanād vikāram /
analyzed: prāptaḥ bhimāna vyasanāt asahyam dantī iva danta vyasanāt vikāram

original: dviṣatpratāpāntaritorutejāḥ śaradghanākīrṇa ivādir ahnaḥ // BhKir_3.45 //
analyzed: dviṣat pratāpa antarita uru tejāḥ śarad ghana ākīrṇaḥ iva ādiḥ ahnaḥ

original: savrīḍamandair iva niṣkriyatvān nātyartham astrair avabhāsamānaḥ /
analyzed: sa vrīḍa mandaiḥ iva niṣkriya tvāt na atyartham astraiḥ avabhāsamānaḥ

original: yaśaḥkṣayakṣīṇajalārṇavābhas tvam anyam ākāram ivābhipannaḥ // BhKir_3.46 //
analyzed: yaśaḥ kṣaya kṣīṇa jala arṇava ābhaḥ tvam anyam ākāram iva abhipannaḥ

original: duḥśāsanāmarṣarajovikīrṇair ebhir vinārthair iva bhāgyanāthaiḥ /
analyzed: duḥśāsana amarṣa rajaḥ vikīrṇaiḥ ebhiḥ vinā arthaiḥ iva bhāgya nāthaiḥ

original: keśaiḥ kadarthīkṛtavīryasāraḥ kaccit sa evāsi dhanaṃjayas tvam // BhKir_3.47 //
analyzed: keśaiḥ kadarthīkṛta vīrya sāraḥ kaccit saḥ evā asi dhanaṃjayaḥ tvam

original: sa kṣattriyas trāṇasahaḥ satāṃ yas tat kārmukaṃ karmasu yasya śaktiḥ /
analyzed: sa kṣattriyaḥ trāṇa sahaḥ satām yaḥ tat kārmukam karmasu yasya śaktiḥ

original: vahan dvayīṃ yady aphale 'rthajāte karoty asaṃskārahatām ivoktim // BhKir_3.48 //
analyzed: vahan dvayīm yadi aphale rtha jāte karoti a saṃskāra hatām iva uktim

original: vītaujasaḥ sannidhimātraśeṣā bhavatkṛtāṃ bhūtim apekṣamāṇāḥ /
analyzed: vīta ojasaḥ sannidhi mātra śeṣāḥ bhavat kṛtām bhūtim apekṣamāṇāḥ

original: samānaduḥkhā iva nas tvadīyāḥ sarūpatāṃ pārtha guṇā bhajante // BhKir_3.49 //
analyzed: samāna duḥkhāḥ iva naḥ tvadīyāḥ sarūpa tām pārtha guṇāḥ bhajante

original: ākṣipyamāṇaṃ ripubhiḥ pramādān nāgair ivālūnasaṭaṃ mṛgendram /
analyzed: ākṣipyamāṇam ripubhiḥ pramādāt nāgaiḥ iva ālūna saṭam mṛgendram

original: tvāṃ dhūr iyaṃ yogyatayādhirūḍhā dīptyā dinaśrīr iva tigmaraśmim // BhKir_3.50 //
analyzed: tvām dhūḥ iyam yogya tayā adhirūḍhā dīptyā dina śrīḥ iva tigmaraśmim

original: karoti yo 'śeṣajanātiriktāṃ sambhāvanām arthavatīṃ kriyābhiḥ /
analyzed: karoti śeṣa jana atiriktām sambhāvanām arthavatīm kriyābhiḥ

original: saṃsatsu jāte puruṣādhikāre na pūraṇī taṃ samupaiti saṃkhyā // BhKir_3.51 //
analyzed: saṃsatsu jāte puruṣa adhikāre na pūraṇī tam samupaiti saṃkhyā

original: priyeṣu yaiḥ pārtha vinopapatter vicintyamānaiḥ klamam eti cetaḥ /
analyzed: priyeṣu yaiḥ pārtha vinā upapatteḥ vicintyamānaiḥ klamam eti cetaḥ

original: tava prayātasya jayāya teṣāṃ kriyād aghānāṃ maghavā vighātam // BhKir_3.52 //
analyzed: tava prayātasya jayāya teṣām kriyāt aghānām maghavā vighātam

original: mā gāś cirāyaikacaraḥ pramādaṃ vasann asambādhaśive 'pi deśe /
analyzed: mā gāḥ cirāya ekacaraḥ pramādam vasan a sambādha śive deśe

original: mātsaryarāgopahatātmanāṃ hi skhalanti sādhuṣv api mānasāni // BhKir_3.53 //
analyzed: mātsarya rāga upahata ātmanām hi skhalanti sādhuṣu api mānasāni

original: tad āśu kurvan vacanaṃ maharṣer manorathān naḥ saphalīkuruṣva /
analyzed: tat āśu kurvan vacanam mahā ṛṣeḥ manorathān naḥ saphalīkuruṣva

original: pratyāgataṃ tvāsmi kṛtārtham eva stanopapīḍaṃ parirabdhukāmā // BhKir_3.54 //
analyzed: pratyāgatam tvā asmi kṛtārtham eva stana upapīḍam parirabdhu kāmā

original: udīritāṃ tām iti yājñasenyā navīkṛtodgrāhitaviprakārām /
analyzed: udīritām tām iti yājñasenyā navīkṛta udgrāhita viprakārām

original: āsādya vācaṃ sa bhṛśaṃ didīpe kāṣṭhām udīcīm iva tigmaraśmiḥ // BhKir_3.55 //
analyzed: āsādya vācam sa bhṛśam didīpe kāṣṭhām udīcīm iva tigmaraśmiḥ

original: athābhipaśyann iva vidviṣaḥ puraḥ purodhasāropitahetisaṃhatiḥ /
analyzed: atha abhipaśyan iva vidviṣaḥ puras purodhasā āropita heti saṃhatiḥ

original: babhāra ramyo 'pi vapuḥ sa bhīṣaṇaṃ gataḥ kriyāṃ mantra ivābhicārikīm // BhKir_3.56 //
analyzed: babhāra ramyaḥ vapuḥ sa bhīṣaṇam gataḥ kriyām mantraḥ iva ābhicārikīm

original: avilaṅghyavikarṣaṇaṃ paraiḥ prathitajyāravakarma kārmukam /
analyzed: a vilaṅghya vikarṣaṇam paraiḥ prathita jyā rava karma kārmukam

original: agatāv aridṛṣṭigocaraṃ śitanistriṃśayujau maheṣudhī // BhKir_3.57 //
analyzed: agatau ari dṛṣṭi gocaram śita nistriṃśa yujau mahā iṣudhī

original: yaśaseva tirodadhan muhur mahasā gotrabhidāyudhakṣatīḥ /
analyzed: yaśasā iva tirodadhan muhur mahasā gotrabhid āyudha kṣatīḥ

original: kavacaṃ ca saratnam udvahañ jvalitajyotir ivāntaraṃ divaḥ // BhKir_3.58 //
analyzed: kavacam ca sa ratnam udvaham jvalita jyotiḥ iva antaram divaḥ

original: akalādhipabhṛtyadarśitaṃ śivam urvīdharavartma samprayān /
analyzed: a kalā adhipa bhṛtya darśitam śivam urvīdhara vartma samprayān

original: hṛdayāni samāviveśa sa kṣaṇam udbāṣpadṛśāṃ tapobhṛtām // BhKir_3.59 //
analyzed: hṛdayāni samāviveśa sa kṣaṇam udbāṣpa dṛśām tapobhṛtām

original: anujagur atha divyaṃ dundubhidhvānam āśāḥ+ surakusumanipātair vyomni lakṣmīr vitene /
analyzed: anujaguḥ atha divyam dundubhi dhvānam āśāḥ sura kusuma nipātaiḥ vyomni lakṣmīḥ vitene

original: priyam iva kathayiṣyann āliliṅga sphurantīṃ bhuvam anibhṛtavelāvīcibāhuḥ payodhiḥ // BhKir_3.60 //
analyzed: priyam iva kathayiṣyan āliliṅga sphurantīm bhuvam a nibhṛta velā vīci bāhuḥ payodhiḥ

original: tataḥ sa kūjatkalahaṃsamekhalāṃ sapākasasyāhitapāṇḍutāguṇām /
analyzed: tatas sa kūjat kalahaṃsa mekhalām sa pāka sasya āhita pāṇḍu tā guṇām

original: upāsasādopajanaṃ janapriyaḥ priyām ivāsāditayauvanāṃ bhuvam // BhKir_4.1 //
analyzed: upāsasāda upajanam jana priyaḥ priyām iva āsādita yauvanām bhuvam

original: vinamraśāliprasavaughaśālinīr apetapaṅkāḥ sasaroruhāmbhasaḥ /
analyzed: vinamra śāli prasava ogha śālinīḥ apeta paṅkāḥ sa saroruha ambhasaḥ

original: nananda paśyann upasīma sa sthalīr upāyanībhūtaśaradguṇaśriyaḥ // BhKir_4.2 //
analyzed: nananda paśyan upasīma sa sthalīḥ upāyanībhūta śarad guṇa śriyaḥ

original: nirīkṣyamāṇā iva vismayākulaiḥ payobhir unmīlitapadmalocanaiḥ /
analyzed: nirīkṣyamāṇāḥ iva vismaya ākulaiḥ payobhiḥ unmīlita padma locanaiḥ

original: hṛtapriyādṛṣṭivilāsavibhramā mano 'sya jahruḥ śapharīvivṛttayaḥ // BhKir_4.3 //
analyzed: hṛta priya adṛṣṭi vilāsa vibhramāḥ jahruḥ śapharī vivṛttayaḥ

original: tutoṣa paśyan kalamasya sa adhikaṃ savārije vāriṇi rāmaṇīyakam /
analyzed: tutoṣa paśyan kalamasya sa adhikam sa vārije vāriṇi rāmaṇīyakam

original: sudurlabhe nārhati ko 'bhinandituṃ prakarṣalakṣmīm anurūpasaṃgame // BhKir_4.4 //
analyzed: su durlabhe nā arhati kaḥ bhinanditum prakarṣa lakṣmīm anurūpa saṃgame

original: nunoda tasya sthalapadminīgataṃ vitarkam āviṣkṛtaphenasaṃtati /
analyzed: nunoda tasya sthalapadminī gatam vitarkam āviṣkṛta phena saṃtati

original: avāptakiñjalkavibhedam uccakair vivṛttapāṭhīnaparāhataṃ payaḥ // BhKir_4.5 //
analyzed: avāpta kiñjalka vibhedam uccakais vivṛtta pāṭhīna parāhatam payaḥ

original: kṛtormirekhaṃ śithilatvam āyatā śanaiḥ śanaiḥ śāntarayeṇa vāriṇā /
analyzed: kṛta ūrmi rekham śithila tvam āyatā śanais śanais śānta rayeṇa vāriṇā

original: nirīkṣya reme sa samudrayoṣitāṃ taraṅgitakṣaumavipāṇḍu saikatam // BhKir_4.6 //
analyzed: nirīkṣya reme sa samudrayoṣitām taraṅgita kṣauma vipāṇḍu saikatam

original: manoramaṃ prāpitam antaraṃ bhruvor alaṃkṛtaṃ kesarareṇuṇāṇunā /
analyzed: manoramam prāpitam antaram bhruvoḥ alaṃkṛtam kesara reṇuṇā aṇunā

original: alaktatāmrādharapallavaśriyā samānayantīm iva bandhujīvakam // BhKir_4.7 //
analyzed: alakta tāmra adhara pallava śriyā samānayantīm iva bandhujīvakam

original: navātapālohitam āhitaṃ muhur mahāniveśau paritaḥ payodharau /
analyzed: nava ātapa ālohitam āhitam muhur mahā niveśau paritas payodharau

original: cakāsayantīm aravindajaṃ rajaḥ pariśramāmbhaḥpulakena sarpatā // BhKir_4.8 //
analyzed: cakāsayantīm aravinda jam rajaḥ pariśrama ambhaḥ pulakena sarpatā

original: kapolasaṃśleṣi vilocanatviṣā vibhūṣayantīm avataṃsakotpalam /
analyzed: kapola saṃśleṣi vilocana tviṣā vibhūṣayantīm avataṃsaka utpalam

original: sutena pāṇḍoḥ kalamasya gopikāṃ nirīkṣya mene śaradaḥ kṛtārthatā // BhKir_4.9 //
analyzed: sutena pāṇḍoḥ kalamasya gopikām nirīkṣya mene śaradaḥ kṛtārtha tā

original: upāratāḥ paścimarātrigocarād apārayantaḥ patituṃ javena gām /
analyzed: upāratāḥ paścima rātri gocarāt a pārayantaḥ patitum javena gām

original: tam utsukāś cakrur avekṣaṇotsukaṃ gavāṃ gaṇāḥ prasnutapīvaraudharasaḥ // BhKir_4.10 //
analyzed: tam utsukāḥ cakruḥ avekṣaṇa utsukam gavām gaṇāḥ

original: parītam ukṣāvajaye jayaśriyā nadantam uccaiḥ kṣatasindhurodhasam /
analyzed: parītam ukṣa avajaye jaya śriyā nadantam uccais kṣata sindhu rodhasam

original: dadarśa puṣṭiṃ dadhataṃ sa śāradīṃ savigrahaṃ darpam ivādhipaṃ gavām // BhKir_4.11 //
analyzed: dadarśa puṣṭim dadhatam sa śāradīm sa vigraham darpam iva adhipam gavām

original: vimucyamānair api tasya mantharaṃ gavāṃ himānīviśadaiḥ kadambakaiḥ /
analyzed: vimucyamānaiḥ api tasya mantharam gavām himānī viśadaiḥ kadambakaiḥ

original: śarannadīnāṃ pulinaiḥ kutūhalaṃ galaddukūlair jaghanair ivādadhe // BhKir_4.12 //
analyzed: śarad nadīnām pulinaiḥ kutūhalam galat dukūlaiḥ jaghanaiḥ iva ādadhe

original: gatān paśūnāṃ sahajanmabandhutāṃ gṛhāśrayaṃ prema vaneṣu bibhrataḥ /
analyzed: gatān paśūnām sahajanma bandhu tām gṛha āśrayam prema vaneṣu bibhrataḥ

original: dadarśa gopān upadhenu pāṇḍavaḥ kṛtānukārān iva gobhir ārjave // BhKir_4.13 //
analyzed: dadarśa gopān upadhenu pāṇḍavaḥ kṛta anukārān iva gobhiḥ ārjave

original: paribhraman mūrdhajaṣaṭpadākulaiḥ smitodayādarśitadantakesaraiḥ /
analyzed: paribhraman mūrdhaja ṣaṭpada ākulaiḥ smita udaya ādarśita danta kesaraiḥ

original: mukhaiś calatkuṇḍalaraśmirañjitair navātapāmṛṣṭasarojacārubhiḥ // BhKir_4.14 //
analyzed: mukhaiḥ calat kuṇḍala raśmi rañjitaiḥ nava ātapa āmṛṣṭa saroja cārubhiḥ

original: nibaddhaniḥśvāsavikampitādharā latā iva prasphuritaikapallavāḥ /
analyzed: nibaddha niḥśvāsa vikampita adharāḥ latāḥ iva prasphurita eka pallavāḥ

original: vyapoḍhapārśvair apavartitatrikā vikarṣaṇaiḥ pāṇivihārahāribhiḥ // BhKir_4.15 //
analyzed: vyapoḍha pārśvaiḥ apavartita trikāḥ vikarṣaṇaiḥ pāṇi vihāra hāribhiḥ

original: vrajājireṣv ambudanādaśaṅkinīḥ śikhaṇḍinām unmadayatsu yoṣitaḥ /
analyzed: vraja ajireṣu ambuda nāda śaṅkinīḥ śikhaṇḍinām unmadayatsu yoṣitaḥ

original: muhuḥ praṇunneṣu mathāṃ vivartanair nadatsu kumbheṣu mṛdaṅgamantharam // BhKir_4.16 //
analyzed: muhur praṇunneṣu vivartanaiḥ nadatsu kumbheṣu mṛdaṅga mantharam

original: sa mantharāvalgitapīvarastanīḥ pariśramaklāntavilocanotpalāḥ /
analyzed: sa manthara āvalgita pīvara stanīḥ pariśrama klānta vilocana utpalāḥ

original: nirīkṣituṃ nopararāma ballavīr abhipranṛttā iva vārayoṣitaḥ // BhKir_4.17 //
analyzed: nirīkṣitum nā upararāma ballavīḥ abhipranṛttāḥ iva vāra yoṣitaḥ

original: papāta pūrvāṃ jahato vijihmatāṃ vṛṣopabhuktāntikasasyasampadaḥ /
analyzed: papāta pūrvām jahataḥ vijihma tām vṛṣa upabhukta antika sasya sampadaḥ

original: rathāṅgasīmantitasāndrakardamān prasaktasampātapṛthakkṛtān pathaḥ // BhKir_4.18 //
analyzed: rathāṅga sīmantita sāndra kardamān prasakta sampāta pṛthakkṛtān pathaḥ

original: janair upagrāmam anindyakarmabhir viviktabhāveṅgitabhūṣaṇair vṛtāḥ /
analyzed: janaiḥ upa grāmam anindya karmabhiḥ vivikta bhāva iṅgita bhūṣaṇaiḥ vṛtāḥ

original: bhṛśaṃ dadarśāśramamaṇḍapopamāḥ sapuṣpahāsāḥ sa niveśavīrudhaḥ // BhKir_4.19 //
analyzed: bhṛśam dadarśa āśrama maṇḍapa upamāḥ sa puṣpahāsāḥ sa niveśa vīrudhaḥ

original: tataḥ sa samprekṣya śaradguṇaśriyaṃ śaradguṇālokanalolacakṣuṣam /
analyzed: tatas sa samprekṣya śarad guṇa śriyam śarad guṇa ālokana lola cakṣuṣam

original: uvāca yakṣas tam acodito 'pi gāṃ na hīṅgitajño 'vasare 'vasīdati // BhKir_4.20 //
analyzed: uvāca yakṣaḥ tam a coditaḥ gām na hi iṅgita jñaḥ vasare vasīdati

original: iyaṃ śivāyā niyater ivāyatiḥ kṛtārthayantī jagataḥ phalaiḥ kriyāḥ /
analyzed: iyam śivāyāḥ niyateḥ iva āyatiḥ kṛtā arthayantī jagataḥ phalaiḥ kriyāḥ

original: jayaśriyaṃ pārtha pṛthūkarotu te śarat prasannāmbur anambuvāridā // BhKir_4.21 //
analyzed: jaya śriyam pārtha pṛthūkarotu te śarad prasanna ambuḥ an ambu vāridā

original: upaiti sasyaṃ pariṇāmaramyatā nadīr anauddhatyam apaṅkatā mahīm /
analyzed: upaiti sasyam pariṇāma ramya tā nadīḥ an auddhatyam a paṅka tā mahīm

original: navair guṇaiḥ samprati saṃstavasthiraṃ tirohitaṃ prema ghanāgamaśriyaḥ // BhKir_4.22 //
analyzed: navaiḥ guṇaiḥ samprati saṃstava sthiram tirohitam prema ghanāgama śriyaḥ

original: patanti nāsmin viśadāḥ patattriṇo dhṛtendracāpā na payodapaṅktayaḥ /
analyzed: patanti na asmin viśadāḥ patattriṇaḥ dhṛta indracāpāḥ na payoda paṅktayaḥ

original: tathāpi puṣṇāti nabhaḥ śriyaṃ parāṃ na ramyam āhāryam apekṣate guṇam // BhKir_4.23 //
analyzed: tathā api puṣṇāti nabhaḥ śriyam parām na ramyam āhāryam apekṣate guṇam

original: vipāṇḍubhir glānatayā payodharaiś cyutācirābhāguṇahemadāmabhiḥ /
analyzed: vipāṇḍubhiḥ glāna tayā payodharaiḥ cyuta acira ābhā guṇa hema dāmabhiḥ

original: iyaṃ kadambānilabhartur atyaye na digvadhūnāṃ kṛśatā na rājate // BhKir_4.24 //
analyzed: iyam kadamba anila bhartuḥ atyaye na diś vadhūnām kṛśa tā na rājate

original: vihāya vāñchām udite madātyayād araktakaṇṭhasya rute śikhaṇḍinaḥ /
analyzed: vihāya vāñchām udite madātyayāt a rakta kaṇṭhasya rute śikhaṇḍinaḥ

original: śrutiḥ śrayaty unmadahaṃsaniḥsvanaṃ guṇāḥ priyatve 'dhikṛtā na saṃstavaḥ // BhKir_4.25 //
analyzed: śrutiḥ śrayati unmada haṃsa niḥsvanam guṇāḥ priya tve dhi kṛtāḥ na saṃstavaḥ

original: amī pṛthustambabhṛtaḥ piśaṅgatāṃ gatā vipākena phalasya śālayaḥ /
analyzed: amī pṛthu stamba bhṛtaḥ piśaṅga tām gatāḥ vipākena phalasya śālayaḥ

original: vikāsi vaprāmbhasi gandhasūcitaṃ namanti nighrātum ivāsitotpalam // BhKir_4.26 //
analyzed: vikāsi vapra ambhasi gandha sūcitam namanti nighrātum iva asitotpalam

original: mṛṇālinīnām anurañjitaṃ tviṣā vibhinnam ambhojapalāśaśobhayā /
analyzed: mṛṇālinīnām anurañjitam tviṣā vibhinnam ambhoja palāśa śobhayā

original: payaḥ sphuracchāliśikhāpiśaṅgitaṃ drutaṃ dhanuṣkhaṇḍam ivāhividviṣaḥ // BhKir_4.27 //
analyzed: payaḥ sphurat śāli śikhā piśaṅgitam drutam dhanuṣkhaṇḍam iva ahi vidviṣaḥ

original: vipāṇḍu saṃvyānam ivāniloddhataṃ nirundhatīḥ saptapalāśajaṃ rajaḥ /
analyzed: vipāṇḍu saṃvyānam iva anila uddhatam nirundhatīḥ saptapalāśa jam rajaḥ

original: anāvilonmīlitabāṇacakṣuṣaḥ sapuṣpahāsā vanarājiyoṣitaḥ // BhKir_4.28 //
analyzed: anāvila unmīlita bāṇa cakṣuṣaḥ sa puṣpahāsāḥ vana rāji yoṣitaḥ

original: adīpitaṃ vaidyutajātavedasā sitāmbudacchedatirohitātapam /
analyzed: a dīpitam vaidyuta jātavedasā sita ambuda cheda tirohita ātapam

original: tatāntaraṃ sāntaravāriśīkaraiḥ śivaṃ nabhovartma sarojavāyubhiḥ // BhKir_4.29 //
analyzed: tata antaram sāntara vāri śīkaraiḥ śivam nabhaḥ vartma saroja vāyubhiḥ

original: sitacchadānām apadiśya dhāvatāṃ rutair amīṣāṃ grathitāḥ patatriṇām /
analyzed: sitacchadānām apadiśya dhāvatām rutaiḥ amīṣām grathitāḥ patatriṇām

original: prakurvate vāridarodhanirgatāḥ parasparālāpam ivāmalā diśaḥ // BhKir_4.30 //
analyzed: prakurvate vārida rodha nirgatāḥ paraspara ālāpam iva amalāḥ diśaḥ

original: vihārabhūmer abhighoṣam utsukāḥ śarīrajebhyaś cyutayūthapaṅktayaḥ /
analyzed: vihāra bhūmeḥ abhighoṣam utsukāḥ śarīrajebhyaḥ cyuta yūtha paṅktayaḥ

original: asaktam ūdhāṃsi payaḥ kṣaranty amūr upāyanānīva nayanti dhenavaḥ // BhKir_4.31 //
analyzed: asaktam ūdhāṃsi payaḥ kṣaranti amūḥ upāyanāni iva nayanti dhenavaḥ

original: jagatprasūtir jagadekapāvanī vrajopakaṇṭhaṃ tanayair upeyuṣī /
analyzed: jagat prasūtiḥ jagat eka pāvanī vraja upakaṇṭham tanayaiḥ upeyuṣī

original: dyutiṃ samagrāṃ samitir gavām asāv upaiti mantrair iva saṃhitāhutiḥ // BhKir_4.32 //
analyzed: dyutim samagrām samitiḥ gavām asau upaiti mantraiḥ iva saṃhitā āhutiḥ

original: kṛtāvadhānaṃ jitabarhiṇadhvanau suraktagopījanagītaniḥsvane /
analyzed: kṛta avadhānam jita barhiṇa dhvanau su rakta gopī jana gīta niḥsvane

original: idaṃ jighatsām apahāya bhūyasīṃ na sasyam abhyeti mṛgīkadambakam // BhKir_4.33 //
analyzed: idam jighatsām apahāya bhūyasīm na sasyam abhyeti mṛgī kadambakam

original: asāv anāsthāparayāvadhīritaḥ saroruhiṇyā śirasā namann api /
analyzed: asau anāsthā parayā avadhīritaḥ saroruhiṇyā śirasā naman api

original: upaiti śuṣyan kalamaḥ sahāmbhasā manobhuvā tapta ivābhipāṇḍutām // BhKir_4.34 //
analyzed: upaiti śuṣyan kalamaḥ saha ambhasā manobhuvā taptaḥ iva abhipāṇḍu tām

original: amī samuddhūtasarojareṇunā hṛtā hṛtāsārakaṇena vāyunā /
analyzed: amī samuddhūta saroja reṇunā hṛtāḥ hṛta āsāra kaṇena vāyunā

original: upāgame duścaritā ivāpadāṃ gatiṃ na niścetum alaṃ śilīmukhāḥ // BhKir_4.35 //
analyzed: upāgame duścaritāḥ iva āpadām gatim na niścetum alam śilīmukhāḥ

original: mukhair asau vidrumabhaṅgalohitaiḥ śikhāḥ piśaṅgīḥ kalamasya bibhratī /
analyzed: mukhaiḥ asau vidruma bhaṅga lohitaiḥ śikhāḥ piśaṅgīḥ kalamasya bibhratī

original: śukāvalir vyaktaśirīṣakomalā dhanuḥśriyaṃ gotrabhido 'nugacchati // BhKir_4.36 //
analyzed: śuka āvaliḥ vyakta śirīṣa komalā dhanuḥ śriyam gotrabhidaḥ nugacchati

original: iti kathayati tatra nātidūrād atha dadṛśe pihitoṣṇaraśmibimbaḥ /
analyzed: iti kathayati tatra na ati dūrāt atha dadṛśe pihita uṣṇaraśmi bimbaḥ

original: vigalitajalabhāraśuklabhāsāṃ nicaya ivāmbumucāṃ nagādhirājaḥ // BhKir_4.37 //
analyzed: vigalita jala bhāra śukla bhāsām nicaye iva ambumucām nagādhirājaḥ

original: tam atanuvanarājiśyāmitopatyakāntaṃ nagam upari himānīgauram āsadya jiṣṇuḥ /
analyzed: tam atanu vana rāji śyāmita upatyakā antam nagam upari himānī gauram āsadya jiṣṇuḥ

original: vyapagatamadarāgasyānusasmāra lakṣmīm asitam adharavāso bibhrataḥ sīrapāṇeḥ // BhKir_4.38 //
analyzed: vyapagata mada rāgasya anusasmāra lakṣmīm asitam adhara vāsaḥ bibhrataḥ sīrapāṇeḥ

original: atha jayāya nu merumahībhṛto rabhasayā nu digantadidṛkṣayā /
analyzed: atha jayāya nu meru mahībhṛtaḥ rabhasayā nu diś anta didṛkṣayā

original: abhiyayau sa himācalam ucchritaṃ samuditaṃ nu vilaṅghayituṃ nabhaḥ // BhKir_5.1 //
analyzed: abhiyayau sa himācalam ucchritam samuditam nu vilaṅghayitum nabhaḥ

original: tapanamaṇḍaladītitam ekataḥ satatanaiśatamovṛtam anyataḥ /
analyzed: tapana maṇḍala dītitam ekatas satata naiśa tamaḥ vṛtam anyatas

original: hasitabhinnatamisracayaṃ puraḥ śivam ivānugataṃ gajacarmaṇā // BhKir_5.2 //
analyzed: hasita bhinna tamisra cayam puras śivam iva anugatam gaja carmaṇā

original: kṣitinabhaḥsuralokanivāsibhiḥ kṛtaniketam adṛṣṭaparasparaiḥ /
analyzed: kṣiti nabhaḥ sura loka nivāsibhiḥ kṛta niketam adṛṣṭa parasparaiḥ

original: prathayituṃ vibhutām abhinirmitaṃ pratinidhiṃ jagatām iva śambhunā // BhKir_5.3 //
analyzed: prathayitum vibhu tām abhinirmitam pratinidhim jagatām iva śambhunā

original: bhujagarājasitena nabhaḥśriyā kanakarājivirājitasānunā /
analyzed: bhujaga rāja sitena nabhaḥ śriyā kanaka rāji virājita sānunā

original: samuditaṃ nicayena taḍitvatīṃ laghayatā śaradambudasaṃhatim // BhKir_5.4 //
analyzed: samuditam nicayena taḍitvatīm laghayatā śarad ambuda saṃhatim

original: maṇimayūkhacayāṃśukabhāsurāḥ suravadhūparibhuktalatāgṛhāḥ /
analyzed: maṇi mayūkha caya aṃśuka bhāsurāḥ sura vadhū paribhukta latā gṛhāḥ

original: dadhatam uccaśilāntaragopurāḥ pura ivoditapuṣpavanā bhuvaḥ // BhKir_5.5 //
analyzed: dadhatam ucca śilā antara gopurāḥ puraḥ iva udita puṣpa vanāḥ bhuvaḥ

original: aviratojjhitavārivipāṇḍubhir virahitair aciradyutitejasā /
analyzed: avirata ujjhita vāri vipāṇḍubhiḥ virahitaiḥ acira dyuti tejasā

original: uditapakṣam ivārataniḥsvanaiḥ pṛthunitambavilambibhir ambudaiḥ // BhKir_5.6 //
analyzed: udita pakṣam iva arata niḥsvanaiḥ pṛthu nitamba vilambibhiḥ ambudaiḥ

original: dadhatam ākaribhiḥ karibhiḥ kṣataiḥ samavatārasamair asamais taṭaiḥ /
analyzed: dadhatam ākaribhiḥ karibhiḥ kṣataiḥ samavatāra samaiḥ asamaiḥ taṭaiḥ

original: vividhakāmahitā mahitāmbhasaḥ sphuṭasarojavanā javanā nadīḥ // BhKir_5.7 //
analyzed: vividha kāma hitāḥ mahita ambhasaḥ sphuṭa saroja vanāḥ javanāḥ nadīḥ

original: navavinidrajapākusumatviṣāṃ dyutimatāṃ nikareṇa mahāśmanām /
analyzed: nava vinidra japā kusuma tviṣām dyutimatām nikareṇa mahā aśmanām

original: vihitasāṃdhyamayūkham iva kvacin nicitakāñcanabhittiṣu sānuṣu // BhKir_5.8 //
analyzed: vihita sāṃdhya mayūkham iva kvacid nicita kāñcana bhittiṣu sānuṣu

original: pṛthukadambakadambakarājitaṃ grahitamālatamālavanākulam /
analyzed: pṛthu kadamba kadambaka rājitam grahi tamāla tamāla vana ākulam

original: laghutuṣāratuṣārajalaścyutaṃ dhṛtasadānasadānanadantinam // BhKir_5.9 //
rahitaratnacayān na śiloccayān aphalatābhavanā na darībhuvaḥ /
analyzed: rahita ratna cayān na śiloccayān a phala tā bhavanāḥ na darībhuvaḥ

original: vipulināmburuhā na saridvadhūr akusumān dadhataṃ na mahīruhaḥ // BhKir_5.10 //
analyzed: vipulinā amburuhā na sarit vadhūḥ akusumān dadhatam na mahīruhaḥ

original: vyathitasindhum anīraśanaiḥ śanair amaralokavadhūjaghanair ghanaiḥ /
analyzed: vyathita sindhum a nīra śanaiḥ śanais amara loka vadhū jaghanaiḥ ghanaiḥ

original: phaṇabhṛtām abhito vitataṃ tataṃ dayitaramyalatābakulaiḥ kulaiḥ // BhKir_5.11 //
analyzed: phaṇabhṛtām abhitas vitatam tatam dayita ramya latā bakulaiḥ kulaiḥ

original: sasuracāpam anekamaṇiprabhair apapayoviśadaṃ himapāṇḍubhiḥ /
analyzed: sa sura cāpam aneka maṇi prabhaiḥ apa payaḥ viśadam hima pāṇḍubhiḥ

original: avicalaṃ śikharair upabibhrataṃ dhvanitasūcitam ambumucāṃ cayam // BhKir_5.12 //
analyzed: avicalam śikharaiḥ upabibhratam dhvanita sūcitam ambumucām cayam

original: vikacavāriruhaṃ dadhataṃ saraḥ sakalahaṃsagaṇaṃ śuci mānasam /
analyzed: vikaca vāriruham dadhatam saraḥ sa kalahaṃsa gaṇam śuci mānasam

original: śivam agātmajayā ca kṛterṣyayā sakalahaṃ sagaṇaṃ śucimānasam // BhKir_5.13 //
analyzed: śivam ca kṛta īrṣyayā sa kalaham sa gaṇam śuci mānasam

original: grahavimānagaṇān abhito divaṃ jvalayatauṣadhijena kṛśānunā /
analyzed: graha vimāna gaṇān abhitas divam jvalayatā oṣadhi jena kṛśānunā

original: muhur anusmarayantam anukṣapaṃ tripuradāham upāpatisevinaḥ // BhKir_5.14 //
analyzed: muhur anusmarayantam anu kṣapam tripura dāham upā pati sevinaḥ

original: vitataśīkararāśibhir ucchritair upalarodhavivartibhir ambubhiḥ /
analyzed: vitata śīkara rāśibhiḥ ucchritaiḥ upala rodha vivartibhiḥ ambubhiḥ

original: dadhatam unnatasānusamuddhatāṃ dhṛtasitavyajanām iva jāhnavīm // BhKir_5.15 //
analyzed: dadhatam unnata sānu samuddhatām dhṛta sita vyajanām iva jāhnavīm

original: anucareṇa dhanādhipater atho nagavilokanavismitamānasaḥ /
analyzed: anucareṇa dhanādhipateḥ atho naga vilokana vismita mānasaḥ

original: sa jagade vacanaṃ priyam ādarān mukharatāvasare hi virājate // BhKir_5.16 //
analyzed: sa jagade vacanam priyam ādarāt mukhara tā avasare hi virājate

original: alam eṣa vilokitaḥ prajānāṃ sahasā saṃhatim aṃhasāṃ vihantum /
analyzed: alam eṣa vilokitaḥ prajānām sahasā saṃhatim aṃhasām vihantum

original: ghanavartma sahasradheva kurvan himagaurair acalādhipaḥ śirobhiḥ // BhKir_5.17 //
analyzed: ghana vartma sahasradhā iva kurvan hima gauraiḥ acalādhipaḥ śirobhiḥ

original: iha duradhigamaiḥ kiṃcid evāgamaiḥ satatam asutaraṃ varṇayanty antaram /
analyzed: iha duradhigamaiḥ kiṃcid eva āgamaiḥ satatam asutaram varṇayanti antaram

original: amum ativipinaṃ veda digvyāpinaṃ puruṣam iva paraṃ padmayoniḥ param // BhKir_5.18 //
analyzed: amum ati vipinam veda diś vyāpinam puruṣam iva param padmayoniḥ param

original: rucirapallavapuṣpalatāgṛhair upalasajjalajair jalarāśibhiḥ /
analyzed: rucira pallava puṣpa latā gṛhaiḥ upalasat jalajaiḥ jala rāśibhiḥ

original: nayati saṃtatam utsukatām ayaṃ dhṛtimatīr upakāntam api striyaḥ // BhKir_5.19 //
analyzed: nayati saṃtatam utsuka tām ayam dhṛtimatīḥ upakāntam api striyaḥ

original: sulabhaiḥ sadā nayavatāyavatā nidhiguhyakādhiparamaiḥ paramaiḥ /
analyzed: sulabhaiḥ sadā nayavatā ayavatā nidhi guhyaka ādhi paramaiḥ paramaiḥ

original: amunā dhanaiḥ kṣitibhṛtātibhṛtā samatītya bhāti jagatī jagatī // BhKir_5.20 //
analyzed: amunā dhanaiḥ kṣitibhṛtā atibhṛtā samatītya bhāti jagatī jagatī

original: akhilam idam amuṣya gairīguros tribhuvanam api naiti manye tulām /
analyzed: akhilam idam amuṣya gairī guroḥ tribhuvanam api nā eti manye tulām

original: adhivasati sadā yad enaṃ janair aviditavibhavo bhavānīpatiḥ // BhKir_5.21 //
analyzed: adhivasati sadā yat enam janaiḥ a vidita vibhavaḥ bhavānīpatiḥ

original: vītajanmajarasaṃ paraṃ śuci brahmaṇaḥ padam upaitum icchatām /
analyzed: vīta janma jarasam param śuci brahmaṇaḥ padam upaitum icchatām

original: āgamād iva tamopahād itaḥ sambhavanti matayo bhavacchidaḥ // BhKir_5.22 //
analyzed: āgamāt iva tama upahāt itas sambhavanti matayaḥ bhavat chidaḥ

original: divyastrīṇāṃ sacaraṇalākṣārāgā rāgāyāte nipatitapuṣpāpīḍāḥ /
analyzed: divya strīṇām sa caraṇa lākṣā rāgāḥ rāgāyāte nipatita puṣpa āpīḍāḥ

original: pīḍābhājaḥ kusumacitāḥ sāśaṃsaṃ śaṃsanty asmin surataviśeṣaṃ śayyāḥ // BhKir_5.23 //
analyzed: pīḍā bhājaḥ kusuma citāḥ sa āśaṃsam śaṃsanti asmin surata viśeṣam śayyāḥ

original: guṇasampadā samadhigamya paraṃ mahimānam atra mahite jagatām /
analyzed: guṇa sampadā samadhigamya param mahimānam atra mahite jagatām

original: nayaśālini śriya ivādhipatau viramanti na jvalitum auṣadhayaḥ // BhKir_5.24 //
analyzed: naya śālini śriyaḥ iva adhipatau viramanti na jvalitum auṣadhayaḥ

original: kurarīgaṇaḥ kṛtaravas taravaḥ kusumānatāḥ sakamalaṃ kamalam /
analyzed: kurarī gaṇaḥ kṛta ravaḥ taravaḥ kusuma ānatāḥ sa kamalam kamalam

original: iha sindhavaś ca varaṇāvaraṇāḥ kariṇāṃ mude sanaladānaladāḥ // BhKir_5.25 //
analyzed: iha sindhavaḥ ca varaṇa avaraṇāḥ kariṇām mude sa nalada analadāḥ

original: sādṛśyaṃ gatam apanidracūtagandhair āmodaṃ madajalasekajaṃ dadhānaḥ /
analyzed: sādṛśyam gatam apanidra cūta gandhaiḥ āmodam mada jala seka jam dadhānaḥ

original: etasmin madayati kokilān akāle līnāliḥ surakariṇāṃ kapolakāṣaḥ // BhKir_5.26 //
analyzed: etasmin madayati kokilān akāle līna aliḥ sura kariṇām kapola kāṣaḥ

original: sanākavanitaṃ nitambaruciraṃ ciraṃ suninadair nadair vṛtam amum /
analyzed: sa nāka vanitam nitamba ruciram ciram su ninadaiḥ nadaiḥ vṛtam amum

original: matā phalavato 'vato rasaparā parāstavasudhā sudhādhivasati // BhKir_5.27 //
analyzed: matā phalavataḥ vataḥ rasa parā sudhā adhivasati

original: śrīmallatābhavanam oṣadhayaḥ pradīpāḥ śayyā navāni haricandanapallavāni /
analyzed: śrīmat latā bhavanam oṣadhayaḥ pradīpāḥ śayyā navāni haricandana pallavāni

original: asmin ratiśramanudaś ca sarojavātāḥ smartuṃ diśanti na divaḥ surasundarībhyaḥ // BhKir_5.28 //
analyzed: asmin rati śrama nudaḥ ca saroja vātāḥ smartum diśanti na divaḥ sura sundarībhyaḥ

original: īśārtham ambhasi cirāya tapaś carantyā yādovilaṅghanavilolavilocanāyāḥ /
analyzed: īśa artham ambhasi cirāya tapaḥ carantyāḥ yādaḥ vilaṅghana vilola vilocanāyāḥ

original: ālambatāgrakaram atra bhavo bhavānyāḥ ścyotannidāghasalilāṅgulinā kareṇa // BhKir_5.29 //
analyzed: ālambatā agrakaram atra bhavaḥ bhavānyāḥ ścyotat nidāgha salila aṅgulinā kareṇa

original: yenāpaviddhasalilaḥ sphuṭanāgasadmā devāsurair amṛtam ambunidhir mamanthe /
analyzed: yena apaviddha salilaḥ sphuṭa nāga sadmā deva asuraiḥ amṛtam ambunidhiḥ mamanthe

original: vyāvartanair ahipater ayam āhitāṅkaḥ khaṃ vyālikhann iva vibhāti sa mandarādriḥ // BhKir_5.30 //
analyzed: vyāvartanaiḥ ahi pateḥ ayam āhita aṅkaḥ kham vyālikhan iva vibhāti sa mandara adriḥ

original: nītocchrāyaṃ muhur aśiśiraraśmer usrair ānīlābhair viracitaparabhāgā ratnaiḥ /
analyzed: nīta ucchrāyam muhur aśiśiraraśmeḥ usraiḥ ānīla ābhaiḥ viracita parabhāgāḥ ratnaiḥ

original: jyotsnāśaṅkām iva vitarati haṃsaśyenī madhye 'py ahnaḥ sphaṭikarajatabhitticchāyā // BhKir_5.31 //
analyzed: jyotsnā śaṅkām iva vitarati haṃsaśyenī madhye pi ahnaḥ sphaṭika rajata bhitti chāyā

original: dadhata iva vilāsaśāli nṛtyaṃ mṛdu patatā pavanena kampitāni /
analyzed: dadhataḥ iva vilāsa śāli nṛtyam mṛdu patatā pavanena kampitāni

original: iha lalitavilāsinījanabhrū- gatikuṭileṣu payaḥsu paṅkajāni // BhKir_5.32 //
analyzed: iha lalitavilāsinī jana bhrū gati kuṭileṣu payaḥsu paṅkajāni

original: asminn agṛhyata pinākabhṛtā salīlam ābaddhavepathur adhīravilocanāyāḥ /
analyzed: asmin agṛhyata pinākabhṛtā sa līlam ābaddha vepathuḥ adhīra vilocanāyāḥ

original: vinyastamaṅgalamahauṣadhir īśvarāyāḥ srastoragapratisareṇa kareṇa pāṇiḥ // BhKir_5.33 //
analyzed: vinyasta maṅgala mahā oṣadhiḥ īśvarāyāḥ srasta uraga pratisareṇa kareṇa pāṇiḥ

original: krāmadbhir ghanapadavīm anekasaṃkhyais tejobhiḥ śucimaṇijanmabhir vibhinnaḥ /
analyzed: krāmadbhiḥ ghana padavīm aneka saṃkhyaiḥ tejobhiḥ śuci maṇi janmabhiḥ vibhinnaḥ

original: usrāṇāṃ vyabhicaratīva saptasapteḥ paryasyann iha nicayaḥ sahasrasaṃkhyām // BhKir_5.34 //
analyzed: usrāṇām vyabhicarati iva saptasapteḥ paryasyan iha nicayaḥ sahasra saṃkhyām

original: vyadhatta yasmin puram uccagopuraṃ purāṃ vijetur dhṛtaye dhanādhipaḥ /
analyzed: vyadhatta yasmin puram ucca gopuram purām vijetuḥ dhṛtaye dhanādhipaḥ

original: sa eṣa kailāsa upāntasarpiṇaḥ karoty akālāstamayaṃ vivasvataḥ // BhKir_5.35 //
analyzed: saḥ eṣa kailāsaḥ upānta sarpiṇaḥ karoti akāla astamayam vivasvataḥ

original: nānāratnajyotiṣāṃ saṃnipātaiś channeṣv antaḥsānu vaprāntareṣu /
analyzed: nānā ratna jyotiṣām saṃnipātaiḥ channeṣu antaḥsānu vapra antareṣu

original: baddhāṃ baddhāṃ bhittiśaṅkām amuṣmin nāvānāvān mātariśvā nihanti // BhKir_5.36 //
analyzed: baddhām baddhām bhitti śaṅkām amuṣmin nāvā nāvān mātariśvā nihanti

original: ramyā navadyutir apaiti na śādvalebhyaḥ śyāmībhavanty anudinaṃ nalinīvanāni /
analyzed: ramyā nava dyutiḥ apaiti na śādvalebhyaḥ śyāmībhavanti anudinam nalinī vanāni

original: asmin vicitrakusumastabakācitānāṃ śākhābhṛtāṃ pariṇamanti na pallavāni // BhKir_5.37 //
analyzed: asmin vicitra kusuma stabaka ācitānām śākhābhṛtām pariṇamanti na pallavāni

original: parisaraviṣayeṣu līḍhamuktā haritatṛṇodgamaśaṅkayā mṛgībhiḥ /
analyzed: parisara viṣayeṣu līḍha muktāḥ harita tṛṇa udgama śaṅkayā mṛgībhiḥ

original: iha navaśukakomalā maṇīnāṃ ravikarasaṃvalitāḥ phalanti bhāsaḥ // BhKir_5.38 //
analyzed: iha nava śuka komalāḥ maṇīnām ravi kara saṃvalitāḥ phalanti bhāsaḥ

original: utphullasthalanalinīvanād amuṣmād uddhūtaḥ sarasijasambhavaḥ parāgaḥ /
analyzed: utphulla sthala nalinī vanāt amuṣmāt uddhūtaḥ sarasija sambhavaḥ parāgaḥ

original: vātyābhir viyati vivartitaḥ samantād ādhatte kanakamayātapatralakṣmīm // BhKir_5.39 //
analyzed: vātyābhiḥ viyati vivartitaḥ samantāt ādhatte kanaka mayāta patra lakṣmīm

original: iha saniyamayoḥ surāpagāyām uṣasi sayāvakasavyapādarekhā /
analyzed: iha sa niyamayoḥ surā āpagāyām uṣasi sa yāvaka savya pāda rekhā

original: kathayati śivayoḥ śarīrayogaṃ viṣamapadā padavī vivartaneṣu // BhKir_5.40 //
analyzed: kathayati śivayoḥ śarīra yogam viṣama padā padavī vivartaneṣu

original: saṃmūrchatāṃ rajatabhittimayūkhajālair ālokapādapalatāntaranirgatānām /
analyzed: saṃmūrchatām rajata bhitti mayūkha jālaiḥ āloka pādapa latā antara nirgatānām

original: gharmadyuter iha muhuḥ paṭalāni dhāmnām ādarśamaṇḍalanibhāni samullasanti // BhKir_5.41 //
analyzed: gharma dyuteḥ iha muhur paṭalāni dhāmnām ādarśa maṇḍala nibhāni samullasanti

original: śuklair mayūkhanicayaiḥ parivītamūrtir vaprābhighātaparimaṇḍalitorudehaḥ /
analyzed: śuklaiḥ mayūkha nicayaiḥ parivīta mūrtiḥ vapra abhighāta parimaṇḍalita ūru dehaḥ

original: śṛṅgāṇy amuṣya bhajate gaṇabhartur ukṣā kurvan vadhūjanamanaḥsu śaśāṅkaśaṅkām // BhKir_5.42 //
analyzed: śṛṅgāṇi amuṣya bhajate gaṇabhartuḥ ukṣā kurvan vadhū jana manaḥsu śaśāṅka śaṅkām

original: samprati labdhajanma śanakaiḥ katham api laghuni kṣīṇapayasy upeyuṣi bhidāṃ jaladharapaṭale /
analyzed: samprati labdha janma śanakais katham api laghuni kṣīṇa payasi upeyuṣi bhidām jaladhara paṭale

original: khaṇḍitavigrahaṃ balabhido dhanur iha vividhāḥ pūrayituṃ bhavanti vibhavaḥ śikharamaṇirucaḥ // BhKir_5.43 //
analyzed: khaṇḍita vigraham balabhidaḥ dhanuḥ iha vividhāḥ pūrayitum bhavanti vibhavaḥ śikharamaṇi rucaḥ

original: snapitanavalatātarupravālair amṛtalavasrutiśālibhir mayūkhaiḥ /
analyzed: snapita nava latā taru pravālaiḥ amṛta lava sruti śālibhiḥ mayūkhaiḥ

original: satatam asitayāminīṣu śambho amalayatīha vanāntam indulekhā // BhKir_5.44 //
analyzed: satatam asita yāminīṣu śambho amalayati iha vanāntam indu lekhā

original: kṣipati yo 'nuvanaṃ vitatāṃ bṛhad bṛhatikām iva raucanikīṃ rucam /
analyzed: kṣipati yaḥ nuvanam vitatām bṛhat bṛhatikām iva raucanikīm rucam

original: ayam anekahiraṇmayakaṃdaras tava pitur dayito jagatīdharaḥ // BhKir_5.45 //
analyzed: ayam aneka hiraṇmaya kaṃdaraḥ tava pituḥ dayitaḥ jagatīdharaḥ

original: saktiṃ lavād apanayaty anile latānāṃ vairocanair dviguṇitāḥ sahasā mayūkhaiḥ /
analyzed: saktim lavāt apanayati anile latānām vairocanaiḥ dvi guṇitāḥ sahasā mayūkhaiḥ

original: rodhobhuvāṃ muhur amutra hiraṇmayīnāṃ bhāsas taḍidvilasitāni viḍambayanti // BhKir_5.46 //
analyzed: rodhaḥ bhuvām muhur amutra hiraṇmayīnām bhāsaḥ taḍit vilasitāni viḍambayanti

original: kaṣaṇakampanirastamahāhibhiḥ kṣaṇavimattamataṅgajavarjitaiḥ /
analyzed: kaṣaṇa kampa nirasta mahā ahibhiḥ kṣaṇa vimatta mataṅga ja varjitaiḥ

original: iha madasnapitair anumīyate suragajasya gataṃ haricandanaiḥ // BhKir_5.47 //
analyzed: iha mada snapitaiḥ anumīyate suragajasya gatam haricandanaiḥ

original: jaladajālaghanair asitāśmanām upahatapracayeha marīcibhiḥ /
analyzed: jalada jāla ghanaiḥ asita aśmanām upahata pracayā iha marīcibhiḥ

original: bhavati dīptir adīpitakaṃdarā timirasaṃvaliteva vivasvataḥ // BhKir_5.48 //
analyzed: bhavati dīptiḥ a dīpita kaṃdarā timira saṃvalitā iva vivasvataḥ

original: bhavyo bhavann api muner iha śāsanena kṣātre sthitaḥ pathi tapasya hatapramādaḥ /
analyzed: bhavyaḥ bhavan api muneḥ iha śāsanena kṣātre sthitaḥ pathi tapasya hata pramādaḥ

original: prāyeṇa saty api hitārthakare vidhau hi śreyāṃsi labdhum asukhāni vināntarāyaiḥ // BhKir_5.49 //
analyzed: prāyeṇa sati api hita artha kare vidhau hi śreyāṃsi labdhum asukhāni vinā antarāyaiḥ

original: mā bhūvann apathahṛtas tavendriyāśvāḥ saṃtāpe diśatu śivaḥ śivāṃ prasaktim /
analyzed: mā bhūvan a patha hṛtaḥ tava indriya aśvāḥ saṃtāpe diśatu śivaḥ śivām prasaktim

original: rakṣantas tapasi balaṃ ca lokapālāḥ kalyāṇīm adhikaphalāṃ kriyāṃ kriyāyuḥ // BhKir_5.50 //
analyzed: rakṣantaḥ tapasi balam ca lokapālāḥ kalyāṇīm adhika phalām kriyām kriyā āyuḥ

original: ity uktvā sapadi hitaṃ priyaṃ priyārhe dhāma svaṃ gatavati rājarājabhṛtye /
analyzed: iti uktvā sapadi hitam priyam priya arhe dhāma svam gatavati rāja rāja bhṛtye
