original: sotkaṇṭhaṃ kim api pṛthāsutaḥ pradadhyau saṃdhatte bhṛśam aratiṃ hi sadviyogaḥ // BhKir_5.51 //
analyzed: sa utkaṇṭham kim api pṛthā sutaḥ pradadhyau saṃdhatte bhṛśam aratim hi sat viyogaḥ

original: tam anatiśayanīyaṃ sarvataḥ sārayogād avirahitam anekenāṅkabhājā phalena /
analyzed: tam an atiśayanīyam sarvatas sāra yogāt avirahitam anekena aṅka bhājā phalena

original: akṛśam akṛśalakṣmīś cetasāśaṃsitaṃ sa svam iva puruṣakāraṃ śailam abhyāsasāda // BhKir_5.52 //
analyzed: akṛśam a kṛśa lakṣmīḥ cetasā āśaṃsitam sa svam iva puruṣakāram śailam abhyāsasāda

original: rucirākṛtiḥ kanakasānum atho paramaḥ pumān iva patiṃ patatām /
analyzed: rucira ākṛtiḥ kanaka sānum atho paramaḥ pumān iva patim patatām

original: dhṛtasatpathas tripathagām abhitaḥ sa tam āruroha puruhūtasutaḥ // BhKir_6.1 //
analyzed: dhṛta sat pathaḥ tripathagām abhitas sa tam āruroha puruhūta sutaḥ

original: tam anindyabandina ivendrasutaṃ vihitālinikvaṇajayadhvanayaḥ /
analyzed: tam anindya bandinaḥ iva indra sutam vihita ali nikvaṇa jaya dhvanayaḥ

original: pavaneritākulavijihmaśikhā jagatīruho 'vacakaruḥ kusumaiḥ // BhKir_6.2 //
analyzed: pavana īrita ākula vijihma śikhāḥ jagatīruhaḥ vacakaruḥ kusumaiḥ

original: avadhūtapaṅkajaparāgakaṇās tanujāhnavīsalilavīcibhidaḥ /
analyzed: avadhūta paṅkaja parāga kaṇāḥ tanu jāhnavī salila vīci bhidaḥ

original: parirebhire 'bhimukham etya sukhāḥ suhṛdaḥ sakhāyam iva taṃ marutaḥ // BhKir_6.3 //
analyzed: parirebhire bhimukham etya sukhāḥ suhṛdaḥ sakhāyam iva tam marutaḥ

original: uditopalaskhalanasaṃvalitāḥ sphuṭahaṃsasārasavirāvayujaḥ /
analyzed: udita upala skhalana saṃvalitāḥ sphuṭa haṃsa sārasa virāva yujaḥ

original: mudam asya māṅgalikatūryakṛtāṃ dhvanayaḥ pratenur anuvapram apām // BhKir_6.4 //
analyzed: mudam asya māṅgalika tūrya kṛtām dhvanayaḥ pratenuḥ anu vapram apām

original: avarugṇatuṅgasuradārutarau nicaye puraḥ surasaritpayasām /
analyzed: avarugṇa tuṅga suradāru tarau nicaye puras surasarit payasām

original: sa dadarśa vetasavanācaritāṃ praṇatiṃ balīyasi samṛddhikarīm // BhKir_6.5 //
analyzed: sa dadarśa vetasa vana ācaritām praṇatim balīyasi samṛddhi karīm

original: prababhūva nālam avalokayituṃ paritaḥ sarojarajasāruṇitam /
analyzed: prababhūva nālam avalokayitum paritas saroja rajasā aruṇitam

original: sariduttarīyam iva saṃhatimat sa taraṅgaraṅgi kalahaṃsakulam // BhKir_6.6 //
analyzed: sarit uttarīyam iva saṃhatimat sa taraṅga raṅgi kalahaṃsa kulam

original: dadhati kṣatīḥ pariṇatadvirade muditāliyoṣiti madasrutibhiḥ /
analyzed: dadhati kṣatīḥ pariṇata dvirade mudita ali yoṣiti mada srutibhiḥ

original: adhikāṃ sa rodhasi babandha dhṛtiṃ mahate rujann api guṇāya mahān // BhKir_6.7 //
analyzed: adhikām sa rodhasi babandha dhṛtim mahate rujan api guṇāya mahān

original: anuhemavapram aruṇaiḥ samatāṃ gatam ūrmibhiḥ sahacaraṃ pṛthubhiḥ /
analyzed: anu hema vapram aruṇaiḥ sama tām gatam ūrmibhiḥ sahacaram pṛthubhiḥ

original: sa rathāṅganāmavanitāṃ karuṇair anubadhnatīm abhinananda rutaiḥ // BhKir_6.8 //
analyzed: sa rathāṅga nāma vanitām karuṇaiḥ anubadhnatīm abhinananda rutaiḥ

original: sitavājine nijagadū rucayaś calavīcirāgaracanāpaṭavaḥ /
analyzed: sitavājine nijagaduḥ rucayaḥ cala vīci rāga racanā paṭavaḥ

original: maṇijālam ambhasi nimagnam api sphuritaṃ manogatam ivākṛtayaḥ // BhKir_6.9 //
analyzed: maṇi jālam ambhasi nimagnam api sphuritam manogatam iva ākṛtayaḥ

original: upalāhatoddhatataraṅgadhṛtaṃ javinā vidhūtavitataṃ marutā /
analyzed: upala āhata uddhata taraṅga dhṛtam javinā vidhūta vitatam marutā

original: sa dadarśa ketakaśikhāviśadaṃ saritaḥ prahāsam iva phenam apām // BhKir_6.10 //
analyzed: sa dadarśa ketaka śikhā viśadam saritaḥ prahāsam iva phenam apām

original: bahu barhicandrikanibhaṃ vidadhe dhṛtim asya dānapayasāṃ paṭalam /
analyzed: bahu barhi candrika nibham vidadhe dhṛtim asya dāna payasām paṭalam

original: avagāḍham īkṣitum ivaibhapatiṃ vikasadvilocanaśataṃ saritaḥ // BhKir_6.11 //
analyzed: avagāḍham īkṣitum iva aibha patim vikasat vilocana śatam saritaḥ

original: pratibodhajṛmbhaṇavibhīnamukhī puline saroruhadṛśā dadṛśe /
analyzed: puline saroruha dṛśā dadṛśe

original: patadacchamauktikamaṇiprakarā galadaśrubindur iva śuktivadhūḥ // BhKir_6.12 //
analyzed: patat accha mauktika maṇi prakarā galat aśru binduḥ iva śuktivadhūḥ

original: śucir apsu vidrumalatāviṭapas tanusāndraphenalavasaṃvalitaḥ /
analyzed: śuciḥ apsu vidruma latā viṭapaḥ tanu sāndra phena lava saṃvalitaḥ

original: smaradāyinaḥ smarayati sma bhṛśaṃ dayitādharasya daśanāṃśubhṛtaḥ // BhKir_6.13 //
analyzed: smara dāyinaḥ smarayati sma bhṛśam dayitā adharasya daśana aṃśu bhṛtaḥ

original: upalabhya cañcalataraṅgahṛtaṃ madagandham utthitavatāṃ payasaḥ /
analyzed: upalabhya cañcala taraṅga hṛtam mada gandham utthitavatām payasaḥ

original: pratidantinām iva sa sambubudhe kariyādasām abhimukhān kariṇaḥ // BhKir_6.14 //
analyzed: pratidantinām iva sa sambubudhe kariyādasām abhimukhān kariṇaḥ

original: sa jagāma vismayam udvīkṣya puraḥ sahasā samutpipatiṣoḥ phaṇinaḥ /
analyzed: sa jagāma vismayam udvīkṣya puras sahasā samutpipatiṣoḥ phaṇinaḥ

original: prahitaṃ divi prajavibhiḥ śvasitaiḥ śaradabhravibhramam apāṃ paṭalam // BhKir_6.15 //
analyzed: prahitam divi prajavibhiḥ śvasitaiḥ śarad abhra vibhramam apām paṭalam

original: sa tatāra saikatavatīr abhitaḥ śapharīparisphuritacārudṛśaḥ /
analyzed: sa tatāra saikatavatīḥ abhitas śapharī parisphurita cāru dṛśaḥ

original: lalitāḥ sakhīr iva bṛhajjaghanāḥ suranimnagām upayatīḥ saritaḥ // BhKir_6.16 //
analyzed: lalitāḥ sakhīḥ iva bṛhat jaghanāḥ suranimnagām upayatīḥ saritaḥ

original: adhiruhya puṣpabharanamraśikhaiḥ paritaḥ pariṣkṛtatalāṃ tarubhiḥ /
analyzed: adhiruhya puṣpa bhara namra śikhaiḥ paritas pariṣkṛta talām tarubhiḥ

original: manasaḥ prasattim iva mūrdhni gireḥ śucim āsasāda sa vanāntabhuvam // BhKir_6.17 //
analyzed: manasaḥ prasattim iva mūrdhni gireḥ śucim āsasāda sa vanānta bhuvam

original: anusānu puṣpitalatāvitatiḥ phalitorubhūruhaviviktavanaḥ /
analyzed: anusānu puṣpita latā vitatiḥ phalita uru bhūruha vivikta vanaḥ

original: dhṛtim ātatāna tanayasya hares tapase 'dhivastum acalām acalaḥ // BhKir_6.18 //
analyzed: dhṛtim ātatāna tanayasya hareḥ tapase dhivastum acalām acalaḥ

original: praṇidhāya tatra vidhinātha dhiyaṃ dadhataḥ purātanamuner munitām /
analyzed: praṇidhāya tatra vidhinā atha dhiyam dadhataḥ purātana muneḥ muni tām

original: śramam ādadhāv asukaraṃ na tapaḥ kim ivāvasādakaram ātmavatām // BhKir_6.19 //
analyzed: śramam ādadhau asukaram na tapaḥ kim iva avasāda karam ātmavatām

original: śamayan dhṛtendriyaśamaikasukhaḥ śucibhir guṇair aghamayaṃ sa tamaḥ /
analyzed: śamayan dhṛta indriya śama eka sukhaḥ śucibhiḥ guṇaiḥ agha mayam sa tamaḥ

original: prativāsaraṃ sukṛtibhir vavṛdhe vimalaḥ kalābhir iva śītaruciḥ // BhKir_6.20 //
analyzed: prativāsaram su kṛtibhiḥ vavṛdhe vimalaḥ kalābhiḥ iva śītaruciḥ

original: adharīcakāra ca vivekaguṇād aguṇeṣu tasya dhiyam astavataḥ /
analyzed: adharīcakāra ca viveka guṇāt aguṇeṣu tasya dhiyam a stavataḥ

original: pratighātinīṃ viṣayasaṅgaratiṃ nirupaplavaḥ śamasukhānubhavaḥ // BhKir_6.21 //
analyzed: pratighātinīm viṣaya saṅga ratim nirupaplavaḥ śama sukha anubhavaḥ

original: manasā japaiḥ praṇatibhiḥ prayataḥ samupeyivān adhipatiṃ sa divaḥ /
analyzed: manasā japaiḥ praṇatibhiḥ prayataḥ samupeyivān adhipatim sa divaḥ

original: sahajetare jayaśamau dadhatī bibharāṃbabhūva yugapan mahasī // BhKir_6.22 //
analyzed: sahaja itare jaya śamau dadhatī bibharāṃbabhūva yugapad mahasī

original: śirasā harinmaṇinibhaḥ sa vahan kṛtajanmano 'bhiṣavaṇena jaṭāḥ /
analyzed: śirasā harinmaṇi nibhaḥ sa vahan kṛta janmanaḥ bhiṣavaṇena jaṭāḥ

original: upamāṃ yayāv aruṇadīdhitibhiḥ parimṛṣṭamūrdhani tamālatarau // BhKir_6.23 //
analyzed: upamām yayau aruṇa dīdhitibhiḥ parimṛṣṭa mūrdhani tamāla tarau

original: dhṛtahetir apy adhṛtajihmamatiś caritair munīn adharayañ śucibhiḥ /
analyzed: dhṛta hetiḥ api a dhṛta jihma matiḥ caritaiḥ munīn adharayam śucibhiḥ

original: rajayāṃcakāra virajāḥ sa mṛgān kam iveśate ramayituṃ na guṇāḥ // BhKir_6.24 //
analyzed: rajayāṃcakāra virajāḥ sa mṛgān kam iva īśate ramayitum na guṇāḥ

original: anukūlapātinam acaṇḍagatiṃ kiratā sugandhim abhitaḥ pavanam /
analyzed: anukūla pātinam a caṇḍa gatim kiratā sugandhim abhitas pavanam

original: avadhīritārtavaguṇaṃ sukhatāṃ nayatā rucāṃ nicayam aṃśumataḥ // BhKir_6.25 //
analyzed: avadhīrita ārtava guṇam sukha tām nayatā rucām nicayam aṃśumataḥ

original: navapallavāñjalibhṛtaḥ pracaye bṛhatas tarūn gamayatāvanatim /
analyzed: nava pallava añjali bhṛtaḥ pracaye bṛhataḥ tarūn gamayata avanatim

original: stṛṇatā tṛṇaiḥ pratiniśaṃ mṛdubhiḥ śayanīyatām upayatīṃ vasudhām // BhKir_6.26 //
analyzed: stṛṇatā tṛṇaiḥ pratiniśam mṛdubhiḥ śayanīya tām upayatīm vasudhām

original: patitair apetajaladān nabhasaḥ pṛṣatair apāṃ śamayatā ca rajaḥ /
analyzed: patitaiḥ apeta jaladāt nabhasaḥ pṛṣataiḥ apām śamayatā ca rajaḥ

original: sa dayāluneva parigāḍhakṛśaḥ paricaryayānujagṛhe tapasā // BhKir_6.27 //
analyzed: sa dayālunā iva parigāḍha kṛśaḥ paricaryayā anujagṛhe tapasā

original: mahate phalāya tad avekṣya śivaṃ vikasannimittakusumaṃ sa puraḥ /
analyzed: mahate phalāya tat avekṣya śivam vikasat nimitta kusumam sa puras

original: na jagāma vismayavaśaṃ vaśināṃ na nihanti dhairyam anubhāvaguṇaḥ // BhKir_6.28 //
analyzed: na jagāma vismaya vaśam vaśinām na nihanti dhairyam anubhāva guṇaḥ

original: tad abhūrivāsarakṛtaṃ sukṛtair upalabhya vaibhavam ananyabhavam /
analyzed: tat a bhūri vāsara kṛtam sukṛtaiḥ upalabhya vaibhavam an anya bhavam

original: upatasthur āsthitaviṣādadhiyaḥ śatayajvano vanacarā vasatim // BhKir_6.29 //
analyzed: upatasthuḥ āsthita viṣāda dhiyaḥ śatayajvanaḥ vana carāḥ vasatim

original: viditāḥ praviśya vihitānatayaḥ śithilīkṛte 'dhikṛtakṛtyavidhau /
analyzed: viditāḥ praviśya vihita ānatayaḥ śithilīkṛte dhi kṛta kṛtya vidhau

original: anapetakālam abhirāmakathāḥ kathayāṃbabhūvur iti gotrabhide // BhKir_6.30 //
analyzed: an apeta kālam abhirāma kathāḥ kathayāṃbabhūvuḥ iti gotrabhide

original: śucivalkavītatanur anyatamas timiracchidām iva girau bhavataḥ /
analyzed: śuci valka vīta tanuḥ anyatamaḥ timiracchidām iva girau bhavataḥ

original: mahate jayāya maghavann anaghaḥ puruṣas tapasyati tapaj jagatīm // BhKir_6.31 //
analyzed: mahate jayāya maghavan anaghaḥ puruṣaḥ tapasyati tapat jagatīm

original: sa bibharti bhīṣaṇabhujaṃgabhujaḥ pṛthi vidviṣāṃ bhayavidhāyi dhanuḥ /
analyzed: sa bibharti bhīṣaṇa bhujaṃga bhujaḥ pṛthi vidviṣām bhaya vidhāyi dhanuḥ

original: amalena tasya dhṛtasaccaritāś caritena cātiśayitā munayaḥ // BhKir_6.32 //
analyzed: amalena tasya dhṛta sat caritāḥ caritena ca atiśayitāḥ munayaḥ

original: marutaḥ śivā navatṛṇā jagatī vimalaṃ nabho rajasi vṛṣṭir apām /
analyzed: marutaḥ śivāḥ nava tṛṇāḥ jagatī vimalam nabhaḥ rajasi vṛṣṭiḥ apām

original: guṇasampadānuguṇatāṃ gamitaḥ kurute 'sya bhaktim iva bhūtagaṇaḥ // BhKir_6.33 //
analyzed: guṇa sampadā anuguṇa tām gamitaḥ kurute sya bhaktim iva bhūta gaṇaḥ

original: itaretarānabhibhavena mṛgās tam upāsate gurum ivāntasadaḥ /
analyzed: itaretarān abhibhavena mṛgāḥ tam upāsate gurum iva antasadaḥ

original: vinamanti cāsya taravaḥ pracaye paravān sa tena bhavateva nagaḥ // BhKir_6.34 //
analyzed: vinamanti ca asya taravaḥ pracaye paravān sa tena bhavatā iva nagaḥ

original: uru sattvam āha vipariśramatā paramaṃ vapuḥ prathayatīva jayam /
analyzed: uru sattvam āha vipariśramatā paramam vapuḥ prathayati iva jayam

original: śamino 'pi tasya navasaṃgamane vibhutānuṣaṅgi bhayam eti janaḥ // BhKir_6.35 //
analyzed: śaminaḥ u pi tasya nava saṃgamane vibhu tā anuṣaṅgi bhayam eti janaḥ

original: ṛṣivaṃśajaḥ sa yadi daityakule yadi vānvaye mahati bhūmibhṛtām /
analyzed: ṛṣi vaṃśa jaḥ sa yadi daitya kule yadi vā anvaye mahati bhūmibhṛtām

original: caratas tapas tava vaneṣu sadā na vayaṃ nirūpayitum asya gatim // BhKir_6.36 //
analyzed: carataḥ tapaḥ tava vaneṣu sadā na vayam nirūpayitum asya gatim

original: vigaṇayya kāraṇam anekaguṇaṃ nijayāthavā kathitam alpatayā /
analyzed: vigaṇayya kāraṇam aneka guṇam nijayā athavā kathitam alpa tayā

original: asad apy adaḥ sahitum arhati naḥ kva vanecarāḥ kva nipuṇā matayaḥ // BhKir_6.37 //
analyzed: asat api adaḥ sahitum arhati naḥ kva vanecarāḥ kva nipuṇāḥ matayaḥ

original: adhigamya guhyakagaṇād iti tan manasaḥ priyaṃ priyasutasya tapaḥ /
analyzed: adhigamya guhyaka gaṇāt iti tat manasaḥ priyam priya sutasya tapaḥ

original: nijugopa harṣam uditaṃ maghavā nayavartmagāḥ prabhavatāṃ hi dhiyaḥ // BhKir_6.38 //
analyzed: nijugopa harṣam uditam maghavā naya vartma gāḥ prabhavatām hi dhiyaḥ

original: praṇidhāya cittam atha bhaktatayā vidite 'py apūrva iva tatra hariḥ /
analyzed: praṇidhāya cittam atha bhakta tayā vidite pi apūrvaḥ iva tatra hariḥ

original: upalabdhum asya niyamasthiratāṃ surasundarīr iti vaco 'bhidadhe // BhKir_6.39 //
analyzed: upalabdhum asya niyama sthira tām surasundarīḥ iti vacaḥ bhidadhe

original: sukumāram ekam aṇu marmabhidām atidūragaṃ yutam amoghatayā /
analyzed: su kumāram ekam aṇu marma bhidām ati dūra gam yutam amogha tayā

original: avipakṣam astram aparaṃ katamad vijayāya yūyam iva cittabhuvaḥ // BhKir_6.40 //
analyzed: a vipakṣam astram aparam katamat vijayāya yūyam iva citta bhuvaḥ

original: bhavavītaye hatabṛhattamasām avabodhavāri rajasaḥ śamanam /
analyzed: bhava vītaye hata bṛhat tamasām avabodha vāri rajasaḥ śamanam

original: paripīyamāṇam iva vo 'sakalair avasādam eti nayanāñjalibhiḥ // BhKir_6.41 //
analyzed: paripīyamāṇam iva vaḥ sakalaiḥ avasādam eti nayana añjalibhiḥ

original: bahudhā gatāṃ jagati bhūtasṛjā kamanīyatāṃ samabhihṛtya purā /
analyzed: bahudhā gatām jagati bhūta sṛjā kamanīya tām samabhihṛtya purā

original: upapāditā vidadhatā bhavatīḥ surasadmayānasumukhī janatā // BhKir_6.42 //
analyzed: upapāditā vidadhatā bhavatīḥ surasadma yāna sumukhī janatā

original: tad upetya vighnayata tasya tapaḥ kṛtibhiḥ kalāsu sahitāḥ sacivaiḥ /
analyzed: tat upetya vighnayata tasya tapaḥ kṛtibhiḥ kalāsu sahitāḥ sacivaiḥ

original: hṛtavītarāgamanasāṃ nanu vaḥ sukhasaṅginaṃ prati sukhāvajitiḥ // BhKir_6.43 //
analyzed: hṛta vīta rāga manasām nanu vaḥ sukha saṅginam prati sukha avajitiḥ

original: avimṛṣyam etad abhilaṣyati sa dviṣatāṃ vadhena viṣayābhiratim /
analyzed: a vimṛṣyam etat abhilaṣyati sa dviṣatām vadhena viṣaya abhiratim

original: bhavavītaye na hi tathā sa vidhiḥ kva śarāsanaṃ kva ca vimuktipathaḥ // BhKir_6.44 //
analyzed: bhava vītaye na hi tathā sa vidhiḥ kva śarāsanam kva ca vimukti pathaḥ

original: pṛthudāmni tatra paribodhi ca mā bhavatībhir anyamunivad vikṛtiḥ /
analyzed: pṛthu dāmni tatra paribodhi ca mā bhavatībhiḥ anya muni vat vikṛtiḥ

original: svayaśāṃsi vikramavatām avatāṃ na vadhūṣv aghāni vimṛṣyanti dhiyaḥ // BhKir_6.45 //
analyzed: sva yaśāṃsi vikramavatām avatām na vadhūṣu aghāni vimṛṣyanti dhiyaḥ

original: āśaṃsitāpaciticāru puraḥ surāṇām ādeśam ity abhimukhaṃ samavāpya bhartuḥ /
analyzed: āśaṃsita apaciti cāru puras surāṇām ādeśam iti abhimukham samavāpya bhartuḥ

original: lebhe parāṃ dyutim amartyavadhūsamūhaḥ sambhāvanā hy adhikṛtasya tanoti tejaḥ // BhKir_6.46 //
analyzed: lebhe parām dyutim amartya vadhū samūhaḥ sambhāvanā hi adhikṛtasya tanoti tejaḥ

original: praṇatim atha vidhāya prasthitāḥ sadmanas tāḥ stanabharanamitāṅgīr aṅganāḥ prītibhājaḥ /
analyzed: praṇatim atha vidhāya prasthitāḥ sadmanaḥ tāḥ stana bhara namita aṅgīḥ aṅganāḥ prīti bhājaḥ

original: acalanalinalakṣmīhāri nālaṃ babhūva stimitam amarabhartur draṣṭum akṣṇāṃ sahasram // BhKir_6.47 //
analyzed: acala nalina lakṣmī hāri nā alam babhūva stimitam amarabhartuḥ draṣṭum akṣṇām sahasram

original: śrīmadbhiḥ sarathagajaiḥ surāṅganānāṃ guptānām atha sacivais trilokabhartuḥ /
analyzed: śrīmadbhiḥ sa ratha gajaiḥ sura aṅganānām guptānām atha sacivaiḥ triloka bhartuḥ

original: saṃmūrchann alaghuvimānarandhrabhinnaḥ prasthānaṃ samabhidadhe mṛdaṅganādaḥ // BhKir_7.1 //
analyzed: saṃmūrchan a laghu vimāna randhra bhinnaḥ prasthānam samabhidadhe mṛdaṅga nādaḥ

original: sotkaṇṭhair amaragaṇair anuprakīrṇān niryāya jvalitarucaḥ purān maghonaḥ /
analyzed: sa utkaṇṭhaiḥ amara gaṇaiḥ anuprakīrṇān niryāya jvalita rucaḥ purāt maghonaḥ

original: rāmāṇām upari vivasvataḥ sthitānāṃ nāsede caritaguṇatvam ātapatraiḥ // BhKir_7.2 //
analyzed: rāmāṇām upari vivasvataḥ sthitānām na āsede carita guṇa tvam ātapatraiḥ

original: dhūtānām abhimukhapātibhiḥ samīrair āyāsād aviśadalocanotpalānām /
analyzed: dhūtānām abhimukha pātibhiḥ samīraiḥ āyāsāt a viśada locana utpalānām

original: āninye madajanitāṃ śriyaṃ vadhūnām uṣṇāṃśudyutijanitaḥ kapolarāgaḥ // BhKir_7.3 //
analyzed: āninye mada janitām śriyam vadhūnām uṣṇāṃśu dyuti janitaḥ kapola rāgaḥ

original: tiṣṭhadbhiḥ katham api devatānubhāvād ākṛṣṭaiḥ prajavibhir āyataṃ turaṅgaiḥ /
analyzed: tiṣṭhadbhiḥ katham api devatā anubhāvāt ākṛṣṭaiḥ prajavibhiḥ āyatam turaṅgaiḥ

original: nemīnām asati vivartanaī rathaughair āsede viyati vimānavat pravṛttiḥ // BhKir_7.4 //
analyzed: nemīnām ratha oghaiḥ āsede viyati vimāna vat pravṛttiḥ

original: kāntānāṃ kṛtapulakaḥ stanāṅgarāge vaktreṣu cyutatilakeṣu mauktikābhas /
analyzed: kāntānām kṛta pulakaḥ stana aṅgarāge vaktreṣu cyuta tilakeṣu

original: sampede śramasalilodgamo vibhūṣā ramyāṇāṃ vikṛtir api śriyaṃ tanoti // BhKir_7.5 //
analyzed: sampede śrama salila udgamaḥ vibhūṣā ramyāṇām vikṛtiḥ api śriyam tanoti

original: rājadbhiḥ pathi marutām abhinnarūpair ulkārciḥ sphuṭagatibhir dhvajāṅkuśānām /
analyzed: rājadbhiḥ pathi marutām abhinna rūpaiḥ ulkā arciḥ sphuṭa gatibhiḥ dhvaja aṅkuśānām

original: tejobhiḥ kanakanikāṣarājigaurair āyāmaḥ kriyata iva sma sātirekaḥ // BhKir_7.6 //
analyzed: tejobhiḥ kanaka nikāṣa rāji gauraiḥ āyāmaḥ kriyate iva sma sa atirekaḥ

original: rāmāṇām avajitamālyasaukumārye samprāpte vapuṣi sahatvam ātapasya /
analyzed: rāmāṇām avajita mālya saukumārye samprāpte vapuṣi saha tvam ātapasya

original: gandharvair adhigatavismayaiḥ pratīye kalyāṇī vidhiṣu vicitratā vidhātuḥ // BhKir_7.7 //
analyzed: gandharvaiḥ adhigata vismayaiḥ pratīye kalyāṇī vidhiṣu vicitra tā vidhātuḥ

original: sindūraiḥ kṛtarucayaḥ sahemakakṣyāḥ srotobhis tridaśagajā madaṃ kṣarantaḥ /
analyzed: sindūraiḥ kṛta rucayaḥ sa hema kakṣyāḥ srotobhiḥ tridaśa gajāḥ madam kṣarantaḥ

original: sādṛśyaṃ yayur aruṇāṃśurāgabhinnair varṣadbhiḥ sphuritaśatahradaiḥ payodaiḥ // BhKir_7.8 //
analyzed: sādṛśyam yayuḥ aruṇa aṃśu rāga bhinnaiḥ varṣadbhiḥ sphurita śatahradaiḥ payodaiḥ

original: atyarthaṃ durupasadād upetya dūraṃ paryantād ahimamayūkhamaṇḍalasya /
analyzed: atyartham durupasadāt upetya dūram paryantāt a hima mayūkha maṇḍalasya

original: āśānām uparacitām ivaikaveṇīṃ ramyormīṃ tridaśanadīṃ yayur balāni // BhKir_7.9 //
analyzed: āśānām uparacitām iva eka veṇīm ramya ūrmīm tridaśa nadīm yayuḥ balāni

original: āmattabhramarakulākulāni dhunvann udbhūtagrathitarajāṃsi paṅkajāni /
analyzed: āmatta bhramara kula ākulāni dhunvan udbhūta grathita rajāṃsi paṅkajāni

original: kāntānāṃ gagananadītaraṅgaśītaḥ saṃtāpaṃ viramayati sma mātariśvā // BhKir_7.10 //
analyzed: kāntānām gagana nadī taraṅga śītaḥ saṃtāpam viramayati sma mātariśvā

original: sambhinnair ibhaturagāvagāhanena prāpyorvīr anupadavīṃ vimānapaṅktīḥ /
analyzed: sambhinnaiḥ ibha turaga avagāhanena prāpya urvīḥ anu padavīm vimāna paṅktīḥ

original: tatpūrvaṃ pratividadhe surāpagāyā vaprāntaskhalitavivartanaṃ payobhiḥ // BhKir_7.11 //
analyzed: tat pūrvam pratividadhe surāpagāyāḥ vapra anta skhalita vivartanam payobhiḥ

original: krāntānāṃ grahacaritāt patho rathānām akṣāgrakṣatasuraveśmavedikānām /
analyzed: krāntānām graha caritāt pathaḥ rathānām akṣa agra kṣata sura veśma vedikānām

original: niḥsaṅgaṃ pradhibhir upādade vivṛttiḥ sampīḍakṣubhitajaleṣu toyadeṣu // BhKir_7.12 //
analyzed: niḥsaṅgam pradhibhiḥ upādade vivṛttiḥ sampīḍa kṣubhita jaleṣu toyadeṣu

original: taptānām upadadhire viṣāṇabhinnāḥ prahlādaṃ surakariṇāṃ ghanāḥ kṣarantaḥ /
analyzed: taptānām upadadhire viṣāṇa bhinnāḥ prahlādam sura kariṇām ghanāḥ kṣarantaḥ

original: yuktānāṃ khalu mahatāṃ paropakāre kalyāṇī bhavati rujatsv api pravṛttiḥ // BhKir_7.13 //
analyzed: yuktānām khalu mahatām para upakāre kalyāṇī bhavati rujatsu api pravṛttiḥ

original: saṃvātā muhur anilena nīyamāne divyastrījaghanavarāṃśuke vivṛttim /
analyzed: saṃvātā muhur anilena nīyamāne divya strī jaghana vara aṃśuke vivṛttim

original: paryasyatpṛthumaṇimekhalāṃśujālaṃ saṃjajñe yutakam ivāntarīyam ūrvoḥ // BhKir_7.14 //
analyzed: paryasyat pṛthu maṇi mekhalā aṃśu jālam saṃjajñe yutakam iva antarīyam ūrvoḥ

original: pratyārdrīkṛtatilakās tuṣārapātaiḥ prahlādaṃ śamitapariśramā diśantaḥ /
analyzed: pratyārdrīkṛta tilakāḥ tuṣāra pātaiḥ prahlādam śamita pariśramāḥ diśantaḥ

original: kāntānāṃ bahumatim āyayuḥ payodā nālpīyān bahu sukṛtaṃ hinasti doṣaḥ // BhKir_7.15 //
analyzed: kāntānām bahu matim āyayuḥ payodāḥ na alpīyān bahu sukṛtam hinasti doṣaḥ

original: yātasya grathitataraṅgasaikatābhe vicchedaṃ vipayasi vārivāhajāle /
analyzed: yātasya grathita taraṅga saikata ābhe vicchedam vipayasi vārivāha jāle

original: ātenus tridaśavadhūjanāṅgabhājāṃ saṃdhānaṃ suradhanuṣaḥ prabhā maṇīnām // BhKir_7.16 //
analyzed: ātenuḥ tridaśa vadhū jana aṅga bhājām saṃdhānam suradhanuṣaḥ prabhāḥ maṇīnām

original: saṃsiddhāv iti karaṇīyasaṃnibaddhair ālāpaiḥ pipatiṣatāṃ vilaṅghya vīthīm /
analyzed: saṃsiddhau iti karaṇīya saṃnibaddhaiḥ ālāpaiḥ pipatiṣatām vilaṅghya vīthīm

original: āsede daśaśatalocanadhvajinyā jīmūtair apihitasānur indrakīlaḥ // BhKir_7.17 //
analyzed: āsede daśa śata locana dhvajinyā jīmūtaiḥ apihita sānuḥ indrakīlaḥ

original: ākīrṇā mukhanalinair vilāsinīnām udbhūtasphuṭaviśadātapatraphenā /
analyzed: ākīrṇā mukha nalinaiḥ vilāsinīnām udbhūta sphuṭa viśada ātapatra phenā

original: sā tūryadhvanitagabhīram āpatantī bhūbhartuḥ śirasi nabhonadīva reje // BhKir_7.18 //
analyzed: sā tūrya dhvanita gabhīram āpatantī bhūbhartuḥ śirasi nabhaḥ nadī iva reje

original: setutvaṃ dadhati payomucāṃ vitāne saṃrambhād abhipatato rathāñ javena /
analyzed: setu tvam dadhati payomucām vitāne saṃrambhāt abhipatataḥ javena

original: āninyur niyamitaraśmibhugnaghoṇāḥ kṛcchreṇa kṣitim avanāmitas turaṅgāḥ // BhKir_7.19 //
analyzed: āninyuḥ niyamita raśmi bhugna ghoṇāḥ kṛcchreṇa kṣitim avanāmitaḥ turaṅgāḥ

original: māhendraṃ nagam abhitaḥ kareṇuvaryāḥ paryantasthitajaladā divaḥ patantaḥ /
analyzed: māhendram nagam abhitas kareṇu varyāḥ paryanta sthita jaladāḥ divaḥ patantaḥ

original: sādṛśyaṃ nilayananiṣprakampapakṣair ājagmur jalanidhiśāyibhir nagendraiḥ // BhKir_7.20 //
analyzed: sādṛśyam nilayana niṣprakampa pakṣaiḥ ājagmuḥ jalanidhi śāyibhiḥ naga indraiḥ

original: utsaṅge samaviṣame samaṃ mahādreḥ krāntānāṃ viyadabhipātalāghavena /
analyzed: utsaṅge sama viṣame samam mahā adreḥ krāntānām viyat abhipāta lāghavena

original: ā mūlād upanadi saikateṣu lebhe sāmagrī khurapadavī turaṅgamāṇām // BhKir_7.21 //
analyzed: ā mūlāt upanadi saikateṣu lebhe sāmagrī khura padavī turaṅgamāṇām

original: sadhvānaṃ nipatitanirjharāsu mandraiḥ saṃmūrchan pratininadair adhityakāsu /
analyzed: sa dhvānam nipatita nirjharāsu mandraiḥ saṃmūrchan pratininadaiḥ adhityakāsu

original: udgrīvair ghanaravaśaṅkayā mayūraiḥ sotkaṇṭhaṃ dhvanir upaśuśruve rathānām // BhKir_7.22 //
analyzed: udgrīvaiḥ ghana rava śaṅkayā mayūraiḥ sa utkaṇṭham dhvaniḥ upaśuśruve rathānām

original: sambhinnām aviralapātibhir mayūkhair nīlānāṃ bhṛśam upamekhalaṃ maṇīnām /
analyzed: sambhinnām avirala pātibhiḥ mayūkhaiḥ nīlānām bhṛśam upamekhalam maṇīnām

original: vicchinām iva vanitā nabhontarāle vaprāmbhaḥsrutim avalokayāṃbabhūvuḥ // BhKir_7.23 //
analyzed: vicchinām iva vanitāḥ nabhaḥ antarāle vapra ambhaḥ srutim avalokayāṃbabhūvuḥ

original: āsannadvipapadavīmadānilāya krudhyanto dhiyam avamatya dhūrgatānām /
analyzed: āsanna dvipa padavī mada anilāya krudhyantaḥ dhiyam avamatya dhūrgatānām

original: savyājaṃ nijakariṇībhir āttacittāḥ prasthānaṃ surakariṇaḥ kathaṃcid īṣuḥ // BhKir_7.24 //
analyzed: sa vyājam nija kariṇībhiḥ ātta cittāḥ prasthānam sura kariṇaḥ kathaṃcid īṣuḥ

original: nīrandhraṃ pathiṣu rajo rathāṅganunnaṃ paryasyan navasalilāruṇaṃ vahantī /
analyzed: nīrandhram pathiṣu rajaḥ ratha aṅga nunnam paryasyan nava salila aruṇam vahantī

original: ātene vanagahanāni vāhinī sā gharmāntakṣubhitajaleva jahnukanyā // BhKir_7.25 //
analyzed: ātene vana gahanāni vāhinī sā gharma anta kṣubhita jalā iva jahnukanyā

original: sambhogakṣamagahanām athopagaṅgaṃ bibhrāṇāṃ jvalitamaṇīni saikatāni /
analyzed: sambhoga kṣama gahanām atha upagaṅgam bibhrāṇām jvalita maṇīni saikatāni

original: adhyūṣuś cyutakusumācitāṃ sahāyā vṛtrārer aviralaśādvalāṃ dharitrīm // BhKir_7.26 //
analyzed: adhyūṣuḥ cyuta kusuma ācitām sahāyāḥ vṛtrāreḥ avirala śādvalām dharitrīm

original: bhūbhartuḥ samadhikam ādadhe tadorvyāḥ śrīmattāṃ harisakhavāhinīniveśaḥ /
analyzed: bhūbhartuḥ samadhikam ādadhe tadā urvyāḥ śrīmat tām hari sakha vāhinī niveśaḥ

original: saṃsaktau kim asulabhaṃ mahodayānām ucchrāyaṃ nayati yadṛcchayāpi yogaḥ // BhKir_7.27 //
analyzed: saṃsaktau kim a sulabham mahodayānām ucchrāyam nayati yadṛcchayā api yogaḥ

original: sāmodāḥ kusumataruśriyo viviktāḥ sampattiḥ kisalayaśālinīlatānām /
analyzed: sa āmodāḥ kusuma taru śriyaḥ viviktāḥ sampattiḥ kisalaya śālinī latānām

original: sāphalyaṃ yayur amarāṅganopabhuktāḥ sā lakṣmīr upakurute yayā pareṣām // BhKir_7.28 //
analyzed: sāphalyam yayuḥ amara aṅganā upabhuktāḥ sā lakṣmīḥ upakurute yayā pareṣām

original: klānto 'pi tridaśavadhūjanaḥ purastāl līnāhiśvasitavilolapallavānām /
analyzed: klāntaḥ pi tridaśa vadhū janaḥ purastāt līna ahi śvasita vilola pallavānām

original: sevyānāṃ hatavinayair ivāvṛtānāṃ samparkaṃ pariharati sma candanānām // BhKir_7.29 //
analyzed: sevyānām hata vinayaiḥ iva āvṛtānām samparkam pariharati sma candanānām

original: utsṛṣṭadhvajakuthakaṅkaṭā dharitrīm ānītā viditanayaiḥ śramaṃ vinetum /
analyzed: utsṛṣṭa dhvaja kutha kaṅkaṭā dharitrīm ānītāḥ vidita nayaiḥ śramam vinetum

original: ākṣiptadrumagahanā yugāntavātaiḥ paryastā giraya iva dvipā virejuḥ // BhKir_7.30 //
analyzed: ākṣipta druma gahanāḥ yugānta vātaiḥ paryastāḥ girayaḥ iva dvipāḥ virejuḥ

original: prasthānaśramajanitāṃ vihāya nidrām āmukte gajapatinā sadānapaṅke /
analyzed: prasthāna śrama janitām vihāya nidrām āmukte gajapatinā sa dāna paṅke

original: śayyānte kulamalināṃ kṣaṇaṃ vilīnaṃ saṃrambhacyutam iva śṛṅkhalaṃ cakāśe // BhKir_7.31 //
analyzed: śayyā ante kula malinām kṣaṇam vilīnam saṃrambha cyutam iva śṛṅkhalam cakāśe

original: āyastaḥ surasaridogharuddhavartmā samprāptuṃ vanagajadānagandhi rodhaḥ /
analyzed: āyastaḥ surasarit ogha ruddha vartmā samprāptum vana gaja dāna gandhi rodhaḥ

original: mūrdhānaṃ nihitaśitāṅkuśaṃ vidhunvan yantāraṃ na vigaṇayāṃcakāra nāgaḥ // BhKir_7.32 //
analyzed: mūrdhānam nihita śita aṅkuśam vidhunvan yantāram na vigaṇayāṃcakāra nāgaḥ

original: āroḍhuḥ samavanatasya pītaśeṣe sāśaṅkaṃ payasi samīrite kareṇa /
analyzed: āroḍhuḥ samavanatasya pīta śeṣe sa āśaṅkam payasi samīrite kareṇa

original: saṃmārjann aruṇamadasrutī kapolau sasyande mada iva śīkaraḥ kareṇoḥ // BhKir_7.33 //
analyzed: saṃmārjan aruṇa mada srutī kapolau sasyande madaḥ iva śīkaraḥ kareṇoḥ

original: āghrāya kṣaṇam atitṛṣyatāpi roṣād uttīraṃ nihitavivṛttalocanena /
analyzed: āghrāya kṣaṇam atitṛṣyatā api roṣāt uttīram nihita vivṛtta locanena

original: sampṛktaṃ vanakarināṃ madāmbusekair nāceme himam api vāri vāraṇena // BhKir_7.34 //
analyzed: sampṛktam vana karinām mada ambu sekaiḥ nā āceme himam api vāri vāraṇena

original: praścyotanmadasurabhīṇi nimnagāyāḥ krīḍanto gajapatayaḥ payāṃsi kṛtvā /
analyzed: praścyotat mada surabhīṇi nimnagāyāḥ krīḍantaḥ gaja patayaḥ payāṃsi kṛtvā

original: kiñjalkavyavahitatāmradānalekhair utteruḥ sarasijagandhibhiḥ kapolaiḥ // BhKir_7.35 //
analyzed: kiñjalka vyavahita tāmra dāna lekhaiḥ utteruḥ sarasija gandhibhiḥ kapolaiḥ

original: ākīrṇaṃ balarajasā ghanāruṇena prakṣobhaiḥ sapadi taraṅgitaṃ taṭeṣu /
analyzed: ākīrṇam bala rajasā ghana aruṇena prakṣobhaiḥ sapadi taraṅgitam taṭeṣu

original: mātaṅgonmathitasarojareṇupiṅgaṃ māñjiṣṭhaṃ vasanam ivāmbu nirbabhāse // BhKir_7.36 //
analyzed: mātaṅga unmathita saroja reṇu piṅgam māñjiṣṭham vasanam iva ambu nirbabhāse

original: śrīmadbhir niyamitakandharāparāntaiḥ saṃsaktair aguruvaneṣu sāṅgahāram /
analyzed: śrīmadbhiḥ niyamita kandharā parāntaiḥ saṃsaktaiḥ aguru vaneṣu sa aṅgahāram

original: samprāpe nisṛtamadāmbubhir gajendraiḥ prasyandipracalitagaṇḍaśailaśobhā // BhKir_7.37 //
analyzed: samprāpe nisṛta mada ambubhiḥ gaja indraiḥ prasyandi pracalita gaṇḍa śaila śobhā

original: niḥśeṣaṃ praśamitareṇu vāraṇānāṃ srotobhir madajalam ujjhatām ajasram /
analyzed: niḥśeṣam praśamita reṇu vāraṇānām srotobhiḥ mada jalam ujjhatām ajasram

original: āmodaṃ vyavahitabhūripuṣpagandho bhinnailāsurabhim uvāha gandhavāhaḥ // BhKir_7.38 //
analyzed: āmodam vyavahita bhūri puṣpa gandhaḥ bhinna elā surabhim uvāha gandhavāhaḥ

original: sādṛśyaṃ dadhati gabhīrameghaghoṣair unnidrakṣubhitamṛgādhipaśrutāni /
analyzed: sādṛśyam dadhati gabhīra megha ghoṣaiḥ unnidra kṣubhita mṛgādhipa śrutāni

original: ātenuś cakitacakoranīlakaṇṭhān kacchāntān amaramahebhabṛṃhitāni // BhKir_7.39 //
analyzed: ātenuḥ cakita cakora nīlakaṇṭhān kacchāntān amara mahā ibha bṛṃhitāni

original: sāsrāvasaktakamaniyaparicchadānām adhvaśramāturavadhūjanasevitānām /
analyzed: adhva śrama ātura vadhū jana sevitānām

original: jajñe niveśanavibhāgapariṣkṛtānāṃ lakṣmīḥ puropavanajā vanapādapānām // BhKir_7.40 //
analyzed: jajñe niveśana vibhāga pariṣkṛtānām lakṣmīḥ pura upavana jā vana pādapānām

original: atha svamāyākṛtamandirojjvalaṃ jvalanmaṇi vyomasadāṃ sanātanam /
analyzed: atha sva māyā kṛta mandira ujjvalam jvalat maṇi vyomasadām sanātanam

original: surāṅganā gopaticāpagopuraṃ puraṃ vanānāṃ vijihīrṣayā jahuḥ // BhKir_8.1 //
analyzed: sura aṅganāḥ gopati cāpa gopuram puram vanānām vijihīrṣayā jahuḥ

original: yathāyathaṃ tāḥ sahitā nabhaścaraiḥ prabhābhir udbhāsitaśailavīrudhaḥ /
analyzed: yathāyatham tāḥ sahitāḥ nabhaścaraiḥ prabhābhiḥ udbhāsita śaila vīrudhaḥ

original: vanaṃ viśantyo vanajāyatekṣaṇāḥ kṣaṇadyutīnāṃ dadhur ekarūpatām // BhKir_8.2 //
analyzed: vanam viśantyaḥ vana jāyata īkṣaṇāḥ kṣaṇa dyutīnām dadhuḥ eka rūpa tām

original: nivṛttavṛttorupayodharaklamaḥ pravṛttainirhrādivibhūṣaṇāravaḥ /
analyzed: nivṛtta vṛtta uru payodhara klamaḥ pravṛtta ai nirhrādi vibhūṣaṇa āravaḥ

original: nitambinīnāṃ bhṛśam ādadhe dhṛtiṃ nabhaḥprayāṇād avanau parikramaḥ // BhKir_8.3 //
analyzed: nitambinīnām bhṛśam ādadhe dhṛtim nabhaḥ prayāṇāt avanau parikramaḥ

original: ghanāni kāmaṃ kusumāni bibhrataḥ karapraceyāny apahāya śākhinaḥ /
analyzed: ghanāni kāmam kusumāni bibhrataḥ kara praceyāni apahāya śākhinaḥ

original: puro 'bhisasre surasundarījanair yathottarecchā hi guṇeṣu kāminaḥ // BhKir_8.4 //
analyzed: puras bhisasre sura sundarī janaiḥ yathottara icchāḥ hi guṇeṣu kāminaḥ

original: tanūr alaktāruṇapāṇipallavāḥ sphurannakhāṃśūtkaramañjarībhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: tanūḥ alakta aruṇa pāṇi pallavāḥ sphurat nakha aṃśu utkara mañjarī bhṛtaḥ

original: vilāsinībāhulatā vanālayo vilepanāmodahṛtāḥ siṣevire // BhKir_8.5 //
analyzed: vilāsinī bāhu latāḥ vana alayaḥ vilepana āmoda hṛtāḥ siṣevire

original: nipīyamānastabakā śilīmukhair aśokayaṣṭiś calabālapallavā /
analyzed: nipīyamāna stabakā śilīmukhaiḥ aśoka yaṣṭiḥ cala bāla pallavā

original: viḍambayantī dadṛśe vadhūjanair amandadaṣṭauṣṭhakarāvadhūnanam // BhKir_8.6 //
analyzed: viḍambayantī dadṛśe vadhū janaiḥ amanda daṣṭa oṣṭha kara avadhūnanam

original: karau dhunānā navapallavākṛtī vṛthā kṛthā mānini mā pariśramam /
analyzed: karau dhunānā nava pallava ākṛtī vṛthā kṛthāḥ mānini mā pariśramam

original: upeyuṣī kalpalatābhiśaṅkayā kathaṃ nv itas trasyati ṣaṭpadāvaliḥ // BhKir_8.7 //
analyzed: upeyuṣī kalpalatā abhiśaṅkayā katham nu itas trasyati ṣaṭpada āvaliḥ

original: jahīhi kopaṃ dayito 'nugamyatāṃ purānuśete tava cañcalaṃ manaḥ /
analyzed: jahīhi kopam dayitaḥ nugamyatām purā anuśete tava cañcalam manaḥ

original: iti priyaṃ kāṃcid upaitum icchatīṃ puro 'nuninye nipuṇaḥ sakhījanaḥ // BhKir_8.8 //
analyzed: iti priyam kāṃcid upaitum icchatīm puras nuninye nipuṇaḥ sakhī janaḥ

original: samunnataiḥ kāśadukūlaśālibhiḥ parikvaṇatsārasapaṅktimekhalaiḥ /
analyzed: samunnataiḥ kāśa dukūla śālibhiḥ parikvaṇat sārasa paṅkti mekhalaiḥ

original: pratīradeśaiḥ svakalatracārubhir vibhūṣitāḥ kuñjasamudrayoṣitaḥ // BhKir_8.9 //
analyzed: pratīra deśaiḥ sva kalatra cārubhiḥ vibhūṣitāḥ kuñja samudra yoṣitaḥ

original: vidūrapātena bhidām upeyuṣaś cyutāḥ pravāhād abhitaḥ prasāriṇaḥ /
analyzed: vidūra pātena bhidām upeyuṣaḥ cyutāḥ pravāhāt abhitas prasāriṇaḥ

original: priyāṅkaśītāḥ śucimauktikatviṣo vanaprahāsā iva vāribindavaḥ // BhKir_8.10 //
analyzed: priya aṅka śītāḥ śuci mauktika tviṣaḥ vana prahāsāḥ iva vāri bindavaḥ

original: sakhījanaṃ prema gurūkṛtādaraṃ nirīkṣamāṇā iva namramūrtayaḥ /
analyzed: sakhī janam prema gurūkṛta ādaram nirīkṣamāṇāḥ iva namra mūrtayaḥ

original: sthiradvirephāñjanaśaritodarair visāribhiḥ puṣpavilocanair latāḥ // BhKir_8.11 //
analyzed: sthira dvirepha añjana śarita udaraiḥ visāribhiḥ puṣpa vilocanaiḥ latāḥ

original: upeyuṣīṇāṃ bṛhatīr adhityakā manāṃsi jahruḥ surarājayoṣitām /
analyzed: upeyuṣīṇām bṛhatīḥ adhityakāḥ manāṃsi jahruḥ surarāja yoṣitām

original: kapolakāṣaiḥ kariṇāṃ madāruṇair upāhitaśyāmarucaś ca candanāḥ // BhKir_8.12 //
analyzed: kapola kāṣaiḥ kariṇām mada aruṇaiḥ upāhita śyāma rucaḥ ca candanāḥ

original: svagocare saty api vittahāriṇā vilobhyamānāḥ prasavena śākhinām /
analyzed: sva gocare sati api vitta hāriṇā vilobhyamānāḥ prasavena śākhinām

original: nabhaścarāṇām upakartum icchatāṃ priyāṇi cakruḥ praṇayena yoṣitaḥ // BhKir_8.13 //
analyzed: nabhaḥ carāṇām upakartum icchatām priyāṇi cakruḥ praṇayena yoṣitaḥ

original: prayacchatoccaiḥ kusumāni māninī vipakṣagotraṃ dayitena lambhitā /
analyzed: prayacchata uccais kusumāni māninī vipakṣa gotram dayitena lambhitā

original: na kiṃcid ūce caraṇena kevalaṃ lilekha bāṣpākulalocanā bhuvam // BhKir_8.14 //
analyzed: na kiṃcid ūce caraṇena kevalam lilekha bāṣpa ākula locanā bhuvam

original: priye 'parā yacchati vācam unmukhī nibaddhadṛṣṭiḥ śithilākuloccayā /
analyzed: priye parā yacchati vācam unmukhī nibaddha dṛṣṭiḥ śithila ākula uccayā

original: samādadhe nāṃśukam āhitaṃ vṛthā viveda puṣpeṣu na pāṇipallavam // BhKir_8.15 //
analyzed: samādadhe nā aṃśukam āhitam vṛthā viveda puṣpeṣu na pāṇi pallavam

original: salīlam āsaktalatāntabhūṣaṇaṃ samāsajantyā kusumāvataṃsakam /
analyzed: sa līlam āsakta latā anta bhūṣaṇam samāsajantyā kusuma avataṃsakam

original: stanopapīḍaṃ nunude nitambinā ghanena kaścij jaghanena kāntayā // BhKir_8.16 //
analyzed: stana upapīḍam nunude nitambinā ghanena kaścid jaghanena kāntayā

original: kalatrabhāreṇa vilolanīvinā galaddukūlastanaśālinorasā /
analyzed: kalatra bhāreṇa vilola nīvinā galat dukūla stana śālinā urasā

original: balivyapāyasphuṭaromarājinā nirāyatatvād udareṇa tāmyatā // BhKir_8.17 //
analyzed: bali vyapāya sphuṭa romarājinā nirāyata tvāt udareṇa tāmyatā

original: vilambamānākulakeśapāśayā kayācid āviṣkṛtabāhumūlayā /
analyzed: vilambamāna ākula keśapāśayā kayācid āviṣkṛta bāhumūlayā

original: taruprasūnāny apadiśya sādaraṃ manodhināthasya manaḥ samādade // BhKir_8.18 //
analyzed: taru prasūnāni apadiśya sa ādaram manodhināthasya manaḥ samādade

original: vyapohituṃ locanato mukhānilair apārayantaṃ kila puṣpajaṃ rajaḥ /
analyzed: vyapohitum locanataḥ mukha anilaiḥ a pārayantam kila puṣpa jam rajaḥ

original: payodhareṇorasi kācid unmanāḥ priyaṃ jaghānonnatapīvarastanī // BhKir_8.19 //
analyzed: payodhareṇa urasi kācid unmanāḥ priyam jaghāna unnata pīvara stanī

original: imāny amūnīty apavarjite śanair yathābhirāmaṃ kusumāgrapallave /
analyzed: imāni amūni iti apavarjite śanais yathā abhirāmam kusuma agra pallave

original: vihāya niḥsāratayeva bhūruhān padaṃ vanaśrīr vanitāsu saṃdadhe // BhKir_8.20 //
analyzed: vihāya niḥsāra tayā iva bhūruhān padam vana śrīḥ vanitāsu saṃdadhe

original: pravālabhaṅgāruṇapāṇipallavaḥ parāgapāṇḍūkṛtapīvarastanaḥ /
analyzed: pravāla bhaṅga aruṇa pāṇipallavaḥ parāga pāṇḍūkṛta pīvara stanaḥ

original: mahīruhaḥ puṣpasugandhir ādade vapurguṇocchrāyam ivāṅganājanaḥ // BhKir_8.21 //
analyzed: mahīruhaḥ puṣpa sugandhiḥ ādade vapuḥ guṇa ucchrāyam iva aṅganā janaḥ

original: varorubhir vāraṇahastapīvaraiś cirāya khinnān navapallavaśriyaḥ /
analyzed: vara ūrubhiḥ vāraṇahasta pīvaraiḥ cirāya khinnān nava pallava śriyaḥ

original: same 'pi yātuṃ caraṇān anīśvarān madād iva praskhalataḥ pade pade // BhKir_8.22 //
analyzed: same pi yātum caraṇān anīśvarān madāt iva praskhalataḥ pade pade

original: visārikāñcīmaṇiraśmilabdhayā manoharocchāyanitambaśobhayā /
analyzed: visāri kāñcī maṇi raśmi labdhayā manohara ucchāya nitamba śobhayā

original: sthitāni jitvā navasaikatadyutiṃ śramātiriktair jaghanāni gauravaiḥ // BhKir_8.23 //
analyzed: sthitāni jitvā nava saikata dyutim śrama atiriktaiḥ jaghanāni gauravaiḥ

original: samucchvasatpaṅkajakośakomalair upāhitaśrīṇy upanīvi nābhibhiḥ /
analyzed: samucchvasat paṅkaja kośa komalaiḥ upāhita śrīṇi upanīvi nābhibhiḥ

original: dadhanti madhyeṣu valīvibhaṅgiṣu stanātibhārād udarāṇi namratām // BhKir_8.24 //
analyzed: dadhanti madhyeṣu valī vibhaṅgiṣu stana ati bhārāt udarāṇi namra tām

original: samānakāntīni tuṣārabhūṣaṇaiḥ saroruhair asphuṭapattrapaṅktibhiḥ /
analyzed: samāna kāntīni tuṣāra bhūṣaṇaiḥ saroruhaiḥ asphuṭa pattra paṅktibhiḥ

original: citāni gharmāmbukaṇaiḥ samantato mukhāny anutphullavilocanāni ca // BhKir_8.25 //
analyzed: citāni gharmāmbu kaṇaiḥ samantataḥ mukhāni an utphulla vilocanāni ca

original: viniryatīnāṃ gurusvedamantharaṃ surāṅganānām anusānuvartmanaḥ /
analyzed: viniryatīnām guru sveda mantharam sura aṅganānām anu sānu vartmanaḥ

original: savismayaṃ rūpayato nabhaścarān viveśa tatpūrvam ivekṣaṇādaraḥ // BhKir_8.26 //
analyzed: sa vismayam rūpayataḥ nabhaścarān viveśa tad pūrvam iva īkṣaṇa ādaraḥ

original: atha sphuranmīnavidhūtapaṅkajā vipaṅkatīraskhalitormisaṃhatiḥ /
analyzed: atha sphurat mīna vidhūta paṅkajā vipaṅka tīra skhalita ūrmi saṃhatiḥ

original: payo 'vagāḍhuṃ kalahaṃsanādinī samājuhāveva vadhūḥ surāpagā // BhKir_8.27 //
analyzed: payaḥ vagāḍhum kalahaṃsa nādinī samājuhāva iva vadhūḥ surāpagā

original: praśāntagharmābhibhavaḥ śanair vivān vilāsinībhyaḥ parimṛṣṭapaṅkajaḥ /
analyzed: praśānta gharma abhibhavaḥ śanais vivān vilāsinībhyaḥ parimṛṣṭa paṅkajaḥ

original: dadau bhujālambam ivāttaśīkaras taraṅgamālāntaragocaro 'nilaḥ // BhKir_8.28 //
analyzed: dadau bhuja ālambam iva ātta śīkaraḥ taraṅga mālā antara gocaraḥ nilaḥ

original: gataiḥ sahāvaiḥ kalahaṃsavikramaṃ kalatrabhāraiḥ pulinaṃ nitambibhiḥ /
analyzed: gataiḥ sahāvaiḥ kalahaṃsa vikramam kalatra bhāraiḥ pulinam nitambibhiḥ

original: mukhaiḥ sarojāni ca dīrghalocanaiḥ surastriyaḥ sāmyaguṇān nirāsire // BhKir_8.29 //
analyzed: mukhaiḥ sarojāni ca dīrgha locanaiḥ sura striyaḥ sāmya guṇān nirāsire

original: vibhinnaparyantagamīnapaṅktayaḥ puro vigāḍhāḥ sakhibhir marutvataḥ /
analyzed: vibhinna paryanta gamīna paṅktayaḥ puras vigāḍhāḥ sakhibhiḥ marutvataḥ

original: kathaṃcid āpaḥ surasundarījanaiḥ sabhītibhis tatprathamaṃ prapedire // BhKir_8.30 //
analyzed: kathaṃcid āpaḥ surasundarī janaiḥ sa bhītibhiḥ tad prathamam prapedire

original: vigāḍhamātre ramaṇībhir ambhasi prayatnasaṃvāhitapīvarorubhiḥ /
analyzed: vigāḍha mātre ramaṇībhiḥ ambhasi prayatna saṃvāhita pīvara ūrubhiḥ

original: vibhidyamānā visasāra sārasān udasya tīreṣu taraṅgasaṃhatiḥ // BhKir_8.31 //
analyzed: vibhidyamānā visasāra sārasān udasya tīreṣu taraṅga saṃhatiḥ

original: śilāghanair nākasadām uraḥsthalair bṛhanniveśaiś ca vadhūpayodharaiḥ /
analyzed: śilā ghanaiḥ nākasadām uraḥsthalaiḥ bṛhat niveśaiḥ ca vadhū payodharaiḥ

original: taṭābhinītena vibhinnavīcinā ruṣeva bheje kaluṣatvam ambhasā // BhKir_8.32 //
analyzed: taṭa abhinītena vibhinna vīcinā ruṣā iva bheje kaluṣa tvam ambhasā

original: vidhūtakeśāḥ parilolitasrajaḥ surāṅganānāṃ praviluptacandanāḥ /
analyzed: vidhūta keśāḥ parilolita srajaḥ surāṅganānām pravilupta candanāḥ

original: atiprasaṅgād vihitāgaso muhuḥ prakampam īyuḥ sabhayā ivormayaḥ // BhKir_8.33 //
analyzed: ati prasaṅgāt vihita āgasaḥ muhur prakampam īyuḥ sa bhayāḥ iva ūrmayaḥ

original: vipakṣacittonmathanā nakhavraṇās tirohitā vibhramamaṇḍanena ye /
analyzed: vipakṣa citta unmathanāḥ nakha vraṇāḥ tirohitāḥ vibhrama maṇḍanena ye

original: hṛtasya śeṣān iva kuṅkumasya tān vikatthanīyān dadhur anyathā striyaḥ // BhKir_8.34 //
analyzed: hṛtasya śeṣān iva kuṅkumasya tān vikatthanīyān anyathā striyaḥ

original: sarojapattre nu vilīnaṣaṭpade viloladṛṣṭeḥ svid amū vilocane /
analyzed: saroja pattre nu vilīna ṣaṭpade vilola dṛṣṭeḥ svid amū vilocane

original: śiroruhāḥ svin natapakṣmasantater dvirephavṛndaṃ nu niśabdaniścalam // BhKir_8.35 //
analyzed: śiroruhāḥ svid nata pakṣma santateḥ dvirepha vṛndam nu niśabda niścalam

original: agūḍhahāsasphuṭadantakesaraṃ mukhaṃ svid etad vikasan nu paṅkajam /
analyzed: agūḍha hāsa sphuṭa danta kesaram mukham svid etat vikasan nu paṅkajam

original: iti pralīnāṃ nalinīvane sakhīṃ vidāṃbabhūvuḥ sucireṇa yoṣitaḥ // BhKir_8.36 //
analyzed: iti pralīnām nalinī vane sakhīm vidāṃbabhūvuḥ sucireṇa yoṣitaḥ

original: priyeṇa saṃgrathya vipakṣasaṃnidhāv upāhitāṃ vakṣasi pīvarastane /
analyzed: priyeṇa saṃgrathya vipakṣa saṃnidhau upāhitām vakṣasi pīvara stane

original: srajaṃ na kācid vijahau jalāvilāṃ vasanti hi premṇi guṇā na vastuni // BhKir_8.37 //
analyzed: srajam na kācid vijahau jala āvilām vasanti hi premṇi guṇāḥ na vastuni

original: asaṃśayaṃ nyastam upāntaraktatāṃ yad eva roddhuṃ ramaṇībhir añjanam /
analyzed: asaṃśayam nyastam upānta rakta tām yat eva roddhum ramaṇībhiḥ añjanam

original: hṛte 'pi tasmin salilena śuklatāṃ nirāsa rāgo nayaneṣu na śriyam // BhKir_8.38 //
analyzed: hṛte pi tasmin salilena śukla tām nirāsa rāgaḥ nayaneṣu na śriyam

original: dyutiṃ vahanto vanitāvataṃsakā hṛtāḥ pralobhād iva vegibhir jalaiḥ /
analyzed: dyutim vahantaḥ vanitā vataṃsakāḥ hṛtāḥ pralobhāt iva vegibhiḥ jalaiḥ

original: upaplutās tatkṣaṇaśocanīyatāṃ cyutādhikārāḥ sacivā ivāyayuḥ // BhKir_8.39 //
analyzed: upaplutāḥ tad kṣaṇa śocanīya tām cyuta adhikārāḥ sacivāḥ iva āyayuḥ

original: vipattralekhā niralaktakādharā nirañjanākṣīr api bibhratīḥ śriyam /
analyzed: vipattra lekhāḥ niralaktaka adharāḥ nirañjana akṣīḥ api bibhratīḥ śriyam

original: nirīkṣya rāmā bubudhe nabhaścarair alaṃkṛtaṃ tadvapuṣaiva maṇḍanam // BhKir_8.40 //
analyzed: nirīkṣya rāmā bubudhe nabhaścaraiḥ alaṃkṛtam tad vapuṣā eva maṇḍanam

original: tathā na pūrvaṃ kṛtabhūṣaṇādaraḥ priyānurāgeṇa vilāsinījanaḥ /
analyzed: tathā na pūrvam kṛta bhūṣaṇa ādaraḥ priya anurāgeṇa vilāsinī janaḥ

original: yathā jalārdro nakhamaṇḍanaśriyā dadāha dṛṣṭīś ca vipakṣayoṣitām // BhKir_8.41 //
analyzed: yathā jala ārdraḥ nakha maṇḍana śriyā dadāha dṛṣṭīḥ ca vipakṣa yoṣitām

original: śubhānanāḥ sāmburuheṣu bhīravo vilolahārāś calaphenapaṅktiṣu /
analyzed: śubha ānanāḥ sa amburuheṣu bhīravaḥ vilola hārāḥ cala phena paṅktiṣu

original: nitāntagauryo hṛtakuṅkumeṣv alaṃ na lebhire tāḥ parabhāgam ūrmiṣu // BhKir_8.42 //
analyzed: nitānta gauryaḥ hṛta kuṅkumeṣu alam na lebhire tāḥ parabhāgam ūrmiṣu

original: hradāmbhasi vyastavadhūkarāhate ravaṃ mṛdaṅgadhvanidhīram ujjhati /
analyzed: hrada ambhasi vyasta vadhū kara āhate ravam mṛdaṅga dhvani dhīram ujjhati

original: muhustanais tālassamaṃ samādade manoramaṃ nṛtyam iva pravepitam // BhKir_8.43 //
analyzed: muhu stanaiḥ tālaḥ samam samādade manoramam nṛtyam iva pravepitam

original: śriyā hasadbhiḥ kalamāni sasmitair alaṃkṛtāmbuḥ pratimāgatair mukhaiḥ /
analyzed: śriyā hasadbhiḥ kalamāni sa smitaiḥ alaṃkṛta ambuḥ pratimā gataiḥ mukhaiḥ

original: kṛtānukūlyā surarājayoṣitāṃ prasādasāphalyam avāpa jāhvanī // BhKir_8.44 //
analyzed: kṛta ānukūlyā surarāja yoṣitām prasāda sāphalyam avāpa jāhvanī

original: parisphuranmīnavighaṭṭitoravaḥ surāṅganās trāsaviloladṛṣṭayaḥ /
analyzed: parisphurat mīna vighaṭṭita ūravaḥ sura aṅganāḥ trāsa vilola dṛṣṭayaḥ

original: upāyayuḥ kampitapāṇipallavāḥ sakhījanasyāpi vilokanīyatām // BhKir_8.45 //
analyzed: upāyayuḥ kampita pāṇi pallavāḥ sakhī janasya api vilokanīya tām

original: bhayād ivāśliṣya jhaṣāhate 'mbhasi priyaṃ mudānandayati sma māninī /
analyzed: bhayāt iva āśliṣya jhaṣa āhate mbhasi priyam mudā ānandayati sma māninī

original: akṛtrimapremarasāhitair mano haranti rāmāḥ kṛtakair apīhitaiḥ // BhKir_8.46 //
analyzed: akṛtrima prema rasa āhitaiḥ manaḥ haranti rāmāḥ kṛtakaiḥ api īhitaiḥ

original: tirohitāntāni nitāntam ākulair apāṃ vigāhād alakaiḥ prasāribhiḥ /
analyzed: tirohita antāni nitāntam ākulaiḥ apām vigāhāt alakaiḥ prasāribhiḥ

original: yayur vadhūnāṃ vadanāni tulyatāṃ dvirephavṛndāntaritaiḥ saroruhaiḥ // BhKir_8.47 //
analyzed: yayuḥ vadhūnām vadanāni tulya tām dvirepha vṛnda antaritaiḥ saroruhaiḥ

original: karau dhunānā navapallavākṛtī payasy agādhe kila jātasambhramā /
analyzed: karau dhunānā nava pallava ākṛtī payasi agādhe kila jāta sambhramā

original: sakhīṣu nirvācyam adhārṣṭhyadūṣitaṃ priyāṅgasaṃśleṣam avāpa māninī // BhKir_8.48 //
analyzed: sakhīṣu nirvācyam a dhārṣṭhya dūṣitam priya aṅga saṃśleṣam avāpa māninī

original: priyaiḥ salīlaṃ karavārivāritaḥ pravṛddhaniḥśvāsavikampitastanaḥ /
analyzed: priyaiḥ sa līlam kara vāri vāritaḥ pravṛddha niḥśvāsa vikampita stanaḥ

original: savibhramādhūtakarāgrapallavo yathārthatām āpa vilāsinījanaḥ // BhKir_8.49 //
analyzed: sa vibhrama ādhūta kara agra pallavaḥ yathārtha tām āpa vilāsinī janaḥ

original: udasya dhairyaṃ dayitena sādaraṃ prasāditāyāḥ karavārivāritam /
analyzed: udasya dhairyam dayitena sa ādaram prasāditāyāḥ kara vāri vāritam

original: mukhaṃ nimīlannayanaṃ natabhruvaḥ śriyaṃ sapatnīvadanād ivādade // BhKir_8.50 //
analyzed: mukham nimīlat nayanam nata bhruvaḥ śriyam sapatnī vadanāt iva ādade

original: vihasya pāṇau vidhṛte dhṛtāmbhasi priyeṇa vadhvā madanārdracetasaḥ /
analyzed: vihasya pāṇau vidhṛte dhṛta ambhasi priyeṇa vadhvā madana ārdra cetasaḥ

original: sakhīva kāñcī payasā ghanīkṛtā babhāra vītoccayabandham aṃśukam // BhKir_8.51 //
analyzed: sakhī iva kāñcī payasā ghanīkṛtā babhāra vīta uccaya bandham aṃśukam

original: nirañjane sācivilokitaṃ dṛśāv ayāvakaṃ vepathur oṣṭhapallavam /
analyzed: nirañjane sāci vilokitam dṛśau a yāvakam vepathuḥ oṣṭha pallavam

original: natabhruvo maṇḍayadi sma vigrahe balikriyā cātilakaṃ tadāspadam // BhKir_8.52 //
analyzed: nata bhruvaḥ sma vigrahe bali kriyā ca a tilakam tad āspadam

original: nimīladākekaralocacakṣuṣāṃ priyopakaṇṭhaṃ kṛtagātravepathuḥ /
analyzed: nimīlat ā kekara loca cakṣuṣām priya upakaṇṭham kṛta gātra vepathuḥ

original: nimajjatīnāṃ śvasitoddhatastanaḥ śramo nu tāsāṃ madano nu paprathe // BhKir_8.53 //
analyzed: nimajjatīnām śvasita uddhata stanaḥ śramaḥ nu tāsām madanaḥ nu paprathe

original: priyeṇa siktā caramaṃ vipakṣataś cukopa kācin na tutoṣa sāntvanaiḥ /
analyzed: priyeṇa siktā caramam vipakṣataḥ cukopa kācid na tutoṣa sāntvanaiḥ

original: janasya rūḍhapraṇayasya cetasaḥ kim apy amarṣo 'nunaye bhṛśāyate // BhKir_8.54 //
analyzed: janasya rūḍha praṇayasya cetasaḥ kim api amarṣaḥ nunaye bhṛśāyate

original: itthaṃ vihṛtya vanitābhir udasyamānaṃ pīnastanorujaghanasthalaśālinībhiḥ /
analyzed: ittham vihṛtya vanitābhiḥ udasyamānam pīna stana ūru jaghana sthala śālinībhiḥ

original: utsarpitormicayalaṅghitatīradeśam autsuky anunnam iva vāri puraḥ pratasthe // BhKir_8.55 //
analyzed: utsarpita ūrmi caya laṅghita tīra deśam autsukī anunnam iva vāri puras pratasthe

original: tīrāntarāṇi mithunāni rathāṅganāmnāṃ nītvā vilolitasarojavanaśriyas tāḥ /
analyzed: tīra antarāṇi mithunāni rathāṅga nāmnām nītvā vilolita saroja vana śriyaḥ tāḥ

original: saṃrejire surasarijjaladhautahārās tārāvitānataralā iva yāmavatyaḥ // BhKir_8.56 //
analyzed: saṃrejire surasarit jaladhauta hārāḥ tārā vitāna taralāḥ iva yāmavatyaḥ

original: saṃkrāntacandanarasāhitavarṇabhedaṃ vicchinnabhūṣaṇamaṇiprakarāṃśucitram /
analyzed: saṃkrānta candana rasa āhita varṇa bhedam vicchinna bhūṣaṇa maṇi prakara aṃśu citram

original: baddhormi nākavanitāparibhuktamuktaṃ sindhor babhāra salilaṃ śayanīyalakṣmīm // BhKir_8.57 //
analyzed: baddha ūrmi nāka vanitā paribhukta muktam sindhoḥ babhāra salilam śayanīya lakṣmīm

original: vīkṣya rantumanasaḥ suranārīr āttacitraparidhānavibhūṣāḥ /
analyzed: vīkṣya rantu manasaḥ sura nārīḥ ātta citra paridhāna vibhūṣāḥ

original: tatpriyārtham iva yātum athāstaṃ bhānumān upapayodhi lalambe // BhKir_9.1 //
analyzed: tad priya artham iva yātum atha astam bhānumān upa payodhi lalambe

original: madhyamopalanibhe lasadaṃśāv ekataś cyutim upeyuṣi bhānau /
analyzed: madhyama upala nibhe lasat aṃśau ekatas cyutim upeyuṣi bhānau

original: dyaur uvāha parivṛttivilolāṃ hārayaṣṭim iva vāsaralakṣmīm // BhKir_9.2 //
analyzed: dyauḥ uvāha parivṛtti vilolām hāra yaṣṭim iva vāsara lakṣmīm

original: aṃśupāṇibhir atīva pipāsuḥ padmajaṃ madhu bhṛśaṃ rasayitvā /
analyzed: aṃśu pāṇibhiḥ atīva pipāsuḥ padma jam madhu bhṛśam rasayitvā

original: kṣībatām iva gataḥ kṣitim eṣyaṃl lohitaṃ vapur uvāha pataṅgaḥ // BhKir_9.3 //
analyzed: kṣība tām iva gataḥ kṣitim eṣyan lohitam vapuḥ uvāha pataṅgaḥ

original: gamyatām upagate nayanānāṃ lohitāyāti sahasramarīcau /
analyzed: gamya tām upagate nayanānām lohitāyāti sahasramarīcau

original: āsasāda virahayya dharitrīṃ cakravākahṛdayāny abhitāpaḥ // BhKir_9.4 //
analyzed: āsasāda virahayya dharitrīm cakravāka hṛdayāni abhitāpaḥ

original: muktamūlalaghur ujjhitapūrvaḥ paścime nabhasi sambhṛtasāndraḥ /
analyzed: mukta mūla laghuḥ ujjhita pūrvaḥ paścime nabhasi sambhṛta sāndraḥ

original: sāmi majjati ravau na vireje khinnajihma iva raśmisamūhaḥ // BhKir_9.5 //
analyzed: sāmi majjati ravau na vireje khinna jihmaḥ iva raśmi samūhaḥ

original: kāntadūtya iva kuṅkumatāmrāḥ sāyamaṇḍalam abhi tvarayantyaḥ /
analyzed: kānta dūtyaḥ iva kuṅkuma tāmrāḥ sāya maṇḍalam abhi tvarayantyaḥ

original: sādaraṃ dadṛśire vanitābhiḥ saudhajālapatitā ravibhāsaḥ // BhKir_9.6 //
analyzed: sa ādaram dadṛśire vanitābhiḥ saudha jāla patitāḥ ravi bhāsaḥ

original: agrasānuṣu nitāntapiśaṅgair bhūruhān mṛdukarair avalambya /
analyzed: agra sānuṣu nitānta piśaṅgaiḥ bhūruhān mṛdu karaiḥ avalambya

original: astaśailagahanaṃ nu vivasvān āviveśa jaladhiṃ nu mahīṃ nu // BhKir_9.7 //
analyzed: asta śaila gahanam nu vivasvān āviveśa jaladhim nu mahīm nu

original: ākulaś calapatatrikulānām āravair anuditauṣasarāgaḥ /
analyzed: ākulaḥ cala patatri kulānām āravaiḥ an udita auṣasa rāgaḥ

original: āyayāv aharidaśvavipāṇḍus tulyatāṃ dinamukhena dināntaḥ // BhKir_9.8 //
analyzed: āyayau a harit aśva vipāṇḍuḥ tulya tām dina mukhena dina antaḥ

original: āsthitaḥ sthagitavāridapaṅktyā saṃdhyayā gaganapaścimabhāgaḥ /
analyzed: āsthitaḥ sthagita vārida paṅktyā saṃdhyayā gagana paścima bhāgaḥ

original: sormividrumavintānavibhāsā rañjitasya jaladheḥ śriyam ūhe // BhKir_9.9 //
analyzed: sa ūrmi vidruma vintāna vibhāsā rañjitasya jaladheḥ śriyam ūhe

original: prāñjalāv api jane natamūrdhni prema tatpravaṇacetasi hitvā /
analyzed: prāñjalau api jane nata mūrdhni prema tad pravaṇa cetasi hitvā

original: saṃdhyayānuvidadhe viramantyā cāpalena sujanetaramaitrī // BhKir_9.10 //
analyzed: saṃdhyayā anuvidadhe viramantyā cāpalena su jana itara maitrī

original: auṣasātapabhayād apalīnaṃ vāsaracchavivirāmapaṭīyaḥ /
analyzed: auṣasa ātapa bhayāt apalīnam vāsara chavi virāma paṭīyaḥ

original: saṃnipatya śanakair iva nimnād andhakāram udavāpa samāni // BhKir_9.11 //
analyzed: saṃnipatya śanakais iva nimnāt andhakāram udavāpa samāni

original: ekatām iva gatasya vivekaḥ kasyacin na mahato 'py upalebhe /
analyzed: eka tām iva gatasya vivekaḥ kasyacid na mahataḥ pi upalebhe

original: bhāsvatā nidadhire bhuvanānām ātmanīva patitena viśeṣāḥ // BhKir_9.12 //
analyzed: bhāsvatā nidadhire bhuvanānām ātmani iva patitena viśeṣāḥ

original: icchatāṃ saha vadhūbhir abhedaṃ yāminīvirahiṇāṃ vihagānām /
analyzed: icchatām saha vadhūbhiḥ abhedam yāminī virahiṇām vihagānām

original: āpur eva mithunāni viyogaṃ laṅghyate na khalu kālaniyogaḥ // BhKir_9.13 //
analyzed: āpuḥ eva mithunāni viyogam laṅghyate na khalu kāla niyogaḥ

original: yacchati pratimukhaṃ dayitāyai vācam antikagate 'pi śakuntau /
analyzed: yacchati pratimukham dayitāyai vācam antika gate śakuntau

original: nīyate sma natim ujjhitaharṣaṃ paṅkajaṃ mukham ivāmburuhiṇyā // BhKir_9.14 //
analyzed: nīyate sma natim ujjhita harṣam paṅkajam mukham iva amburuhiṇyā

original: rañjitā nu vividhās taruśailā nāmitaṃ nu gaganaṃ sthagitaṃ nu /
analyzed: rañjitāḥ nu vividhāḥ taru śailāḥ nāmitam nu gaganam sthagitam nu

original: pūritā nu viṣameṣu dharitrī saṃhṛtā nu kakubhas timireṇa // BhKir_9.15 //
analyzed: pūritā nu viṣameṣu dharitrī saṃhṛtāḥ nu kakubhaḥ timireṇa

original: rātrirāgamalināni vikāsaṃ paṅkajāni rahayanti vihāya /
analyzed: rātri rāga malināni vikāsam paṅkajāni rahayanti vihāya

original: spaṣṭatārakam iyāya nabhaḥ śrīr vastum icchati nirāpadi sarvaḥ // BhKir_9.16 //
analyzed: spaṣṭa tārakam iyāya nabhaḥ śrīḥ vastum icchati nirāpadi sarvaḥ

original: vyānaśe śaśadhareṇa vimuktaḥ ketakīkusumakesarapāṇḍuḥ /
analyzed: vyānaśe śaśadhareṇa vimuktaḥ ketakī kusuma kesara pāṇḍuḥ

original: cūrṇamuṣṭir iva lambhitakāntir vāsavasya diśam aṃśusamūhaḥ // BhKir_9.17 //
analyzed: cūrṇa muṣṭiḥ iva lambhita kāntiḥ vāsavasya diśam aṃśu samūhaḥ

original: ujjhatī śucam ivāśu tamisrām antikaṃ vrajati tārakarāje /
analyzed: ujjhatī śucam iva āśu tamisrām antikam vrajati tāraka rāje

original: dikprasādaguṇamaṇḍanam ūhe raśmihāsaviśadaṃ mukham aindrī // BhKir_9.18 //
analyzed: diś prasāda guṇa maṇḍanam ūhe raśmi hāsa viśadam mukham aindrī

original: nīlanīrajanibhe himagauraṃ śailaruddhavapuṣaḥ sitaraśmeḥ /
analyzed: nīla nīraja nibhe hima gauram śaila ruddha vapuṣaḥ sitaraśmeḥ

original: khe rarāja nipatatkarajālaṃ vāridheḥ payasi gāṅgam ivāmbhaḥ // BhKir_9.19 //
analyzed: khe rarāja nipatat kara jālam vāridheḥ payasi gāṅgam iva ambhaḥ

original: dyāṃ nirundhad atinīlaghanābhaṃ dhvāntam udyatakareṇa purastāt /
analyzed: dyām nirundhat ati nīla ghana ābham dhvāntam udyata kareṇa purastāt

original: kṣipyamāṇam asitetarabhāsā śambhuneva karicarma cakāse // BhKir_9.20 //
analyzed: kṣipyamāṇam asita itara bhāsā śambhunā iva kari carma

original: antikāntikagatenduvisṛṣṭe jihmatāṃ jahati dīdhitijāle /
analyzed: antika antika gata indu visṛṣṭe jihma tām jahati dīdhiti jāle

original: niḥsṛtas timirabhāranirodhād ucchvasann iva rarāja digantaḥ // BhKir_9.21 //
analyzed: niḥsṛtaḥ timira bhāra nirodhāt ucchvasan iva rarāja diś antaḥ

original: lekhayā vimalavidrumabhāsā saṃtataṃ timiram indur udāse /
analyzed: lekhayā vimala vidruma bhāsā saṃtatam timiram induḥ udāse

original: daṃṣṭrayā kanakaṭaṅkapiśaṅgyā maṇḍalaṃ bhuva ivādivarāhaḥ // BhKir_9.22 //
analyzed: daṃṣṭrayā kanaka ṭaṅka piśaṅgyā maṇḍalam bhuvaḥ iva ādivarāhaḥ

original: dīpayann atha nabhaḥ kiraṇaughaiḥ kuṅkumāruṇapayodharagauraḥ /
analyzed: dīpayan atha nabhaḥ kiraṇa oghaiḥ kuṅkuma aruṇa payodhara gauraḥ

original: hemakumbha iva pūrvapayodher unmamajja śanakais tuhināṃśuḥ // BhKir_9.23 //
analyzed: hema kumbhaḥ iva pūrva payodheḥ unmamajja śanakais tuhināṃśuḥ

original: udgatendum avibhinnatamisrāṃ paśyati sma rajanīm avitṛptaḥ /
analyzed: udgata indum a vibhinna tamisrām paśyati sma rajanīm a vitṛptaḥ

original: vyaṃśukasphuṭamukhīm atijihmāṃ vrīḍayā navavadhūm iva lokaḥ // BhKir_9.24 //
analyzed: vyaṃśuka sphuṭa mukhīm ati jihmām vrīḍayā nava vadhūm iva lokaḥ

original: na prasādam ucitaṃ gamitā dyair noddhṛtaṃ timiram adrivanebhyaḥ /
analyzed: na prasādam ucitam gamitāḥ na uddhṛtam timiram adri vanebhyaḥ

original: diṅmukheṣu na ca dhāma vikīrṇaṃ bhūṣitaiva rajanī himabhāsā // BhKir_9.25 //
analyzed: diṅmukheṣu na ca dhāma vikīrṇam bhūṣitā eva rajanī himabhāsā

original: māninījanavilocanapātān uṣṇabāṣpakaluṣān pratigṛhṇan /
analyzed: māninī jana vilocana pātān uṣṇa bāṣpa kaluṣān pratigṛhṇan

original: mandamandam uditaḥ prayayau khaṃ bhītabhīta iva śītamayūkhaḥ // BhKir_9.26 //
analyzed: manda mandam uditaḥ prayayau kham bhīta bhītaḥ iva śītamayūkhaḥ

original: śliṣyataḥ priyavadhūr upakaṇṭhaṃ tārakās tatakarasya himāṃśoḥ /
analyzed: śliṣyataḥ priya vadhūḥ upakaṇṭham tārakāḥ tata karasya himāṃśoḥ

original: udvamann abhirarāja samantād aṅgarāga iva lohitarāgaḥ // BhKir_9.27 //
analyzed: udvaman abhirarāja samantāt aṅgarāgaḥ iva lohita rāgaḥ

original: preritaḥ śaśadhareṇa karaughaḥ saṃhatāny api nunoda tamāṃsi /
analyzed: preritaḥ śaśadhareṇa kara oghaḥ saṃhatāni api nunoda tamāṃsi

original: kṣīrasindhur iva mandarabhinnaḥ kānanāny aviraloccatarūṇi // BhKir_9.28 //
analyzed: kṣīrasindhuḥ iva mandara bhinnaḥ kānanāni a virala ucca tarūṇi

original: śāratāṃ gamitayā śaśipādaiś chāyayā viṭapināṃ pratipede /
analyzed: śāra tām gamitayā śaśi pādaiḥ chāyayā viṭapinām pratipede

original: nyastaśuklabalicitratalābhis tulyatā vasativeśmamahībhiḥ // BhKir_9.29 //
analyzed: nyasta śukla bali citra talābhiḥ tulya tā vasati veśma mahībhiḥ

original: ātape dhṛtimatā saha vadhvā yāminīvirahiṇā vihagena /
analyzed: ātape dhṛtimatā saha vadhvā yāminīvirahiṇā vihagena

original: sehire na kiraṇā himaraśmer duḥkhite manasi sarvam asahyam // BhKir_9.30 //
analyzed: sehire na kiraṇāḥ himaraśmeḥ duḥkhite manasi sarvam asahyam

original: gandham uddhatarajaḥkaṇavāhī vikṣipan vikasatāṃ kumudānām /
analyzed: gandham uddhata rajaḥ kaṇa vāhī vikṣipan vikasatām kumudānām

original: ādudhāva parilīnavihaṅgā yāminīmarud apāṃ vanarājīḥ // BhKir_9.31 //
analyzed: ādudhāva parilīna vihaṅgāḥ yāminī marut apām vana rājīḥ

original: saṃvidhātum abhiṣekam udāse manmathasya lasadaṃśujalaughaḥ /
analyzed: saṃvidhātum abhiṣekam udāse manmathasya lasat aṃśu jala oghaḥ

original: yāminīvanitayā tatacihnaḥ sotpalo rajatakumbha ivenduḥ // BhKir_9.32 //
analyzed: yāminī vanitayā tata cihnaḥ sa utpalaḥ rajata kumbhaḥ iva induḥ

original: ojasāpi khalu nūnam anūnaṃ nāsahāyam upayāti jayaśrīḥ /
analyzed: ojasā api khalu nūnam anūnam na asahāyam upayāti jaya śrīḥ

original: yad vibhuḥ śaśimayūkhasakhaḥ sann ādade vijayi cāpam anaṅgaḥ // BhKir_9.33 //
analyzed: yat vibhuḥ śaśi mayūkha sakhaḥ san ādade vijayi cāpam anaṅgaḥ

original: sadmanāṃ viracanāhitaśobhair āgatapriyakathair api dūtyam /
analyzed: sadmanām viracana āhita śobhaiḥ āgata priya kathaiḥ api dūtyam

original: saṃnikṛṣṭaratibhiḥ suradārair bhūṣitair api vibhūṣaṇam īṣe // BhKir_9.34 //
analyzed: saṃnikṛṣṭa ratibhiḥ sura dāraiḥ bhūṣitaiḥ api vibhūṣaṇam īṣe

original: na srajo rurucire ramaṇībhyaś candanāni virahe madirā vā /
analyzed: na srajaḥ rurucire ramaṇībhyaḥ candanāni virahe madirāḥ vā

original: sādhaneṣu hi rater upadhatte ramyatāṃ priyasamāgama eva // BhKir_9.35 //
analyzed: sādhaneṣu hi rateḥ upadhatte ramya tām priya samāgamaḥ eva

original: prasthitābhir adhināthanivāsaṃ dhvaṃsitapriyasakhīvacanābhiḥ /
analyzed: prasthitābhiḥ adhinātha nivāsam dhvaṃsita priya sakhī vacanābhiḥ

original: māninībhir apahastitadhairyaḥ sādayann iva mado 'valalambe // BhKir_9.36 //
analyzed: māninībhiḥ apahastita dhairyaḥ sādayan iva madaḥ valalambe

original: kāntaveśma bahu saṃdiśatībhir yātam eva rataye ramaṇībhiḥ /
analyzed: kānta veśma bahu saṃdiśatībhiḥ yātam eva rataye ramaṇībhiḥ

original: manmathena pariluptamatīnāṃ prāyaśaḥ skhalitam apy upakāri // BhKir_9.37 //
analyzed: manmathena parilupta matīnām prāyaśas skhalitam api upakāri

original: āśu kāntam abhisāritavatyā yoṣitaḥ pulakaruddhakapolam /
analyzed: āśu kāntam abhisāritavatyāḥ yoṣitaḥ pulaka ruddha kapolam

original: nirjigāya mukham indum akhaṇḍaṃ khaṇḍapatratilakākṛti kāntyā // BhKir_9.38 //
analyzed: nirjigāya mukham indum akhaṇḍam khaṇḍa patra tilaka ākṛti kāntyā

original: ucyatāṃ sa vacanīyam aśeṣaṃ neśvare paruṣatā sakhi sādhvī /
analyzed: ucyatām sa vacanīyam aśeṣam na īśvare paruṣa tā sakhi sādhvī

original: ānayainam anunīya kathaṃ vā vipriyāṇi janayann anuneyaḥ // BhKir_9.39 //
analyzed: ānaya enam anunīya katham vā vipriyāṇi janayan anuneyaḥ

original: kiṃ gatena na hi yuktam upaituṃ kaḥ priye subhagamānini mānaḥ /
analyzed: kim gatena na hi yuktam upaitum kaḥ priye subhaga mānini mānaḥ

original: yoṣitām iti kathāsu sametaiḥ kāmibhir bahurasā dhṛtir ūhe // BhKir_9.40 //
analyzed: yoṣitām iti kathāsu sametaiḥ kāmibhiḥ bahu rasā dhṛtiḥ ūhe

original: yoṣitaḥ pulakarodhi dadhatyā gharmavāri navasaṃgamajanma /
analyzed: yoṣitaḥ pulaka rodhi dadhatyāḥ gharma vāri nava saṃgama janma

original: kāntavakṣasi babhūva patantyā maṇḍanaṃ lulitamaṇḍanataiva // BhKir_9.41 //
analyzed: kānta vakṣasi babhūva patantyāḥ maṇḍanam lulita maṇḍana tā eva

original: śīdhupānavidhurāsu nigṛhṇan mānam āśu śithilīkṛtalajjaḥ /
analyzed: śīdhu pāna vidhurāsu nigṛhṇan mānam āśu śithilīkṛta lajjaḥ

original: saṃgatāsu dayitair upalebhe kāminīṣu madano nu mado nu // BhKir_9.42 //
analyzed: saṃgatāsu dayitaiḥ upalebhe kāminīṣu madanaḥ nu madaḥ nu

original: dvāri cakṣur adhipāṇi kapolau kīvitaṃ tvayi kutaḥ kalaho 'syāḥ /
analyzed: dvāri cakṣuḥ adhipāṇi kapolau tvayi kutas kalahaḥ syāḥ

original: kāminām iti vacaḥ punaruktaṃ prītaye navanavatvam iyāya // BhKir_9.43 //
analyzed: kāminām iti vacaḥ punar uktam prītaye nava nava tvam iyāya

original: sāci locanayugaṃ namayantī rundhatī dayitavakṣasi pātam /
analyzed: sāci locana yugam namayantī rundhatī dayita vakṣasi pātam

original: subhruvo janayati sma vibhūṣāṃ saṃgatāv upararāma ca lajjā // BhKir_9.44 //
analyzed: subhruvaḥ janayati sma vibhūṣām saṃgatau upararāma ca lajjā

original: savyalīkam avadhīritakhinnaṃ prasthitaṃ sapadi kopapadena /
analyzed: sa vyalīkam avadhīrita khinnam prasthitam sapadi kopa padena

original: yoṣitaḥ suhṛd iva sma ruṇaddhi prāṇanātham abhibāṣpanipātaḥ // BhKir_9.45 //
analyzed: yoṣitaḥ suhṛd iva sma ruṇaddhi prāṇanātham abhi bāṣpa nipātaḥ

original: śaṅkitāya kṛtabāṣpanipātām īrṣyayā vimukhitāṃ dayitāya /
analyzed: śaṅkitāya kṛta bāṣpa nipātām īrṣyayā vimukhitām dayitāya

original: māninim abhimukhāhitacittāṃ śaṃsati sma ghanaromavibhedaḥ // BhKir_9.46 //
analyzed: māninim abhimukha āhita cittām śaṃsati sma ghanaromavibhedaḥ

original: loladṛṣṭi vadanaṃ dayitāyāś cumbati priyatame rabhasena /
analyzed: lola dṛṣṭi vadanam dayitāyāḥ cumbati priyatame rabhasena

original: vrīḍayā saha vinīvi nitambād aṃśukaṃ śithilatām upapade // BhKir_9.47 //
analyzed: vrīḍayā saha vinīvi nitambāt aṃśukam śithila tām upapade

original: hrītaya agalitanīvi nirasyann antarīyam avalambitakāñci /
analyzed: hrītaye a galita nīvi nirasyan antarīyam avalambita kāñci

original: maṇḍalīkṛtapṛthustanabhāraṃ sasvaje dayitayā hṛdayeśaḥ // BhKir_9.48 //
analyzed: maṇḍalīkṛta pṛthu stana bhāram sasvaje dayitayā hṛdayeśaḥ

original: ādṛtā nakhapadaiḥ parirambhāś cumbitāni ghanadantanipātaiḥ /
analyzed: ādṛtāḥ nakha padaiḥ parirambhāḥ cumbitāni ghana danta nipātaiḥ

original: saukumāryaguṇasambhṛtakīrtir vāma eva surateṣv api kāmaḥ // BhKir_9.49 //
analyzed: saukumārya guṇa sambhṛta kīrtiḥ vāmaḥ eva surateṣu api kāmaḥ

original: pāṇipallavavidhūnanam antaḥ sītkṛtāni nayanārdhanimeṣāḥ /
analyzed: pāṇipallava vidhūnanam antar sītkṛtāni nayana ardha nimeṣāḥ

original: yoṣitāṃ rahasi gadgadavācām astratām upayayur madanasya // BhKir_9.50 //
analyzed: yoṣitām rahasi gadgada vācām astra tām upayayuḥ madanasya

original: pātum āhitaratīny abhileṣus tarṣayanty apunaruktarasāni /
analyzed: pātum āhita ratīni abhileṣuḥ tarṣayanti a punar ukta rasāni

original: sasmitāni vadanāni vadhūnāṃ sotpalāni ca madhūni yuvānaḥ // BhKir_9.51 //
analyzed: sa smitāni vadanāni vadhūnām sa utpalāni ca madhūni yuvānaḥ

original: kāntasaṃgamaparājitamanyau vāruṇīrasanaśāntavivāde /
analyzed: kānta saṃgama parājita manyau vāruṇī rasana śānta vivāde

original: māninījana upāhitasaṃdhau saṃdadhe dhanuṣi neṣum anaṅgaḥ // BhKir_9.52 //
analyzed: māninī jane upāhita saṃdhau saṃdadhe dhanuṣi na iṣum anaṅgaḥ

original: kupyatāśu bhavatānatacittāḥ kopitāṃś ca varivasyata yūnaḥ /
analyzed: kupyata āśu bhavatā ānata cittāḥ kopitān ca varivasyata yūnaḥ

original: ity aneka upadeśa iva sma svādyate yuvatibhir madhuvāraḥ // BhKir_9.53 //
analyzed: iti anekaḥ upadeśaḥ iva sma svādyate yuvatibhiḥ madhuvāraḥ

original: bhartṛbhiḥ praṇayasambhramadattāṃ vāruṇīm atirasāṃ rasayitvā /
analyzed: bhartṛbhiḥ praṇaya sambhrama dattām vāruṇīm atirasām rasayitvā

original: hrīvimohavirahād upalebhe pāṭavaṃ nu hṛdayaṃ nu vadhūbhiḥ // BhKir_9.54 //
analyzed: hrī vimoha virahāt upalebhe pāṭavam nu hṛdayam nu vadhūbhiḥ

original: svāditaḥ svayam athaidhitamānaṃ lambhitaḥ priyatamaiḥ saha pītaḥ /
analyzed: svāditaḥ svayam atha edhita mānam lambhitaḥ priyatamaiḥ saha pītaḥ

original: āsavaḥ pratipadaṃ pramadānāṃ naikarūparasatām iva bheje // BhKir_9.55 //
analyzed: āsavaḥ pratipadam pramadānām na eka rūpa rasa tām iva bheje

original: bhrūvilāsasubhagān anukartuṃ vibhramān iva vadhūnayanānām /
analyzed: bhrū vilāsa subhagān anukartum vibhramān iva vadhū nayanānām

original: ādade mṛduvilokapalāśair utpalaiś caṣakavīciṣu kampaḥ // BhKir_9.56 //
analyzed: ādade mṛdu viloka palāśaiḥ utpalaiḥ caṣaka vīciṣu kampaḥ

original: oṣṭhapallavavidaṃśarucīnāṃ hṛdyatām upayayau ramaṇānām /
analyzed: oṣṭha pallava vidaṃśa rucīnām hṛdya tām upayayau ramaṇānām

original: phullalocanavinīlasarojair aṅganāsyacaṣakair madhuvāraḥ // BhKir_9.57 //
analyzed: phulla locana vinīla sarojaiḥ aṅganā āsya caṣakaiḥ madhuvāraḥ

original: prāpyate guṇavatāpi guṇānāṃ vyaktam āśrayavaśena viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: prāpyate guṇavatā api guṇānām vyaktam āśraya vaśena viśeṣaḥ

original: tat tathā hi dayitānanadattaṃ vyānaśe madhu rasātiśayena // BhKir_9.58 //
analyzed: tat tathā hi dayita ānana dattam vyānaśe madhu rasa atiśayena

original: vīkṣya ratnacaṣakeṣv atiriktāṃ kāntadantapadamaṇḍanalakṣmīm /
analyzed: vīkṣya ratna caṣakeṣu atiriktām kānta danta pada maṇḍana lakṣmīm

original: jajñire bahumatāḥ pramadānām oṣṭhayāvakanudo madhuvārāḥ // BhKir_9.59 //
analyzed: jajñire bahu matāḥ pramadānām oṣṭha yāvaka nudaḥ madhuvārāḥ

original: locanādharakṛtāhṛtarāgā vāsitānanaviśeṣitagandhā /
analyzed: locana adhara kṛta āhṛta rāgā vāsita ānana viśeṣita gandhā

original: vāruṇī paraguṇātmaguṇānāṃ vyatyayaṃ vinimayaṃ nu vitene // BhKir_9.60 //
analyzed: vāruṇī para guṇa ātma guṇānām vyatyayam vinimayam nu vitene

original: tulyarūpam asitotpalam akṣṇoḥ karṇagaṃ nirupakāri viditvā /
analyzed: tulya rūpam asita utpalam akṣṇoḥ karṇa gam nirupakāri viditvā

original: yoṣitaḥ suhṛd iva pravibheje lambhitekṣaṇarucir madarāgaḥ // BhKir_9.61 //
analyzed: yoṣitaḥ suhṛd iva pravibheje lambhita īkṣaṇa ruciḥ mada rāgaḥ

original: kṣīṇayāvakaraso 'py atipānaiḥ kāntadantapadasambhṛtaśobhaḥ /
analyzed: kṣīṇa yāvaka rasaḥ pi ati pānaiḥ kānta danta pada sambhṛta śobhaḥ

original: āyayāv atitarām iva vadhvāḥ sāndratām adharapallavarāgaḥ // BhKir_9.62 //
analyzed: āyayau atitarām iva vadhvāḥ sāndra tām adhara pallava rāgaḥ

original: rāgajāntanayaneṣu nitāntaṃ vidrumāruṇakapolataleṣu /
analyzed: rāga ja anta nayaneṣu nitāntam vidruma aruṇa kapola taleṣu

original: sarvagāpi dadṛśe vanitānāṃ darpaṇeṣv iva mukheṣu madaśrīḥ // BhKir_9.63 //
analyzed: sarva gā api dadṛśe vanitānām darpaṇeṣu iva mukheṣu mada śrīḥ

original: baddhakopavikṛtīr api rāmāś cārutābhimatatām upaninye /
analyzed: baddha kopa vikṛtīḥ api rāmāḥ cāru tā abhimata tām upaninye

original: vaśyatāṃ madhumado dayitānām ātmavargahitam icchati sarvaḥ // BhKir_9.64 //
analyzed: vaśya tām madhu madaḥ dayitānām ātma varga hitam icchati sarvaḥ

original: vāsasāṃ śithilatām upanābhi hrīnirāsam apade kupitāni /
analyzed: vāsasām śithila tām upanābhi hrī nirāsam a pade kupitāni

original: yoṣitāṃ vidadhatī guṇapakṣe nirmamārja madirā vacanīyam // BhKir_9.65 //
analyzed: yoṣitām vidadhatī guṇa pakṣe nirmamārja madirā vacanīyam

original: bhartṛṣūpasakhi nikṣipatīnām ātmano madhumadodyamitānām /
analyzed: bhartṛṣu upasakhi nikṣipatīnām ātmanaḥ madhu mada udyamitānām

original: vrīḍayā viphalayā vanitānāṃ na sthitaṃ na vigataṃ hṛdayeṣu // BhKir_9.66 //
analyzed: vrīḍayā viphalayā vanitānām na sthitam na vigatam hṛdayeṣu

original: rundhatī nayanavākyavikāsaṃ sādito bhayakarā parirambhe /
analyzed: rundhatī nayana vākya vikāsam sā aditaḥ bhaya karā parirambhe

original: vrīḍitasya lalitaṃ yuvatīnāṃ kṣībatā bahuguṇair anujahre // BhKir_9.67 //
analyzed: vrīḍitasya lalitam yuvatīnām kṣība tā bahu guṇaiḥ anujahre

original: yoṣid uddhatamanobhavarāgā mānavaty api yayau dayitāṅkam /
analyzed: yoṣit uddhata manobhava rāgā mānavatī api yayau dayitā aṅkam

original: kārayaty anibhṛtā guṇadoṣe vāruṇī khalu rahasyavibhedam // BhKir_9.68 //
analyzed: kārayati a nibhṛtā guṇa doṣe vāruṇī khalu rahasya vibhedam

original: āhite nu madhunā madhuratve ceṣṭitasya gamite nu vikāsam /
analyzed: āhite nu madhunā madhura tve ceṣṭitasya gamite nu vikāsam

original: ābabhau nava ivoddhatarāgaḥ kāminīṣv avasaraḥ kusumeṣoḥ // BhKir_9.69 //
analyzed: ābabhau navaḥ iva uddhata rāgaḥ kāminīṣu avasaraḥ kusumeṣoḥ

original: mā gaman madavimūḍhadhiyo naḥ projjhya rantum iti śaṅkitanāthāḥ /
analyzed: mā gamat mada vimūḍha dhiyaḥ naḥ projjhya rantum iti śaṅkita nāthāḥ

original: yoṣito na madirāṃ bhṛśam īṣuḥ prema paśyati bhayāny apade 'pi // BhKir_9.70 //
analyzed: yoṣitaḥ na madirām bhṛśam īṣuḥ prema paśyati bhayāni a pade pi

original: cittanirvṛtividhāyi viviktaṃ manmatho madhumadaḥ śaśibhāsaḥ /
analyzed: citta nirvṛti vidhāyi viviktam manmathaḥ madhu madaḥ śaśi bhāsaḥ

original: saṃgamaś ca dayitaiḥ sma nayanti prema kām api bhuvaṃ pramadānām // BhKir_9.71 //
analyzed: saṃgamaḥ ca dayitaiḥ sma nayanti prema kām api bhuvam pramadānām

original: dhārṣṭyalaṅghitayathocitabhūmau nirdayaṃ vilulitālakamālye /
analyzed: dhārṣṭya laṅghita yathocita bhūmau nirdayam vilulita alaka mālye

original: māninīratividhau kusumeṣur mattamatta iva vibhramam āpa // BhKir_9.72 //
analyzed: māninī rati vidhau kusumeṣuḥ matta mattaḥ iva vibhramam āpa

original: śīdhupānavidhureṣu vadhūnāṃ vighnatām upagateṣu vapuḥṣu /
analyzed: śīdhu pāna vidhureṣu vadhūnām vighna tām upagateṣu vapuḥṣu

original: īhitaṃ ratirasāhitabhāvaṃ vītalakṣyam api kāmiṣu reje // BhKir_9.73 //
analyzed: īhitam rati rasa āhita bhāvam vīta lakṣyam api kāmiṣu reje

original: anyonyaraktamanasām atha bibhratīnāṃ cetobhuvo harisakhāpsarasāṃ nideśam /
analyzed: anyonya rakta manasām atha bibhratīnām cetaḥ bhuvaḥ harisakha apsarasām nideśam

original: vaibodhikadhvanivibhāvitapaścimārdhā sā saṃhṛteva parivṛttim iyāya rātriḥ // BhKir_9.74 //
analyzed: vaibodhika dhvani vibhāvita paścima ardhā sā saṃhṛtā iva parivṛttim iyāya rātriḥ

original: nidrāvinoditanitāntaratiklamānām āyāmimaṅgalaninādavibodhitānām /
analyzed: nidrā vinodita nitānta rati klamānām āyāmi maṅgala nināda vibodhitānām

original: rāmāsu bhāvivirahākulitāsu yūnāṃ tatpūrvatām iva samādadhire ratāni // BhKir_9.75 //
analyzed: rāmāsu bhāvi viraha ākulitāsu yūnām tad pūrva tām iva samādadhire ratāni

original: kāntājanaṃ suratakhedanimīlitākṣaṃ saṃvāhituṃ samupayān iva mandamandam /
analyzed: kāntā janam surata kheda nimīlita akṣam saṃvāhitum samupayān iva mandamandam

original: harmyeṣu mālyamadirāparibhogagandhān āviścakāra rajanīparivṛttivāyuḥ // BhKir_9.76 //
analyzed: harmyeṣu mālya madirā paribhoga gandhān āviścakāra rajanī parivṛtti vāyuḥ

original: āmodavāsitacalādharapallaveṣu nidrākaṣāyitavipāṭalalocaneṣu /
analyzed: āmoda vāsita cala adhara pallaveṣu nidrā kaṣāyita vipāṭala locaneṣu

original: vyāmṛṣṭapattratilakeṣu vilāsinīnāṃ śobhāṃ babandha vadaneṣu madāvaśeṣaḥ // BhKir_9.77 //
analyzed: vyāmṛṣṭa pattra tilakeṣu vilāsinīnām śobhām babandha vadaneṣu mada avaśeṣaḥ

original: gatavati nakhalekhālakṣyatām aṅgarāge samadadayitapītātāmrabimbādharāṇām /
analyzed: gatavati nakha lekhā lakṣya tām aṅgarāge sa mada dayita pīta ātāmra bimba adharāṇām

original: virahavidhuram iṣṭā satsakhīvaṅganānāṃ hṛdayam avalalambe rātrisambhogalakṣmīḥ // BhKir_9.78 //
analyzed: viraha vidhuram iṣṭā sat sakhī vaṅganānām hṛdayam avalalambe rātri sambhoga lakṣmīḥ

original: atha parimalajām avāpya lakṣmīm avayavadīpitamaṇḍanaśriyas tāḥ /
analyzed: atha parimala jām avāpya lakṣmīm avayava dīpita maṇḍana śriyaḥ tāḥ

original: vasatim abhivihāya ramyahāvāḥ surapatisūnuvilobhanāya jagmuḥ // BhKir_10.1 //
analyzed: vasatim abhivihāya ramya hāvāḥ surapati sūnu vilobhanāya jagmuḥ

original: drutapadam abhiyātum icchatīnāṃ gamanaparikramalāghavena tāsām /
analyzed: druta padam abhiyātum icchatīnām gamana parikrama lāghavena tāsām

original: avaniṣu caraṇaiḥ pṛthustanīnām alaghunitambatayā ciraṃ niṣede // BhKir_10.2 //
analyzed: avaniṣu caraṇaiḥ pṛthu stanīnām a laghu nitamba tayā ciram niṣede

original: nihitasarasayāvakair babhāse caraṇatalaiḥ kṛtapaddhatir vadhūnām /
analyzed: nihita sarasa yāvakaiḥ babhāse caraṇa talaiḥ kṛta paddhatiḥ vadhūnām

original: aviralavitateva śakragopair aruṇitanīlatṛṇolapā dharitrī // BhKir_10.3 //
analyzed: avirala vitatā iva śakragopaiḥ aruṇita nīla tṛṇa ulapā dharitrī

original: dhvanir agavivareṣu nūpurāṇāṃ pṛthuraśanāguṇaśiñjitānuyātaḥ /
analyzed: dhvaniḥ aga vivareṣu nūpurāṇām pṛthu raśanā guṇa śiñjita anuyātaḥ

original: pratiravavitato vanāni cakre mukharasam utsukahaṃsasārasāni // BhKir_10.4 //
analyzed: pratirava vitataḥ vanāni cakre mukha rasam utsuka haṃsa sārasāni

original: avacayaparibhogavanti hiṃsraiḥ sahacaritāny amṛgāṇi kānanāni /
analyzed: avacaya paribhogavanti hiṃsraiḥ sahacaritāni a mṛgāṇi kānanāni

original: abhidadhur abhito muniṃ vadhūbhyaḥ samuditasādhvasaviklavaṃ ca cetaḥ // BhKir_10.5 //
analyzed: abhidadhuḥ abhitas munim vadhūbhyaḥ samudita sādhvasa viklavam ca cetaḥ

original: nṛpatimuniparigraheṇa sā bhūḥ surasacivāpsarasāṃ jahāra cetaḥ /
analyzed: nṛpati muni parigraheṇa sā bhūḥ sura saciva apsarasām jahāra cetaḥ

original: upahitaparamaprabhāvadhāmnāṃ na hi jayināṃ tapasām alaṅghyam asti // BhKir_10.6 //
analyzed: upahita parama prabhāva dhāmnām na hi jayinām tapasām a laṅghyam asti

original: sacakitam iva vismayākulābhiḥ śucisikatāsv atimānuṣāṇi tābhiḥ /
analyzed: sa cakitam iva vismaya ākulābhiḥ śuci sikatāsu atimānuṣāṇi tābhiḥ

original: kṣitiṣu dadṛśire padāni jiṣṇor upahitaketur athāṅgalāñchanāni // BhKir_10.7 //
analyzed: kṣitiṣu dadṛśire padāni jiṣṇoḥ upahita ketuḥ atha aṅga lāñchanāni

original: atiśayitavanāntaradyutīnāṃ phalakusumāvacaye 'pi tadvidhānām /
analyzed: atiśayita vana antara dyutīnām phala kusuma avacaye tadvidhānām

original: ṛtur iva taruvīrudhāṃ samṛddhyā yuvatijanair jagṛhe muniprabhāvaḥ // BhKir_10.8 //
analyzed: ṛtuḥ iva taru vīrudhām samṛddhyā yuvati janaiḥ jagṛhe muni prabhāvaḥ

original: mṛditakisalayaḥ surāṅganānāṃ sasalilavalkalabhārabhugnaśākhaḥ /
analyzed: mṛdita kisalayaḥ sura aṅganānām sa salila valkala bhāra bhugna śākhaḥ

original: bahumatim adhikāṃ yayāv aśokaḥ parijanatāpi guṇāya sadguṇānām // BhKir_10.9 //
analyzed: bahu matim adhikām yayau aśokaḥ parijana tā api guṇāya sat guṇānām

original: yamaniyamakṛśīkṛtasthirāṅgaḥ paridadṛśe vidhṛtāyudhaḥ sa tābhiḥ /
analyzed: yama niyama kṛśīkṛta sthira aṅgaḥ paridadṛśe vidhṛta āyudhaḥ sa tābhiḥ

original: anupamaśamadīptatāgarīyān kṛtapadapaṅktir atharvaṇeva vedaḥ // BhKir_10.10 //
analyzed: anupama śama dīpta tā garīyān kṛta pada paṅktiḥ atharvaṇā iva vedaḥ

original: śaśadhara iva locanābhirāmair gaganavisāribhir aṃśubhiḥ parītaḥ /
analyzed: śaśadharaḥ iva locana abhirāmaiḥ gagana visāribhiḥ aṃśubhiḥ parītaḥ

original: śikharanicayam ekasānusadmā sakalam ivāpi dadhan mahīdharasya // BhKir_10.11 //
analyzed: śikhara nicayam eka sānu sadmā sakalam iva api dadhan mahīdharasya

original: surasariti paraṃ tapo 'dhigacchan vidhṛtapiśaṅgabṛhajjaṭākalāpaḥ /
analyzed: surasariti param tapaḥ dhigacchan vidhṛta piśaṅga bṛhat jaṭā kalāpaḥ

original: havir iva vitataḥ śikhāsamūhaiḥ samabhilaṣann upavedi jātavedāḥ // BhKir_10.12 //
analyzed: haviḥ iva vitataḥ śikhā samūhaiḥ samabhilaṣan upavedi jātavedāḥ

original: sadṛśam atanum ākṛteḥ prayatnaṃ tadanuguṇām aparaiḥ kriyām alaṅghyām /
analyzed: sadṛśam a tanum ākṛteḥ prayatnam tad anuguṇām aparaiḥ kriyām a laṅghyām

original: dadhad alaghu tapaḥ kriyānurūpaṃ vijayavatīṃ ca tapaḥsamāṃ samṛddhim // BhKir_10.13 //
analyzed: dadhat alaghu tapaḥ kriyā anurūpam vijayavatīm ca tapaḥ samām samṛddhim

original: ciraniyamakṛśo 'pi śailasāraḥ śamanirato 'pi durāsadaḥ prakṛtyā /
analyzed: cira niyama kṛśaḥ pi śaila sāraḥ śama nirataḥ pi durāsadaḥ prakṛtyā

original: sasaciva iva nirjane 'pi tiṣṭhan munir api tulyarucis trilokabhartuḥ // BhKir_10.14 //
analyzed: sa sacivaḥ iva nirjane tiṣṭhan muniḥ api tulya ruciḥ triloka bhartuḥ

original: tanum avajitalokasāradhāmnīṃ tribhuvanaguptisahāṃ vilokayantyaḥ /
analyzed: tanum avajita loka sāra dhāmnīm tribhuvana gupti sahām vilokayantyaḥ

original: avayayur amarastriyo 'sya yatnaṃ vijayaphale viphalaṃ tapodhikāre // BhKir_10.15 //
analyzed: avayayuḥ amara striyaḥ sya yatnam vijaya phale viphalam tapaḥ adhikāre

original: munidanutanayān vilobhya sadyaḥ pratanubalāny adhitiṣṭhatas tapāṃsi /
analyzed: muni danu tanayān vilobhya sadyas pratanu balāni adhitiṣṭhataḥ tapāṃsi

original: alaghuni bahu menire ca tāḥ svaṃ kuliśabhṛtā vihitaṃ pade niyogam // BhKir_10.16 //
analyzed: alaghuni bahu menire ca tāḥ svam kuliśa bhṛtā vihitam pade niyogam

original: atha kṛtakavilobhanaṃ vidhitsau yuvatijane harisūnudarśanena /
analyzed: atha kṛtaka vilobhanam vidhitsau yuvati jane harisūnu darśanena

original: prasabham avatatāra cittajanmā harati mano madhurā hi yauvanaśrīḥ // BhKir_10.17 //
analyzed: prasabham avatatāra cittajanmā harati manaḥ madhurā hi yauvana śrīḥ

original: sapadi harisakhair vadhūnideśād dhvanitamanoramavallakīmṛdaṅgaiḥ /
analyzed: sapadi hari sakhaiḥ vadhū nideśāt dhvanita manorama vallakī mṛdaṅgaiḥ

original: yugapad ṛtugaṇasya saṃnidhānaṃ viyati vane ca yathāyathaṃ vitene // BhKir_10.18 //
analyzed: yugapad ṛtu gaṇasya saṃnidhānam viyati vane ca yathāyatham vitene

original: sajalajaladharaṃ nabho vireje vivṛtim iyāya rucis taḍillatānām /
analyzed: sa jala jaladharam nabhaḥ vireje vivṛtim iyāya ruciḥ taḍit latānām

original: vyavahitarativigrahair vitene jalagurubhiḥ stanitair digantareṣu // BhKir_10.19 //
analyzed: vyavahita rati vigrahaiḥ vitene jala gurubhiḥ stanitaiḥ digantareṣu

original: parisurapatisūnudhāma sadyaḥ samupadadhan mukulāni mālatīnām /
analyzed: pari surapati sūnu dhāma sadyas samupadadhan mukulāni mālatīnām

original: viralam apajahāra baddhabinduḥ sarajasatām avaner apāṃ nipātaḥ // BhKir_10.20 //
analyzed: viralam apajahāra baddha binduḥ sa rajasa tām avaneḥ apām nipātaḥ

original: pratidiśam abhigacchatābhimṛṣṭaḥ kakubhavikāsasugandhinānilena /
analyzed: pratidiśam abhigacchatā abhimṛṣṭaḥ kakubha vikāsa sugandhinā anilena

original: nava iva vibabhau sacittajanmā gatadhṛtir ākulitaś ca jīvalokaḥ // BhKir_10.21 //
analyzed: navaḥ iva vibabhau sa cittajanmā gata dhṛtiḥ ākulitaḥ ca jīva lokaḥ

original: vyathitam api bhṛśaṃ mano harantī pariṇatajambuphalopabhogahṛṣṭā /
analyzed: vyathitam api bhṛśam manaḥ harantī pariṇata jambu phala upabhoga hṛṣṭā

original: parabhṛtayuvatiḥ svanaṃ vitene navanavayojitakaṇṭharāgaramyam // BhKir_10.22 //
analyzed: parabhṛta yuvatiḥ svanam vitene nava nava yojita kaṇṭha rāga ramyam

original: abhibhavati manaḥ kadambavāyau madamadhure ca śikhaṇḍināṃ nināde /
analyzed: abhibhavati manaḥ kadamba vāyau mada madhure ca śikhaṇḍinām nināde

original: jana iva na dhṛteś cacāla jiṣṇur na hi mahatāṃ sukaraḥ samādhibhaṅgaḥ // BhKir_10.23 //
analyzed: janaḥ iva na dhṛteḥ cacāla jiṣṇuḥ na hi mahatām su karaḥ samādhi bhaṅgaḥ

original: dhṛtabisavalayāvalir vahantī kumudavanaikadukūlam āttabāṇā /
analyzed: dhṛta bisa valaya āvaliḥ vahantī kumuda vana eka dukūlam ātta bāṇā

original: śaradamalatale sarojapāṇau ghanasamayena vadhūr ivālalambe // BhKir_10.24 //
analyzed: śarad amala tale saroja pāṇau ghana samayena vadhūḥ iva ālalambe

original: samadaśikhirutāni haṃsanādaiḥ kumudavanāni kadambapuṣpavṛṣṭyā /
analyzed: sa mada śikhi rutāni haṃsa nādaiḥ kumuda vanāni kadamba puṣpa vṛṣṭyā

original: śriyam atiśayinīṃ sametya jagmur guṇamahatāṃ mahate guṇāya yogaḥ // BhKir_10.25 //
analyzed: śriyam atiśayinīm sametya jagmuḥ guṇa mahatām mahate guṇāya yogaḥ

original: sarajasam apahāya ketakīnāṃ prasavam upāntikanīpareṇukīrṇam /
analyzed: sa rajasam apahāya ketakīnām prasavam upāntika nīpa reṇu kīrṇam

original: priyamadhurasanāni ṣaṭpadālī malinayati sma vinīlabandhanāni // BhKir_10.26 //
analyzed: priya madhu rasanāni ṣaṭpada ālī malinayati sma vinīla bandhanāni

original: mukulitam atiśayya bandhujīvaṃ dhṛtajalabinduṣu śādvalasthalīṣu /
