analyzed: mukulitam atiśayya bandhujīvam dhṛta jala binduṣu śādvala sthalīṣu

original: aviralavapuṣaḥ surendragopā vikacapalāśacayaśriyaṃ samīyuḥ // BhKir_10.27 //
analyzed: avirala vapuṣaḥ surendragopāḥ vikaca palāśa caya śriyam samīyuḥ

original: aviralaphalinīvanaprasūnaḥ kusumitakundasugandhigandhavāhaḥ /
guṇam asamayajaṃ cirāya lebhe viralatuṣārakaṇ.as tuṣārakālaḥ // BhKir_10.28 //
analyzed: guṇam a samaya jam cirāya lebhe virala tuṣāra kaṇaḥ tuṣāra kālaḥ

original: nicayini lavalīlatāvikāse janayati lodhrasamīraṇe ca harṣam /
analyzed: nicayini lavalī latā vikāse janayati lodhra samīraṇe ca harṣam

original: vikṛtim upayayau na pāṇḍusūnuś calati nayān na jigīṣatāṃ hi cetaḥ // BhKir_10.29 //
analyzed: vikṛtim upayayau na pāṇḍu sūnuḥ calati nayāt na jigīṣatām hi cetaḥ

original: katipayasahakārapuṣparamyas tanutuhino 'lpavinidrasinduvāraḥ /
analyzed: katipaya sahakāra puṣpa ramyaḥ tanu tuhinaḥ lpa vinidra sinduvāraḥ

original: surabhimukhahimāgamāntaśaṃsī samupayayau śiśiraḥ smaraikabandhuḥ // BhKir_10.30 //
analyzed: surabhi mukha hima āgama anta śaṃsī samupayayau śiśiraḥ smara eka bandhuḥ

original: kusumanagavanāny upaitukāmā kisalayinīm avalambya cūtayaṣṭim /
analyzed: kusuma naga vanāni upaitu kāmā kisalayinīm avalambya cūta yaṣṭim

original: kvaṇadalikulanūpurā nirāse nalinavaneṣu padaṃ vasantalakṣmīḥ // BhKir_10.31 //
analyzed: kvaṇat ali kula nūpurā nirāse nalina vaneṣu padam vasanta lakṣmīḥ

original: vikasitakusumādharaṃ hasantīṃ kurabakarājivadhūṃ vilokayantam /
analyzed: vikasita kusuma adharam hasantīm kurabaka rāji vadhūm vilokayantam

original: dadṛśur iva surāṅganā niṣaṇṇaṃ saśaram anaṅgam aśokapallaveṣu // BhKir_10.32 //
analyzed: dadṛśuḥ iva sura aṅganāḥ niṣaṇṇam sa śaram anaṅgam aśoka pallaveṣu

original: muhur anupatatā vidhūyamānaṃ viracitasaṃhati dakṣiṇānilena /
analyzed: muhur anupatatā vidhūyamānam viracita saṃhati dakṣiṇa anilena

original: alikulam alakākṛtiṃ prapede nalinamukhāntavisarpi paṅkajinyāḥ // BhKir_10.33 //
analyzed: ali kulam alaka ākṛtim prapede nalina mukha anta visarpi paṅkajinyāḥ

original: śvasanacalitapallavādharoṣṭhe navanihiterṣyam ivāvadhūnayantī /
analyzed: śvasana calita pallava adhara uṣṭhe nava nihita īrṣyam iva avadhūnayantī

original: madhusurabhiṇi ṣaṭpadena puṣpe mukha iva śālalatāvadhūś cucumbe // BhKir_10.34 //
analyzed: madhu surabhiṇi ṣaṭpadena puṣpe mukhe iva śāla latā vadhūḥ cucumbe

original: prabhavati na tadā paro vijetuṃ bhavati jitendriyatā yad ātmarakṣā /
analyzed: prabhavati na tadā paraḥ vijetum bhavati jita indriya tā yat ātma rakṣā

original: avajitabhuvanas tathā hi lebhe sitaturage vijayaṃ na puṣpamāsaḥ // BhKir_10.35 //
analyzed: avajita bhuvanaḥ tathā hi lebhe sitaturage vijayam na puṣpamāsaḥ

original: katham iva tava saṃmatir bhavitrī samam ṛtubhir munināvadhīritasya /
analyzed: katham iva tava saṃmatiḥ bhavitrī samam ṛtubhiḥ muninā avadhīritasya

original: iti viracitamallikāvikāsaḥ smayata iva sma madhuṃ nidāghakālaḥ // BhKir_10.36 //
analyzed: iti viracita mallikā vikāsaḥ smayataḥ iva sma madhum nidāgha kālaḥ

original: balavad api balaṃ mithovirodhi prabhavati naiva vipakṣanirjayāya /
analyzed: balavat api balam mithaḥ virodhi prabhavati nā eva vipakṣa nirjayāya

original: bhuvanaparibhavī na yat tadānīṃ tam ṛtugaṇaḥ kṣaṇam unmanīcakāra // BhKir_10.37 //
analyzed: bhuvana paribhavī na yat tadānīm tam ṛtu gaṇaḥ kṣaṇam unmanīcakāra

original: śrutisukham upavīṇitaṃ sahāyair aviralalāñchanahāriṇaś ca kālāḥ /
analyzed: śruti sukham sahāyaiḥ avirala lāñchana hāriṇaḥ ca kālāḥ

original: avihitaharisūnuvikriyāṇi tridaśavadhūṣu manobhavaṃ vitenuḥ // BhKir_10.38 //
analyzed: a vihita hari sūnu vikriyāṇi tridaśa vadhūṣu manobhavam vitenuḥ

original: na dalati nicaye tathotpalānāṃ na ca viṣamacchadagucchayūthikāsu /
analyzed: na dalati nicaye tathā utpalānām na ca viṣamacchada guccha yūthikāsu

original: abhiratum upalebhire yathāsāṃ haritanayāvayaveṣu locanāni // BhKir_10.39 //
analyzed: abhiratum upalebhire yathā āsām hari tanaya avayaveṣu locanāni

original: munim abhimukhatāṃ ninīṣavo yāḥ samupayayuḥ kamanīyatāguṇena /
analyzed: munim abhimukha tām ninīṣavaḥ yāḥ samupayayuḥ kamanīya tā guṇena

original: madanam upadadhe sa eva tāsāṃ duradhigamā hi gatiḥ prayojanānām // BhKir_10.40 //
analyzed: madanam upadadhe saḥ eva tāsām duradhigamā hi gatiḥ prayojanānām

original: prakṛtam anusasāra nābhineyaṃ pravikasadaṅguli pāṇipallavaṃ vā /
analyzed: prakṛtam anusasāra na abhineyam pravikasat aṅguli pāṇipallavam vā

original: prathamam upahitaṃ vilāsi cakṣuḥ sitaturage na cacāla nartakīnām // BhKir_10.41 //
analyzed: prathamam upahitam vilāsi cakṣuḥ sitaturage na cacāla nartakīnām

original: abhinayamanasaḥ surāṅganāyā nihitam alaktakavartanābhitāmram /
analyzed: abhinaya manasaḥ sura aṅganāyāḥ nihitam alaktaka vartana abhitāmram

original: caraṇam abhipapāta ṣaṭpadālī dhutanavalohitapaṅkajābhiśaṅkā // BhKir_10.42 //
analyzed: caraṇam abhipapāta ṣaṭpada ālī dhuta nava lohita paṅkaja abhiśaṅkā

original: aviralam alaseṣu nartakīnāṃ drutapariṣiktam alaktakaṃ padeṣu /
analyzed: aviralam alaseṣu nartakīnām druta pariṣiktam alaktakam padeṣu

original: savapuṣām iva cittarāgam ūhur namitaśikhāni kadambakesarāṇi // BhKir_10.43 //
analyzed: sa vapuṣām iva citta rāgam ūhuḥ namita śikhāni kadamba kesarāṇi

original: nṛpasutam abhitaḥ samanmathāyāḥ parijanagātratirohitāṅgayaṣṭeḥ /
analyzed: nṛpa sutam abhitas sa manmathāyāḥ parijana gātra tirohita aṅga yaṣṭeḥ

original: sphuṭam abhilaṣitaṃ babhūva vadhvā vadati hi saṃvṛtir eva kāmitāni // BhKir_10.44 //
analyzed: sphuṭam abhilaṣitam babhūva vadhvāḥ vadati hi saṃvṛtiḥ eva kāmitāni

original: abhimuni sahasā hṛte parasyā ghanamarutā jaghanāṃśukaikadeśe /
analyzed: abhimuni sahasā hṛte parasyāḥ ghana marutā jaghana aṃśuka eka deśe

original: cakitam avasanoru satrapāyāḥ pratiyuvatīr api vismayaṃ nināya // BhKir_10.45 //
analyzed: cakitam a vasana ūru sa trapāyāḥ pratiyuvatīḥ api vismayam nināya

original: dhṛtabisavalaye nidhāya pāṇau mukham adhirūṣitapāṇḍugaṇḍalekham /
analyzed: dhṛta bisa valaye nidhāya pāṇau mukham adhi rūṣita pāṇḍu gaṇḍa lekham

original: nṛpasutam aparā smarābhitāpād amadhumadālasalocanaṃ nidadhyau // BhKir_10.46 //
analyzed: nṛpa sutam aparā smara abhitāpāt a madhu mada alasa locanam nidadhyau

original: sakhi dayitam ihānayeti sā māṃ prahitavatī kusumeṣuṇābhitaptā /
analyzed: sakhi dayitam iha ānaya iti sā mām prahitavatī kusumeṣuṇā abhitaptā

original: hṛdayam ahṛdayā na nāma pūrvaṃ bhavadupakaṇṭham upāgataṃ viveda // BhKir_10.47 //
analyzed: hṛdayam ahṛdayā na nāma pūrvam bhavat upakaṇṭham upāgatam viveda

original: ciram api kalitāny apārayantyā parigadituṃ pariśuṣyatā mukhena /
analyzed: ciram api kalitāni a pārayantyā parigaditum pariśuṣyatā mukhena

original: gataghṛṇa gamitāni satsakhīnāṃ nayanayugaiḥ samam ārdratāṃ manāṃsi // BhKir_10.48 //
analyzed: gata ghṛṇa gamitāni sat sakhīnām nayana yugaiḥ samam ārdra tām manāṃsi

original: acakamata sapallavāṃ dharitrīṃ mṛdusurabhiṃ virahayya puṣpaśayyām /
analyzed: acakamata sa pallavām dharitrīm mṛdu surabhim virahayya puṣpa śayyām

original: bhṛśam aratim avāpya tatra cāsyās tava sukhaśītam upaitum aṅkam icchā // BhKir_10.49 //
analyzed: bhṛśam aratim avāpya tatra ca asyāḥ tava sukha śītam upaitum aṅkam icchā

original: tad anagha tanur astu sā sakāmā vrajati purā hi parāsutāṃ tvadarthe /
analyzed: tat anagha tanuḥ astu sā sa kāmā vrajati purā hi parāsu tām tvad arthe

original: punar api sulabhaṃ tapo 'nurāgī yuvatijanaḥ khalu nāpyate 'nurūpaḥ // BhKir_10.50 //
analyzed: punar api sulabham tapaḥ nurāgī yuvati janaḥ khalu nā āpyate nurūpaḥ

original: jahihi kaṭhinatāṃ prayaccha vācaṃ nanu karuṇāmṛdu mānasaṃ munīnām /
analyzed: jahihi kaṭhina tām prayaccha vācam nanu karuṇā mṛdu mānasam munīnām

original: upagatam avadhīrayanty abhavyāḥ sa nipuṇam etya kayācid evam ūce // BhKir_10.51 //
analyzed: upagatam avadhīrayanti abhavyāḥ sa nipuṇam etya kayācid evam ūce

original: salalitacalitatrikābhirāmāḥ śirasijasaṃyamanākulaikapāṇiḥ /
analyzed: sa lalita calita trika abhirāmāḥ śirasija saṃyamana ākula eka pāṇiḥ

original: surapatitanaye 'parā nirāse manasijajaitraśaraṃ vilocanārdham // BhKir_10.52 //
analyzed: surapati tanaye parā nirāse manasija jaitra śaram vilocana ardham

original: kusumitam avalambya cūtam uccais tanur ibhakumbhapṛthustanānatāṅgī /
analyzed: kusumitam avalambya cūtam uccais tanuḥ ibha kumbha pṛthu stana ānata aṅgī

original: tadabhimukham anaṅgacāpayaṣṭir visṛtaguṇeva samunnanāma kācit // BhKir_10.53 //
analyzed: tad abhimukham anaṅga cāpa yaṣṭiḥ visṛta guṇā iva samunnanāma kācid

original: sarabhasam avalambya nīlam anyā vigalitanīvi vilolam antarīyam /
analyzed: sarabhasam avalambya nīlam anyā vigalita nīvi vilolam antarīyam

original: abhipatitumanāḥ sasādhvaseva cyutaraśanāguṇasaṃditāvatasthe // BhKir_10.54 //
analyzed: abhipatitu manāḥ sa sādhvasā iva cyuta raśanā guṇa saṃditā avatasthe

original: yadi manasi śamaḥ kim aṅga cāpaṃ śaṭha viṣayās tava vallabhā na muktiḥ /
analyzed: yadi manasi śamaḥ kim aṅga cāpam śaṭha viṣayāḥ tava vallabhāḥ na muktiḥ

original: bhavatu diśati nānyakāminībhyas tava hṛdaye hṛdayeśvarāvakāśam // BhKir_10.55 //
analyzed: bhavatu diśati na anya kāminībhyaḥ tava hṛdaye hṛdaya īśvara avakāśam

original: iti viṣamitacakṣuṣābhidhāya sphuradadharoṣṭham asūyayā kayācit /
analyzed: iti viṣamita cakṣuṣā abhidhāya sphurat adhara uṣṭham asūyayā kayācid

original: agaṇitagurumānalajjayāsau svayam urasi śravaṇotpalena jaghne // BhKir_10.56 //
analyzed: a gaṇita guru māna lajjayā asau svayam urasi śravaṇa utpalena jaghne

original: savinayam aparābhisṛtya sāci smitasubhagaikalasatkapolalakṣmīḥ /
analyzed: sa vinayam aparā abhisṛtya sāci smita subhagā eka lasat kapola lakṣmīḥ

original: śravaṇaniyamitena taṃ nidadhya sakalam ivāsakalena locanena // BhKir_10.57 //
analyzed: śravaṇa niyamitena tam sakalam iva a sakalena locanena

original: karuṇam abhihitaṃ trapā nirastā tadabhimukhaṃ ca vimuktam aśru tābhiḥ /
analyzed: karuṇam abhihitam trapā nirastā tad abhimukham ca vimuktam aśru tābhiḥ

original: prakupitam abhisāraṇe 'nunetuṃ priyam iyatī hy abalājanasya bhūmiḥ // BhKir_10.58 //
analyzed: prakupitam abhisāraṇe nunetum priyam iyatī hi abalā janasya bhūmiḥ

original: asakalanayanekṣitāni lajjā gatam alasaṃ paripāṇḍutā viṣādaḥ /
analyzed: a sakala nayana īkṣitāni lajjā gatam alasam paripāṇḍu tā viṣādaḥ

original: iti vividham iyāya tāsu bhūṣāṃ prabhavati maṇḍayituṃ vadhūr anaṅgaḥ // BhKir_10.59 //
analyzed: iti vividham iyāya tāsu bhūṣām prabhavati maṇḍayitum vadhūḥ anaṅgaḥ

original: alasapadamanoramaṃ prakṛtyā jitakalahaṃsavadhūgati prayātam /
analyzed: alasa pada manoramam prakṛtyā jita kalahaṃsa vadhū gati prayātam

original: sthitam urujaghanasthalātibhārād uditapariśramajihmitekṣaṇaṃ vā // BhKir_10.60 //
analyzed: sthitam uru jaghana sthala ati bhārāt udita pariśrama jihmita īkṣaṇam vā

original: bhṛśakusumaśareṣupātamohād anavasitārthapadākulo 'bhilāpaḥ /
analyzed: bhṛśa kusuma śara iṣu pāta mohāt an avasita artha pada ākulaḥ bhilāpaḥ

original: adhikavitatalocanaṃ vadhūnām ayugapad unnamitabhru vīkṣitaṃ ca // BhKir_10.61 //
analyzed: adhika vitata locanam vadhūnām ayugapad unnamita bhru vīkṣitam ca

original: rucikaram api nārthavad babhūva stimitasamādhiśucau pṛthātanūje /
analyzed: ruci karam api nā arthavat babhūva stimita samādhi śucau pṛthā tanūje

original: jvalayati mahatāṃ manāṃsy amarṣe na hi labhate 'vasaraṃ sukhābhilāṣaḥ // BhKir_10.62 //
analyzed: jvalayati mahatām manāṃsi amarṣe na hi labhate vasaram sukha abhilāṣaḥ

original: svayaṃ saṃrādhyaivaṃ śatamakham akhaṇḍena tapasā parocchittyā labhyām abhilaṣati lakṣmīṃ harisute /
analyzed: svayam saṃrādhya evam śatamakham akhaṇḍena tapasā para ucchittyā labhyām abhilaṣati lakṣmīm harisute

original: manobhiḥ sodvegaiḥ praṇayavihataidhvastarucayaḥ sagandharmā dhāma tridaśavanitāḥ svaṃ pratiyayuḥ // BhKir_10.63 //
analyzed: manobhiḥ sa udvegaiḥ praṇaya vihataiḥ dhvasta rucayaḥ dhāma tridaśa vanitāḥ svam pratiyayuḥ

original: athāmarṣān nisargāc ca jitendriyatayā tayā /
analyzed: atha amarṣāt nisargāt ca jita indriya tayā tayā

original: āgajāmāśramaṃ jiṣṇoḥ pratītaḥ pākaśāsanaḥ // BhKir_11.1 //
analyzed: āgajām āśramam jiṣṇoḥ pratītaḥ pākaśāsanaḥ

original: munirūpo 'nurūpeṇa sūnunā dadṛśe puraḥ /
analyzed: muni rūpaḥ nurūpeṇa sūnunā dadṛśe puras

original: drāghīyasā vayotītaḥ pariklāntaḥ kilādhvanā // BhKir_11.2 //
analyzed: drāghīyasā vayotītaḥ pariklāntaḥ kila adhvanā

original: jaṭānāṃ kīrṇayā keśaiḥ saṃhatyā paritaḥ sitaiḥ /
analyzed: jaṭānām kīrṇayā keśaiḥ saṃhatyā paritas sitaiḥ

original: pṛktayendukarair ahnaḥ paryanta iva saṃdhyayā // BhKir_11.3 //
analyzed: pṛktayā indu karaiḥ ahnaḥ paryante iva saṃdhyayā

original: viśadabhrūyugacchanna- valitāpāṅgalocanaḥ /
analyzed: valita apāṅga locanaḥ

original: prāleyāvatatimlāna- palāśābja iva hradaḥ // BhKir_11.4 //
analyzed: prāleya avatati mlāna palāśa abjaḥ iva hradaḥ

original: āsaktabharanīkāśair aṅgaiḥ parikṛśair api /
analyzed: āsakta bhara nīkāśaiḥ aṅgaiḥ parikṛśaiḥ api

original: adyūnaḥ sadgṛhiṇy eva prāyo yaṣṭyāvalambitaḥ // BhKir_11.5 //
analyzed: adyūnaḥ sat gṛhiṇī eva prāyas yaṣṭyā avalambitaḥ

original: gūḍho 'pi vapuṣā rājan dhāmnā lokābhibhāvinā /
analyzed: gūḍhaḥ u pi vapuṣā rājan dhāmnā loka abhibhāvinā

original: aṃśumān iva tanvabhra- paṭalacchannavigrahaḥ // BhKir_11.6 //
analyzed: aṃśumān iva tanu abhra paṭala channa vigrahaḥ

original: jaratīm api bibhrāṇas tanum aprākṛtākṛtiḥ /
analyzed: jaratīm api bibhrāṇaḥ tanum a prākṛta ākṛtiḥ

original: cakārākrāntalakṣmīkaḥ sasādhvasam ivāśrayam // BhKir_11.7 //
analyzed: cakāra ākrānta lakṣmīkaḥ sa sādhvasam iva āśrayam

original: abhitas taṃ pṛthāsūnuḥ snehena paritastare /
analyzed: abhitas tam pṛthā sūnuḥ snehena paritastare

original: avijñāte 'pi bandhau hi balāt prahlādate manaḥ // BhKir_11.8 //
analyzed: a vijñāte pi bandhau hi balāt prahlādate manaḥ

original: ātitheyīm athāsādya sutādapacitiṃ hariḥ /
analyzed: ātitheyīm atha āsādya sutāt apacitim hariḥ

original: viśramya viṣṭare nāma vyājahāreti bhāratīm // BhKir_11.9 //
analyzed: viśramya viṣṭare nāma vyājahāra iti bhāratīm

original: tvayā sādhu samārambhi nave vayasi yat tapaḥ /
analyzed: tvayā sādhu samārambhi nave vayasi yat tapaḥ

original: hriyate viṣayaiḥ prāyo varṣīyān api mādṛśaḥ // BhKir_11.10 //
analyzed: hriyate viṣayaiḥ prāyas varṣīyān api mādṛśaḥ

original: śreyasīṃ tava samprāptā guṇasampadam ākṛtiḥ /
analyzed: śreyasīm tava samprāptā guṇa sampadam ākṛtiḥ

original: sulabhā ramyatā loke durlabhaṃ hi guṇārjanam // BhKir_11.11 //
analyzed: sulabhā ramya tā loke durlabham hi guṇa arjanam

original: śaradambudharacchāyā gatvaryo yauvanaśriyaḥ /
analyzed: śarad ambudhara chāyāḥ gatvaryaḥ yauvana śriyaḥ

original: āpātaramyā viṣayāḥ paryantaparitāpinaḥ // BhKir_11.12 //
analyzed: āpāta ramyāḥ viṣayāḥ paryanta paritāpinaḥ

original: antakaḥ paryavasthātā janminaḥ saṃtatāpadaḥ /
analyzed: antakaḥ paryavasthātā janminaḥ saṃtata āpadaḥ

original: iti tyājye bhave bhavyo muktāv uttiṣṭhate manaḥ // BhKir_11.13 //
analyzed: iti tyājye bhave bhavyaḥ muktau uttiṣṭhate manaḥ

original: cittavān asi kalyāṇī yat tvāṃ matir upasthitā /
analyzed: cittavān asi kalyāṇī yat tvām matiḥ upasthitā

original: viruddhaḥ kevalaṃ veṣaḥ saṃdehayati me manaḥ // BhKir_11.14 //
analyzed: viruddhaḥ kevalam veṣaḥ saṃdehayati me manaḥ

original: yuyutsuneva kavacaṃ kim āmuktam idaṃ tvayā /
analyzed: yuyutsunā iva kavacam kim āmuktam idam tvayā

original: tapasvino hi vasate kevalājinavalkale // BhKir_11.15 //
analyzed: tapasvinaḥ hi vasate kevala ajina valkale

original: prapitsoḥ kiṃ ca te muktiṃ niḥspṛhasya kalevare /
analyzed: prapitsoḥ kim ca te muktim niḥspṛhasya kalevare

original: maheṣudhī dhanur bhīmaṃ bhūtānām anabhidruhaḥ // BhKir_11.16 //
analyzed: mahā iṣudhī dhanuḥ bhīmam bhūtānām an abhidruhaḥ

original: bhayaṃkaraḥ prāṇabhṛtāṃ mṛtyor bhuja ivāparaḥ /
analyzed: bhayaṃkaraḥ prāṇabhṛtām mṛtyoḥ bhujaḥ iva aparaḥ

original: asis tava tapasthasya na samarthayate śamam // BhKir_11.17 //
analyzed: asiḥ tava tapasthasya na samarthayate śamam

original: jayam atrabhavān nūnam arātiṣv abhilāṣukaḥ /
analyzed: jayam atrabhavān nūnam arātiṣu abhilāṣukaḥ

original: krodhalakṣma kṣamāvantaḥ kvāyudhaṃ kva tapodhanāḥ // BhKir_11.18 //
analyzed: krodha lakṣma kṣamāvantaḥ kva āyudham kva tapodhanāḥ

original: yaḥ karoti vadhodarkā niḥśreyasakarīḥ kriyāḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ karoti vadha udarkāḥ niḥśreyasa karīḥ kriyāḥ

original: glānidoṣacchidaḥ svacchāḥ sa mūḍhaḥ paṅkayaty apaḥ // BhKir_11.19 //
analyzed: glāni doṣa chidaḥ su acchāḥ sa mūḍhaḥ paṅkayati apaḥ

original: mūlaṃ doṣasya hiṃsāder arthakāmau sma mā puṣaḥ /
analyzed: mūlam doṣasya hiṃsā ādeḥ artha kāmau sma mā puṣaḥ

original: tau hi tattvāvabodhasya durucchedāv upaplavau // BhKir_11.20 //
analyzed: tau hi tattva avabodhasya durucchedau upaplavau

original: abhidroheṇa bhūtānām arjayan gatvarīḥ śriyaḥ /
analyzed: abhidroheṇa bhūtānām arjayan gatvarīḥ śriyaḥ

original: udanvān iva sindhūnām āpadām eti pātratām // BhKir_11.21 //
analyzed: udanvān iva sindhūnām āpadām eti pātra tām

original: yā gamyāḥ satsahāyānāṃ yāsu khedo bhayaṃ yataḥ /
analyzed: yāḥ gamyāḥ sat sahāyānām yāsu khedaḥ bhayam yatas

original: tāsāṃ kiṃ yan na duḥkhāya vipadām iva sampadām // BhKir_11.22 //
analyzed: tāsām kim yat na duḥkhāya vipadām iva sampadām

original: durāsadān arīn ugrān dhṛter viśvāsajanmanaḥ /
analyzed: durāsadān arīn ugrān dhṛteḥ viśvāsa janmanaḥ

original: bhogān bhogān ivāheyān adhyāsyāpan na durlabhā // BhKir_11.23 //
analyzed: bhogān bhogān iva aheyān adhyāsya āpad na durlabhā

original: nāntarajñāḥ śriyo jātu priyair āsāṃ na bhūyate /
analyzed: na antara jñāḥ śriyaḥ jātu priyaiḥ āsām na bhūyate

original: āsaktās tāsv amī mūḍhā vāmaśīlā hi jantavaḥ // BhKir_11.24 //
analyzed: āsaktāḥ tāsu amī mūḍhāḥ vāma śīlāḥ hi jantavaḥ

original: ko 'pavādaḥ stutipade yad aśīleṣu cañcalāḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ upavādaḥ stuti pade yat aśīleṣu cañcalāḥ

original: sādhuvṛttān api kṣudrā vikṣipanty eva sampadaḥ // BhKir_11.25 //
analyzed: sādhu vṛttān api kṣudrāḥ vikṣipanti eva sampadaḥ

original: kṛtavān anyadeheṣu kartā ca vidhuraṃ manaḥ /
analyzed: kṛtavān anya deheṣu kartā ca vidhuram manaḥ

original: apriyair iva saṃyogo viprayogaḥ priyaiḥ saha // BhKir_11.26 //
analyzed: apriyaiḥ iva saṃyogaḥ viprayogaḥ priyaiḥ saha

original: śūnyam ākīrṇatām eti tulyaṃ vyasanam utsavaiḥ /
analyzed: śūnyam ākīrṇa tām eti tulyam vyasanam utsavaiḥ

original: vipralambho 'pi lābhāya sati priyasamāgame // BhKir_11.27 //
analyzed: vipralambhaḥ pi lābhāya sati priya samāgame

original: tadā ramyāṇy aramyāṇi priyāḥ śalyaṃ tadāsavaḥ /
analyzed: tadā ramyāṇi aramyāṇi priyāḥ śalyam tadā asavaḥ

original: tadaikākī sabandhuḥ sann iṣṭena rahito yadā // BhKir_11.28 //
analyzed: tadā ekākī sabandhuḥ san iṣṭena rahitaḥ yadā

original: yuktaḥ pramādyasi hitād apetaḥ paritapyase /
analyzed: yuktaḥ pramādyasi hitāt apetaḥ paritapyase

original: yadi neṣṭātmanaḥ pīḍā mā sañji bhavatā jane // BhKir_11.29 //
analyzed: yadi nā iṣṭā ātmanaḥ pīḍā mā sañji bhavatā jane

original: janmino 'sya sthitiṃ vidvāṃl lakṣmīm iva calācalām /
analyzed: janminaḥ sya sthitim vidvān lakṣmīm iva cala acalām

original: bhavān mā sma vadhīn nyāyyaṃ nyāyādhārā hi sādhavaḥ // BhKir_11.30 //
analyzed: bhavān mā sma vadhīt nyāyyam nyāya ādhārāḥ hi sādhavaḥ

original: vijahīhi raṇotsāhaṃ mā tapaḥ sādhi nīnaśaḥ /
analyzed: vijahīhi raṇa utsāham mā tapaḥ sādhi nīnaśaḥ

original: ucchedaṃ janmanaḥ kartum edhi śāntas tapodhana // BhKir_11.31 //
analyzed: ucchedam janmanaḥ kartum edhi śāntaḥ tapodhana

original: jīyantāṃ durjayā dehe ripavaś cakṣurādayaḥ /
analyzed: jīyantām durjayāḥ dehe ripavaḥ cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ

original: jiteṣu nanu loko 'yaṃ teṣu kṛtsnas tvayā jitaḥ // BhKir_11.32 //
analyzed: jiteṣu nanu lokaḥ yam teṣu kṛtsnaḥ tvayā jitaḥ

original: paravān arthasaṃsiddhau nīcavṛttir apatrapaḥ /
analyzed: paravān artha saṃsiddhau nīca vṛttiḥ apatrapaḥ

original: avidheyendriyaḥ puṃsāṃ gaur ivaitei vidheyatām // BhKir_11.33 //
analyzed: avidheya indriyaḥ puṃsām gauḥ vidheya tām

original: śvas tvayā sukhasaṃvittiḥ smaraṇīyādhunātanī /
analyzed: śvas tvayā sukha saṃvittiḥ smaraṇīyā adhunātanī

original: iti svapnopamān matvā kāmān mā gās tadaṅgatām // BhKir_11.34 //
analyzed: iti svapna upamān matvā kāmān mā gāḥ tad aṅga tām

original: śraddheyā vipralabdhāraḥ priyā vipriyakāriṇaḥ /
analyzed: śraddheyāḥ vipralabdhāraḥ priyāḥ vipriya kāriṇaḥ

original: sudustyajās tyajanto 'pi kāmāḥ kaṣṭā hi śatravaḥ // BhKir_11.35 //
analyzed: su dustyajāḥ tyajantaḥ pi kāmāḥ kaṣṭāḥ hi śatravaḥ

original: vivikte 'smin nage bhūyaḥ plāvite jahnukanyayā /
analyzed: vivikte smin nage bhūyas plāvite jahnukanyayā

original: pratyāsīdati muktis tvāṃ purā mā bhūr udāyudhaḥ // BhKir_11.36 //
analyzed: pratyāsīdati muktiḥ tvām purā mā bhūḥ udāyudhaḥ

original: vyāhṛtya marutāṃ patyāv iti vācam avasthite /
analyzed: vyāhṛtya marutām patyau iti vācam avasthite

original: vacaḥ praśrayagambhīram athovāca kapidhvajaḥ // BhKir_11.37 //
analyzed: vacaḥ praśraya gambhīram athā uvāca kapidhvajaḥ

original: prasādaramyam ojasvi garīyo lāghavānvitam /
analyzed: prasāda ramyam ojasvi garīyaḥ lāghava anvitam

original: sākāṅkṣam anupaskāraṃ viṣvaggati nirākulam // BhKir_11.38 //
analyzed: sa ākāṅkṣam an upaskāram viṣvaggati nirākulam

original: nyāyanirṇītasāratvān nirapekṣam ivāgame /
analyzed: nyāya nirṇīta sāra tvāt nirapekṣam iva āgame

original: aprakampyatayānyeṣām āmnāyavacanopamam // BhKir_11.39 //
analyzed: a prakampya tayā anyeṣām āmnāya vacana upamam

original: alaṅghyatvāj janair anyaiḥ kṣubhitodanvadūrjitam /
analyzed: a laṅghya tvāt janaiḥ anyaiḥ kṣubhita udanvat ūrjitam

original: audāryād arthasampatteḥ śāntaṃ cittam ṛṣer iva // BhKir_11.40 //
analyzed: audāryāt artha sampatteḥ śāntam cittam ṛṣeḥ iva

original: idam īdṛgguṇopetaṃ labdhāvasarasādhanam /
analyzed: idam īdṛś guṇa upetam labdha avasara sādhanam

original: vyākuryāt kaḥ priyaṃ vākyaṃ yo vaktā nedṛgāśayaḥ // BhKir_11.41 //
analyzed: vyākuryāt kaḥ priyam vākyam yaḥ vaktā na īdṛś āśayaḥ

original: na jñātaṃ tāta yatnasya paurvāparyam amuṣya te /
analyzed: na jñātam tāta yatnasya paurvāparyam amuṣya te

original: śāsituṃ yena māṃ dharmaṃ munibhis tulyam icchasi // BhKir_11.42 //
analyzed: śāsitum yena mām dharmam munibhiḥ tulyam icchasi

original: avijñātaprabandhasya vaco vācaspater iva /
analyzed: a vijñāta prabandhasya vacaḥ vācaspateḥ iva

original: vrajaty aphalatām eva nayadruha ivehitam // BhKir_11.43 //
analyzed: vrajati aphala tām eva naya druhaḥ iva īhitam

original: śreyaso 'py asya te tāta vacaso nāsmi bhājanam /
analyzed: śreyasaḥ pi asya te tāta vacasaḥ nā asmi bhājanam

original: nabhasaḥ sphuṭatārasya rātrer iva viparyayaḥ // BhKir_11.44 //
analyzed: nabhasaḥ sphuṭa tārasya rātreḥ iva viparyayaḥ

original: kṣatriyas tanayaḥ pāṇḍor ahaṃ pārtho dhanaṃjayaḥ /
analyzed: kṣatriyaḥ tanayaḥ pāṇḍoḥ aham pārthaḥ dhanaṃjayaḥ

original: sthitaḥ prāstasya dāyādair bhrātur jyeṣṭhasya śāsane // BhKir_11.45 //
analyzed: sthitaḥ prāstasya dāyādaiḥ bhrātuḥ jyeṣṭhasya śāsane

original: kṛṣṇadvaipāyanādeśād bibharmi vratam īdṛśam /
analyzed: kṛṣṇadvaipāyana ādeśāt bibharmi vratam īdṛśam

original: bhṛśam ārādhane yattaḥ svārādhyasya marutvataḥ // BhKir_11.46 //
analyzed: bhṛśam ārādhane yattaḥ su ārādhyasya marutvataḥ

original: durakṣān dīvyatā rājñā rājyam ātmā vayaṃ vadhūḥ /
analyzed: durakṣān dīvyatā rājñā rājyam ātmā vayam vadhūḥ

original: nītāni paṇatāṃ nūnam īdṛśī bhavitavyatā // BhKir_11.47 //
analyzed: nītāni paṇatām nūnam īdṛśī bhavitavya tā

original: tenānujasahāyena draupadyā ca mayā vinā /
analyzed: tena anuja sahāyena draupadyā ca mayā vinā

original: bhṛśam āyāmiyāmāsu yāminīṣv abhitapyate // BhKir_11.48 //
analyzed: bhṛśam āyāmi yāmāsu yāminīṣu abhitapyate

original: hṛtottarīyāṃ prasabhaṃ sabhāyām āgatahriyaḥ /
analyzed: hṛta uttarīyām prasabham sabhāyām āgata hriyaḥ

original: marmacchidā no vacasā niratakṣann arātayaḥ // BhKir_11.49 //
analyzed: marma chidā naḥ vacasā niratakṣan arātayaḥ

original: upādhatta sapatneṣu kṛṣṇāyā gurusaṃnidhau /
analyzed: upādhatta sapatneṣu kṛṣṇāyāḥ guru saṃnidhau

original: bhāvam ānayane satyāḥ satyaṃkāram ivāntakaḥ // BhKir_11.50 //
analyzed: bhāvam ānayane satyāḥ satyaṃkāram iva antakaḥ

original: tām aikṣanta kṣaṇaṃ sabhyā duḥśāsanapuraḥsarām /
analyzed: tām aikṣanta kṣaṇam sabhyāḥ duḥśāsana puraḥsarām

original: abhisāyārkam āvṛttāṃ chāyām iva mahātaroḥ // BhKir_11.51 //
analyzed: abhisāya arkam āvṛttām chāyām iva mahā taroḥ

original: ayathārthakriyārambhaiḥ patibhiḥ kiṃ tavekṣitaiḥ /
analyzed: ayathā artha kriyā ārambhaiḥ patibhiḥ kim tava īkṣitaiḥ

original: arudhyetām itīvāsyā nayane bāṣpavāriṇe // BhKir_11.52 //
analyzed: arudhyetām iti iva asyāḥ nayane bāṣpa vāriṇe

original: soḍhavān no daśām antyāṃ jyāyān eva guṇapriyaḥ /
analyzed: soḍhavān naḥ daśām antyām jyāyān eva guṇa priyaḥ

original: sulabho hi dviṣāṃ bhaṅgo durlabhā satsv avācyatā // BhKir_11.53 //
analyzed: sulabhaḥ hi dviṣām bhaṅgaḥ durlabhā satsu a vācya tā

original: sthityatikrāntibhīrūṇi svacchāny ākulitāny api /
analyzed: sthiti atikrānti bhīrūṇi svacchāni ākulitāni api

original: toyāni toyarāśīnāṃ manāṃsi ca manasvinām // BhKir_11.54 //
analyzed: toyāni toyarāśīnām manāṃsi ca manasvinām

original: dhārtarāṣṭraiḥ saha prītir vairam asmāsv asūyata /
analyzed: dhārtarāṣṭraiḥ saha prītiḥ vairam asmāsu asūyata

original: asanmaitrī hi doṣāya kūlacchāyeva sevitā // BhKir_11.55 //
analyzed: asat maitrī hi doṣāya kūla chāyā iva sevitā

original: apavādād abhītasya samasya guṇadoṣayoḥ /
analyzed: apavādāt abhītasya samasya guṇa doṣayoḥ

original: asadvṛtter ahovṛttaṃ durvibhāvaṃ vidher iva // BhKir_11.56 //
analyzed: asat vṛtteḥ ahovṛttam durvibhāvam vidheḥ iva

original: dhvaṃseta hṛdayaṃ sadyaḥ paribhūtasya me paraiḥ /
analyzed: dhvaṃseta hṛdayam sadyas paribhūtasya me paraiḥ

original: yady amarṣaḥ pratīkāraṃ bhujālambaṃ na lambhayet // BhKir_11.57 //
analyzed: yadi amarṣaḥ pratīkāram bhuja ālambam na lambhayet

original: avadhūyāribhir nītā hariṇais tulyavṛttitām /
analyzed: avadhūya aribhiḥ nītāḥ hariṇaiḥ tulya vṛtti tām

original: anyonyasyāpi jihrīmaḥ kiṃ punaḥ sahavāsinām // BhKir_11.58 //
analyzed: anyonyasya api jihrīmaḥ kim punar sahavāsinām

original: śaktivaikalyanamrasya niḥsāratvāl laghīyasaḥ /
analyzed: śakti vaikalya namrasya niḥsāra tvāt laghīyasaḥ

original: janmino mānahinasya tṛṇasya ca samā gatiḥ // BhKir_11.59 //
analyzed: janminaḥ māna hinasya tṛṇasya ca samā gatiḥ

original: alaṅghyaṃ tat tad udvīkṣya yad yad uccair mahībhṛtām /
analyzed: a laṅghyam tat tat udvīkṣya yat yat uccais mahībhṛtām

original: priyatāṃ jyāyasīṃ mā gān mahatāṃ kena tuṅgatā // BhKir_11.60 //
analyzed: priya tām jyāyasīm mā gāt mahatām kena tuṅga tā

original: tāvad āśrīyate lakṣmyā tāvad asya sthiraṃ yaśaḥ /
analyzed: tāvat āśrīyate lakṣmyā tāvat asya sthiram yaśaḥ

original: puruṣas tāvad evāsau yāvan mānān na hīyate // BhKir_11.61 //
analyzed: puruṣaḥ tāvat eva asau yāvat mānāt na hīyate

original: sa pumān arthavaj janmā yasya nāmni puraḥsthite /
analyzed: sa pumān arthavat janmā yasya nāmni puraḥsthite

original: nānyām aṅgulim abhyeti saṃkhyāyām udyatāṅguliḥ // BhKir_11.62 //
analyzed: na anyām aṅgulim abhyeti saṃkhyāyām udyata aṅguliḥ

original: durāsadavanajyāyān gamyas tuṅgo 'pi bhūdharaḥ /
analyzed: durāsada vana jyāyān gamyaḥ bhūdharaḥ

original: na jahāti mahaujaskaṃ mānaprāṃśum alaṅghyatā // BhKir_11.63 //
analyzed: na jahāti mahā ojaskam māna prāṃśum a laṅghya tā

original: gurūn kurvanti te vaṃśyān anvarthā tair vasuṃdharā /
analyzed: gurūn kurvanti te vaṃśyān anvarthā taiḥ vasuṃdharā

original: yeṣāṃ yaśāṃsi śubhrāṇi hrepayantīndumaṇḍalam // BhKir_11.64 //
analyzed: yeṣām yaśāṃsi śubhrāṇi hrepayanti indu maṇḍalam

original: udāharaṇam āśīḥṣu prathame te manasvinām /
analyzed: udāharaṇam āśīḥṣu prathame te manasvinām

original: śuṣke 'śanir ivāmarṣo yair arātiṣu pātyate // BhKir_11.65 //
analyzed: śuṣke śaniḥ iva amarṣaḥ yaiḥ arātiṣu pātyate

original: na sukhaṃ prārthaye nārtham udanvadvīcicañcalam /
analyzed: na sukham prārthaye na artham udanvat vīci cañcalam

original: nānityatāśanes trasyan viviktaṃ brahmaṇaḥ padam // BhKir_11.66 //
analyzed: na anitya tā aśaneḥ trasyan viviktam brahmaṇaḥ padam

original: pramārṣṭum ayaśaḥpaṅkam iccheyaṃ chadmanā kṛtam /
analyzed: pramārṣṭum ayaśaḥ paṅkam iccheyam chadmanā kṛtam

original: vaidhavyatāpitārāti- vanitālocanāmbubhiḥ // BhKir_11.67 //
analyzed: vaidhavya tāpita arāti vanitā locana ambubhiḥ

original: apahasye 'thavā sadbhiḥ pramādo vāstu me dhiyaḥ /
analyzed: apahasye sadbhiḥ pramādaḥ vā astu me dhiyaḥ

original: asthānavihitāyāsaḥ kāmaṃ jihretu vā bhavān // BhKir_11.68 //
analyzed: asthāna vihita āyāsaḥ kāmam jihretu vā bhavān

original: vaṃśalakṣmīm anuddhṛtya samucchedena vidviṣām /
analyzed: vaṃśa lakṣmīm an uddhṛtya samucchedena vidviṣām

original: nirvāṇam api manye 'ham antarāyaṃ jayaśriyaḥ // BhKir_11.69 //
analyzed: nirvāṇam api manye ham antarāyam jaya śriyaḥ

original: ajanmā puruṣas tāvad gatāsus tṛṇam eva vā /
analyzed: ajanmā puruṣaḥ tāvat gatāsuḥ tṛṇam eva vā

original: yāvan neṣubhir ādatte viluptam aribhir yaśaḥ // BhKir_11.70 //
analyzed: yāvat na iṣubhiḥ ādatte viluptam aribhiḥ yaśaḥ

original: anirjayena dviṣatāṃ yasyāmarṣaḥ praśāmyati /
analyzed: anirjayena dviṣatām yasya āmarṣaḥ praśāmyati

original: puruṣoktiḥ kathaṃ tasmin brūhi tvaṃ hi tapodhana // BhKir_11.71 //
analyzed: puruṣa uktiḥ katham tasmin brūhi tvam hi tapodhana

original: kṛtaṃ puruṣaśabdena jātimātrāvalambinā /
analyzed: kṛtam puruṣa śabdena jāti mātra avalambinā

original: yo 'ṅgīkṛtaguṇaiḥ ślāghyaḥ savismayam udāhṛtaḥ // BhKir_11.72 //
analyzed: ṅgīkṛta guṇaiḥ ślāghyaḥ sa vismayam udāhṛtaḥ

original: grasamānam ivaujāṃsi sadasā gauraveritam /
analyzed: grasamānam iva ojāṃsi sadasā gaurava īritam

original: nāma yasyābhinandanti dviṣo 'pi sa pumān pumān // BhKir_11.73 //
analyzed: nāma yasya abhinandanti dviṣaḥ pi sa pumān pumān

original: yathāpratijñaṃ dviṣatāṃ yudhi praticikīrṣayā /
analyzed: yathāpratijñam dviṣatām yudhi praticikīrṣayā

original: mamaivādhyeti nṛpatis tṛṣyann iva jalāñjaleḥ // BhKir_11.74 //
analyzed: mama eva adhyeti nṛpatiḥ tṛṣyan iva jalāñjaleḥ

original: sa vaṃśasyāvadātasya śaśāṅkasyeva lāñchanam /
analyzed: sa vaṃśasya avadātasya śaśāṅkasya iva lāñchanam

original: kṛcchreṣu vyarthayā yatra bhūyate bhartur ājñayā // BhKir_11.75 //
analyzed: kṛcchreṣu vyarthayā yatra bhūyate bhartuḥ ājñayā

original: kathaṃ vādīyatām arvāṅ munitā dharmarodhinī /
analyzed: katham vādīyatām arvāk muni tā dharma rodhinī

original: āśramānukramaḥ pūrvaiḥ smaryate na vyatikramaḥ // BhKir_11.76 //
analyzed: āśrama anukramaḥ pūrvaiḥ smaryate na vyatikramaḥ

original: āsaktā dhūr iyaṃ rūḍhā jananī dūragā ca me /
analyzed: āsaktā dhūḥ iyam rūḍhā jananī dūra gā ca me

original: tiraskaroti svātantryaṃ jyāyāṃś cācāravān nṛpaḥ // BhKir_11.77 //
analyzed: tiraskaroti svātantryam jyāyān ca ācāravān nṛpaḥ

original: svadharmam anurundhante nātikramam arātibhiḥ /
analyzed: svadharmam anurundhante na atikramam arātibhiḥ

original: palāyante kṛtadhvaṃsā nāhavān mānaśālinaḥ // BhKir_11.78 //
analyzed: palāyante kṛta dhvaṃsāḥ na āhavāt māna śālinaḥ

original: vicchinnābhravilāyaṃ vā vilīye nagamūrdhani /
analyzed: vicchinna abhra vilāyam vā vilīye naga mūrdhani

original: ārādhya vā sahasrākṣam ayaśaḥśalyam uddhare // BhKir_11.79 //
analyzed: ārādhya vā sahasrākṣam ayaśaḥ śalyam uddhare

original: ity uktavantaṃ parirabhya dorbhyāṃ tanūjam āviṣkṛtadivyamūrtiḥ /
analyzed: iti uktavantam parirabhya dorbhyām tanūjam āviṣkṛta divya mūrtiḥ

original: aghopaghātaṃ maghavā vibhūtyai bhavodbhavārādhanam ādideśa // BhKir_11.80 //
analyzed: agha upaghātam maghavā vibhūtyai bhava udbhava ārādhanam ādideśa

original: prīte pinākini mayā saha lokapālair lokatraye 'pi vihitāprativāryavīryaḥ /
analyzed: prīte pinākini mayā saha lokapālaiḥ lokatraye vihita aprativārya vīryaḥ

original: lakṣmīṃ samutsukayitāsi bhṛśaṃ pareṣām uccārya vācam iti tena tirobabhūve // BhKir_11.81 //
analyzed: lakṣmīm samutsukayitāsi bhṛśam pareṣām uccārya vācam iti tena tirobabhūve

original: atha vāsavasya vacanena ruciravadanas trilocanam /
analyzed: atha vāsavasya vacanena rucira vadanaḥ trilocanam

original: klāntirahitam abhirādhayituṃ vidhivat tapāṃsi vidadhe dhanaṃjayaḥ // BhKir_12.1 //
analyzed: klānti rahitam abhirādhayitum vidhivat tapāṃsi vidadhe dhanaṃjayaḥ

original: abhiraśmimāli vimalasya dhṛtajayadhṛter anāśuṣaḥ /
analyzed: abhi raśmi māli vimalasya dhṛta jaya dhṛteḥ an āśuṣaḥ

original: tasya bhuvi bahutithās tithayaḥ pratijagmur ekacaraṇaṃ niṣīdataḥ // BhKir_12.2 //
analyzed: tasya bhuvi bahutithāḥ tithayaḥ pratijagmuḥ eka caraṇam niṣīdataḥ

original: vapurindriyopatapaneṣu satatam asukheṣu pāṇḍavaḥ /
analyzed: vapuḥ indriya upatapaneṣu satatam asukheṣu pāṇḍavaḥ

original: vyāpa nagapatir iva sthiratāṃ mahatāṃ hi dhairyam avibhāvyavaibhavam // BhKir_12.3 //
analyzed: vyāpa nagapatiḥ iva sthira tām mahatām hi dhairyam avibhāvya vaibhavam

original: na papāta saṃnihitapakti- surabhiṣu phaleṣu mānasam /
analyzed: na papāta saṃnihita pakti surabhiṣu phaleṣu mānasam

original: tasya śucini śiśire ca payasy amṛtāyate hi sutapaḥ sukarmaṇām // BhKir_12.4 //
analyzed: tasya śucini śiśire ca payasi amṛtāyate hi su tapaḥ su karmaṇām

original: na visismiye na viṣasāda muhur alasatāṃ nu cādade /
analyzed: na visismiye na viṣasāda muhur alasa tām nu ca ādade

original: sattvam urudhṛti rajastamasī na hataḥ sma tasya hataśaktipelave // BhKir_12.5 //
analyzed: sattvam uru dhṛti rajaḥ tamasī na hataḥ sma tasya hata śakti pelave

original: tapasā kṛśaṃ vapur uvāha sa vijitajagattrayodayam /
analyzed: tapasā kṛśam vapuḥ uvāha sa vijita jagattraya udayam

original: trāsajananam api tattvavidāṃ kim ivāsti yan na sukaraṃ manasvibhiḥ // BhKir_12.6 //
analyzed: trāsa jananam api tattva vidām kim iva asti yat na sukaram manasvibhiḥ

original: jvalato 'nalād anuniśītham adhikarucir ambhasāṃ nidheḥ /
analyzed: jvalataḥ nalāt anuniśītham adhika ruciḥ ambhasām nidheḥ

original: dhairyaguṇam avajayan vijayī dadṛśe samunnatataraḥ sa śailataḥ // BhKir_12.7 //
analyzed: dhairya guṇam avajayan vijayī dadṛśe samunnatataraḥ sa śailataḥ

original: japataḥ sadā japam upāṃśu vadanam abhito visāribhiḥ /
analyzed: japataḥ sadā japam upāṃśu vadanam abhitas visāribhiḥ

original: tasya daśanakiraṇaiḥ śuśubhe pariveṣabhīṣaṇam ivārkamaṇḍalam // BhKir_12.8 //
analyzed: tasya daśana kiraṇaiḥ śuśubhe pariveṣa bhīṣaṇam iva arka maṇḍalam

original: kavacaṃ sa bibhrad upavīta- padanihitasajyakārmukaḥ /
analyzed: kavacam sa bibhrat pada nihita sajya kārmukaḥ

original: śailapatir iva mahendradhanuḥ- parivītabhīmagahano vididyute // BhKir_12.9 //
analyzed: śailapatiḥ iva mahā indradhanuḥ parivīta bhīma gahanaḥ vididyute

original: praviveśa gām iva kṛśasya niyamasavanāya gacchataḥ /
analyzed: praviveśa gām iva kṛśasya niyama savanāya gacchataḥ

original: tasya padavinamito himavān gurutāṃ nayanti hi guṇā na saṃhatiḥ // BhKir_12.10 //
analyzed: tasya padavī namitaḥ himavān guru tām nayanti hi guṇāḥ na saṃhatiḥ

original: parikīrṇam udyatabhujasya bhuvanavivare durāsadam /
analyzed: parikīrṇam udyata bhujasya bhuvana vivare durāsadam

original: jyotir upari śiraso vitataṃ jagṛhe nijān munidivaukasāṃ pathaḥ // BhKir_12.11 //
analyzed: jyotiḥ upari śirasaḥ vitatam jagṛhe nijān muni divaukasām pathaḥ

original: rajanīṣu rājatanayasya bahulasamaye 'pi dhāmabhiḥ /
analyzed: rajanīṣu rāja tanayasya bahula samaye pi dhāmabhiḥ

original: bhinnatimiranikaraṃ na jahe śaśiraśmisaṃgamayujā nabhaḥ śriyā // BhKir_12.12 //
analyzed: bhinna timira nikaram na jahe śaśi raśmi saṃgama yujā nabhaḥ śriyā

original: mahatā mayūkhanicayena śamitaruci jiṣṇujanmanā /
analyzed: mahatā mayūkha nicayena śamita ruci jiṣṇu janmanā

original: hrītam iva nabhasi vītamale na virājate sma vapur aṃśumālinaḥ // BhKir_12.13 //
analyzed: hrītam iva nabhasi vīta male na virājate sma vapuḥ aṃśumālinaḥ

original: tam udīritāruṇajaṭāṃśum adhiguṇaśarāsanaṃ janāḥ /
analyzed: tam udīrita aruṇa jaṭā aṃśum adhiguṇa śarāsanam janāḥ

original: rudram anuditalalāṭadṛśaṃ dadṛśur mimanthiṣum ivāsurīḥ purīḥ // BhKir_12.14 //
analyzed: rudram an udita lalāṭa dṛśam dadṛśuḥ mimanthiṣum iva āsurīḥ purīḥ

original: marutāṃ patiḥ svid ahimāṃśur uta pṛthuśikhaḥ śikhī tapaḥ /
analyzed: marutām patiḥ svid ahimāṃśuḥ uta pṛthu śikhaḥ śikhī tapaḥ

original: taptum asukaram upakramate na jano 'yam ity avayaye sa tāpasaiḥ // BhKir_12.15 //
analyzed: taptum asukaram upakramate na janaḥ yam iti avayaye sa tāpasaiḥ

original: na dadāha bhūruhavanāni haritanayadhāma dūragam /
analyzed: na dadāha bhūruha vanāni hari tanaya dhāma dūra gam

original: na sma nayati pariśoṣam apaḥ susahaṃ babhūva na ca siddhatāpasaiḥ // BhKir_12.16 //
analyzed: na sma nayati pariśoṣam apaḥ su saham babhūva na ca siddha tāpasaiḥ

original: vinayaṃ guṇā iva vivekam apanayabhidaṃ nayā iva /
analyzed: vinayam guṇāḥ iva vivekam apanaya bhidam nayāḥ iva

original: nyāyam avadhaya ivāśaraṇāḥ śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ śivam atho maharṣayaḥ // BhKir_12.17 //
analyzed: nyāyam avadhayaḥ iva aśaraṇāḥ śaraṇam yayuḥ śivam atho mahā ṛṣayaḥ

original: parivītam aṃśubhir udasta- dinakaramayūkhamaṇḍalaiḥ /
analyzed: parivītam aṃśubhiḥ udasta dinakara mayūkha maṇḍalaiḥ

original: śambhum upahatadṛśaḥ sahasā na ca te nicāyitum abhiprasehire // BhKir_12.18 //
analyzed: śambhum upahata dṛśaḥ sahasā na ca te nicāyitum abhiprasehire

original: atha bhūtabhavyabhavadīśam abhimukhayituṃ kṛtastavāḥ /
analyzed: atha bhūta bhavya bhavat īśam abhimukhayitum kṛta stavāḥ

original: tatra mahasi dadṛśuḥ puruṣaṃ kamanīyavigraham ayugmalocanam // BhKir_12.19 //
analyzed: tatra mahasi dadṛśuḥ puruṣam kamanīya vigraham ayugmalocanam

original: kakude vṛṣasya kṛtabāhum akṛśapariṇāhaśālini /
analyzed: kakude vṛṣasya kṛta bāhum a kṛśa pariṇāha śālini

original: sparśasukham anubhavantam umā- kucayugmamaṇḍala ivārdracandane // BhKir_12.20 //
analyzed: sparśa sukham anubhavantam umā kuca yugma maṇḍale iva ārdra candane

original: sthitam unnate tuhinaśaila- śirasi bhuvanātivartinā /
analyzed: sthitam unnate tuhina śaila śirasi bhuvana ativartinā

original: sādrijaladhijalavāhapathaṃ sadigaśnuvānam iva viśvam ojasā // BhKir_12.21 //
analyzed: sa adri jaladhi jala vāha patham sa diś aśnuvānam iva viśvam ojasā

original: anujānumadhyamavasakta- vitatavapuṣā mahāhinā /
analyzed: anu jānu madhyam avasakta vitata vapuṣā mahā ahinā

original: lokam akhilam iva bhūmibhṛtā ravitejasām avadhinādhiveṣṭitam // BhKir_12.22 //
analyzed: lokam akhilam iva bhūmi bhṛtā ravi tejasām avadhinā adhiveṣṭitam

original: pariṇāhinā tuhinarāśi- viśadam upavītasūtratām /
analyzed: pariṇāhinā tuhina rāśi viśadam upavīta sūtra tām

original: nītam uragam anurañjayatā śitinā galena vilasanmarīcinā // BhKir_12.23 //
analyzed: nītam uragam anurañjayatā śitinā galena vilasat marīcinā

original: plutamālatīsitakapāla- kamudam uparuddhamūrdhajam /
analyzed: pluta mālatī sita kapāla ka mudam uparuddha mūrdhajam

original: śeṣam iva surasaritpayasāṃ śirasā visāri śaśidhāma bibhratam // BhKir_12.24 //
analyzed: śeṣam iva surasarit payasām śirasā visāri śaśi dhāma bibhratam

original: munayas tato 'bhimukham etya nayanavinimeṣanoditāḥ /
analyzed: munayaḥ tatas abhimukham etya nayana vinimeṣa noditāḥ

original: pāṇḍutanayatapasā janitaṃ jagatām aśarma bhṛśam ācacakṣire // BhKir_12.25 //
analyzed: pāṇḍu tanaya tapasā janitam jagatām a śarma bhṛśam ācacakṣire

original: tarasaiva ko 'pi bhuvanaika- puruṣa puruṣas tapasyati /
analyzed: tarasā eva kaḥ pi bhuvana eka puruṣa puruṣaḥ tapasyati

original: jyotiramalavapuṣo 'pi raver abhibhūya vṛtra iva bhīmavigrahaḥ // BhKir_12.26 //
analyzed: jyotiḥ amala vapuṣaḥ pi raveḥ abhibhūya vṛtraḥ iva bhīma vigrahaḥ

original: sa dhanurmaheṣudhi nibharti kavacam asitam uttamaṃ jaṭāḥ /
analyzed: sa dhanuḥ mahā iṣudhi nibharti kavacam asitam uttamam jaṭāḥ

original: valkam ajinam iti citram idaṃ munitāvirodhi na ca nāsya rājate // BhKir_12.27 //
analyzed: valkam ajinam iti citram idam muni tā virodhi na ca nā asya rājate

original: calane 'vaniś calati tasya karaṇaniyame sadiṅmukham /
analyzed: calane vaniḥ calati tasya karaṇa niyame sa diṅmukham

original: stambham anubhavati śāntamarud- grahatārakāgaṇayutaṃ nabhastalam // BhKir_12.28 //
analyzed: stambham anubhavati śānta marut graha tārakā gaṇa yutam nabhastalam

original: sa tadojasā vijitasāram amaraditijopasaṃhitam /
analyzed: sa tat ojasā vijita sāram amara ditija upasaṃhitam

original: viśvam idam apidadhāti purā kim ivāsti yan na tapasām aduṣkaram // BhKir_12.29 //
analyzed: viśvam idam apidadhāti purā kim iva asti yat na tapasām a duṣkaram

original: vijigīṣate yadi jaganti yugapad atha saṃjihīrṣati /
analyzed: vijigīṣate yadi jaganti yugapad atha saṃjihīrṣati

original: prāptum abhavam abhivāñchati vā vayam asya no viṣahituṃ kṣamā rucaḥ // BhKir_12.30 //
analyzed: prāptum abhavam abhivāñchati vā vayam asya naḥ viṣahitum kṣamāḥ rucaḥ

original: kim upekṣase kathaya nātha na tava viditaṃ na kiṃcana /
analyzed: kim upekṣase kathaya nātha na tava viditam na kiṃcana

original: trātum alam abhayadārhasi nas tvayi mā sma śāsati bhavatparābhavaḥ // BhKir_12.31 //
analyzed: trātum alam abhaya da arhasi naḥ tvayi mā sma śāsati bhavat parābhavaḥ

original: iti gāṃ vidhāya virateṣu muniṣu vacanaṃ samādade /
analyzed: iti gām vidhāya virateṣu muniṣu vacanam samādade

original: bhinnajaladhijalanādaguru dhvanayan diśāṃ vivaram andhakāntakaḥ // BhKir_12.32 //
analyzed: bhinna jaladhi jala nāda guru dhvanayan diśām vivaram andhaka antakaḥ

original: badarītapovananivāsa- niratam avagāta mānyathā /
analyzed: badarī tapovana nivāsa niratam avagāta mā anyathā

original: dhātur udayanidhane jagatāṃ naram aṃśam ādipuruṣasya gāṃ gatam // BhKir_12.33 //
analyzed: dhātuḥ udaya nidhane jagatām naram aṃśam ādi puruṣasya gām gatam

original: dviṣataḥ parāsisiṣur eṣa sakalabhuvanābhitāpinaḥ /
analyzed: dviṣataḥ parāsisiṣuḥ eṣa sakala bhuvana abhitāpinaḥ

original: krāntakuliśakaravīryabalān madupāsanaṃ vihitavān mahat tapaḥ // BhKir_12.34 //
analyzed: krānta kuliśa kara vīrya balān mad upāsanam vihitavān mahat tapaḥ

original: ayam acyutaś ca vacanena sarasiruhajanmanaḥ prajāḥ /
analyzed: ayam acyutaḥ ca vacanena sarasiruha janmanaḥ prajāḥ

original: pātum asuranidhanena vibhū bhuvam abhyupetya manujeṣu tiṣṭhataḥ // BhKir_12.35 //
analyzed: pātum asura nidhanena vibhū bhuvam abhyupetya manujeṣu tiṣṭhataḥ

original: surakṛtyam etad avagamya nipuṇam iti mūkadānavaḥ /
analyzed: sura kṛtyam etat avagamya nipuṇam iti mūka dānavaḥ

original: hantum abhipatati pāṇḍusutaṃ tvarayā tad atra saha gamyatāṃ mayā // BhKir_12.36 //
analyzed: hantum abhipatati pāṇḍu sutam tvarayā tat atra saha gamyatām mayā

original: vivare 'pi nainam anigūḍham abhibhavitum eṣa pārayan /
analyzed: vivare pi na enam a nigūḍham abhibhavitum eṣa pārayan

original: pāpaniratir aviśaṅkitayā vijayaṃ vyavasyati varāhamāyayā // BhKir_12.37 //
analyzed: pāpa niratiḥ a viśaṅkitayā vijayam vyavasyati varāha māyayā

original: nihate viḍambitakirāta- nṛpativapuṣā ripau mayā /
analyzed: nihate viḍambita kirāta nṛpati vapuṣā ripau mayā

original: muktaniśitaviśikhaḥ prasabhaṃ mṛgayāvivādam ayam ācariṣyati // BhKir_12.38 //
analyzed: mukta niśita viśikhaḥ prasabham mṛgayā vivādam ayam ācariṣyati

original: tapasā nipīḍitakṛśasya virahitasahāyasampadaḥ /
analyzed: tapasā nipīḍita kṛśasya virahita sahāya sampadaḥ

original: sattvavihitam atulaṃ bhujayor balam asya paśyata mṛdhe 'dhikupyataḥ // BhKir_12.39 //
analyzed: sattva vihitam atulam bhujayoḥ balam asya paśyata mṛdhe dhi kupyataḥ

original: iti tān udāram anunīya viṣamaharicandanālinā /
analyzed: iti tān udāram anunīya viṣama haricandana ālinā

original: gharmajanitapulakena lasad- gajamauktikāvaliguṇena vakṣasā // BhKir_12.40 //
analyzed: gharma janita pulakena lasat gaja mauktika āvali guṇena vakṣasā

original: vadanena puṣpitalatānta- niyamitavilambitamaulinā /
analyzed: vadanena puṣpita latā anta niyamita vilambita maulinā

original: bibhrad aruṇanayanena rucaṃ śikhipicchalāñchitakapolabhittinā // BhKir_12.41 //
analyzed: bibhrat aruṇa nayanena rucam śikhi piccha lāñchita kapolabhittinā

original: bṛhadudvahañ jaladanādi dhanur upahitaikamārgaṇam /
analyzed: bṛhat udvaham jalada nādi dhanuḥ upahita eka mārgaṇam

original: meghanicaya iva saṃvavṛte ruciraḥ kirātapṛtanāpatiḥ śivaḥ // BhKir_12.42 //
analyzed: megha nicayaḥ iva saṃvavṛte ruciraḥ kirāta pṛtanāpatiḥ śivaḥ

original: anukūlam asya ca vicintya gaṇapatibhir āttavigrahaiḥ /
analyzed: anukūlam asya ca vicintya gaṇa patibhiḥ ātta vigrahaiḥ

original: śūlaparaśuśaracāpabhṛtair mahatī vanecaracamūr vinirmame // BhKir_12.43 //
analyzed: śūla paraśu śara cāpa bhṛtaiḥ mahatī vanecara camūḥ vinirmame

original: viracayya kānanavibhāgam anugiram atheśvarājñayā /
analyzed: viracayya kānana vibhāgam anugiram atha īśvara ājñayā

original: bhīmaninadapihitorubhuvaḥ parito 'padiśya mṛgayāṃ pratasthire // BhKir_12.44 //
analyzed: bhīma ninada pihita uru bhuvaḥ upadiśya mṛgayām pratasthire

original: kṣubhitābhiniḥsṛtavibhinna- śakunimṛgayūthaniḥsvanaiḥ /
analyzed: kṣubhita abhiniḥsṛta vibhinna śakuni mṛga yūtha niḥsvanaiḥ

original: pūrṇapṛthuvanaguhāvivaraḥ sahasā bhayād iva rarāsa bhūdharaḥ // BhKir_12.45 //
analyzed: pūrṇa pṛthu vana guhā vivaraḥ sahasā bhayāt iva rarāsa bhūdharaḥ

original: na virodhinī ruṣam iyāya pathi mṛgavihaṅgasaṃhatiḥ /
analyzed: na virodhinī ruṣam iyāya pathi mṛga vihaṅga saṃhatiḥ

original: ghnanti sahajam api bhūribhiyaḥ samam āgatāḥ sapadi vairam āpadaḥ // BhKir_12.46 //
analyzed: ghnanti sahajam api bhūri bhiyaḥ samam āgatāḥ sapadi vairam āpadaḥ

original: camarīgaṇair gaṇabalasya balavati bhaye 'py upasthite /
analyzed: camarī gaṇaiḥ gaṇa balasya balavati bhaye pi upasthite

original: vaṃśavitatiṣu viṣaktapṛthu- priyabālavāladhibhir ādade dhṛtiḥ // BhKir_12.47 //
analyzed: vaṃśa vitatiṣu viṣakta pṛthu priya bāla vāladhibhiḥ ādade dhṛtiḥ

original: harasainikāḥ pratibhaye 'pi gajamadasugandhikesaraiḥ /
analyzed: hara sainikāḥ pratibhaye gaja mada sugandhi kesaraiḥ

original: svastham abhidadṛśire sahasā pratibodhajṛmbhamukhair mṛgādhipaiḥ // BhKir_12.48 //
analyzed: svastham abhidadṛśire sahasā pratibodha jṛmbha mukhaiḥ mṛgādhipaiḥ

original: bibharāṃbabhūvur apavṛtta- jaṭharaśapharīkulākulāḥ /
analyzed: bibharāṃbabhūvuḥ apavṛtta jaṭhara śapharī kula ākulāḥ

original: paṅkaviṣamitataṭāḥ saritaḥ karirugṇacandanarasāruṇaṃ payaḥ // BhKir_12.49 //
analyzed: paṅka viṣamita taṭāḥ saritaḥ kari rugṇa candana rasa aruṇam payaḥ

original: mahiṣakṣatāgurutamāla- naladasurabhiḥ sadāgatiḥ /
analyzed: mahiṣa kṣata aguru tamāla nalada surabhiḥ sadāgatiḥ

original: vyastaśukanibhaśilākusumaḥ praṇudan vavau vanasadāṃ pariśramam // BhKir_12.50 //
analyzed: vyasta śuka nibha śilā kusumaḥ praṇudan vavau vanasadām pariśramam

original: mathitāmbhaso rayavikīrṇa- mṛditakadalīgavedhukāḥ /
analyzed: mathita ambhasaḥ raya vikīrṇa mṛdita kadalī gavedhukāḥ

original: klāntajalaruhalatāḥ sarasīr vidadhe nidāgha iva sattvasamplavaḥ // BhKir_12.51 //
analyzed: klānta jalaruha latāḥ sarasīḥ vidadhe nidāghaḥ iva sattva samplavaḥ

original: iti cālayann acalasānu- vanagahanajān umāpatiḥ /
analyzed: iti cālayan acala sānu vana gahana jān umāpatiḥ

original: prāpa muditahariṇīdaśana- kṣatavīrudhaṃ vasatim aindrasūnavīm // BhKir_12.52 //
analyzed: prāpa mudita hariṇī daśana kṣata vīrudham vasatim aindrasūnavīm

original: sa tam āsasāda ghananīlam abhimukham upasthitaṃ muneḥ /
analyzed: sa tam āsasāda ghana nīlam abhimukham upasthitam muneḥ

original: pitranikaṣaṇavibhinnabhuvaṃ danujaṃ dadhānam atha saukaraṃ vapuḥ // BhKir_12.53 //
analyzed: danujam dadhānam atha saukaram vapuḥ

original: kacchānte surasarito nidhāya senām anvatiḥ sakatipayaiḥ kirātavaryaiḥ /
analyzed: kaccha ante surasaritaḥ nidhāya senām sa katipayaiḥ kirāta varyaiḥ

original: pracchannas tarugahanaiḥ sagulmajālair lakṣmīvān anupadam asya sampratasthe // BhKir_12.54 //
analyzed: pracchannaḥ taru gahanaiḥ sa gulma jālaiḥ lakṣmīvān anupadam asya sampratasthe

original: vapuṣāṃ parameṇa bhūdharāṇām atha sambhāvyaparākramaṃ vibhede /
analyzed: vapuṣām parameṇa bhūdharāṇām atha sambhāvya parākramam vibhede

original: mṛgam āśu vilokayāṃcakāra sthiradaṃṣṭrogramukhaṃ mahendrasūnuḥ // BhKir_13.1 //
analyzed: mṛgam āśu vilokayāṃcakāra sthira daṃṣṭra ugra mukham mahā indra sūnuḥ

original: sphuṭabaddhasaṭonnatiḥ sa dūrād abhidhāvann avadhīritānyakṛtyaḥ /
analyzed: sphuṭa baddha saṭā unnatiḥ sa dūrāt abhidhāvan avadhīrita anya kṛtyaḥ

original: jayam icchati tasya jātaśaṅke manasīmaṃ muhur ādade vitarkam // BhKir_13.2 //
analyzed: jayam icchati tasya jāta śaṅke manasi imam muhur ādade vitarkam

original: ghanapotravidīrṇaśālamūlo nibiḍaskandhanikāṣarugṇavapraḥ /
analyzed: ghana potra vidīrṇa śāla mūlaḥ nibiḍa skandha nikāṣa rugṇa vapraḥ

original: ayam ekacaro 'bhivartate māṃ samarāyeva samājuhūṣamāṇaḥ // BhKir_13.3 //
analyzed: ayam ekacaraḥ bhivartate mām samarāya iva samājuhūṣamāṇaḥ

original: iha vītabhayās taponubhāvāj jahati vyālamṛgāḥ pareṣu vṛttim /
analyzed: iha vīta bhayāḥ tapaḥ nubhāvāt jahati vyāla mṛgāḥ pareṣu vṛttim

original: mayi tāṃ sutarām ayaṃ vidhatte vikṛtiḥ kiṃ nu bhaved iyaṃ nu māyā // BhKir_13.4 //
analyzed: mayi tām sutarām ayam vidhatte vikṛtiḥ kim nu bhavet iyam nu māyā

original: athavaiṣa kṛtajñayeva pūrvaṃ bhṛśam āsevitayā ruṣā na muktaḥ /
analyzed: athavā eṣa kṛtajñayā iva pūrvam bhṛśam āsevitayā ruṣā na muktaḥ

original: avadhūya virodhinīḥ kim ārān mṛgajātīr abhiyāti māṃ javena // BhKir_13.5 //
analyzed: avadhūya virodhinīḥ kim ārāt mṛga jātīḥ abhiyāti mām javena

original: na mṛgaḥ khalu ko 'py ayaṃ jighāṃsuḥ skhalati hy atra tathā bhṛśaṃ mano me /
analyzed: na mṛgaḥ khalu kaḥ pi ayam jighāṃsuḥ skhalati hi atra tathā bhṛśam manaḥ me

original: vimalaṃ kaluṣībhavac ca cetaḥ kathayaty eva hitaiṣiṇaṃ ripuṃ vā // BhKir_13.6 //
analyzed: vimalam kaluṣībhavat ca cetaḥ kathayati eva hita eṣiṇam ripum vā

original: munir asmi nirāgasaḥ kuto me bhayam ity eṣa na bhūtaye 'bhimānaḥ /
analyzed: muniḥ asmi nirāgasaḥ kutas me bhayam iti eṣa na bhūtaye bhimānaḥ

original: paravṛddhiṣu baddhamatsarāṇāṃ kim iva hy asti durātmanām alaṅghyam // BhKir_13.7 //
analyzed: para vṛddhiṣu baddha matsarāṇām kim iva hi asti durātmanām a laṅghyam

original: danujaḥ svid ayaṃ kṣapācaro vā vanaje neti balaṃ bad asti sattve /
analyzed: danujaḥ svid ayam kṣapācaraḥ vā vana je nā iti balam asti sattve

original: abhibhūya tathā hi meghanīlaḥ sakalaṃ kampayatīva śailarājam // BhKir_13.8 //
analyzed: abhibhūya tathā hi megha nīlaḥ sakalam kampayati iva śailarājam

original: ayam eva mṛgavyasattrakāmaḥ prahariṣyan mayi māyayā śamasthe /
analyzed: ayam eva mṛgavya sattra kāmaḥ prahariṣyan mayi māyayā śama sthe

original: pṛthubhir dhvajinīsravair akārṣīc cakitodbhrāntamṛgāṇi kānanāni // BhKir_13.9 //
analyzed: pṛthubhiḥ dhvajinī sravaiḥ akārṣīt cakita udbhrānta mṛgāṇi kānanāni

original: bahuśaḥ kṛtasatkṛter vidhātuṃ priyam icchann athavā suyodhanasya /
analyzed: bahuśas kṛta satkṛteḥ vidhātum priyam icchan athavā suyodhanasya

original: kṣubhitaṃ vanagocarābhiyogād gaṇam āśiśriyad ākulaṃ tiraścām // BhKir_13.10 //
analyzed: kṣubhitam vana gocara abhiyogāt gaṇam āśiśriyat ākulam tiraścām

original: avalīḍhasanābhir aśvasenaḥ prasabhaṃ khāṇḍavajātavedasā vā /
analyzed: avalīḍha sanābhiḥ aśvasenaḥ prasabham khāṇḍava jātavedasā vā

original: pratikartum upāgataḥ samanyuḥ kṛtamanyur yadi vā vṛkodareṇa // BhKir_13.11 //
analyzed: pratikartum upāgataḥ sa manyuḥ kṛta manyuḥ yadi vā vṛkodareṇa

original: balaśālitayā yathā tathā vā dhiyam ucchedaparāmayaṃ dadhānaḥ /
analyzed: bala śāli tayā yathā tathā vā dhiyam uccheda para āmayam dadhānaḥ

original: niyamena mayā nibarhaṇīyaḥ paramaṃ lābham arātibhaṅgam āhuḥ // BhKir_13.12 //
analyzed: niyamena mayā paramam lābham arāti bhaṅgam āhuḥ

original: kuru tāta tapāṃsy amārgadāyī vijayāyety alam anvaśān munir mām /
analyzed: kuru tāta tapāṃsi amārga dāyī vijayāya iti alam anvaśāt muniḥ mām

original: balinaś ca vadhād ṛte 'sya śakyaṃ vrasaṃrakṣaṇam anyathā na kartum // BhKir_13.13 //
analyzed: balinaḥ ca vadhāt ṛte sya śakyam vra saṃrakṣaṇam anyathā na kartum

original: iti tena vicintya cāpanāma prathamaṃ pauruṣacihnam ālalambe /
analyzed: iti tena vicintya cāpa nāma prathamam pauruṣa cihnam ālalambe

original: upalabdhaguṇaḥ parasya bhede sacivaḥ śuddha ivādade ca bāṇaḥ // BhKir_13.14 //
analyzed: upalabdha guṇaḥ parasya bhede sacivaḥ śuddhaḥ iva ādade ca bāṇaḥ

original: anubhāvavatā guru sthiratvād avisaṃvādi dhanur dhanaṃjayena /
analyzed: anubhāvavatā guru sthira tvāt avisaṃvādi dhanuḥ dhanaṃjayena

original: svabalavyasane 'pi pīḍyamānaṃ guṇavan mitram ivānatiṃ prapede // BhKir_13.15 //
analyzed: sva bala vyasane pi pīḍyamānam guṇavat mitram iva ānatim prapede

original: pravikarṣaninādabhinnarandhraḥ padaviṣṭambhanipīḍitas tadānīm /
analyzed: pravikarṣa nināda bhinna randhraḥ pada viṣṭambha nipīḍitaḥ tadānīm

original: adhirohati gāṇḍivaṃ maheṣau sakalaḥ saṃśayam āruroha śailaḥ // BhKir_13.16 //
analyzed: adhirohati gāṇḍivam mahā iṣau sakalaḥ saṃśayam āruroha śailaḥ

original: dadṛśe 'tha savismayaṃ śivena sthirapūrṇāyatacāpamaṇḍalasthaḥ /
analyzed: dadṛśe tha sa vismayam śivena sthira pūrṇa āyata cāpa maṇḍala sthaḥ

original: racitas tisṛṇāṃ purāṃ vidhātuṃ vadham ātmeva bhayānakaḥ pareṣām // BhKir_13.17 //
analyzed: racitaḥ tisṛṇām purām vidhātum vadham ātmā iva bhayānakaḥ pareṣām

original: vicakarṣa ca saṃhiteṣur uccaiś caraṇāskandananāmitācalendraḥ /
analyzed: vicakarṣa ca saṃhita iṣuḥ uccais caraṇa āskandana nāmita acala indraḥ

original: dhanurāyatabhogavāsukijyā- vadanagranthivimuktavahni śambhuḥ // BhKir_13.18 //
analyzed: dhanuḥ āyata bhoga vāsuki jyāḥ vadana granthi vimukta vahni śambhuḥ

original: sa bhavasya bhavakṣayaikahetoḥ sitasapteś ca vidhāsyatoḥ sahārtham /
analyzed: sa bhavasya bhava kṣaya eka hetoḥ sitasapteḥ ca vidhāsyatoḥ saha artham

original: ripur āpa parābhavāya madhyaṃ prakṛtipratyayayor ivānubandhaḥ // BhKir_13.19 //
analyzed: ripuḥ āpa parābhavāya madhyam prakṛti pratyayayoḥ iva anubandhaḥ

original: atha dīpitavārivāhavartmā ravavitrāsitavāraṇād avāryaḥ /
analyzed: atha dīpita vārivāha vartmā rava vitrāsita vāraṇāt avāryaḥ

original: nipapāta javādiṣu pinākān mahato 'bhrād iva vaidyutaḥ kṛśānuḥ // BhKir_13.20 //
analyzed: nipapāta java ādiṣu pinākāt mahataḥ iva vaidyutaḥ kṛśānuḥ

original: vrajato 'sya bṛhat patattrajanmā kṛtatārkṣyopanipātavegaśaṅkaḥ /
analyzed: vrajataḥ sya bṛhat patattra janmā kṛta tārkṣya upanipāta vega śaṅkaḥ

original: pratinādamahān mahoragāṇāṃ hṛdayaśrotrabhid utpapāta nādaḥ // BhKir_13.21 //
analyzed: pratināda mahān mahā uragāṇām hṛdaya śrotra bhid utpapāta nādaḥ

original: nayanād iva śūlinaḥ pravṛttair manaso 'py āśutaraṃ yataḥ piśaṅgaiḥ /
analyzed: nayanāt iva śūlinaḥ pravṛttaiḥ manasaḥ u pi āśutaram yatas piśaṅgaiḥ

original: vidadhe vilasattaḍillatābhaiḥ kiraṇair vyomani mārgaṇasya mārgaḥ // BhKir_13.22 //
analyzed: vidadhe vilasat taḍit latā ābhaiḥ kiraṇaiḥ vyomani mārgaṇasya mārgaḥ

original: apayan dhanuṣaḥ śivāntikasthair vivaresadbhir abhikhyayā jihānaḥ /
analyzed: apayan dhanuṣaḥ śiva antika sthaiḥ vivaresadbhiḥ abhikhyayā jihānaḥ

original: yugapad dadṛśe viśan varāhaṃ tadupoḍhaiś ca nabhaścaraiḥ pṛṣatkaḥ // BhKir_13.23 //
analyzed: yugapad dadṛśe viśan varāham tad upoḍhaiḥ ca nabhaḥ caraiḥ pṛṣatkaḥ

original: sa tamālanibhe ripau surāṇāṃ ghananīhāra ivāviṣaktavegaḥ /
analyzed: sa tamāla nibhe ripau surāṇām ghana nīhāraḥ iva a viṣakta vegaḥ

original: bhayaviplutam īkṣito nabhaḥsthair jagatīṃ grāha ivāpagāṃ jagāhe // BhKir_13.24 //
analyzed: bhaya viplutam īkṣitaḥ nabhaḥ sthaiḥ jagatīm grāhaḥ iva āpagām jagāhe

original: sapadi priyarūpaparvarekhaḥ sitalohāgranakhaḥ kham āsasāda /
analyzed: sapadi priya rūpa parva rekhaḥ sita loha agra nakhaḥ kham āsasāda

original: kupitāntakatarjanāṅguliśrīr vyathayan prāṇabhṛtaḥ kapidhvajeṣu // BhKir_13.25 //
analyzed: kupita antaka tarjana aṅguli śrīḥ vyathayan prāṇabhṛtaḥ kapidhvajeṣu

original: paramāstraparigrahorutejaḥ sphuradulkākṛti vikṣipan vaneṣu /
analyzed: parama astra parigraha uru tejaḥ sphurat ulkā ākṛti vikṣipan vaneṣu

original: sa javena patan paraḥśatānāṃ patatāṃ vrāta ivāravaṃ vitene // BhKir_13.26 //
analyzed: sa javena patan paraḥśatānām patatām vrāte iva āravam vitene

original: avibhāvitaniṣkramaprayāṇaḥ śamitāyāma ivātiraṃhasā saḥ /
analyzed: a vibhāvita niṣkrama prayāṇaḥ śamita āyāmaḥ iva ati raṃhasā saḥ

original: saha pūrvataraṃ nu cittavṛtter apatitvā nu cakāra lakṣyabhedam // BhKir_13.27 //
analyzed: saha pūrvataram nu citta vṛtteḥ a patitvā nu cakāra lakṣya bhedam

original: sa vṛṣadhvajasāyakāvabhinnaṃ jayahetuḥ pratikāyam eṣaṇīyam /
analyzed: sa vṛṣadhvaja sāyaka avabhinnam jaya hetuḥ pratikāyam eṣaṇīyam

original: laghu sādhayituṃ śaraḥ prasehe vidhinevārtham udīritaṃ prayatnaḥ // BhKir_13.28 //
analyzed: laghu sādhayitum śaraḥ prasehe vidhinā iva artham udīritam prayatnaḥ

original: avivekavṛthāśramāv ivārthaṃ kṣayalobhāv iva saṃśritānurāgam /
analyzed: a viveka vṛthak śramau iva artham kṣaya lobhau iva saṃśrita anurāgam

original: vijigīṣum ivānayapramādāv avasādaṃ viśikhau vininyatus tam // BhKir_13.29 //
analyzed: vijigīṣum iva anaya pramādau avasādam viśikhau vininyatuḥ tam

original: atha dīrghatamaṃ tamaḥ pravekṣyan sahasā rugṇrayaḥ sa sambhrameṇa /
analyzed: atha dīrghatamam tamaḥ pravekṣyan sahasā sa sambhrameṇa

original: nipatantam ivoṣṇaraśmim urvyāṃ valayībhūtataruṃ dharāṃ ca mene // BhKir_13.30 //
analyzed: nipatantam iva uṣṇaraśmim urvyām valayībhūta tarum dharām ca mene

original: sa gataḥ kṣitim uṣṇaśoṇitārdraḥ khuradaṃṣṭrāgranipātadāritāśmā /
analyzed: sa gataḥ kṣitim uṣṇa śoṇita ārdraḥ khura daṃṣṭra agra nipāta dārita aśmā

original: asubhiḥ kṣaṇam īkṣitendrasūnir vihitāmarṣagurudhvanir nirāse // BhKir_13.31 //
analyzed: asubhiḥ kṣaṇam īkṣita indrasūniḥ vihita amarṣa guru dhvaniḥ nirāse

original: sphuṭapauruṣam āpapāta pārthas tam atha prājyaśaraḥ śaraṃ jighṛkṣuḥ /
analyzed: sphuṭa pauruṣam āpapāta pārthaḥ tam atha prājya śaraḥ śaram jighṛkṣuḥ

original: na tathā kṛtavedināṃ kariṣyan priyatām eti yathā kṛtāvadānaḥ // BhKir_13.32 //
analyzed: na tathā kṛtavedinām kariṣyan priya tām eti yathā kṛta avadānaḥ

original: upakāra ivāsati prayuktaḥ sthitim aprāpya mṛge gataḥ praṇāśam /
analyzed: upakāre iva asati prayuktaḥ sthitim a prāpya mṛge gataḥ praṇāśam

original: kṛtaśaktir avāṅmukho gurutvāj janitavrīḍa ivātmapauruṣeṇa // BhKir_13.33 //
analyzed: kṛta śaktiḥ avāṅmukhaḥ guru tvāt janita vrīḍaḥ iva ātma pauruṣeṇa

original: sa samuddharatā vicintya tena svarucaṃ kīrtim ivottamāṃ dadhānaḥ /
analyzed: sa samuddharatā vicintya tena sva rucam kīrtim iva uttamām dadhānaḥ

original: anuyukta iva svavārtam uccaiḥ parirebhe nu bhṛśaṃ vilocanābhyām // BhKir_13.34 //
analyzed: anuyuktaḥ iva sva vārtam uccais parirebhe nu bhṛśam vilocanābhyām

original: tatra kārmukabhṛtaṃ mahābhujaḥ paśyati sma sahasā vanecaram /
analyzed: tatra kārmuka bhṛtam mahā bhujaḥ paśyati sma sahasā vanecaram

original: saṃnikāśayitum agrataḥ sthitaṃ śāsanaṃ kusumacāpavidviṣaḥ // BhKir_13.35 //
analyzed: saṃnikāśayitum agratas sthitam śāsanam kusuma cāpa vidviṣaḥ

original: sa prayujya tanaye mahīpater ātmajātisadṛśīṃ kilānatim /
analyzed: sa prayujya tanaye mahīpateḥ ātma jāti sadṛśīm kila ānatim

original: sāntvapūrvam abhinītihetukaṃ vaktum ittham upacakrame vacaḥ // BhKir_13.36 //
analyzed: sāntva pūrvam abhinīti hetukam vaktum ittham upacakrame vacaḥ

original: śāntatā vinayayogi mānasaṃ bhūridhāma vimalaṃ tapaḥ śrutam /
analyzed: śānta tā vinaya yogi mānasam bhūri dhāma vimalam tapaḥ śrutam

original: prāha te nu sadṛśī divaukasām anvavāyam avadātam ākṛtiḥ // BhKir_13.37 //
analyzed: prāha te nu sadṛśī divaukasām anvavāyam avadātam ākṛtiḥ

original: dīpitas tvam anubhāvasampadā gauraveṇa laghayan mahībhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: dīpitaḥ tvam anubhāva sampadā gauraveṇa laghayan mahībhṛtaḥ

original: rājase munir apīha kārayann ādhipatyam iva śātamanyavam // BhKir_13.38 //
analyzed: rājase muniḥ api iha kārayan ādhipatyam iva śātamanyavam

original: tāpaso 'pi vibhutām upeyivān āspadaṃ tvam asi sarvasampadām /
analyzed: tāpasaḥ u pi vibhu tām upeyivān āspadam tvam asi sarva sampadām

original: dṛśyate hi bhavato vinā janair anvitasya sacivair iva dyutiḥ // BhKir_13.39 //
analyzed: dṛśyate hi bhavataḥ vinā janaiḥ anvitasya sacivaiḥ iva dyutiḥ

original: vismayaḥ ka iva vā jayaśriyā naiva muktir api te davīyasī /
analyzed: vismayaḥ kaḥ iva vā jaya śriyā nā eva muktiḥ api te davīyasī

original: īpsitasya na bhaved upāśrayaḥ kasya nirjitarajastamoguṇaḥ // BhKir_13.40 //
analyzed: īpsitasya na bhavet upāśrayaḥ kasya nirjita rajaḥ tamaḥ guṇaḥ

original: hrepayann ahimatejasaṃ tviṣā sa tvam ittham upapannapauruṣaḥ /
analyzed: hrepayan a hima tejasam tviṣā sa tvam ittham upapanna pauruṣaḥ

original: hartum arhasi varāhabhedinaṃ nainam asmadadhipasya sāyakam // BhKir_13.41 //
analyzed: hartum arhasi varāha bhedinam na enam asmad adhipasya sāyakam

original: smaryate tanubhṛtāṃ sanātanaṃ nyāyyam ācaritam uttamair nṛbhiḥ /
analyzed: smaryate tanubhṛtām sanātanam nyāyyam ācaritam uttamaiḥ nṛbhiḥ

original: dhvaṃsate yadi bhavādṛśas tataḥ kaḥ prayātu vada tena vartmanā // BhKir_13.42 //
analyzed: dhvaṃsate yadi bhavādṛśaḥ tatas kaḥ prayātu vada tena vartmanā

original: ākumāram upadeṣṭum icchavaḥ saṃnivṛttim apathān mahāpadaḥ /
analyzed: ākumāram upadeṣṭum icchavaḥ saṃnivṛttim apathāt mahā padaḥ

original: yogaśaktijitajanmamṛtyavaḥ śīlayanti yatayaḥ suśīlatām // BhKir_13.43 //
analyzed: yoga śakti jita janma mṛtyavaḥ śīlayanti yatayaḥ su śīla tām

original: tiṣṭhatāṃ tapasi puṇyam āsajan sampado 'nuguṇayan sukhaiṣiṇām /
analyzed: tiṣṭhatām tapasi puṇyam āsajan sampadaḥ nuguṇayan sukha eṣiṇām

original: yogināṃ pariṇaman vimuktaye kena nāstu vinayaḥ satāṃ priyaḥ // BhKir_13.44 //
analyzed: yoginām pariṇaman vimuktaye kena nā astu vinayaḥ satām priyaḥ

original: nūnam atrabhavataḥ śarākṛtiṃ sarvathāyam anuyāti sāyakaḥ /
analyzed: nūnam atrabhavataḥ śara ākṛtim sarvathā ayam anuyāti sāyakaḥ

original: so 'yam ity anupapannasaṃśayaḥ kāritas tvam apathe padaṃ yayā // BhKir_13.45 //
analyzed: saḥ yam iti anupapanna saṃśayaḥ kāritaḥ tvam apathe padam yayā

original: anyadīyaviśikhe na kevalaṃ niḥspṛhasya bhavitavyam āhṛte /
analyzed: anyadīya viśikhe na kevalam niḥspṛhasya bhavitavyam āhṛte

original: nighnataḥ paranibarhitaṃ mṛgaṃ vrīḍitavyam api te sacetasaḥ // BhKir_13.46 //
analyzed: nighnataḥ para nibarhitam mṛgam vrīḍitavyam api te sa cetasaḥ

original: saṃtataṃ niśamayanta utsukā yaiḥ prayānti mudam asya sūrayaḥ /
analyzed: saṃtatam niśamayantaḥ utsukāḥ yaiḥ prayānti mudam asya sūrayaḥ

original: kīrtitāni hasite 'pi tāni yaṃ vrīḍayanti caritāni māninam // BhKir_13.47 //
analyzed: kīrtitāni hasite pi tāni yam vrīḍayanti caritāni māninam

original: anyadoṣam iva saḥ svakaṃ guṇaṃ khyāpayet katham adhṛṣṭatājaḍaḥ /
analyzed: anya doṣam iva saḥ svakam guṇam khyāpayet katham adhṛṣṭa tā jaḍaḥ

original: ucyate sa khalu kāryavattayā dhig vibhinnabudhasetum arthitām // BhKir_13.48 //
analyzed: ucyate sa khalu kāryavat tayā dhik vibhinna budha setum arthi tām

original: durvacaṃ tad atha mā sma bhūn mṛgas tvāv asau yad akariṣyad ojasā /
analyzed: durvacam tat atha mā sma bhūt mṛgaḥ asau yat akariṣyat ojasā

original: nainam āśu yadi vāhinīpatiḥ pratyapatsyata śitena pattriṇā // BhKir_13.49 //
analyzed: na enam āśu yadi vāhinīpatiḥ pratyapatsyata śitena pattriṇā

original: ko nv imaṃ harituraṅgam āyudha- stheyasīṃ dadhatam aṅgasaṃhatim /
analyzed: kaḥ nu imam hari turaṅgam āyudha stheyasīm dadhatam aṅga saṃhatim

original: vegavattaramṛte camūpater hantum arhati śareṇa daṃṣṭriṇam // BhKir_13.50 //
analyzed: vegavattaram ṛte camū pateḥ hantum arhati śareṇa daṃṣṭriṇam

original: mitram iṣṭam upakāri saṃśaye medinīpatir ayaṃ tathā ca te /
analyzed: mitram iṣṭam upakāri saṃśaye medinīpatiḥ ayam tathā ca te

original: taṃ virodhya bhavatā nirāsi mā sajjanaikavasatiḥ kṛtajñatā // BhKir_13.51 //
analyzed: tam virodhya bhavatā mā sat jana eka vasatiḥ kṛtajña tā

original: labhyam ekasukṛtena durlabhā rakṣitāram asurakṣyabhūtayaḥ /
analyzed: labhyam eka sukṛtena durlabhāḥ rakṣitāram a su rakṣya bhūtayaḥ

original: svantam antavirasā jigīṣatāṃ mitralābham anu lābhasampadaḥ // BhKir_13.52 //
analyzed: su antam anta virasāḥ jigīṣatām mitra lābham anu lābha sampadaḥ

original: cañcalaṃ vasu nitāntam unnatā medinīm api haranty arātayaḥ /
analyzed: cañcalam vasu nitāntam unnatāḥ medinīm api haranti arātayaḥ

original: bhūdharasthiram upeyam āgataṃ māvamaṃsta suhṛdaṃ mahīpatim // BhKir_13.53 //
analyzed: bhūdhara sthiram upeyam āgatam mā avamaṃsta suhṛdam mahīpatim

original: jetum eva bhavatā tapasyate nāyudhāni dadhate mumukṣavaḥ /
analyzed: jetum eva bhavatā tapasyate na āyudhāni dadhate mumukṣavaḥ

original: prāpsyate ca sakalaṃ mahībhṛtā saṃgatena tapasaḥ phalaṃ tvayā // BhKir_13.54 //
analyzed: prāpsyate ca sakalam mahībhṛtā saṃgatena tapasaḥ phalam tvayā

original: vājibhūmir ibharājakānanaṃ santi ratnanicayāś ca bhūriśaḥ /
analyzed: vāji bhūmiḥ ibha rāja kānanam santi ratna nicayāḥ ca bhūriśas

original: kāñcanena kim ivāsya pattriṇā kevalaṃ na sahate vilaṅghanam // BhKir_13.55 //
analyzed: kāñcanena kim iva asya pattriṇā kevalam na sahate vilaṅghanam

original: sāvalepam upalipsate parair abhyupaiti vikṛtiṃ rajasy api /
analyzed: sa avalepam upalipsate paraiḥ abhyupaiti vikṛtim rajasi api

original: arthitas tu na mahān samīhate jīvitaṃ kimu dhanaṃ dhanāyitum // BhKir_13.56 //
analyzed: arthitaḥ tu na mahān samīhate jīvitam kimu dhanam dhanāyitum

original: tat tadīyaviśikhātisarjanād astu vāṃ guru yadṛcchayāgatam /
analyzed: tat tadīya viśikha atisarjanāt astu vām guru yadṛcchayā āgatam

original: rāghavaplavagarājayor iva prema yuktam itaretarāśrayam // BhKir_13.57 //
analyzed: rāghava plavaga rājayoḥ iva prema yuktam itaretara āśrayam

original: nābhiyoktum anṛtaṃ tvam iṣyate kas tapasviviśikheṣu cādaraḥ /
analyzed: nā abhiyoktum anṛtam tvam iṣyate kaḥ tapasvi viśikheṣu ca ādaraḥ

original: santi bhūbhṛti śarā hi naḥ pare ye parākramavasūni vajriṇaḥ // BhKir_13.58 //
analyzed: santi bhūbhṛti śarāḥ hi naḥ pare ye parākrama vasūni vajriṇaḥ

original: mārgaṇair atha tava prayojanaṃ nāthase kimu patiṃ na bhūbhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: mārgaṇaiḥ atha tava prayojanam kimu patim na bhūbhṛtaḥ

original: tvadvidhaṃ suhṛdam etya sa arthinaṃ kiṃ na yacchati vijitya medinīm // BhKir_13.59 //
analyzed: tvadvidham suhṛdam etya sa arthinam kim na yacchati vijitya medinīm

original: tena sūrir upakāritādhanaḥ kartum icchati na yācitaṃ vṛthā /
analyzed: tena sūriḥ upakāri tā dhanaḥ kartum icchati na yācitam vṛthā

original: sīdatām anubhavann ivārthināṃ veda yat praṇayabhaṅgavedanām // BhKir_13.60 //
analyzed: sīdatām anubhavan iva arthinām veda yat praṇaya bhaṅga vedanām

original: śaktir arthapatiṣu svayaṃgrahaṃ prema kārayati vā niratyayam /
analyzed: śaktiḥ arthapatiṣu svayaṃgraham prema kārayati vā niratyayam

original: kāraṇadvayam idaṃ nirasyataḥ prārthanādhikabale vipatphalā // BhKir_13.61 //
analyzed: kāraṇa dvayam idam nirasyataḥ prārthanā adhika bale vipad phalā

original: astravedam adhigamya tattvataḥ kasya ceha bhujavīryaśālinaḥ /
analyzed: astra vedam adhigamya tattvataḥ kasya ca iha bhuja vīrya śālinaḥ

original: jāmadagnyam apahāya gīyate tāpaseṣu caritārtham āyudham // BhKir_13.62 //
analyzed: jāmadagnyam apahāya gīyate tāpaseṣu caritārtham āyudham

original: abhyaghāni municāpalāt tvayā yan mṛgaḥ kṣitipateḥ parigrahaḥ /
analyzed: abhyaghāni muni cāpalāt tvayā yat mṛgaḥ kṣitipateḥ parigrahaḥ

original: akṣamiṣṭa tad ayaṃ pramādyatāṃ saṃvṛṇoti khalu doṣam ajñatā // BhKir_13.63 //
analyzed: akṣamiṣṭa tat ayam pramādyatām saṃvṛṇoti khalu doṣam ajña tā

original: janmaveṣatapasāṃ virodhinīṃ mā kṛthāḥ punar amūm apakriyām /
analyzed: janma veṣa tapasām virodhinīm mā kṛthāḥ punar amūm apakriyām

original: āpad ety ubhayalokadūṣaṇī vartamānam apathe hi durmatim // BhKir_13.64 //
analyzed: āpad eti ubhaya loka dūṣaṇī vartamānam apathe hi durmatim

original: yaṣṭum icchasi pitṝn na sāmprataṃ saṃvṛto 'rcicayiṣur divaukasaḥ /
analyzed: yaṣṭum icchasi pitṝn na sāmpratam saṃvṛtaḥ rcicayiṣuḥ divaukasaḥ

original: dātum eva padavīm api kṣamaḥ kiṃ mṛge 'ṅga viśikhaṃ nyavīviśaḥ // BhKir_13.65 //
analyzed: dātum eva padavīm api kṣamaḥ kim mṛge ṅga viśikham nyavīviśaḥ

original: sajjano 'si vijahīhi cāpalaṃ sarvadā ka iva vā sahiṣyate /
analyzed: sat janaḥ si vijahīhi cāpalam sarvadā kaḥ iva vā sahiṣyate

original: vāridhīn iva yugāntavāyavaḥ kṣobhayanty anibhṛtā gurūn api // BhKir_13.66 //
analyzed: vāridhīn iva yuga anta vāyavaḥ kṣobhayanti a nibhṛtāḥ gurūn api

original: astravedavid ayaṃ mahīpatiḥ parvatīya iti māvajīgaṇaḥ /
analyzed: astra veda vid ayam mahīpatiḥ parvatīyaḥ iti māvajīgaṇaḥ

original: gopituṃ bhuvam imāṃ marutvatā śailavāsam anunīya lambhitaḥ // BhKir_13.67 //
analyzed: gopitum bhuvam imām marutvatā śaila vāsam anunīya lambhitaḥ

original: tat titikṣitam idaṃ mayā muner ity avocata vacaś camūpatiḥ /
analyzed: tat titikṣitam idam mayā muneḥ iti avocata vacaḥ camūpatiḥ

original: bāṇam atrabhavate nijaṃ diśann āpnuhi tvam api sarvasampadaḥ // BhKir_13.68 //
analyzed: bāṇam atrabhavate nijam diśan āpnuhi tvam api sarva sampadaḥ

original: ātmanīnam upatiṣṭhate guṇāḥ sambhavanti viramanti cāpadaḥ /
analyzed: ātmanīnam upatiṣṭhate guṇāḥ sambhavanti viramanti ca āpadaḥ

original: ity anekaphalabhāji mā sma bhūd arthitā katham ivāryasaṃgame // BhKir_13.69 //
analyzed: iti aneka phala bhāji mā sma bhūt arthi tā katham iva ārya saṃgame

original: dṛśyatām ayam anokahāntare tigmahetipṛtanābhir anvitaḥ /
analyzed: dṛśyatām ayam anokaha antare tigma heti pṛtanābhiḥ anvitaḥ

original: sāhivīcir iva sindhur uddhato bhūpatiḥ samayasetuvāritaḥ // BhKir_13.70 //
analyzed: sa ahi vīciḥ iva sindhuḥ uddhataḥ bhūpatiḥ samaya setu vāritaḥ

original: sajyaṃ dhanur vahati yo 'hipatisthavīyaḥ stheyāñ jayan harituraṅgamaketulakṣmīm /
analyzed: sajyam dhanuḥ vahati yaḥ hi pati sthavīyaḥ stheyām jayan hari turaṅgama ketu lakṣmīm

original: asyānukūlaya matiṃ matimann anena sakhyā sukhaṃ samabhiyāsyasi cintitāni // BhKir_13.71 //
analyzed: asya anukūlaya matim matiman anena sakhyā sukham samabhiyāsyasi cintitāni

original: tataḥ kirātasya vacobhir uddhataiḥ parāhataḥ śaila ivārṇavāmbubhiḥ /
analyzed: tatas kirātasya vacobhiḥ uddhataiḥ parāhataḥ śailaḥ iva arṇava ambubhiḥ

original: jahau na dhairyaṃ kupito 'pi pāṇḍavaḥ sudurgrahāntaḥkaraṇā hi sādhavaḥ // BhKir_14.1 //
analyzed: jahau na dhairyam kupitaḥ pi pāṇḍavaḥ su durgraha antaḥkaraṇāḥ hi sādhavaḥ

original: saleśam ulliṅgitaśātraveṅgitaḥ kṛtī girāṃ vistaratattvasaṃgrahe /
analyzed: sa leśam ulliṅgita śātrava iṅgitaḥ kṛtī girām vistara tattva saṃgrahe

original: ayaṃ pramāṇīkṛtakālasādhanaḥ praśāntasaṃrambha ivādade vacaḥ // BhKir_14.2 //
analyzed: ayam pramāṇīkṛta kāla sādhanaḥ praśānta saṃrambhaḥ iva ādade vacaḥ

original: viviktavarṇābharaṇā sukhaśrutiḥ prasādayantī hṛdayāny api dviṣām /
analyzed: vivikta varṇa ābharaṇā sukha śrutiḥ prasādayantī hṛdayāni api dviṣām

original: pravartate nākṛtapuṇyakarmaṇāṃ prasannagambhīrapadā sarasvatī // BhKir_14.3 //
analyzed: pravartate na akṛta puṇya karmaṇām prasanna gambhīra padā sarasvatī

original: bhavanti te sabhyatamā vipaścitāṃ manogataṃ vāci niveśayanti ye /
analyzed: bhavanti te sabhyatamāḥ vipaścitām manogatam vāci niveśayanti ye

original: nayanti teṣv apy upapannanaipuṇā gambhīram arthaṃ katicit prakāśatām // BhKir_14.4 //
analyzed: nayanti teṣu api upapanna naipuṇāḥ gambhīram artham katicid prakāśa tām

original: stuvanti gurvīm abhidheyasampadaṃ viśuddhimukter apare vipaścitaḥ /
analyzed: stuvanti gurvīm abhidheya sampadam viśuddhi mukteḥ apare vipaścitaḥ

original: iti sthitāyāṃ pratipūruṣaṃ rucau sudurlabhāḥ sarvamanoramā giraḥ // BhKir_14.5 //
analyzed: iti sthitāyām pratipūruṣam rucau su durlabhāḥ sarva manoramāḥ giraḥ

original: samasya sampādayatā guṇair imāṃ tvayā samāropitabhāra bhāratīm /
analyzed: samasya sampādayatā guṇaiḥ imām tvayā samāropita bhāra bhāratīm

original: pragalbham ātmā dhuri dhurya vāgmināṃ vanacareṇāpi satādhiropitaḥ // BhKir_14.6 //
analyzed: pragalbham ātmā dhuri dhurya vāgminām vanacareṇa api satā adhiropitaḥ

original: prayujya sāmācaritaṃ vilobhanaṃ bhayaṃ vibhedāya dhiyaḥ pradarśitam /
analyzed: prayujya sāma ācaritam vilobhanam bhayam vibhedāya dhiyaḥ pradarśitam

original: tathābhiyuktaṃ ca śilīmukhārthinā yathetaran nyāyyam ivāvabhāsate // BhKir_14.7 //
analyzed: tathā abhiyuktam ca śilīmukha arthinā yathā itarat nyāyyam iva avabhāsate

original: virodhi siddher iti kartum udyataḥ sa vāritaḥ kiṃ bhavatā na bhūpatiḥ /
analyzed: virodhi siddheḥ iti kartum udyataḥ sa vāritaḥ kim bhavatā na bhūpatiḥ

original: hite niyojyaḥ khalu bhūtim icchatā sahārthanāśena nṛpo 'nujīvinā // BhKir_14.8 //
analyzed: hite niyojyaḥ khalu bhūtim icchatā saha artha nāśena nṛpaḥ nu jīvinā

original: dhruvaṃ praṇāśaḥ prahitasya pattriṇaḥ śiloccaye tasya vimārgaṇaṃ nayaḥ /
analyzed: dhruvam praṇāśaḥ prahitasya pattriṇaḥ śiloccaye tasya vimārgaṇam nayaḥ

original: na yuktam atrāryajanātilaṅghanaṃ diśaty apāyaṃ hi satām atikramaḥ // BhKir_14.9 //
analyzed: na yuktam atrā ārya jana atilaṅghanam diśati apāyam hi satām atikramaḥ

original: atītasaṃkhyā vihitā mamāgninā śilāmukhāḥ khāṇḍavam attum icchatā /
analyzed: atīta saṃkhyāḥ vihitāḥ mama agninā śilā mukhāḥ khāṇḍavam attum icchatā

original: anādṛtasyāmarasāyakeṣv api sthitā kathaṃ śailajanāśuge dhṛtiḥ // BhKir_14.10 //
analyzed: an ādṛtasya amara sāyakeṣu api sthitā katham śaila jana āśuge dhṛtiḥ

original: yadi pramāṇīkṛtam āryaceṣṭitaṃ kim ity adoṣeṇa tiraskṛtā vayam /
analyzed: yadi pramāṇīkṛtam ārya ceṣṭitam kim iti adoṣeṇa tiraskṛtāḥ vayam

original: ayātapūrvā parivādagocaraṃ satāṃ hi vāṇī guṇam eva bhāṣate // BhKir_14.11 //
analyzed: a yāta pūrvā parivāda gocaram satām hi vāṇī guṇam eva bhāṣate

original: guṇāpavādena tadanyaropaṇād bhṛśādhirūḍhasya samañjasaṃ janam /
analyzed: guṇa apavādena tad anya ropaṇāt bhṛśa adhirūḍhasya samañjasam janam

original: dvidheva kṛtvā hṛdayaṃ nigūhataḥ sphurad asādhor vivṛṇoti vāgasiḥ // BhKir_14.12 //
analyzed: dvidhā iva kṛtvā hṛdayam nigūhataḥ sphurat asādhoḥ vivṛṇoti vāgasiḥ

original: vanāśrayāḥ kasya mṛgāḥ parigrahāḥ śṛṇāti yas tān prasabhena tasya te /
analyzed: vana āśrayāḥ kasya mṛgāḥ parigrahāḥ śṛṇāti yaḥ tān prasabhena tasya te

original: prahīyatām atra nṛpeṇa mānitā na mānitā cāsti bhavanti ca śriyaḥ // BhKir_14.13 //
analyzed: prahīyatām atra nṛpeṇa māni tā na māni tā ca asti bhavanti ca śriyaḥ

original: na vartma kasmaicid api pradīyatām iti vrataṃ me vihitaṃ maharṣiṇā /
analyzed: na vartma kasmaicid api pradīyatām iti vratam me vihitam mahā ṛṣiṇā

original: jighāṃsur asmān nihato mayā mṛgo vratābhirakṣā hi satām alaṃkriyā // BhKir_14.14 //
analyzed: jighāṃsuḥ asmān nihataḥ mayā mṛgaḥ vrata abhirakṣā hi satām alaṃkriyā

original: mṛgān vinighnan mṛgayuḥ svahetunā kṛtopakāraḥ katham icchatāṃ tapaḥ /
analyzed: mṛgān vinighnan mṛgayuḥ sva hetunā kṛta upakāraḥ katham icchatām tapaḥ

original: kṛpeti ced astu mṛgaḥ kṣataḥ kṣaṇād anena pūrvaṃ na mayeti kā gatiḥ // BhKir_14.15 //
analyzed: kṛpā iti ced astu mṛgaḥ kṣataḥ kṣaṇāt anena pūrvam na mayā iti kā gatiḥ

original: anāyudhe sattvajighāṃsite munau kṛpeti vṛttir mahatām akṛtrimā /
analyzed: anāyudhe sattva jighāṃsite munau kṛpā iti vṛttiḥ mahatām akṛtrimā

original: śarāsanaṃ bibhrati sajyasāyakaṃ kṛtānukampaḥ sa kathaṃ pratīyate // BhKir_14.16 //
analyzed: śarāsanam bibhrati sajya sāyakam kṛta anukampaḥ sa katham pratīyate

original: atho śaras tena madartham ujjhitaḥ phalaṃ ca tasya pratikāyasādhanam /
analyzed: atho śaraḥ tena mad artham ujjhitaḥ phalam ca tasya pratikāya sādhanam

original: avikṣate tatra mayātmasātkṛte kṛtārthatā nanv adhikā camūpateḥ // BhKir_14.17 //
analyzed: a vikṣate tatra mayā ātmasāt kṛte kṛtārtha tā nanu adhikā camū pateḥ

original: yad āttha kāmaṃ bhavatā sa yācyatām iti kṣamaṃ naitad analpacetasām /
analyzed: yat āttha kāmam bhavatā sa yācyatām iti kṣamam nā etat analpa cetasām

original: kathaṃ prasahyāharaṇaiṣiṇāṃ priyaḥ parāvanatyā malinīkṛtāḥ śriyaḥ // BhKir_14.18 //
analyzed: katham prasahya āharaṇa eṣiṇām priyaḥ para avanatyā malinīkṛtāḥ śriyaḥ

original: abhūtam āsajya viruddham īhitaṃ balād alabhyaṃ tava lipsate nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: abhūtam āsajya viruddham īhitam balāt alabhyam tava lipsate nṛpaḥ

original: vijānato 'pi hy anayasya raudratāṃ bhavaty apāye parimohinī matiḥ // BhKir_14.19 //
analyzed: vijānataḥ pi hi anayasya raudra tām bhavati apāye parimohinī matiḥ

original: asiḥ śarā varma dhanuś ca noccakair vivicya kiṃ prārthitam īśvareṇa te /
analyzed: asiḥ śarāḥ varma dhanuḥ ca na uccakais vivicya kim prārthitam īśvareṇa te

original: athāsti śaktiḥ kṛtam eva yācñayā na dūṣitaḥ śaktimatāṃ svayaṃgrahaḥ // BhKir_14.20 //
analyzed: athā asti śaktiḥ kṛtam eva yācñayā na dūṣitaḥ śaktimatām svayaṃgrahaḥ

original: sakhā sa yuktaḥ kathitaḥ kathaṃ tvayā yadṛcchayāsūyati yas tapasyate /
analyzed: sakhā sa yuktaḥ kathitaḥ katham tvayā yadṛcchayā asūyati yaḥ tapasyate

original: guṇārjanocchrāyaviruddhabuddhayaḥ prakṛtyamitrā hi satām asādhavaḥ // BhKir_14.21 //
analyzed: guṇa arjana ucchrāya viruddha buddhayaḥ prakṛti amitrāḥ hi satām asādhavaḥ

original: vayaṃ kva varṇāśramarakṣaṇocitāḥ kva jātihīnā mṛgajīvitacchidaḥ /
analyzed: vayam kva varṇa āśrama rakṣaṇa ucitāḥ kva jāti hīnāḥ mṛga jīvita chidaḥ

original: sahāpakṛṣṭair mahatāṃ na saṃgataṃ bhavanti gomāyusakhā na dantinaḥ // BhKir_14.22 //
analyzed: saha apakṛṣṭaiḥ mahatām na saṃgatam bhavanti gomāyu sakhāḥ na dantinaḥ

original: paro 'vajānāti yad ajñatājaḍas tad unnatānāṃ na vihanti dhīratām /
analyzed: paraḥ yat ajña tā jaḍaḥ tat unnatānām na vihanti dhīra tām

original: samānavīryānvayapauruṣeṣu yaḥ karoty atikrāntim asau tiraskriyā // BhKir_14.23 //
analyzed: samāna vīrya anvaya pauruṣeṣu yaḥ karoti atikrāntim asau tiraskriyā

original: yadā vigṛhṇāti hataṃ tadā yaśaḥ karoti maitrīm atha dūṣitā guṇāḥ /
analyzed: yadā vigṛhṇāti hatam tadā yaśaḥ karoti maitrīm atha dūṣitāḥ guṇāḥ

original: sthitiṃ samīkṣyobhayathā parīkṣakaḥ karoty avajñopahataṃ pṛthagjanam // BhKir_14.24 //
analyzed: sthitim samīkṣya ubhayathā parīkṣakaḥ karoti avajñā upahatam pṛthagjanam

original: mayā mṛgān hantur anena hetunā viruddham ākṣepavacas titikṣitam /
analyzed: mayā mṛgān hantuḥ anena hetunā viruddham ākṣepa vacaḥ titikṣitam

original: śarārtham eṣyaty atha lapsyate gatiṃ śiromaṇiṃ dṛṣṭiviṣāj jighṛkṣataḥ // BhKir_14.25 //
analyzed: śara artham eṣyati atha lapsyate gatim śiromaṇim dṛṣṭiviṣāt jighṛkṣataḥ

original: itīritākūtam anīlavājinaṃ jayāya dūtaḥ pratitarjya tejasā /
analyzed: iti īrita ākūtam anīlavājinam jayāya dūtaḥ pratitarjya tejasā

original: yayau samīpaṃ dhvajinīm upeyuṣaḥ prasannarūpasya virūpacakṣuṣaḥ // BhKir_14.26 //
analyzed: yayau samīpam dhvajinīm upeyuṣaḥ prasanna rūpasya virūpa cakṣuṣaḥ

original: tato 'pavādena patākinīpateś cacāla nirhrādavatī mahācamūḥ /
analyzed: tatas upavādena patākinī pateḥ cacāla nirhrādavatī mahā camūḥ

original: yugāntavātābhihateva kurvatī ninādam ambhonidhivīcisaṃhatiḥ // BhKir_14.27 //
analyzed: yugānta vāta abhihatā iva kurvatī ninādam ambhonidhi vīci saṃhatiḥ

original: raṇāya jaitraḥ pradiśann iva tvarāṃ taraṅgitālambitaketusaṃtatiḥ /
analyzed: raṇāya jaitraḥ pradiśan iva tvarām taraṅgita ālambita ketu saṃtatiḥ

original: puro balānāṃ saghanāmbuśīkaraḥ śanaiḥ pratasthe surabhiḥ samīraṇaḥ // BhKir_14.28 //
analyzed: puras balānām sa ghana ambu śīkaraḥ śanais pratasthe surabhiḥ samīraṇaḥ

original: jayāravakṣveḍitanādamūrchitaḥ śarāsanajyātalavāraṇadhvaniḥ /
analyzed: jayārava kṣveḍita nāda mūrchitaḥ śarāsana jyā tala vāraṇa dhvaniḥ

original: asambhavanbhūdhararājakukṣiṣu prakampayan gām avatastare diśaḥ // BhKir_14.29 //
analyzed: a sambhavan bhūdhara rāja kukṣiṣu prakampayan gām avatastare diśaḥ

original: niśātaraudreṣu vikāsatāṃ gataiḥ pradīpayadbhiḥ kakubhām ivāntaram /
analyzed: niśāta raudreṣu vikāsa tām gataiḥ pradīpayadbhiḥ kakubhām iva antaram

original: vanesadāṃ hetiṣu bhinnavigrahair vipusphure raśmimato marīcibhiḥ // BhKir_14.30 //
analyzed: vanesadām hetiṣu bhinna vigrahaiḥ vipusphure raśmimataḥ marīcibhiḥ

original: udūḍhavakṣaḥsthagitaikadiṅmukho vikṛṣṭavisphāritacāpamaṇḍalaḥ /
analyzed: udūḍha vakṣaḥ sthagita eka diṅmukhaḥ vikṛṣṭa visphārita cāpa maṇḍalaḥ
