original: vitatya pakṣadvayam āyataṃ babhau vibhur guṇānām uparīva madhyagaḥ // BhKir_14.31 //
analyzed: vitatya pakṣa dvayam āyatam babhau vibhuḥ guṇānām upari iva madhya gaḥ

original: sugeṣu durgeṣu ca tulyavikramair javād ahaṃpūrvikayā yiyāsubhiḥ /
analyzed: sugeṣu durgeṣu ca tulya vikramaiḥ javāt ahaṃpūrvikayā yiyāsubhiḥ

original: gaṇair avicchedaniruddham ābabhau vanaṃ nirucchvāsam ivākulākulam // BhKir_14.32 //
analyzed: gaṇaiḥ a viccheda niruddham ābabhau vanam nirucchvāsam iva a kula ākulam

original: tirohitaśvabhranikuñcarodhasaḥ samaśnuvānāḥ sahasātiriktatām /
analyzed: tirohita śvabhra nikuñca rodhasaḥ samaśnuvānāḥ sahasā atirikta tām

original: kirātasainyair apidhāya recitā bhuvaḥ kṣaṇaṃ nimnatayeva bhejire // BhKir_14.33 //
analyzed: kirāta sainyaiḥ apidhāya recitāḥ bhuvaḥ kṣaṇam nimna tayā iva bhejire

original: pṛthūruparyastabṛhallatātatir javānilāghūrṇitaśālacandanā /
analyzed: pṛthu uru paryasta bṛhat latā tatiḥ java anila āghūrṇita śāla candanā

original: gaṇādhipānāṃ paritaḥ prasāriṇī vanāny avāñcīva cakāra saṃhatiḥ // BhKir_14.34 //
analyzed: gaṇa adhipānām paritas prasāriṇī vanāni avāñci iva cakāra saṃhatiḥ

original: tataḥ sadarpaṃ pratanuṃ tapasyayā madasrutikṣāmam ivaikavāraṇam /
analyzed: tatas sa darpam pratanum tapasyayā mada sruti kṣāmam iva eka vāraṇam

original: parijvalantaṃ nidhanāya bhūbhṛtāṃ dahantam āśā iva jātavedasam // BhKir_14.35 //
analyzed: parijvalantam nidhanāya bhūbhṛtām dahantam āśāḥ iva jātavedasam

original: anādaropāttadhṛtaikasāyakaṃ jaye 'nukūle suhṛdīva saspṛham /
analyzed: an ādara upātta dhṛta eka sāyakam jaye nukūle suhṛdi iva sa spṛham

original: śanair apūrṇapratikārapelave niveśayantaṃ nayane balodadhau // BhKir_14.36 //
analyzed: śanais a pūrṇa pratikāra pelave niveśayantam nayane bala udadhau

original: niṣaṇṇam āpatpratikārakāraṇe śarāsane dhairya ivānapāyini /
analyzed: niṣaṇṇam āpat pratikāra kāraṇe śarāsane dhairye iva anapāyini

original: alaṅghanīyaṃ prakṛtāv api sthitaṃ nivātaniṣkampam ivāpagāpatim // BhKir_14.37 //
analyzed: a laṅghanīyam prakṛtau api sthitam nivāta niṣkampam iva āpagā patim

original: upeyuṣīṃ bibhratam antakadyutiṃ vadhād adūre patitasya daṃṣṭriṇaḥ /
analyzed: upeyuṣīm bibhratam antaka dyutim vadhāt adūre patitasya daṃṣṭriṇaḥ

original: puraḥ samāveśitasatpaśuṃ dvijaiḥ patiṃ paśūnām iva hūtam adhvare // BhKir_14.38 //
analyzed: puras samāveśita sat paśum dvijaiḥ patim paśūnām iva hūtam adhvare

original: nijena nītaṃ vijitānyagauravaṃ gabhīratāṃ dhairyaguṇena bhūyasā /
analyzed: nijena nītam vijita anya gauravam gabhīra tām dhairya guṇena bhūyasā

original: vanodayeneva ghanoruvīrudhā samandhakārīkṛtam uttamācalam // BhKir_14.39 //
analyzed: vana udayena iva ghana uru vīrudhā samandhakārīkṛtam uttama acalam

original: maharṣabhaskandham anūnakaṃdharaṃ bṛhacchilāvapraghanena vakṣasā /
analyzed: mahā ṛṣabha skandham anūna kaṃdharam bṛhat śilā vapra ghanena vakṣasā

original: samujjihīrṣuṃ jagatīṃ mahābharāṃ mahāvarāhaṃ mahato 'rṇavād iva // BhKir_14.40 //
analyzed: samujjihīrṣum jagatīm mahā bharām mahāvarāham mahataḥ rṇavāt iva

original: harinmaṇiśyāmam udagravigrahaṃ prakāśamānaṃ paribhūya dehinaḥ /
analyzed: harinmaṇi śyāmam udagra vigraham prakāśamānam paribhūya dehinaḥ

original: manuṣyabhāve puruṣaṃ purātanaṃ sthitaṃ jalādarśa ivāṃśumālinam // BhKir_14.41 //
analyzed: manuṣya bhāve puruṣam purātanam sthitam jala ādarśe iva aṃśumālinam

original: gurukriyārambhaphalair alaṃkṛtaṃ gatiṃ pratāpasya jagatpramāthinaḥ /
analyzed: guru kriyā ārambha phalaiḥ alaṃkṛtam gatim pratāpasya jagat pramāthinaḥ

original: gaṇāḥ samāsedur anīlavājinaṃ tapātyaye toyaghanā ghanā iva // BhKir_14.42 //
analyzed: gaṇāḥ samāseduḥ anīlavājinam tapātyaye toya ghanāḥ ghanāḥ iva

original: yathāsvam āśaṃsitavikramāḥ purā muniprabhāvakṣatatejasaḥ pare /
analyzed: yathāsvam āśaṃsita vikramāḥ purā muni prabhāva kṣata tejasaḥ pare

original: yayuḥ kṣaṇād apratipattimūḍhatāṃ mahānubhāvaḥ pratihanti pauruṣam // BhKir_14.43 //
analyzed: yayuḥ kṣaṇāt a pratipatti mūḍha tām mahā anubhāvaḥ pratihanti pauruṣam

original: tataḥ prajahre samam eva tatra tair apekṣitānyonyabalopapattibhiḥ /
analyzed: tatas prajahre samam eva tatra taiḥ apekṣita anyonya bala upapattibhiḥ

original: mahodayānām api saṃghavṛttitāṃ sahāyasādhyāḥ pradiśanti siddhayaḥ // BhKir_14.44 //
analyzed: mahodayānām api saṃgha vṛtti tām sahāya sādhyāḥ pradiśanti siddhayaḥ

original: kirātasainyād urucāpanoditāḥ samaṃ samutpetur upāttaraṃhasaḥ /
analyzed: kirāta sainyāt uru cāpa noditāḥ samam samutpetuḥ upātta raṃhasaḥ

original: mahāvanād unmanasaḥ khagā iva pravṛttapattradhvanayaḥ śilīmukhāḥ // BhKir_14.45 //
analyzed: mahā vanāt unmanasaḥ khagāḥ iva pravṛtta pattra dhvanayaḥ śilīmukhāḥ

original: gabhīrarandhreṣu bhṛśaṃ mahībhṛtaḥ pratisvanair unnamitena sānuṣu /
analyzed: gabhīra randhreṣu bhṛśam mahībhṛtaḥ pratisvanaiḥ unnamitena sānuṣu

original: dhanurninādena javād upeyuṣā vibhidyamānā iva dadhvanur diśaḥ // BhKir_14.46 //
analyzed: dhanuḥ ninādena javāt upeyuṣā vibhidyamānāḥ iva dadhvanuḥ diśaḥ

original: vidhūnayantī gahanāni bhūruhāṃ tirohitopāntanabhodigantarā /
analyzed: vidhūnayantī gahanāni bhūruhām tirohita upānta nabhaḥ digantarā

original: mahīyasī vṛṣṭir ivānileritā ravaṃ vitene gaṇamārgaṇāvaliḥ // BhKir_14.47 //
analyzed: mahīyasī vṛṣṭiḥ iva anila īritā ravam vitene gaṇa mārgaṇa āvaliḥ

original: trayīm ṛtūnām anilāśinaḥ sataḥ prayāti poṣaṃ vapuṣi prahṛṣyataḥ /
analyzed: trayīm ṛtūnām anila āśinaḥ sataḥ prayāti poṣam vapuṣi prahṛṣyataḥ

original: raṇāya jiṣṇor viduṣeva satvaraṃ ghanatvam īye śithilena varmaṇā // BhKir_14.48 //
analyzed: raṇāya jiṣṇoḥ viduṣā iva sa tvaram ghana tvam īye śithilena varmaṇā

original: patatsu śastreṣu vitatya rodasī samantatas tasya dhanur dudhūṣataḥ /
analyzed: patatsu śastreṣu vitatya rodasī samantataḥ tasya dhanuḥ dudhūṣataḥ

original: saroṣam ulkeva papāta bhīṣaṇā baleṣu dṛṣṭir vinipātaśaṃsinī // BhKir_14.49 //
analyzed: sa roṣam ulkā iva papāta bhīṣaṇā baleṣu dṛṣṭiḥ vinipāta śaṃsinī

original: diśaḥ samūhann iva vikṣipann iva prabhāṃ raver ākulayann ivānilam /
analyzed: diśaḥ samūhan iva vikṣipan iva prabhām raveḥ ākulayan iva anilam

original: muniś cacāla kṣayakāladāruṇaḥ kṣitiṃ saśailāṃ calayann iveṣubhiḥ // BhKir_14.50 //
analyzed: muniḥ cacāla kṣaya kāla dāruṇaḥ kṣitim sa śailām calayan iva iṣubhiḥ

original: vimuktam āśaṃsitaśatrunirjayair anekam ekāvasaraṃ vanecaraiḥ /
analyzed: vimuktam āśaṃsita śatru nirjayaiḥ anekam eka avasaram vanecaraiḥ

original: sa nirjaghānāyudham antarā śaraiḥ kriyāphalaṃ kāla ivātipātitaḥ // BhKir_14.51 //
analyzed: sa nirjaghāna āyudham antarā śaraiḥ kriyā phalam kālaḥ iva atipātitaḥ

original: gataiḥ pareṣām avibhāvanīyatāṃ nivārayadbhir vipadaṃ vidūragaiḥ /
analyzed: gataiḥ pareṣām a vibhāvanīya tām nivārayadbhiḥ vipadam vidūra gaiḥ

original: bhṛśaṃ babhūvopacito bṛhatphalaiḥ śarair upāyair iva pāṇḍunandanaḥ // BhKir_14.52 //
analyzed: bhṛśam babhūva upacitaḥ bṛhat phalaiḥ śaraiḥ upāyaiḥ iva pāṇḍu nandanaḥ

original: divaḥ pṛthivyāḥ kakubhāṃ nu maṇḍalāt patanti bimbād uta tigmatejasaḥ /
analyzed: divaḥ pṛthivyāḥ kakubhām nu maṇḍalāt patanti bimbāt uta tigmatejasaḥ

original: sakṛd vikṛṣṭād atha kārmukān muneḥ śarāḥ śarīrād iti te 'bhimenire // BhKir_14.53 //
analyzed: sakṛt vikṛṣṭāt atha kārmukāt muneḥ śarāḥ śarīrāt iti te bhimenire

original: gaṇādhipānām avidhāya nirgataiḥ parāsutāṃ marmavidāraṇair api /
analyzed: gaṇa adhipānām a vidhāya nirgataiḥ parāsu tām marma vidāraṇaiḥ api

original: javād atīye himavān adhomukhaiḥ kṛtāparādhair iva tasya pattribhiḥ // BhKir_14.54 //
analyzed: javāt atīye himavān adhomukhaiḥ kṛta aparādhaiḥ iva tasya pattribhiḥ

original: dviṣāṃ kṣatīr yāḥ prathame śilāmukhā vibhidya dehāvaraṇāni cakrire /
analyzed: dviṣām kṣatīḥ yāḥ prathame śilā mukhāḥ vibhidya deha āvaraṇāni cakrire

original: na tāsu pete viśikhaiḥ punar muner aruṃtudatvaṃ mahatāṃ hy agocaraḥ // BhKir_14.55 //
analyzed: na tāsu pete viśikhaiḥ punar muneḥ aruṃtuda tvam mahatām hi agocaraḥ

original: samujjhitā yāvadarāti niryatī sahaiva cāpān munibāṇasaṃhatiḥ /
analyzed: samujjhitā yāvat arāti niryatī saha eva cāpāt muni bāṇa saṃhatiḥ

original: prabhā himāṃśor iva paṅkajāvaliṃ nināya saṃkocam umāpateś camūm // BhKir_14.56 //
analyzed: prabhā himāṃśoḥ iva paṅkaja āvalim nināya saṃkocam umāpateḥ camūm

original: ajihmam ojiṣṭham amogham aklamaṃ kriyāsu bahvīṣu pṛthaṅ niyojitam /
analyzed: a jihmam ojiṣṭham a mogham a klamam kriyāsu bahvīṣu pṛthak niyojitam

original: prasehire sādayituṃ na sāditāḥ śaraugham utsāham ivāsya vidviṣaḥ // BhKir_14.57 //
analyzed: prasehire sādayitum na sāditāḥ śara ogham utsāham iva asya vidviṣaḥ

original: śivadhvajinyaḥ pratiyodham agrataḥ sphurantam ugeṣumayūkhamālinam /
analyzed: śiva dhvajinyaḥ pratiyodham agratas sphurantam ugeṣu mayūkha mālinam

original: tam ekadeśastham anekadeśagā nidadhyur arkaṃ yugapat prajā iva // BhKir_14.58 //
analyzed: tam eka deśa stham aneka deśa gāḥ nidadhyuḥ arkam yugapad prajāḥ iva

original: muneḥ śaraugheṇa tadugraraṃhasā balaṃ prakopād iva viṣvag āyatā /
analyzed: muneḥ śara ogheṇa tad ugra raṃhasā balam prakopāt iva āyatā

original: vidhūnitaṃ bhrāntim iyāya saṅginīṃ mahānileneva nidāghajaṃ rajaḥ // BhKir_14.59 //
analyzed: vidhūnitam bhrāntim iyāya saṅginīm mahā anilena iva nidāgha jam rajaḥ

original: tapobalenaiṣa vidhāya bhūyasīs tanūr adṛśyāḥ svid iṣūn nirasyati /
analyzed: tapaḥ balena eṣa vidhāya bhūyasīḥ tanūḥ adṛśyāḥ svid iṣūn nirasyati

original: amuṣya māyāvihataṃ nihanti naḥ pratīpam āgatya kim u svam āyudham // BhKir_14.60 //
analyzed: amuṣya māyā vihatam nihanti naḥ pratīpam āgatya kim svam āyudham

original: hṛtā guṇair asya bhayena vā munes tirohitāḥ svit praharanti devatāḥ /
analyzed: hṛtāḥ guṇaiḥ asya bhayena vā muneḥ tirohitāḥ svid praharanti devatāḥ

original: kathaṃ nv amī saṃtatam asya sāyakā bhavanty aneke jaladher ivormayaḥ // BhKir_14.61 //
analyzed: katham nu amī saṃtatam asya sāyakāḥ bhavanti aneke jaladheḥ iva ūrmayaḥ

original: jayena kaccid viramed ayaṃ raṇād bhaved api svasti carācarāya vā /
analyzed: jayena kaccit viramet ayam raṇāt bhavet api svasti carācarāya vā

original: tatāpa kīrṇā nṛpasūnumārgaṇair iti pratarkākulitā patākinī // BhKir_14.62 //
analyzed: tatāpa kīrṇā nṛpa sūnu mārgaṇaiḥ iti pratarka ākulitā patākinī

original: amarṣiṇā kṛtyam iva kṣamāśrayaṃ madoddhateneva hitaṃ priyaṃ vacaḥ /
analyzed: amarṣiṇā kṛtyam iva kṣamā āśrayam mada uddhatena iva hitam priyam vacaḥ

original: balīyasā tad vidhineva pauruṣaṃ balaṃ nirastaṃ na rarāja jiṣṇunā // BhKir_14.63 //
analyzed: balīyasā tat vidhinā iva pauruṣam balam nirastam na rarāja jiṣṇunā

original: pratidiśaṃ plavagādhipalakṣmaṇā viśikhasaṃhatitāpitamūrtibhiḥ /
analyzed: pratidiśam plavaga adhipa lakṣmaṇā viśikha saṃhati tāpita mūrtibhiḥ

original: ravikaraglapitair iva vāribhiḥ śivabalaiḥ parimaṇḍalatā dadhe // BhKir_14.64 //
analyzed: ravi kara glapitaiḥ iva vāribhiḥ śiva balaiḥ parimaṇḍala tā dadhe

original: pravitataśarajālacchannaviśvāntarāle vidhuvati dhanur āvir maṇḍalaṃ pāṇḍusūnau /
analyzed: pravitata śara jāla channa viśva antarāle vidhuvati dhanuḥ āvis maṇḍalam pāṇḍu sūnau

original: katham api jayalakṣmīr bhūtabhūtā vihātuṃ viṣamanayanasenāpakṣapātaṃ viṣehe // BhKir_14.65 //
analyzed: katham api jaya lakṣmīḥ bhūta bhūtā vihātum viṣama nayana senā pakṣapātam viṣehe

original: atha bhūtāni vārtraghna- śarebhyas tatra tatrasuḥ /
analyzed: atha bhūtāni vārtraghna śarebhyaḥ tatra tatrasuḥ

original: bheje diśaḥ parityakta- maheṣvāsā ca sā camūḥ // BhKir_15.1 //
analyzed: bheje diśaḥ parityakta mahā iṣvāsā ca sā camūḥ

original: apaśyadbhir iveśānaṃ raṇān nivavṛte gaṇaiḥ /
analyzed: a paśyadbhiḥ iva īśānam raṇāt nivavṛte gaṇaiḥ

original: muhyatīva hi kṛcchreṣu sambhramajvalitaṃ manaḥ // BhKir_15.2 //
analyzed: muhyati iva hi kṛcchreṣu sambhrama jvalitam manaḥ

original: khaṇḍitāśaṃsayā teṣāṃ parāṅmukhatayā tayā /
analyzed: khaṇḍita āśaṃsayā teṣām parāṅmukha tayā tayā

original: āviveśa kṛpā ketau kṛtoccairvānaraṃ naram // BhKir_15.3 //
analyzed: āviveśa kṛpā ketau kṛta uccais vānaram naram

original: āsthām ālambya nīteṣu vaśaṃ kṣudreṣv arātiṣu /
analyzed: āsthām ālambya nīteṣu vaśam kṣudreṣu arātiṣu

original: vyaktim āyāti mahatāṃ māhātmyam anukampayā // BhKir_15.4 //
analyzed: vyaktim āyāti mahatām māhātmyam anukampayā

original: sa sāsiḥ sāsusūḥ sāso yeyāyeyāyayāyayaḥ /
analyzed: sa sa asiḥ sāsaḥ

original: lalau līlāṃ lalo 'lolaḥ śaśīśaśiśuśīḥ śaśan // BhKir_15.5 //
analyzed: līlām lalaḥ lolaḥ śaśan

original: trāsajihmaṃ yataś caitān mandam evānviyāya saḥ /
analyzed: trāsa jihmam yatas ca etān mandam evā anviyāya saḥ

original: nātipīḍayituṃ bhagnān icchanti hi mahaujasaḥ // BhKir_15.6 //
analyzed: na atipīḍayitum bhagnān icchanti hi mahā ojasaḥ

original: athāgre hasatā sāci- sthitena sthirakīrtinā /
analyzed: athā agre hasatā sāci sthitena sthira kīrtinā

original: senānyā te jagadire kiṃcidāyastacetasā // BhKir_15.7 //
analyzed: senānyā te jagadire kiṃcid āyasta cetasā

original: mā vihāsiṣṭa samaraṃ samarantavyasaṃyataḥ /
analyzed: mā vihāsiṣṭa samaram sama rantavya saṃyataḥ

original: kṣataṃ kṣuṇṇāsuragaṇair agaṇair iva kiṃ yaśaḥ // BhKir_15.8 //
analyzed: kṣatam kṣuṇṇa asura gaṇaiḥ a gaṇaiḥ iva kim yaśaḥ

original: vivasvadaṃśusaṃśleṣa- dviguṇīkṛtatejasaḥ /
analyzed: vivasvat aṃśu saṃśleṣa dvi guṇīkṛta tejasaḥ

original: amī vo mogham udgūrṇā hasantīva mahāsayaḥ // BhKir_15.9 //
analyzed: amī vaḥ mogham udgūrṇāḥ hasanti iva mahā asayaḥ

original: vane 'vane vanasadāṃ mārgaṃ mārgam upeyuṣām /
analyzed: vane vane vana sadām mārgam mārgam upeyuṣām

original: vāṇair bāṇaiḥ samāsaktaṃ śaṅke 'śaṃ kena śāmyati // BhKir_15.10 //
analyzed: vāṇaiḥ bāṇaiḥ samāsaktam śaṅke śam kena śāmyati

original: pātitottuṅgamāhātmyaiḥ saṃhṛtāyatakīrtibhiḥ /
analyzed: pātita uttuṅga māhātmyaiḥ saṃhṛta āyata kīrtibhiḥ

original: gurvīṃ kām āpadaṃ hantuṃ kṛtam āvṛttisāhasam // BhKir_15.11 //
analyzed: gurvīm kām āpadam hantum kṛtam āvṛtti sāhasam

original: nāsuro 'yaṃ na vā nāgo dharasaṃstho na rākṣasaḥ /
analyzed: na asuraḥ yam na vā nāgaḥ dhara saṃsthaḥ na rākṣasaḥ

original: nā sukho 'yaṃ navābhogo dharaṇistho hi rājasaḥ // BhKir_15.12 //
analyzed: nā sukhaḥ yam na vā bhogaḥ dharaṇi sthaḥ hi rājasaḥ

original: mandam asyann iṣulatāṃ ghṛṇayā munir eṣa vaḥ /
analyzed: mandam asyan iṣu latām ghṛṇayā muniḥ eṣa vaḥ

original: praṇudaty āgatāvajñaṃ jaghaneṣu paśūn iva // BhKir_15.13 //
analyzed: praṇudati āgata avajñam jaghaneṣu paśūn iva

original: na nonanunno 'nunneno na nā nānānanā nanu /
analyzed: na nona nunnaḥ nunna inaḥ na nā nanu

original: nunno 'nunno na nunneno nānenānunnanun na nut // BhKir_15.14 //
analyzed: nunnaḥ nunnaḥ na na

original: varaṃ kṛtadhvastaguṇād atyantam aguṇaḥ pumān /
analyzed: varam kṛta dhvasta guṇāt atyantam aguṇaḥ pumān

original: prakṛtyā hy amaṇiḥ śreyān nālaṃkāraś cyutopalaḥ // BhKir_15.15 //
analyzed: prakṛtyā hi a maṇiḥ śreyān na alaṃkāraḥ cyuta upalaḥ

original: syandanā no caturagāḥ surebhā vāvipattayaḥ /
analyzed: syandanāḥ naḥ caturagāḥ su rebhāḥ vāvipattayaḥ

original: syandanā no ca turagāḥ surebhāvā vipattayaḥ // BhKir_15.16 //
analyzed: syandanāḥ no ca turagāḥ vipattayaḥ

original: bhavadbhir adhunārāti- parihāpitapauruṣaiḥ /
analyzed: bhavadbhiḥ adhunā arāti parihāpita pauruṣaiḥ

original: hradair ivārkaniṣpītaiḥ prāptaḥ paṅko durutsahaḥ // BhKir_15.17 //
analyzed: hradaiḥ iva arka niṣpītaiḥ prāptaḥ paṅkaḥ durutsahaḥ

original: vetraśākakuje śaile 'leśaije 'kukaśātrave /
analyzed: vetra śāka kuje śaile leśaije kuka śātrave

original: yāta kiṃ vidiśo jetuṃ tuñjeśo divi kiṃtayā // BhKir_15.18 //
analyzed: yāta kim vidiśaḥ jetum tuñja īśaḥ divi kiṃtayā

original: ayaṃ vaḥ klaibyam āpannān dṛṣṭapṛṣṭhān arātinā /
analyzed: ayam vaḥ klaibyam āpannān dṛṣṭa pṛṣṭhān arātinā

original: icchatīśaś cyutācārān dārān iva nigopitum // BhKir_15.19 //
analyzed: icchati īśaḥ cyuta ācārān dārān iva nigopitum

original: nanu ho mathanā rāgho ghorā nāthamaho nu na /
analyzed: nanu ho mathanā ghorā nātha mahaḥ nu na

original: tayadātavadā bhīmā mābhīdā bata dāyata // BhKir_15.20 //
analyzed: tayadātavadāḥ bhīmāḥ mābhīdāḥ bata

original: kiṃ tyaktāpāstadevatva- mānuṣyakaparigrahaiḥ /
analyzed: kim tyakta apāsta deva tva mānuṣyaka parigrahaiḥ

original: jvalitānyaguṇair gurvī sthitā tejasi mānyatā // BhKir_15.21 //
analyzed: jvalitāni aguṇaiḥ gurvī sthitā tejasi mānya tā

original: niśitāsirato 'bhīko nyejate 'maraṇā rucā /
analyzed: niśita asiḥ atas bhīkaḥ nyejate maraṇāḥ rucā

original: sārato na virodhī naḥ svābhāso bharavān uta // BhKir_15.22 //
analyzed: sārataḥ na virodhī naḥ su ābhāsaḥ bharavān uta

original: tanuvārabhaso bhāsvān adhīro 'vinatorasā /
analyzed: bhāsvān adhīraḥ vinatā urasā

original: cāruṇā ramate janye ko 'bhīto rasitāśini // BhKir_15.23 //
analyzed: cāruṇā ramate janye kaḥ bhītaḥ rasita āśini

original: nirbhinnapātitāśvīya- niruddharathavartmani /
analyzed: nirbhinna pātita aśvīya niruddha ratha vartmani

original: hatadvipanagaṣṭhyūta- rudhirāmbunadākule // BhKir_15.24 //
analyzed: hata dvipa naga ṣṭhyūta rudhira ambu nada ākule

original: devākānini kāvāde vāhikāsvasvakāhi vā /
analyzed: vā

original: kākārebhabhare kākā nisvabhavyavyabhasvani // BhKir_15.25 //
analyzed: kākā

original: pranṛttaśavavitrasta- turagākṣiptasārathau /
analyzed: pranṛtta śava vitrasta turaga ākṣipta sārathau

original: mārutāpūrṇatūṇīra- vikruṣṭahatasādini // BhKir_15.26 //
analyzed: māruta āpūrṇa tūṇīra vikruṣṭa hata sādini

original: sasattvaratide nityaṃ sadarāmarṣanāśini /
analyzed: sa sattva rati de nityam sa dara amarṣa nāśini

original: tvarādhikakasannāde ramakatvam akarṣati // BhKir_15.27 //
analyzed: ramaka tvam a karṣati

original: āsure lokavitrāsa- vidhāyini mahāhave /
analyzed: āsure loka vitrāsa vidhāyini mahā āhave

original: yuṣmābhir unnatiṃ nītaṃ nirastam iha pauruṣam // BhKir_15.28 //
analyzed: yuṣmābhiḥ unnatim nītam nirastam iha pauruṣam

original: iti śāsati senānyāṃ gacchatas tān anekadhā /
analyzed: iti śāsati senānyām gacchataḥ tān anekadhā

original: niṣidhya hasatā kiṃcit tatra tasthe 'ndhakāriṇā // BhKir_15.29 //
analyzed: niṣidhya hasatā kiṃcid tatra tasthe ndhakāriṇā

original: munīṣudahanātaptāṃl lajjayā nivivṛtsataḥ /
analyzed: muni iṣu dahana ātaptān lajjayā

original: śivaḥ prahlādayāmāsa tān niṣedhahimāmbunā // BhKir_15.30 //
analyzed: śivaḥ prahlādayāmāsa tān niṣedha hima ambunā

original: dūnās te 'ribalād ūnā nirebhā bahu menire /
analyzed: dūnāḥ te ribalāt ūnāḥ nirebhāḥ bahu menire

original: bhītāḥ śitaśarābhītāḥ śaṃkaraṃ tatra śaṃkaram // BhKir_15.31 //
analyzed: bhītāḥ śita śara abhītāḥ śaṃkaram tatra śaṃkaram

original: maheṣujaladhau śatror vartamānā duruttare /
analyzed: mahā iṣu jaladhau śatroḥ vartamānāḥ duruttare

original: prāpya pāram iveśānam āśaśvāsa patākinī // BhKir_15.32 //
analyzed: prāpya pāram iva īśānam āśaśvāsa patākinī

original: sa babhāra raṇāpetāṃ camūṃ paścād avasthitām /
analyzed: sa babhāra raṇa apetām camūm paścāt avasthitām

original: puraḥ sūryād upāvṛttāṃ chāyām iva mahātaruḥ // BhKir_15.33 //
analyzed: puras sūryāt upāvṛttām chāyām iva mahā taruḥ

original: muñcatīśe śarāñ jiṣṇau pinākasvanapūritaḥ /
analyzed: muñcati īśe śarām jiṣṇau pināka svana pūritaḥ

original: dadhvāna dhvanayann āśāḥ sphuṭann iva dharādharaḥ // BhKir_15.34 //
analyzed: dadhvāna dhvanayan āśāḥ sphuṭan iva dharādharaḥ

original: tadgaṇā dadṛśur bhīmaṃ citrasaṃsthā ivācalāḥ /
analyzed: tad gaṇāḥ dadṛśuḥ bhīmam citra saṃsthāḥ iva acalāḥ

original: vismayena tayor yuddhaṃ citrasaṃsthā ivācalāḥ // BhKir_15.35 //
analyzed: vismayena tayoḥ yuddham citra saṃsthāḥ iva acalāḥ

original: parimohayamāṇena śikṣālāghavalīlayā /
analyzed: parimohayamāṇena śikṣā lāghava līlayā

original: jaiṣṇavī viśikhaśreṇī parijahre pinākinā // BhKir_15.36 //
analyzed: jaiṣṇavī viśikha śreṇī parijahre pinākinā

original: avadyan patriṇaḥ śambhoḥ sāyakair avasāyakaiḥ /
analyzed: avadyan patriṇaḥ śambhoḥ sāyakaiḥ avasāyakaiḥ

original: pāṇḍavaḥ paricakrāma śikṣayā raṇaśikṣayā // BhKir_15.37 //
analyzed: pāṇḍavaḥ paricakrāma śikṣayā raṇa śikṣayā

original: cāracuñcuś cirārecī cañcaccīrarucā rucaḥ /
analyzed: cāra cuñcuḥ cira ārecī cañcat cīra rucā rucaḥ

original: cacāra ruciraś cāru cārair ācāracañcuraḥ // BhKir_15.38 //
analyzed: cacāra ruciraḥ cāru cāraiḥ ācāra cañcuraḥ

original: sphuratpiśaṅgamaurvīkaṃ dhunānaḥ sa bṛhaddhanuḥ /
analyzed: sphurat piśaṅga maurvīkam dhunānaḥ sa bṛhat dhanuḥ

original: dhṛtolkānalayogena tulyam aṃśumatā babhau // BhKir_15.39 //
analyzed: dhṛta ulkā anala yogena tulyam aṃśumatā babhau

original: pārthabāṇāḥ paśupater āvavrur viśikhāvalim /
analyzed: pārtha bāṇāḥ paśupateḥ āvavruḥ viśikha āvalim

original: payomuca ivārandhrāḥ sāvitrīm aṃśusaṃhatim // BhKir_15.40 //
analyzed: payaḥ mucaḥ iva arandhrāḥ sāvitrīm aṃśu saṃhatim

original: śaravṛṣṭiṃ vidhūyorvīm udastāṃ savyasācinā /
analyzed: śara vṛṣṭim vidhūya urvīm udastām savyasācinā

original: rurodha mārgaṇair mārgaṃ tapanasya trilocanaḥ // BhKir_15.41 //
analyzed: rurodha mārgaṇaiḥ mārgam tapanasya trilocanaḥ

original: tena vyātenire bhīmā bhīmārjanaphalānanāḥ /
analyzed: tena vyātenire bhīmāḥ bhīma arjana phala ānanāḥ

original: na nānukampya viśikhāḥ śikhādharajavāsasaḥ // BhKir_15.42 //
analyzed: na na anukampya viśikhāḥ śikhādhara ja vāsasaḥ

original: dyuviyadgāminī tāra- saṃrāvavihataśrutiḥ /
analyzed: tāra saṃrāva vihata śrutiḥ

original: haimīṣumālā śuśubhe vidyutām iva saṃhatiḥ // BhKir_15.43 //
analyzed: haimī iṣu mālā śuśubhe vidyutām iva saṃhatiḥ

original: vilaṅghya patriṇāṃ paṅktiṃ bhinnaḥ śivaśilīmukhaiḥ /
analyzed: vilaṅghya patriṇām paṅktim bhinnaḥ śiva śilīmukhaiḥ

original: jyāyo vīryaṃ samāśritya na cakampe kapidhvajaḥ // BhKir_15.44 //
analyzed: jyāyaḥ vīryam samāśritya na cakampe kapidhvajaḥ

original: jagatīśaraṇe yukto harikāntaḥ sudhāsitaḥ /
dānavarṣīkṛtāśaṃso nāgarāja ivābabhau // BhKir_15.45 //
analyzed: nāga rājaḥ iva ābabhau

original: viphalīkṛtayatnasya kṣatabāṇasya śambhunā /
analyzed: viphalīkṛta yatnasya kṣata bāṇasya śambhunā

original: gāṇḍīvadhanvanaḥ khebhyo niścacāra hutāśanaḥ // BhKir_15.46 //
analyzed: gāṇḍīvadhanvanaḥ khebhyaḥ niścacāra hutāśanaḥ

original: sa piśaṅgajaṭāvaliḥ kirann urutejaḥ parameṇa manyunā /
analyzed: sa piśaṅga jaṭā āvaliḥ kiran uru tejaḥ parameṇa manyunā

original: jvalitauṣadhijātavedasā himaśailena samaṃ vididyute // BhKir_15.47 //
analyzed: jvalita auṣadhi jātavedasā himaśailena samam vididyute

original: śataśo viśikhān avadyate bhṛśam asmai raṇavegaśāline /
analyzed: śataśas viśikhān avadyate bhṛśam asmai raṇa vega śāline

original: prathayann anivāryavīryatāṃ prajigāyeṣum aghātukaṃ śivaḥ // BhKir_15.48 //
analyzed: prathayan a nivārya vīrya tām prajigāya iṣum a ghātukam śivaḥ

original: śambho dhanurmaṇḍalataḥ pravṛttaṃ taṃ maṇḍalād aṃśum ivāṃśubhartuḥ /
analyzed: śambho dhanuḥ maṇḍalataḥ pravṛttam tam maṇḍalāt aṃśum iva aṃśubhartuḥ

original: nivārayiṣyan vidadhe sitāśvaḥ śilīmukhacchāyavṛtāṃ dharitrīm // BhKir_15.49 //
analyzed: nivārayiṣyan vidadhe sitāśvaḥ śilīmukha chāya vṛtām dharitrīm

original: ghanaṃ vidāryārjunabāṇapūgaṃ sasārabāṇo 'yug alocanasya /
analyzed: ghanam vidāryā arjuna bāṇa pūgam sa sāra bāṇaḥ yuj a locanasya

original: ghanaṃ vidāryārjunabāṇapūgaṃ sasāra bāṇo 'yugalocanasya // BhKir_15.50 //
analyzed: ghanam vidārya arjuna bāṇa pūgam sasāra bāṇaḥ yuga locanasya

original: rujan pareṣūn bahudhāśupātino muhuḥ śaraughair apavārayan diśaḥ /
analyzed: rujan para iṣūn bahudhā āśu pātinaḥ muhur śara oghaiḥ apavārayan diśaḥ

original: calācalo 'neka iva kriyāvaśān maharṣisaṃghair bubudhe dhanaṃjayaḥ // BhKir_15.51 //
analyzed: cala acalaḥ nekaḥ iva kriyā vaśāt mahā ṛṣi saṃghaiḥ bubudhe dhanaṃjayaḥ

original: vikāśam īyur jagatīśamārgaṇā vikāśam īyur jagatīśamārgaṇāḥ /
analyzed: vikāśam īyuḥ jagatī īśa mārgaṇāḥ vikāśam īyuḥ jagatī īśa mārgaṇāḥ

original: vikāśam īyur jagatīśamārgaṇā vikāśam īyur jagatīśamārgaṇāḥ // BhKir_15.52 //
analyzed: vikāśam īyuḥ jagatī īśa mārgaṇāḥ vikāśam īyuḥ jagatī īśa mārgaṇāḥ

original: sampaśyatām iti śivena vitāyamānaṃ lakṣmīvataḥ kṣitipates tanayasya vīryam /
analyzed: sampaśyatām iti śivena vitāyamānam lakṣmīvataḥ kṣitipateḥ tanayasya vīryam

original: aṅgāny abhinnam api tattvavidāṃ munīnāṃ romāñcam añcitataraṃ bibharāmbabhūvuḥ // BhKir_15.53 //
analyzed: aṅgāni abhinnam api tattva vidām munīnām romāñcam añcitataram

original: tataḥ kirātādhipater alaghvīm ājikriyāṃ vīkṣya vivṛddhamanyuḥ /
analyzed: tatas kirāta adhipateḥ a laghvīm āji kriyām vīkṣya vivṛddha manyuḥ

original: sa tarkayāmāsa viviktatarkaś ciraṃ vicinvann iti kāraṇāni // BhKir_16.1 //
analyzed: sa tarkayāmāsa vivikta tarkaḥ ciram vicinvan iti kāraṇāni

original: madasrutiśyāmitagaṇḍalekhāḥ krāmanti vikrāntanarādhirūḍhāḥ /
analyzed: mada sruti śyāmita gaṇḍa lekhāḥ krāmanti vikrānta nara adhirūḍhāḥ

original: sahiṣṇavo neha yudhām abhijñā nāgā nagocchrāyam ivākṣipantaḥ // BhKir_16.2 //
analyzed: sahiṣṇavaḥ na iha yudhām abhijñāḥ nāgāḥ naga ucchrāyam iva ākṣipantaḥ

original: vicitrayā citrayateva bhinnāṃ rucaṃ raveḥ ketanaratnabhāsā /
analyzed: vicitrayā citrayatā iva bhinnām rucam raveḥ ketana ratna bhāsā

original: mahārathaughena na saṃniruddhāḥ payodamandradhvaninā dharitrī // BhKir_16.3 //
analyzed: mahā ratha oghena na saṃniruddhāḥ payoda mandra dhvaninā dharitrī

original: samullasatprāsamahormimālaṃ parisphuraccāmaraphenapaṅkti /
analyzed: samullasat prāsa mahā ūrmi mālam parisphurat cāmara phena paṅkti

original: vibhinnamaryādam ihātanoti nāśvīyam āśā jaladher ivāmbhaḥ // BhKir_16.4 //
analyzed: vibhinna maryādam iha ātanoti na aśvīyam āśāḥ jaladheḥ iva ambhaḥ

original: hatāhatety uddhatabhīṣmaghoṣaiḥ samujjhitā yoddhṛbhir abhyamitram /
analyzed: hata ahata iti uddhata bhīṣma ghoṣaiḥ samujjhitāḥ yoddhṛbhiḥ abhyamitram

original: na hetayaḥ prāptataḍittviṣaḥ khe vivasvadaṃśujvalitāḥ patanti // BhKir_16.5 //
analyzed: na hetayaḥ prāpta taḍit tviṣaḥ khe vivasvat aṃśu jvalitāḥ patanti

original: abhyāyataḥ saṃtatadhūmadhūmraṃ vyāpi prabhājālam ivāntakasya /
analyzed: abhyāyataḥ saṃtata dhūma dhūmram vyāpi prabhā jālam iva antakasya

original: rajaḥ pratūrṇāśvarathāṅganunnaṃ tanoti na vyomani mātariśvā // BhKir_16.6 //
analyzed: rajaḥ pratūrṇa aśva ratha aṅga nunnam tanoti na vyomani mātariśvā

original: bhūreṇunā rāsabhadhūsareṇa tirohite vartmani locanānām /
analyzed: bhū reṇunā rāsabha dhūsareṇa tirohite vartmani locanānām

original: nāsty atra tejasvibhir utsukānām ahni pradoṣaḥ surasundarīṇām // BhKir_16.7 //
analyzed: na asti atra tejasvibhiḥ utsukānām ahni pradoṣaḥ sura sundarīṇām

original: rathāṅgasaṃkrīḍitam aśvaheṣā bṛhanti mattadvipabṛṃhitāni /
analyzed: ratha aṅga saṃkrīḍitam aśva heṣā bṛhanti matta dvipa bṛṃhitāni

original: saṃgharṣayogād iva mūrchitāni hrādaṃ nigṛhṇanti na dundubhīnām // BhKir_16.8 //
analyzed: saṃgharṣa yogāt iva mūrchitāni hrādam nigṛhṇanti na dundubhīnām

original: asmin yaśaḥpauruṣalolupānām arātibhiḥ pratyurasaṃ kṣatānām /
analyzed: asmin yaśaḥ pauruṣa lolupānām arātibhiḥ pratyurasam kṣatānām

original: mūrchāntarāyaṃ muhur ucchinatti nāsāraśītaṃ kariśīkarāmbhaḥ // BhKir_16.9 //
analyzed: mūrchā antarāyam muhur ucchinatti na āsāra śītam kari śīkara ambhaḥ

original: asṛṅnadīnām upacīyamānair vidārayadbhiḥ padavīṃ dhvajinyāḥ /
analyzed: asṛj nadīnām upacīyamānaiḥ vidārayadbhiḥ padavīm dhvajinyāḥ

original: ucchrāyam āyānti na śoṇitaughaiḥ paṅkair ivāśyānaghanais taṭāni // BhKir_16.10 //
analyzed: ucchrāyam āyānti na śoṇita oghaiḥ paṅkaiḥ iva āśyāna ghanaiḥ taṭāni

original: parikṣate vakṣasi dantidantaiḥ priyāṅkaśītā nabhasaḥ patantī /
analyzed: parikṣate vakṣasi danti dantaiḥ priya aṅka śītā nabhasaḥ patantī

original: neha pramohaṃ priyasāhasānāṃ mandāramālā viralīkaroti // BhKir_16.11 //
analyzed: na iha pramoham priya sāhasānām mandāra mālā viralīkaroti

original: niṣādisaṃnāhamaṇiprabhaughe parīyamāṇe kariśīkareṇa /
analyzed: niṣādi saṃnāha maṇi prabhā oghe parīyamāṇe kari śīkareṇa

original: arkatviṣonmīlitam abhyudeti na khaṇḍam ākhaṇḍalakārmukasya // BhKir_16.12 //
analyzed: arka tviṣā unmīlitam abhyudeti na khaṇḍam ākhaṇḍala kārmukasya

original: mahībhṛtā pakṣavateva bhinnā vigāhya madhyaṃ paravāraṇena /
analyzed: mahībhṛtā pakṣavatā iva bhinnāḥ vigāhya madhyam para vāraṇena

original: nāvartamānā ninadanti bhīmam apāṃ nidher āpa iva dhvajinyaḥ // BhKir_16.13 //
analyzed: na āvartamānāḥ ninadanti bhīmam apām nidheḥ āpaḥ iva dhvajinyaḥ

original: mahārathānāṃ pratidantyanīkam adhisyadasyandanam utthitānām /
analyzed: mahā rathānām pratidanti anīkam adhi syada syandanam utthitānām

original: āmūlalūnair atimanyuneva mātaṅgahastair vriyate na panthāḥ // BhKir_16.14 //
analyzed: ā mūla lūnaiḥ ati manyunā iva mātaṅga hastaiḥ vriyate na panthāḥ

original: dhṛtotpalāpīḍa iva priyāyāḥ śiroruhāṇāṃ śithilaḥ kalāpaḥ /
analyzed: dhṛta utpala āpīḍaḥ iva priyāyāḥ śiroruhāṇām śithilaḥ kalāpaḥ

original: na barhabhāraḥ patitasya śaṅkor niṣādivakṣaḥsthalam ātanoti // BhKir_16.15 //
analyzed: na barha bhāraḥ patitasya śaṅkoḥ niṣādi vakṣaḥ sthalam ātanoti

original: ujjhatsu saṃhāra ivāstasaṃkhyam ahnāya tejasviṣu jīvitāni /
analyzed: ujjhatsu saṃhāre iva astasaṃkhyam ahnāya tejasviṣu jīvitāni

original: lokatrayāsvādanalolajihvaṃ na vyādadāty ānanam atra mṛtyuḥ // BhKir_16.16 //
analyzed: lokatraya āsvādana lola jihvam na vyādadāti ānanam atra mṛtyuḥ

original: iyaṃ ca durvāramahārathānām ākṣipya vīryaṃ mahatāṃ balānām /
analyzed: iyam ca durvāra mahā rathānām ākṣipya vīryam mahatām balānām

original: śaktir mamāvasyati hīnayuddhe saurīva tārādhipadhāmni dīptiḥ // BhKir_16.17 //
analyzed: śaktiḥ mama avasyati hīna yuddhe saurī iva tārādhipa dhāmni dīptiḥ

original: māyā svid eṣā mativibhramo vā dhvastaṃ nu me vīryam utāham anyaḥ /
analyzed: māyā svid eṣā mati vibhramaḥ vā dhvastam nu me vīryam uta aham anyaḥ

original: gāṇḍīvamuktā hi yathā purā me parākramante na śarāḥ kirāte // BhKir_16.18 //
analyzed: gāṇḍīva muktāḥ hi yathā purā me parākramante na śarāḥ kirāte

original: puṃsaḥ padaṃ madhyamam uttamasya dvidheva kurvan dhanuṣaḥ praṇādaiḥ /
analyzed: puṃsaḥ padam madhyamam uttamasya dvidhā iva kurvan dhanuṣaḥ praṇādaiḥ

original: nūnaṃ tathā naiṣā yathāsya veṣaḥ pracchannam apy ūhayate hi ceṣṭā // BhKir_16.19 //
analyzed: nūnam tathā nā eṣā yathā asya veṣaḥ pracchannam api ūhayate hi ceṣṭā

original: dhanuḥ prabandhadhvanitaṃ ruṣeva sakṛd vikṛṣṭā vitateva maurvī /
analyzed: dhanuḥ prabandha dhvanitam ruṣā iva sakṛt vikṛṣṭā vitatā iva maurvī

original: saṃdhānam utkarṣam iva vyudasya muṣṭer asambheda ivāpavarge // BhKir_16.20 //
analyzed: saṃdhānam utkarṣam iva vyudasya muṣṭeḥ a sambhedaḥ iva apavarge

original: aṃsāv avaṣṭabdhanatau samādhiḥ śirodharāyā rahitaprayāsaḥ /
analyzed: aṃsau avaṣṭabdha natau samādhiḥ śirodharāyāḥ rahita prayāsaḥ

original: dhṛtā vikārāṃs tyajatā mukhena prasādalakṣmīḥ śaśalāñchanasya // BhKir_16.21 //
analyzed: dhṛtā vikārān tyajatā mukhena prasāda lakṣmīḥ śaśalāñchanasya

original: prahīyate kāryavaśāgateṣu sthāneṣu viṣṭabdhatayā na dehaḥ /
analyzed: prahīyate kārya vaśa āgateṣu sthāneṣu viṣṭabdha tayā na dehaḥ

original: sthitaprayāteṣu sasauṣṭhavaś ca lakṣyeṣu pātaḥ sadṛśaḥ śarāṇām // BhKir_16.22 //
analyzed: sthita prayāteṣu sa sauṣṭhavaḥ ca lakṣyeṣu pātaḥ sadṛśaḥ śarāṇām

original: parasya bhūyān vivare 'bhiyogaḥ prasahya saṃrakṣaṇam ātmarandhre /
analyzed: parasya bhūyān vivare bhiyogaḥ prasahya saṃrakṣaṇam ātma randhre

original: bhīṣme 'py asambhāvyam idaṃ gurau vā na sambhavaty eva vanecareṣu // BhKir_16.23 //
analyzed: bhīṣme pi asambhāvyam idam gurau vā na sambhavati eva vanecareṣu

original: aprākṛtasyāhavadurmadasya nivāryam asyāstrabalena vīryam /
analyzed: aprākṛtasya āhava durmadasya nivāryam asya astra balena vīryam

original: alpīyaso 'py āmayatulyavṛtter mahāpakārāya ripor vivṛddhiḥ // BhKir_16.24 //
analyzed: alpīyasaḥ api āmaya tulya vṛtteḥ mahā apakārāya ripoḥ vivṛddhiḥ

original: sa sampradhāryaivam ahāryasāraḥ sāraṃ vineṣyan sagaṇasya śatroḥ /
analyzed: sa sampradhārya evam a hārya sāraḥ sāram vineṣyan sa gaṇasya śatroḥ

original: prasvāpanāstraṃ drutam ājahāra dhvāntaṃ ghanānaddha ivārdharātraḥ // BhKir_16.25 //
analyzed: prasvāpana astram drutam ājahāra dhvāntam ghana ānaddhaḥ iva ardharātraḥ

original: prasaktadāvānaladhūmadhūmrā nirundhatī dhāma sahasraraśmeḥ /
analyzed: prasakta dāva anala dhūma dhūmrā nirundhatī dhāma sahasraraśmeḥ

original: mahāvanānīva mahātamisrā chāyā tatāneśabalāni kālī // BhKir_16.26 //
analyzed: mahā vanāni iva mahā tamisrā chāyā tatāna īśa balāni kālī

original: āsāditā tatprathamaṃ prasahya pragalbhatāyāḥ padavīṃ harantī /
analyzed: āsāditā tad prathamam prasahya pragalbha tāyāḥ padavīm harantī

original: sabheva bhīmā vidadhe gaṇānāṃ nidrā nirāsaṃ pratibhāguṇasya // BhKir_16.27 //
analyzed: sabhā iva bhīmā vidadhe gaṇānām nidrā nirāsam pratibhā guṇasya

original: gurusthirāṇy uttamavaṃśajatvād vijñātasārāṇy anuśīlanena /
analyzed: guru sthirāṇi uttama vaṃśa ja tvāt vijñāta sārāṇi anuśīlanena

original: kecit samāśritya guṇān vitāni suhṛtkulānīva dhanūṃṣi tasthuḥ // BhKir_16.28 //
analyzed: kecid samāśritya guṇān suhṛd kulāni iva dhanūṃṣi tasthuḥ

original: kṛtāntadurvṛtta ivāpareṣāṃ puraḥ pratidvandvini pāṇḍavāstre /
analyzed: kṛtānta durvṛtte iva apareṣām puras pratidvandvini pāṇḍava astre

original: atarkitaṃ pāṇitalān nipetuḥ kriyāphalānīva tadāyudhāni // BhKir_16.29 //
analyzed: atarkitam pāṇi talāt nipetuḥ kriyā phalāni iva tad āyudhāni

original: aṃsasthalaiḥ kecid abhinnadhairyāḥ skandheṣu saṃśleṣavatāṃ tarūṇām /
analyzed: aṃsa sthalaiḥ kecid abhinna dhairyāḥ skandheṣu saṃśleṣavatām tarūṇām

original: madena mīlannayanāḥ salīlaṃ nāgā iva srastakarā niṣeduḥ // BhKir_16.30 //
analyzed: madena mīlat nayanāḥ sa līlam nāgāḥ iva srasta karāḥ niṣeduḥ

original: tirohitendor atha śambhumūrdhnaḥ praṇamyamānaṃ tapasāṃ nivāsaiḥ /
analyzed: tirohita indoḥ atha śambhu mūrdhnaḥ praṇamyamānam tapasām nivāsaiḥ

original: sumeruśṛṅgād iva bimbam ārkaṃ piśaṅgam uccair udiyāya tejaḥ // BhKir_16.31 //
analyzed: sumeru śṛṅgāt iva bimbam ārkam piśaṅgam uccais udiyāya tejaḥ

original: chāyāṃ vinirdhūya tamomayīṃ tāṃ tattvasya saṃvittir ivāpavidyām /
analyzed: chāyām vinirdhūya tamaḥ mayīm tām tattvasya saṃvittiḥ iva apavidyām

original: yayau vikāsaṃ dyutir indumauler ālokam abhyādiśatī gaṇebhyaḥ // BhKir_16.32 //
analyzed: yayau vikāsam dyutiḥ indumauleḥ ālokam abhyādiśatī gaṇebhyaḥ

original: tviṣāṃ tatiḥ pāṭalitāmbuvāhā sā sarvataḥ pūrvasarīva saṃdhyā /
analyzed: tviṣām tatiḥ pāṭalita ambuvāhā sā sarvatas pūrvasarī iva saṃdhyā

original: nināya teṣāṃ drutam ullasantī vinidratāṃ locanapaṅkajāni // BhKir_16.33 //
analyzed: nināya teṣām drutam ullasantī vinidra tām locana paṅkajāni

original: pṛthagvidhāny astravirāmabuddhāḥ śastrāṇi bhūyaḥ pratipedire te /
analyzed: pṛthagvidhāni astra virāma buddhāḥ śastrāṇi bhūyas pratipedire te

original: muktā vitānena balāhakānāṃ jyotīṃṣi ramyā iva digvibhāgāḥ // BhKir_16.34 //
analyzed: muktāḥ vitānena balāhakānām jyotīṃṣi ramyāḥ iva diś vibhāgāḥ

original: dyaur unnanāmeva diśaḥ praseduḥ sphuṭaṃ visasre savitur mayūkhaiḥ /
analyzed: dyauḥ unnanāma iva diśaḥ praseduḥ sphuṭam visasre savituḥ mayūkhaiḥ

original: kṣayaṃ gatāyām iva yāmavatyāṃ punaḥ samīyāya dinaṃ dinaśrīḥ // BhKir_16.35 //
analyzed: kṣayam gatāyām iva yāmavatyām punar samīyāya dinam dina śrīḥ

original: mahāstradurge śithilaprayatnaṃ digvāraṇeneva pareṇa rugṇe /
analyzed: mahā astra durge śithila prayatnam digvāraṇena iva pareṇa rugṇe

original: bhujaṅgapāśān bhujavīryaśālī prabandhanāya prajighāya jiṣṇuḥ // BhKir_16.36 //
analyzed: bhujaṅga pāśān bhuja vīrya śālī prabandhanāya prajighāya jiṣṇuḥ

original: jihvāśatāny ullasayanty ajasraṃ lasattaḍillolaviṣānalāni /
analyzed: jihvā śatāni ullasayanti ajasram lasat taḍit lola viṣa analāni

original: trāsān nirastāṃ bhujagendrasenā nabhaścarais tatpadavīṃ vivavre // BhKir_16.37 //
analyzed: trāsāt nirastām bhujaga indra senā nabhaḥ caraiḥ tad padavīm vivavre

original: diṅnāgahastākṛtim udvahadbhir bhogaiḥ praśastāsitaratnanīlaiḥ /
analyzed: diṅnāga hasta ākṛtim udvahadbhiḥ bhogaiḥ praśasta asita ratna nīlaiḥ

original: rarāja sarpāvalir ullasantī taraṅgamāleva nabhorṇavasya // BhKir_16.38 //
analyzed: rarāja sarpa āvaliḥ ullasantī taraṅga mālā iva nabhaḥ ūrṇavasya

original: niḥśvāsadhūmaiḥ sthagitāṃśujālaṃ phaṇāvatām utphaṇamaṇḍalānām /
analyzed: niḥśvāsa dhūmaiḥ sthagita aṃśu jālam phaṇāvatām utphaṇa maṇḍalānām

original: gacchann ivāstaṃ vapur abhyuvāha vilocanānāṃ sukham uṣṇaraśmiḥ // BhKir_16.39 //
analyzed: gacchan iva astam vapuḥ abhyuvāha vilocanānām sukham uṣṇaraśmiḥ

original: prataptacāmīkarabhāsureṇa diśaḥ prakāśena piśaṅgayantyaḥ /
analyzed: pratapta cāmīkara bhāsureṇa diśaḥ prakāśena piśaṅgayantyaḥ

original: niścakramuḥ prāṇaharekṣaṇānāṃ jvālā maholkā iva locanebhyaḥ // BhKir_16.40 //
analyzed: niścakramuḥ prāṇa hara īkṣaṇānām jvālāḥ mahā ulkāḥ iva locanebhyaḥ

original: ākṣiptasampātam apetaśobham udvahni dhūmākkuladigvibhāgam /
analyzed: ākṣipta sampātam apeta śobham udvahni dhūma akkula diś vibhāgam

original: vṛtaṃ nabho bhogikulair avasthāṃ paroparuddhasya purasya bheje // BhKir_16.41 //
analyzed: vṛtam nabhaḥ bhogi kulaiḥ avasthām para uparuddhasya purasya bheje

original: tam āśu cakṣuḥśravasāṃ samūhaṃ mantreṇa tārkṣyodayakāraṇena /
analyzed: tam āśu cakṣuḥśravasām samūham mantreṇa tārkṣya udaya kāraṇena

original: netā nayeneva paropajāpaṃ nivārayāmāsa patiḥ paśūnām // BhKir_16.42 //
analyzed: netā nayena iva para upajāpam nivārayāmāsa patiḥ paśūnām

original: pratighnatībhiḥ kṛtamīlitāni dyulokabhājām api locanāni /
analyzed: pratighnatībhiḥ kṛta mīlitāni dyu loka bhājām api locanāni

original: garutmatā saṃhatibhir vihāyaḥ kṣaṇaprakāśābhir ivāvatene // BhKir_16.43 //
analyzed: garutmatā saṃhatibhiḥ vihāyaḥ kṣaṇaprakāśābhiḥ iva avatene

original: tataḥ suparṇavrajapakṣajanmā nānāgatir maṇḍalayañ javena /
analyzed: tatas suparṇa vraja pakṣa janmā nānāgatiḥ maṇḍalayam javena

original: jarattṛṇānīva viyan nināya vanaspatīnāṃ gahanāni vāyuḥ // BhKir_16.44 //
analyzed: jarat tṛṇāni iva viyat nināya vanaspatīnām gahanāni vāyuḥ

original: manaḥśilābhaṅganibhena paścān nirudhyamānaṃ nikareṇa bhāsām /
analyzed: manaḥśilā bhaṅga nibhena paścāt nirudhyamānam nikareṇa bhāsām

original: vyūḍhair urobhiś ca vinudyamānaṃ nabhaḥ sasarpeva puraḥ khagānām // BhKir_16.45 //
analyzed: vyūḍhaiḥ urobhiḥ ca vinudyamānam nabhaḥ sasarpa iva puras khagānām

original: darīmukhair āsavarāgatāmraṃ vikāsi rukmacchadadhāma pītvā /
analyzed: darīmukhaiḥ āsava rāga tāmram vikāsi rukma chada dhāma pītvā

original: javānilāghūrṇitasānujālo himācalaḥ kṣība ivācakampe // BhKir_16.46 //
analyzed: java anilāḥ ghūrṇita sānu jālaḥ himācalaḥ kṣībaḥ iva ācakampe

original: pravṛttanaktaṃdivasaṃdhidīptair nabhastalaṃ gāṃ ca piśaṅgayaṣṭiḥ /
analyzed: pravṛtta naktaṃdiva saṃdhi dīptaiḥ nabhastalam gām ca piśaṅga yaṣṭiḥ

original: antarhitārkaiḥ paritaḥ patadbhiś chāyāḥ samācikṣipire vanānām // BhKir_16.47 //
analyzed: antarhita arkaiḥ paritas patadbhiḥ chāyāḥ samācikṣipire vanānām

original: sa bhogasaṃghaḥ śamam ugradhāmnāṃ sainyena ninye vinatāsutānām /
analyzed: sa bhoga saṃghaḥ śamam ugra dhāmnām sainyena ninye vinatā sutānām

original: mahādhvare vidhyapacāradoṣaḥ karmāntareṇeva mahodayena // BhKir_16.48 //
analyzed: mahā adhvare vidhi apacāra doṣaḥ karma antareṇa iva mahā udayena

original: sāphalyam astre ripupauruṣasya kṛtvā gate bhāgya iavāpavargam /
analyzed: sāphalyam astre ripu pauruṣasya kṛtvā gate bhāgye iava apavargam

original: anindhanasya prasabhaṃ samanyuḥ samādade 'straṃ jvalanasya jiṣṇuḥ // BhKir_16.49 //
analyzed: an indhanasya prasabham sa manyuḥ samādade stram jvalanasya jiṣṇuḥ

original: ūrdhvaṃ tiraścīnam adhaś ca kīrṇair jvālāsaṭair laṅghitameghapaṅktiḥ /
analyzed: ūrdhvam tiraścīnam adhas ca kīrṇaiḥ jvālā saṭaiḥ laṅghita megha paṅktiḥ

original: āyastasiṃhākṛtir utpapāta prāṇyantam icchann iva jātavedāḥ // BhKir_16.50 //
analyzed: āyasta siṃha ākṛtiḥ utpapāta prāṇi antam icchan iva jātavedāḥ

original: bhittveva bhābhiḥ savitur mayūkhāñ jajvāla viṣvag visṛtasphuliṅgaḥ /
analyzed: bhittvā iva bhābhiḥ savituḥ mayūkhām jajvāla viṣvak visṛta sphuliṅgaḥ

original: vidīryamāṇāśmaninādadhīraṃ dhvaniṃ vitanvann akṛśaḥ kṛśānuḥ // BhKir_16.51 //
analyzed: vidīryamāṇa aśma nināda dhīram dhvanim vitanvan a kṛśaḥ kṛśānuḥ

original: cayān ivādrīn iva tuṅgaśṛṅgān kvacit purāṇīva hiraṇmayāni /
analyzed: cayān iva adrīn iva tuṅga śṛṅgān kvacid purāṇi iva hiraṇmayāni

original: mahāvanānīva ca kiṃśukānām attāna vahniḥ pavanānuvṛttyā // BhKir_16.52 //
analyzed: mahā vanāni iva ca kiṃśukānām vahniḥ pavana anuvṛttyā

original: muhuś calatpallavalohinībhir uccaiḥ śikhābhiḥ śikhino 'valīḍhāḥ /
analyzed: muhur calat pallava lohinībhiḥ uccais śikhābhiḥ śikhinaḥ valīḍhāḥ

original: taleṣu muktāviśadā babhūvuḥ sāndrāñjjanaśyāmarucaḥ payodāḥ // BhKir_16.53 //
analyzed: taleṣu muktā viśadāḥ babhūvuḥ sāndrān jana śyāma rucaḥ payodāḥ

original: lilikṣatīva kṣayakālaraudre lokaṃ vilolārciṣi rohitāśve /
analyzed: lilikṣati iva kṣaya kāla raudre lokam vilola arciṣi rohitāśve

original: pinākinā hūtamahāmbuvāham astraṃ punaḥ pāśabhṛtaḥ praṇinye // BhKir_16.54 //
analyzed: pinākinā hūta mahā ambuvāham astram punar pāśabhṛtaḥ praṇinye

original: tato dharitrīdharatulyarodhasas taḍillatāliṅgitanīlamūrtayaḥ /
analyzed: tatas dharitrīdhara tulya rodhasaḥ taḍit latā āliṅgita nīla mūrtayaḥ

original: adhomukhākāśasarinnipātinīr apaḥ prasaktaṃ mumucuḥ payomucaḥ // BhKir_16.55 //
analyzed: adhas mukha ākāśa sarit nipātinīḥ apaḥ prasaktam mumucuḥ payomucaḥ

original: parāhatadhvastaśikhe śikhāvato vapuṣy adhikṣiptasamiddhatejasi /
analyzed: parāhata dhvasta śikhe śikhāvataḥ vapuṣi adhikṣipta samiddha tejasi

original: kṛtāspadās tapta ivāyasi dhvaniṃ payonipātāḥ prathame vitenire // BhKir_16.56 //
analyzed: kṛta āspadāḥ tapte iva ayasi dhvanim payaḥ nipātāḥ prathame vitenire

original: mahānale bhinnasitābhrapātibhiḥ sametya sadyaḥ kathanena phenatām /
analyzed: mahā anale bhinna sita abhra pātibhiḥ sametya sadyas kathanena phena tām

original: vrajadbhir ārdrendhanavat parikṣayaṃ jalair vitene divi dhūmasaṃtatiḥ // BhKir_16.57 //
analyzed: vrajadbhiḥ ārdra indhana vat parikṣayam jalaiḥ vitene divi dhūma saṃtatiḥ

original: svaketubhiḥ pāṇḍuranīlapāṭalaiḥ samāgatāḥ śakradhanuḥprabhābhidaḥ /
analyzed: sva ketubhiḥ pāṇḍura nīla pāṭalaiḥ samāgatāḥ śakradhanuḥ prabhā bhidaḥ

original: asaṃsthitām ādadhire vibhāvasor vicitracīnāṃśukacārutāṃ tviṣaḥ // BhKir_16.58 //
analyzed: a saṃsthitām ādadhire vibhāvasoḥ vicitra cīna aṃśuka cāru tām tviṣaḥ

original: jalaughasaṃmūrchanamūrchitasvanaḥ prasaktavidyullasitaidhitadyutiḥ /
analyzed: jala ogha saṃmūrchana mūrchita svanaḥ prasakta vidyut lasita edhita dyutiḥ

original: praśāntim eṣyan dhṛtadhūmamaṇḍalo babhūva bhūyān iva tatra pāvakaḥ // BhKir_16.59 //
analyzed: praśāntim eṣyan dhṛta dhūma maṇḍalaḥ babhūva bhūyān iva tatra pāvakaḥ

original: pravṛddhasindhūrmicayasthavīyasāṃ cayair vibhinnāḥ payasāṃ prapedire /
analyzed: pravṛddha sindhu ūrmi caya sthavīyasām cayaiḥ vibhinnāḥ payasām prapedire

original: upāttasaṃdhyārucibhiḥ sarūpatāṃ payodavicchedalavaiḥ kṛśānavaḥ // BhKir_16.60 //
analyzed: upātta saṃdhyā rucibhiḥ sarūpa tām payoda viccheda lavaiḥ kṛśānavaḥ

original: upaity anantadyutir apy asaṃśayaṃ vibhinnamūlo 'nudayāya saṃkṣayam /
analyzed: upaiti ananta dyutiḥ api asaṃśayam vibhinna mūlaḥ saṃkṣayam

original: tathā hi toyaughavibhinnasaṃhatiḥ sa havyavāhaḥ prayayau parābhavam // BhKir_16.61 //
analyzed: tathā hi toya ogha vibhinna saṃhatiḥ sa havyavāhaḥ prayayau parābhavam

original: atha vihitavidheyair āśu muktā vitānair asitanaganitambaśyāmabhāsāṃ ghanānām /
analyzed: atha vihita vidheyaiḥ āśu muktāḥ vitānaiḥ asita naga nitamba śyāma bhāsām ghanānām

original: vikasadamaladhāmnāṃ prāpa nīlotpalānāṃ śriyam adhikaviśuddhāṃ vahnidāhād iva dyauḥ // BhKir_16.62 //
analyzed: vikasat amala dhāmnām prāpa nīlotpalānām śriyam adhika viśuddhām vahni dāhāt iva dyauḥ

original: iti vividham udāse savyasācī yad astraṃ bahusamaranayajñaḥ sādayiṣyann arātim /
analyzed: iti vividham udāse savyasācī yat astram bahu samara naya jñaḥ sādayiṣyan arātim

original: vidhir iva viparītaḥ pauruṣaṃ nyāyavṛtteḥ sapadi tad upaninye riktatāṃ nīlakaṇṭhaḥ // BhKir_16.63 //
analyzed: vidhiḥ iva viparītaḥ pauruṣam nyāya vṛtteḥ sapadi tat upaninye rikta tām nīlakaṇṭhaḥ

original: vītaprabhāvatanur apy atanuprabhāvaḥ pratyācakāṅkṣa jayinīṃ bhujavīryalakṣmīm /
analyzed: vīta prabhāva tanuḥ api a tanu prabhāvaḥ pratyācakāṅkṣa jayinīm bhuja vīrya lakṣmīm

original: astreṣu bhūtapatināpahṛteṣu jiṣṇur varṣiṣyatā dinakṛteva jaleṣu lokaḥ // BhKir_16.64 //
analyzed: astreṣu bhūtapatinā apahṛteṣu jiṣṇuḥ varṣiṣyatā dinakṛtā iva jaleṣu lokaḥ

original: athāpadām uddharaṇakṣameṣu mitreṣv ivāstreṣu tirohiteṣu /
analyzed: atha āpadām uddharaṇa kṣameṣu mitreṣu iva astreṣu tirohiteṣu

original: dhṛtiṃ guruśrīr guruṇābhipuṣyan svapauruṣeṇeva śarāsanena // BhKir_17.1 //
analyzed: dhṛtim guru śrīḥ guruṇā abhipuṣyan sva pauruṣeṇa iva śarāsanena

original: bhūriprabhāveṇa raṇābhiyogāt prīto vijihmaś ca tadīyavṛddhyā /
analyzed: bhūri prabhāveṇa raṇa abhiyogāt prītaḥ vijihmaḥ ca tadīya vṛddhyā

original: spaṣṭo 'py avispaṣṭavapuḥprakāśaḥ sarpanmahādhūma ivādrivahniḥ // BhKir_17.2 //
analyzed: spaṣṭaḥ pi avispaṣṭa vapuḥ prakāśaḥ sarpat mahā dhūmaḥ iva adri vahniḥ

original: tejaḥ samāśritya parair ahāryaṃ nijaṃ mahanmitram ivorudhairyam /
analyzed: tejaḥ samāśritya paraiḥ a hāryam nijam mahat mitram iva uru dhairyam

original: āsādayann askhalitasvabhāvaṃ bhīme bhujālambam ivāridurge // BhKir_17.3 //
analyzed: āsādayan a skhalita svabhāvam bhīme bhuja ālambam iva ari durge

original: vaṃśocitatvād abhimānavatyā samprāptayā sampriyatām asubhyaḥ /
analyzed: vaṃśa ucita tvāt abhimānavatyā samprāptayā sampriya tām asubhyaḥ

original: samakṣam āditsitayā pareṇa vadhveva kīrtyā paritapyamānaḥ // BhKir_17.4 //
analyzed: samakṣam āditsitayā pareṇa vadhvā iva kīrtyā paritapyamānaḥ

original: patiṃ nagānām iva baddhamūlam unmūlayiṣyaṃs tarasā vipakṣam /
analyzed: patim nagānām iva baddha mūlam unmūlayiṣyan tarasā vipakṣam

original: laghuprayatnaṃ nigṛhītavīryas trimārgagāvega iveśvareṇa // BhKir_17.5 //
analyzed: laghu prayatnam nigṛhīta vīryaḥ tri mārga ga āvegaḥ iva īśvareṇa

original: saṃskāravattvād ramayatsu cetaḥ prayogaśikṣāguṇabhūṣaṇeṣu /
analyzed: saṃskāravat tvāt ramayatsu cetaḥ prayoga śikṣā guṇa bhūṣaṇeṣu

original: jayaṃ yathārtheṣu śareṣu pārthaḥ śabdeṣu bhāvārtham ivāśaśaṃse // BhKir_17.6 //
analyzed: jayam yathā artheṣu śareṣu pārthaḥ śabdeṣu bhāva artham iva āśaśaṃse

original: bhūyaḥ samādhānavivṛddhatejā naivaṃ purā yuddham iti vyathāvān /
analyzed: bhūyas samādhāna vivṛddha tejāḥ na evam purā yuddham iti vyathāvān

original: sa nirvavāmāsram amarṣanunnaṃ viṣaṃ mahānāga ivekṣaṇābhyām // BhKir_17.7 //
analyzed: sa nirvavāma asram amarṣa nunnam viṣam mahā nāgaḥ iva īkṣaṇābhyām

original: tasyāhavāyāsavilolamauleḥ saṃrambhatāmrāyatalocanasya /
analyzed: tasya āhava āyāsa vilola mauleḥ saṃrambha tāmra āyata locanasya

original: nirvāpayiṣyann iva roṣataptaṃ prasnāpayāmāsa mukhaṃ nidāghaḥ // BhKir_17.8 //
analyzed: nirvāpayiṣyan iva roṣa taptam prasnāpayāmāsa mukham nidāghaḥ

original: krodhāndhakārāntarito raṇāya bhrūbhedarekhāḥ sa babhāra tisraḥ /
analyzed: krodha andhakāra antaritaḥ raṇāya bhrū bheda rekhāḥ sa babhāra tisraḥ

original: ghanoparuddhaḥ prabhavāya vṛṣṭer ūrdhvāṃśurājīr iva tigmaraśmiḥ // BhKir_17.9 //
analyzed: ghana uparuddhaḥ prabhavāya vṛṣṭeḥ ūrdhva aṃśu rājīḥ iva tigmaraśmiḥ

original: sa pradhvanayyāmbudanādi cāpaṃ hastena diṅnāga ivādriśṛṅgam /
analyzed: sa pradhvanayya ambuda nādi cāpam hastena diṅnāgaḥ iva adri śṛṅgam

original: balāni śambhor iṣubhis tatāpa cetāṃsi cintābhir ivāśarīraḥ // BhKir_17.10 //
analyzed: balāni śambhoḥ iṣubhiḥ tatāpa cetāṃsi cintābhiḥ iva aśarīraḥ

original: sadvāditevābhiniviṣṭabuddhau guṇābhyasūyeva vipakṣapāte /
analyzed: sat vādi tā iva abhiniviṣṭa buddhau guṇa abhyasūyā iva vipakṣapāte

original: agocare vāg iva copareme śaktiḥ śarāṇāṃ śitikaṇṭhakāye // BhKir_17.11 //
analyzed: agocare vāc iva ca upareme śaktiḥ śarāṇām śitikaṇṭha kāye

original: umāpatiṃ pāṇḍusutapraṇunnāḥ śilīmukhā na vyathayāṃbabhūvuḥ /
analyzed: umāpatim pāṇḍu suta praṇunnāḥ śilīmukhāḥ na vyathayāṃbabhūvuḥ

original: abhyutthitasyādripater nitambam arkasya pādā iva haimanasya // BhKir_17.12 //
analyzed: abhyutthitasya adripateḥ nitambam arkasya pādāḥ iva haimanasya

original: samprīyamāṇo 'nubabhūva tīvraṃ parākramaṃ tasya patir gaṇānām /
analyzed: samprīyamāṇaḥ nubabhūva tīvram parākramam tasya patiḥ gaṇānām

original: viṣāṇabhedaṃ himavān asahyaṃ vaprānatasyeva suradvipasya // BhKir_17.13 //
analyzed: viṣāṇabhedam himavān asahyam vapra ānatasya iva suradvipasya

original: tasmai hi bhāroddharaṇe samarthaṃ pradāsyatā bāhum iva pratāpam /
analyzed: tasmai hi bhāra uddharaṇe samartham pradāsyatā bāhum iva pratāpam

original: ciraṃ viṣehe 'bhibhavas tadānīṃ sa kāraṇānām api kāraṇena // BhKir_17.14 //
analyzed: ciram viṣehe bhibhavaḥ tadānīm sa kāraṇānām api kāraṇena

original: pratyāhataujāḥ kṛtasattvavegaḥ parākramaṃ jyāyasi yas tanoti /
analyzed: pratyāhata ojāḥ kṛta sattva vegaḥ parākramam jyāyasi yaḥ tanoti

original: tejāṃsi bhānor iva niṣpatanti yaśāṃsi vīryajvalitāni tasya // BhKir_17.15 //
analyzed: tejāṃsi bhānoḥ iva niṣpatanti yaśāṃsi vīrya jvalitāni tasya

original: dṛṣṭāvadānād vyathate 'rilokaḥ pradhvaṃsam eti vyathitāc ca tejaḥ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭa avadānāt vyathate ri lokaḥ pradhvaṃsam eti vyathitāt ca tejaḥ

original: tejovihīnaṃ vijahāti darpaḥ śāntārciṣaṃ dīpam iva prakāśaḥ // BhKir_17.16 //
analyzed: tejaḥ vihīnam vijahāti darpaḥ śānta arciṣam dīpam iva prakāśaḥ

original: tataḥ prayātyastamadāvalepaḥ sa jayyatāyāḥ padavīṃ jigīṣoḥ /
analyzed: tatas prayāti asta mada avalepaḥ sa jayya tāyāḥ padavīm jigīṣoḥ

original: gandhena jetuḥ pramukhāgatasya pratidvipasyeva mataṅgajaughaḥ // BhKir_17.17 //
analyzed: gandhena jetuḥ pramukha āgatasya pratidvipasya iva mataṅga ja oghaḥ

original: evaṃ pratidvandviṣu tasya kīrtiṃ maulīndulekhāviśadāṃ vidhāsyan /
analyzed: evam pratidvandviṣu tasya kīrtim mauli indu lekhā viśadām vidhāsyan

original: iyeṣa paryāyajayāvasādāṃ raṇakriyāṃ śambhur anukrameṇa // BhKir_17.18 //
analyzed: iyeṣa paryāya jaya avasādām raṇa kriyām śambhuḥ anukrameṇa

original: muner vicitrair iṣubhiḥ sa bhūyān ninye vaśaṃ bhūtapater balaughaḥ /
analyzed: muneḥ vicitraiḥ iṣubhiḥ sa bhūyāt ninye vaśam bhūtapateḥ bala oghaḥ

original: sahātmalābhena samutpatadbhir jātisvabhāvair iva jīvalokaḥ // BhKir_17.19 //
analyzed: saha ātmalābhena samutpatadbhiḥ jāti svabhāvaiḥ iva jīva lokaḥ

original: vitanvatas tasya śarāndhakāraṃ trastāni sainyāni ravaṃ niśemuḥ /
analyzed: vitanvataḥ tasya śara andhakāram trastāni sainyāni ravam niśemuḥ

original: pravarṣataḥ saṃtatavepathūni kṣapāghanasyeva gavāṃ kulāni // BhKir_17.20 //
analyzed: pravarṣataḥ saṃtata vepathūni kṣapā ghanasya iva gavām kulāni

original: sa sāyakān sādhvasaviplutānāṃ kṣipan pareṣām atisauṣṭhavena /
analyzed: sa sāyakān sādhvasa viplutānām kṣipan pareṣām ati sauṣṭhavena

original: śaśīva doṣāvṛtalocanānāṃ vibhidyamānaḥ pṛthag ābabhāse // BhKir_17.21 //
analyzed: śaśī iva doṣa āvṛta locanānām vibhidyamānaḥ pṛthak ābabhāse

original: kṣobheṇa tenātha gaṇādhipānāṃ bhedaṃ yayav ākṛtir īśvarasya /
analyzed: kṣobheṇa tena atha gaṇa adhipānām bhedam yayau ākṛtiḥ īśvarasya

original: taraṅgakampena mahāhradānāṃ chāyāmayasyeva dinasya kartuḥ // BhKir_17.22 //
analyzed: taraṅga kampena mahā hradānām chāyā mayasya iva dinasya kartuḥ

original: prasedivāṃsaṃ na tam āpa kopaḥ kutaḥ parasmin puruṣe vikāraḥ /
analyzed: prasedivāṃsam na tam āpa kopaḥ kutas parasmin puruṣe vikāraḥ

original: ākāravaiṣamyam idaṃ ca bheje durlakṣyacihnā mahatāṃ hi vṛttiḥ // BhKir_17.23 //
analyzed: ākāra vaiṣamyam idam ca bheje durlakṣya cihnā mahatām hi vṛttiḥ

original: visphāryamāṇasya tato bhujābhyāṃ bhūtāni bhartrā dhanur antakasya /
analyzed: visphāryamāṇasya tatas bhujābhyām bhūtāni bhartrā dhanuḥ antakasya

original: bhinnākṛtiṃ jyāṃ dadṛśuḥ sphurantīṃ kruddhasya jihvām iva takṣakasya // BhKir_17.24 //
analyzed: bhinna ākṛtim jyām dadṛśuḥ sphurantīm kruddhasya jihvām iva takṣakasya

original: svyāpasavyadhvanitogracāpaṃ pārthaḥ kirātādhipam āśaśaṅke /
analyzed: svya apasavya dhvanita ugra cāpam pārthaḥ kirāta adhipam āśaśaṅke

original: paryāyasampāditakarṇatālaṃ yantā gajaṃ vyālam ivāparāddhaḥ // BhKir_17.25 //
analyzed: paryāya sampādita karṇa tālam yantā gajam vyālam iva aparāddhaḥ

original: nijaghnire tasya hareṣujālaiḥ patanti vṛndāni śilīmukhānām /
analyzed: nijaghnire tasya hara iṣu jālaiḥ patanti vṛndāni śilīmukhānām

original: ūrjasvibhiḥ sindhumukhāgatāni yādāṃsi yādobhir ivāmburāśeḥ // BhKir_17.26 //
analyzed: ūrjasvibhiḥ sindhu mukha āgatāni yādāṃsi yādobhiḥ iva amburāśeḥ

original: vibhedam antaḥ padavīnirodhaṃ vidhvaṃsanaṃ cāviditaprayogaḥ /
analyzed: vibhedam antar padavī nirodham vidhvaṃsanam ca avidita prayogaḥ

original: netārilokeṣu karoti yad yat tat tac cakārāsya śareṣu śambhuḥ // BhKir_17.27 //
analyzed: netāri lokeṣu karoti yat yat tat tat cakāra asya śareṣu śambhuḥ

original: soḍhāvagītaprathamāyudhasya krodhojjhitair vegitayā patadbhiḥ /
analyzed: soḍha avagīta prathama āyudhasya krodha ujjhitaiḥ vegi tayā patadbhiḥ

original: chinnair api trāsitavāhinīkaiḥ pete kṛtārthair iva tasya bāṇaiḥ // BhKir_17.28 //
analyzed: chinnaiḥ api trāsita vāhinīkaiḥ pete kṛtārthaiḥ iva tasya bāṇaiḥ

original: alaṃkṛtānām ṛjutāguṇena gurūpadiṣṭāṃ gatim āsthitānām /
analyzed: alaṃkṛtānām ṛju tā guṇena guru upadiṣṭām gatim āsthitānām

original: satām ivāparvaṇi mārgaṇānāṃ bhaṅgaḥ sa jiṣṇor dhṛtim unmamātha // BhKir_17.29 //
analyzed: satām iva aparvaṇi mārgaṇānām bhaṅgaḥ sa jiṣṇoḥ dhṛtim unmamātha

original: bāṇacchidas te viśikhāḥ smarārer avāṅmukhībhūtaphalāḥ patantaḥ /
analyzed: bāṇa chidaḥ te viśikhāḥ smarāreḥ avāk mukhībhūta phalāḥ patantaḥ

original: akhaṇḍitaṃ pāṇḍavasāyakebhyaḥ kṛtasya sadyaḥ pratikāram āpuḥ // BhKir_17.30 //
analyzed: akhaṇḍitam pāṇḍava sāyakebhyaḥ kṛtasya sadyas pratikāram āpuḥ

original: citrīyamāṇān atilāghavena pramāthinas tān bhavamārgaṇānām /
analyzed: citrīyamāṇān ati lāghavena pramāthinaḥ tān bhava mārgaṇānām

original: samākulāyā nicakhāna dūraṃ bāṇān dhvajinyā hṛdayeṣv arātiḥ // BhKir_17.31 //
analyzed: samākulāyāḥ nicakhāna dūram bāṇān dhvajinyāḥ hṛdayeṣu arātiḥ

original: tasyātiyatnād atiricyamāne parākrame 'nyonyaviśeṣaṇena /
analyzed: tasya ati yatnāt atiricyamāne parākrame nyonya viśeṣaṇena

original: hantā purāṃ bhūri pṛṣatkavarṣaṃ nirāsa naidāgha ivāmbu meghaḥ // BhKir_17.32 //
analyzed: hantā purām bhūri pṛṣatka varṣam nirāsa naidāghaḥ iva ambu meghaḥ

original: anāmṛśantaḥ kvacid eva marma priyaiṣiṇānuprahitāḥ śivena /
analyzed: an āmṛśantaḥ kvacid eva marma priya eṣiṇā anuprahitāḥ śivena

original: suhṛtprayuktā iva narmavādāḥ śarā muneḥ prītikarā babhūvuḥ // BhKir_17.33 //
analyzed: suhṛd prayuktāḥ iva narma vādāḥ śarāḥ muneḥ prīti karāḥ babhūvuḥ

original: astraiḥ samānām atirekiṇīṃ vā paśyanīṣūṇām api tasya śaktim /
analyzed: astraiḥ samānām atirekiṇīm vā paśyanīṣūṇām api tasya śaktim

original: viṣādavaktavyabalaḥ pramāthī svam ālalambe balam indumauliḥ // BhKir_17.34 //
analyzed: viṣāda vaktavya balaḥ pramāthī svam ālalambe balam indumauliḥ

original: tapas tapovīryasamuddhatasya pāraṃ yiyāsoḥ samarārṇavasya /
analyzed: tapaḥ tapaḥ vīrya samuddhatasya pāram yiyāsoḥ samara arṇavasya

original: maheṣujālāny akhilāni jiṣṇor arkaḥ payāṃsīva samācacāma // BhKir_17.35 //
analyzed: mahā iṣu jālāni akhilāni jiṣṇoḥ arkaḥ payāṃsi iva samācacāma

original: rikte savisrambham ath+arjunasya niṣaṅgavaktre nipatāta pāṇiḥ /
analyzed: rikte sa visrambham atha arjunasya niṣaṅga vaktre nipatāta pāṇiḥ

original: anyadvipāpītajale satarṣaṃ mataṅgajasyeva nagāśmarandhre // BhKir_17.36 //
analyzed: anya dvipa āpīta jale sa tarṣam mataṅga jasya iva naga aśma randhre

original: cyute sa tasminn iṣudhau śarārthād dhvastārthasāre sahaseva bandhau /
analyzed: cyute sa tasmin iṣudhau śara arthāt dhvasta artha sāre sahasā iva bandhau

original: tatkālamoghapraṇayaḥ prapede nirvācyatākāma ivābhimukhyam // BhKir_17.37 //
analyzed: tad kāla mogha praṇayaḥ prapede nirvācya tā kāmaḥ iva ābhimukhyam

original: āghaṭṭayāmāsa gatāgatābhyāṃ sāvegam agrāṅgulir asya tūṇau /
analyzed: āghaṭṭayāmāsa gata āgatābhyām sa āvegam agra aṅguliḥ asya tūṇau

original: vidheyamārge matir utsukasya nayaprayogāv iva gāṃ jigīṣoḥ // BhKir_17.38 //
analyzed: vidheya mārge matiḥ utsukasya naya prayogau iva gām jigīṣoḥ

original: babhāra śūnyākṛtir arjunas tau maheṣudhī vītamaheṣujālau /
analyzed: babhāra śūnya ākṛtiḥ arjunaḥ tau mahā iṣudhī vīta mahā iṣu jālau

original: yugāntasaṃśuṣkajalau vijihmaḥ pūrvāparau loka ivāmburāśī // BhKir_17.39 //
analyzed: yugānta saṃśuṣka jalau vijihmaḥ pūrva aparau lokaḥ iva amburāśī

original: tenātimittena tathā na pārthas tayor yathā riktatayānutepe /
analyzed: tena atimittena tathā na pārthaḥ tayoḥ yathā rikta tayā anutepe

original: svām āpadaṃ projjhya vipattimagnaṃ śocanti santo hy upakāripakṣam // BhKir_17.40 //
analyzed: svām āpadam projjhya vipatti magnam śocanti santaḥ hi upakāri pakṣam

original: pratikriyāyai vidhuraḥ sa tasmāt kṛcchreṇa viśleṣam iyāya hastaḥ /
analyzed: pratikriyāyai vidhuraḥ sa tasmāt kṛcchreṇa viśleṣam iyāya hastaḥ

original: parāṅmukhatve 'pi kṛtopakārāt tūṇīmukhān mitrakulād ivāryaḥ // BhKir_17.41 //
analyzed: parāṅmukha tve pi kṛta upakārāt tūṇīmukhāt mitra kulāt iva āryaḥ

original: paścātkriyā tūṇayugasya bhartur jajñe tadānīm upakāriṇīva /
analyzed: paścātkriyā tūṇa yugasya bhartuḥ jajñe tadānīm upakāriṇī iva

original: sambhāvanāyām adharīkṛtāyāṃ patyuḥ puraḥ sāhasam āsitavyam // BhKir_17.42 //
analyzed: sambhāvanāyām adharīkṛtāyām patyuḥ puras sāhasam āsitavyam

original: taṃ śambhur ākṣiptamaheṣujālaṃ lohaiḥ śarair marmasu nistutoda /
analyzed: tam śambhuḥ ākṣipta mahā iṣu jālam lohaiḥ śaraiḥ marmasu nistutoda

original: hṛttottaraṃ tattvavicāramadhye vakteva doṣair gurubhir vipakṣam // BhKir_17.43 //
analyzed: hṛtta uttaram tattva vicāra madhye vaktā iva doṣaiḥ gurubhiḥ vipakṣam

original: jahāra cāsmād acireṇa varma jvalanmaṇidyotitahaimalekham /
analyzed: jahāra ca asmāt acireṇa varma jvalat maṇi dyotita haima lekham

original: caṇḍaḥ pataṅgān marudekanīlaṃ taḍitvataḥ khaṇḍam ivāmbudasya // BhKir_17.44 //
analyzed: caṇḍaḥ pataṅgān marut eka nīlam taḍitvataḥ khaṇḍam iva ambudasya

original: vikośanirdhautatanor mahāseḥ phaṇāvataś ca tvaci vicyutāyām /
analyzed: vikośa nirdhauta tanoḥ mahā aseḥ phaṇāvataḥ ca tvaci vicyutāyām

original: pratidvipābaddharuṣaḥ samakṣaṃ nāgasya cākṣiptamukhacchadasya // BhKir_17.45 //
analyzed: prati dvipa ābaddha ruṣaḥ samakṣam nāgasya ca ākṣipta mukhacchadasya

original: vibodhitasya dhvaninā ghanānāṃ harer apetasya ca śailarandhrāt /
analyzed: vibodhitasya dhvaninā ghanānām hareḥ apetasya ca śaila randhrāt

original: nirastadhūmasya ca rātrivahner vinā tanutreṇa ruciṃ sa bheje // BhKir_17.46 //
analyzed: nirasta dhūmasya ca rātri vahneḥ vinā tanutreṇa rucim sa bheje

original: acittatāyām api nāma yuktām anūrdhvatāṃ prāpya tadīyakṛcchre /
analyzed: acitta tāyām api nāma yuktām anūrdhva tām prāpya tadīya kṛcchre

original: mahīṃ gatau tāv iṣudhī tadānīṃ vivavratuś cetanayeva yogam // BhKir_17.47 //
analyzed: mahīm gatau tau iṣudhī tadānīm vivavratuḥ cetanayā iva yogam

original: sthitaṃ viśuddhe nabhasīva sattve dhāmnā tapovīryamayena yuktam /
analyzed: sthitam viśuddhe nabhasi iva sattve dhāmnā tapaḥ vīrya mayena yuktam

original: śastrābhighātais tam ajasram īśas tvaṣṭā vivasvantam ivollilekha // BhKir_17.48 //
analyzed: śastra abhighātaiḥ tam ajasram īśaḥ tvaṣṭā vivasvantam iva ullilekha

original: saṃrambhavegojjhitavedaneṣu gātreṣu bāhiryam upāgateṣu /
analyzed: saṃrambha vega ujjhita vedaneṣu gātreṣu bāhiryam upāgateṣu

original: muner babhūvāgaṇiteṣurāśer lauhas tiraskāra ivātmamanyuḥ // BhKir_17.49 //
analyzed: muneḥ babhūva agaṇita iṣu rāśeḥ lauhaḥ tiraskāraḥ iva ātma manyuḥ

original: tato 'nupūrvāyatavṛttabāhuḥ śrīmān kṣarallohitadigdhadehaḥ /
analyzed: tatas nupūrva āyata vṛtta bāhuḥ śrīmān kṣarat lohita digdha dehaḥ

original: āskandya vegena vimuktanādaḥ kṣitiṃ vidhunvann iva pārṣṇighātaiḥ // BhKir_17.50 //
analyzed: āskandya vegena vimukta nādaḥ kṣitim vidhunvan iva pārṣṇi ghātaiḥ

original: sāmyaṃ gatenāśaninā maghonaḥ śaśāṅkakhaṇḍākṛtipāṇḍureṇa /
analyzed: sāmyam gatena aśaninā maghonaḥ śaśāṅka khaṇḍa ākṛti pāṇḍureṇa

original: śambhuṃ bibhitsur dhanuṣā jaghāna stambaṃ viṣāṇena mahān ivebhaḥ // BhKir_17.51 //
analyzed: śambhum bibhitsuḥ dhanuṣā jaghāna stambam viṣāṇena mahān iva ibhaḥ

original: rayeṇa sā saṃnidadhe patantī bhavodbhavenātmani cāpayaṣṭiḥ /
analyzed: rayeṇa sā saṃnidadhe patantī bhavodbhavena ātmani cāpa yaṣṭiḥ

original: samuddhatā sindhur anekamārgā pare sthitenaujasi jahnuneva // BhKir_17.52 //
analyzed: samuddhatā sindhuḥ aneka mārgā pare sthitena ojasi jahnunā iva

original: vikārmukaḥ karmasu śocanīyaḥ paricyutaudārya ivopacāraḥ /
analyzed: vikārmukaḥ karmasu śocanīyaḥ paricyuta audāryaḥ iva upacāraḥ

original: vicikṣipe śūlabhṛtā salīlaṃ sa patribhir dūram adūrapātaiḥ // BhKir_17.53 //
analyzed: vicikṣipe śūlabhṛtā sa līlam sa patribhiḥ dūram adūra pātaiḥ

original: upoḍhakalyāṇaphalo 'bhirakṣan vīravrataṃ puṇyaraṇāśramasthaḥ /
analyzed: upoḍha kalyāṇa phalaḥ abhirakṣan vīra vratam puṇya raṇa āśrama sthaḥ

original: japopavāsair iva saṃyatātmā tepe munis tair iṣubhiḥ śivasya // BhKir_17.54 //
analyzed: japa upavāsaiḥ iva saṃyata ātmā tepe muniḥ taiḥ iṣubhiḥ śivasya

original: tato 'grabhūmiṃ vyavasāyasiddheḥ sīmānam anyair atidustaraṃ saḥ /
analyzed: tatas gra bhūmim vyavasāya siddheḥ sīmānam anyaiḥ ati dustaram saḥ

original: tejaḥśriyām āśrayam uttamāsiṃ sākṣād ahaṃkāram ivālalambe // BhKir_17.55 //
analyzed: tejaḥ śriyām āśrayam uttama asim sākṣāt ahaṃkāram iva ālalambe

original: śarān avadyann anavadyakarmā cacāra citraṃ pravicāramārgaiḥ /
analyzed: śarān avadyan anavadya karmā cacāra citram pravicāra mārgaiḥ

original: hastena nistriṃśabhṛtā sa dīptaḥ sārkāṃśunā vāridhir ūrmiṇeva // BhKir_17.56 //
analyzed: hastena nistriṃśa bhṛtā sa dīptaḥ sa arka aṃśunā vāridhiḥ ūrmiṇā iva

original: yathā nije vartmani bhāti bhābhiś cyāyāmayaś cāpsu sahasraraśmiḥ /
analyzed: yathā nije vartmani bhāti bhābhiḥ cyāyā amayaḥ ca apsu sahasraraśmiḥ

original: tathā nabhasy āśu raṇasthalīṣu spaṣṭadvimūrtir dadṛśe sa bhūtaiḥ // BhKir_17.57 //
analyzed: tathā nabhasi āśu raṇa sthalīṣu spaṣṭa dvi mūrtiḥ dadṛśe sa bhūtaiḥ

original: śivapraṇunnena śilīmukhena tsarupradeśād apavarjitāṅgaḥ /
analyzed: śiva praṇunnena śilīmukhena tsaru pradeśāt apavarjita aṅgaḥ

original: jvalann asis tasya papāta pāṇer ghanasya vaprād iva vaidyuto 'gniḥ // BhKir_17.58 //
analyzed: jvalan asiḥ tasya papāta pāṇeḥ ghanasya vaprāt iva vaidyutaḥ gniḥ

original: ākṣiptacāpāvaraṇeṣujālaś chinnottamāsiḥ sa mṛdhe 'vadhūtaḥ /
analyzed: ākṣipta cāpa āvaraṇa iṣu jālaḥ chinna uttama asiḥ sa mṛdhe vadhūtaḥ

original: riktaḥ prakāśaś ca babhūva bhūmer utsāditodyāna iva pradeśaḥ // BhKir_17.59 //
analyzed: riktaḥ prakāśaḥ ca babhūva bhūmeḥ utsādita udyānaḥ iva pradeśaḥ

original: sa khaṇḍanaṃ prāpya parād amarṣavān bhujadvitīyo 'pi vijetum icchayā /
analyzed: sa khaṇḍanam prāpya parāt amarṣavān bhuja dvitīyaḥ u pi vijetum icchayā

original: sasarja vṛṣṭiṃ parirugṇapādapāṃ dravetareṣāṃ payasām ivāśmanām // BhKir_17.60 //
analyzed: sasarja vṛṣṭim parirugṇa pādapām drava itareṣām payasām iva aśmanām

original: nīrandhraṃ parigamite kṣayaṃ pṛṣatkair bhūtānām adhipatinā śilāvitāne /
analyzed: nīrandhram parigamite kṣayam pṛṣatkaiḥ bhūtānām adhipatinā śilā vitāne

original: ucchrāyasthagitanabhodigantarālaṃ cikṣepa kṣitiruhajālam indrasūnuḥ // BhKir_17.61 //
analyzed: ucchrāya sthagita nabhaḥ diś antarālam cikṣepa kṣitiruha jālam indrasūnuḥ

original: niḥśeṣaṃ śakalitavalkalāṅgasāraiḥ kurvadbhir bhuvam abhitaḥ kaṣāyacitrām /
analyzed: niḥśeṣam śakalita valkala aṅga sāraiḥ kurvadbhiḥ bhuvam abhitas kaṣāya citrām

original: īśānaḥ sakusumapallavair nagais tair ātene balim iva raṅgadevatābhyaḥ // BhKir_17.62 //
analyzed: īśānaḥ sa kusuma pallavaiḥ nagaiḥ taiḥ ātene balim iva raṅga devatābhyaḥ

original: unmajjan makara ivāmārāpagāyā vegena pratimukham etya bāṇanadyāḥ /
analyzed: unmajjan makaraḥ iva amāra āpagāyāḥ vegena pratimukham etya bāṇa nadyāḥ

original: gāṇḍīvī kanakaśilānibhaṃ bhujābhyām ājaghne viṣam avilocanasya vakṣaḥ // BhKir_17.63 //
analyzed: gāṇḍīvī kanaka śilā nibham bhujābhyām ājaghne viṣam avilocanasya vakṣaḥ

original: abhilaṣata upāyaṃ vikramaṃ kīrtilakṣmyor asugamam arisainyair aṅkam abhyāgatasya /
analyzed: abhilaṣataḥ upāyam vikramam kīrti lakṣmyoḥ asugamam ari sainyaiḥ aṅkam abhyāgatasya

original: janaka iva śiśutve supriyasyaikasūnor avinayam api sehe pāṇḍavasya smarāriḥ // BhKir_17.64 //
analyzed: janakaḥ iva śiśu tve su priyasya eka sūnoḥ avinayam api sehe pāṇḍavasya smarāriḥ

original: tata udagra iva dvirade munau raṇam upeyuṣi bhīmabhujāyudhe /
analyzed: tatas udagre iva dvirade munau raṇam upeyuṣi bhīma bhuja āyudhe

original: dhanur apāsya sabāṇadhi śaṃkaraḥ pratijaghāna ghanair iva muṣṭibhiḥ // BhKir_18.1 //
analyzed: dhanuḥ apāsya sa bāṇadhi śaṃkaraḥ pratijaghāna ghanaiḥ iva muṣṭibhiḥ

original: harapṛthāsutayor dhvanir utpatann amṛdusaṃvalitāṅgulipāṇijaḥ /
analyzed: hara pṛthā sutayoḥ dhvaniḥ utpatan a mṛdu saṃvalita aṅguli pāṇi jaḥ

original: sphuṭadanalpaśilāravadāruṇaḥ pratinanāda darīṣu darībhṛtaḥ // BhKir_18.2 //
analyzed: sphuṭat analpa śilā rava dāruṇaḥ pratinanāda darīṣu darībhṛtaḥ

original: śivabhujāhatibhinnapṛthukṣatīḥ sukham ivānubabhūva kapidhvajaḥ /
analyzed: śiva bhuja āhati bhinna pṛthu kṣatīḥ sukham iva anubabhūva kapidhvajaḥ

original: ka iva nāma bṛhanmanasāṃ bhaved anukṛter api sattvavatāṃ kṣamaḥ // BhKir_18.3 //
analyzed: kaḥ iva nāma bṛhat manasām bhavet anukṛteḥ api sattvavatām kṣamaḥ

original: vraṇamukhacyutaśoṇitaśīkara- sthagitaśailataṭābhabhujāntaraḥ /
analyzed: vraṇa mukha cyuta śoṇita śīkara sthagita śaila taṭa ābha bhujāntaraḥ

original: abhinavauṣasarāgabhṛtā babhau jaladhareṇa samānam umāpatiḥ // BhKir_18.4 //
analyzed: abhinava auṣasa rāga bhṛtā babhau jaladhareṇa samānam umāpatiḥ

original: urasi śūlabhṛtaḥ prahitā muhuḥ pratihatiṃ yayur arjunamuṣṭayaḥ /
analyzed: urasi śūlabhṛtaḥ prahitāḥ muhur pratihatim yayuḥ arjuna muṣṭayaḥ

original: bhṛśarayā iva sahyamahībhṛtaḥ pṛthuni rodhasi sindhumahormayaḥ // BhKir_18.5 //
analyzed: bhṛśa rayāḥ iva sahya mahībhṛtaḥ pṛthuni rodhasi sindhu mahā ūrmayaḥ

original: nipatite 'dhiśirodharam āyate samam aratniyuge 'yugacakṣuṣaḥ /
analyzed: nipatite dhi śirodharam āyate samam aratni yuge yuga cakṣuṣaḥ

original: tricatureṣu padeṣu kirīṭinā lulitadṛṣṭi madād iva caskhale // BhKir_18.6 //
analyzed: tricatureṣu padeṣu kirīṭinā lulita dṛṣṭi madāt iva caskhale

original: abhibhavoditamanyuvidīpitaḥ samabhisṛtya bhṛśaṃ javam ojasā /
analyzed: abhibhava udita manyu vidīpitaḥ samabhisṛtya bhṛśam javam ojasā

original: bhujayugena vibhajya samādade śaśikalābharaṇasya bhujadvayam // BhKir_18.7 //
analyzed: bhuja yugena vibhajya samādade śaśi kalā ābharaṇasya bhuja dvayam

original: pravavṛte 'tha mahāhavamallayor acalasaṃcalanāharaṇo raṇaḥ /
analyzed: pravavṛte tha mahā āhava mallayoḥ acala saṃcalana āharaṇaḥ raṇaḥ

original: karaṇaśṛṅkhalasaṃkalanāgurur gurubhujāyudhagarvitayos tayoḥ // BhKir_18.8 //
analyzed: karaṇa śṛṅkhala saṃkalanā guruḥ guru bhuja āyudha garvitayoḥ tayoḥ

original: ayam asau bhagavān uta pāṇḍavaḥ sthitam avāṅ muninā śaśimaulinā /
analyzed: ayam asau bhagavān uta pāṇḍavaḥ sthitam avāk muninā śaśimaulinā

original: samadhirūḍham ajena nu jiṣṇunā svid iti vegavaśān mumuhe gaṇaiḥ // BhKir_18.9 //
analyzed: samadhirūḍham ajena nu jiṣṇunā svid iti vega vaśāt mumuhe gaṇaiḥ

original: pracalite calitaṃ sthitam āsthite vinamite natam unnatam unnatau /
analyzed: pracalite calitam sthitam āsthite vinamite natam unnatam unnatau

original: vṛṣakapidhvajayor asahiṣṇunā muhur abhāvabhayād iva bhūbhṛtā // BhKir_18.10 //
analyzed: vṛṣa kapi dhvajayoḥ asahiṣṇunā muhur abhāva bhayāt iva bhūbhṛtā

original: karaṇaśṛṅkhalaniḥsṛtayos tayoḥ kṛtabhujadhvani valgu vivalgatoḥ /
analyzed: karaṇa śṛṅkhala niḥsṛtayoḥ tayoḥ kṛta bhuja dhvani valgu vivalgatoḥ

original: caraṇapātanipātitarodharasaḥ prasasṛpuḥ saritaḥ paritaḥ sthalīḥ // BhKir_18.11 //
analyzed: caraṇa pāta nipātita rodha rasaḥ prasasṛpuḥ saritaḥ paritas sthalīḥ

original: viyati vegapariplutam antarā samabhisṛtya rayeṇa kapidhvajaḥ /
analyzed: viyati vega pariplutam antarā samabhisṛtya rayeṇa kapidhvajaḥ

original: caraṇayoś caraṇānamitakṣitir nijagṛhe tisṛṇāṃ jayinaṃ purām // BhKir_18.12 //
analyzed: caraṇayoḥ caraṇa ānamita kṣitiḥ nijagṛhe tisṛṇām jayinam purām

original: vismitaḥ sapadi tena karmaṇā karmaṇāṃ kṣayakaraḥ paraḥ pumān /
analyzed: vismitaḥ sapadi tena karmaṇā karmaṇām kṣaya karaḥ paraḥ pumān

original: kṣeptukāmam avanau tam aklamaṃ niṣpipeṣa parirabhya vakṣasā // BhKir_18.13 //
analyzed: kṣeptu kāmam avanau tam a klamam niṣpipeṣa parirabhya vakṣasā

original: tapasā tathā na mudam asya yayau bhagavān yathā vipulasattvatayā /
analyzed: tapasā tathā na mudam asya yayau bhagavān yathā vipula sattva tayā

original: guṇasaṃhateḥ samatiriktam aho nijam eva sattvam upakāri satām // BhKir_18.14 //
analyzed: guṇa saṃhateḥ samatiriktam aho nijam eva sattvam upakāri satām

original: atha himaśucibhasmabhūṣitaṃ śirasi virājitam indulekhayā /
analyzed: atha hima śuci bhasma bhūṣitam śirasi virājitam indu lekhayā

original: svavapur atimanoharaṃ haraṃ dadhatam udīkṣya nanāma pāṇḍavaḥ // BhKir_18.15 //
analyzed: sva vapuḥ ati manoharam haram dadhatam udīkṣya nanāma pāṇḍavaḥ

original: sahaśaradhi nijaṃ tathā kārmukaṃ vapur atanu tathaiva saṃvarmitam /
analyzed: saha śaradhi nijam tathā kārmukam vapuḥ atanu tathā eva saṃvarmitam

original: nihitam api tathaiva paśyann asiṃ vṛṣabhagatir upāyayau vismayam // BhKir_18.16 //
analyzed: nihitam api tathā eva paśyan asim vṛṣabhagatiḥ upāyayau vismayam

original: siṣicur avanim ambuvāhāḥ śanaiḥ surakusumam iyāya citraṃ divaḥ /
analyzed: siṣicuḥ avanim ambuvāhāḥ śanais sura kusumam iyāya citram divaḥ

original: vimalaruci bhṛśaṃ nabho dundubher dhvanir akhilam anāhatasyānaśe // BhKir_18.17 //
analyzed: vimala ruci bhṛśam nabhaḥ dundubheḥ dhvaniḥ akhilam anāhatasya ānaśe

original: āseduṣāṃ gotrabhido 'nuvṛttyā gopāyakānāṃ bhuvanatrayasya /
analyzed: āseduṣām gotrabhidaḥ nuvṛttyā gopāyakānām bhuvanatrayasya

original: rociṣṇuratnāvalibhir vimānair dyaur ācitā tārakiteva reje // BhKir_18.18 //
analyzed: rociṣṇu ratna āvalibhiḥ vimānaiḥ dyauḥ ācitā tārakitā iva reje

original: haṃsā bṛhantaḥ surasadmavāhāḥ saṃhrādikaṇṭhābharaṇāḥ patantaḥ /
analyzed: haṃsāḥ bṛhantaḥ sura sadma vāhāḥ saṃhrādi kaṇṭha ābharaṇāḥ patantaḥ

original: cakruḥ prayatnena vikīryamāṇair vyomnaḥ pariṣvaṅgam ivāgrapakṣaiḥ // BhKir_18.19 //
analyzed: cakruḥ prayatnena vikīryamāṇaiḥ vyomnaḥ pariṣvaṅgam iva agra pakṣaiḥ

original: muditamadhuliho vitānīkṛtāḥ sraja upari vitatya sātānikīḥ /
analyzed: mudita madhulihaḥ vitānīkṛtāḥ srajaḥ upari vitatya sātānikīḥ

original: jalada iva niṣedivāṃsaṃ vṛṣe marudupasukhayāṃbabhūveśvaram // BhKir_18.20 //
analyzed: jalade iva niṣedivāṃsam vṛṣe marut upasukhayāṃbabhūva īśvaram

original: kṛtadhṛti parivanditenoccakair gaṇapatibhir abhinnaromodgamaiḥ /
analyzed: kṛta dhṛti parivanditena uccakais gaṇa patibhiḥ abhinna roma udgamaiḥ

original: tapasi kṛtaphale phalajyāyasī stutir iti jagade hareḥ sūnunā // BhKir_18.21 //
analyzed: tapasi kṛta phale phala jyāyasī stutiḥ iti jagade hareḥ sūnunā

original: śaraṇaṃ bhavantam atikāruṇikaṃ bhava bhaktigamyam adhigamya janāḥ /
analyzed: śaraṇam bhavantam ati kāruṇikam bhava bhakti gamyam adhigamya janāḥ

original: jitamṛtyavo 'jita bhavanti bhaye sasurāsurasya jagataḥ śaraṇam // BhKir_18.22 //
analyzed: jita mṛtyavaḥ jita bhavanti bhaye sa sura asurasya jagataḥ śaraṇam

original: vipad eti tāvad avasādakarī na ca kāmasampad abhikāmayate /
analyzed: vipad eti tāvat avasāda karī na ca kāma sampad abhikāmayate

original: na namanti caikapuruṣaṃ puruṣās tava yāvad īśa na natiḥ kriyate // BhKir_18.23 //
analyzed: na namanti ca eka puruṣam puruṣāḥ tava yāvat īśa na natiḥ kriyate

original: saṃsevante dānaśīlā vimuktya sampaśyanto janmaduḥkhaṃ pumāṃsaḥ /
analyzed: saṃsevante dāna śīlāḥ sampaśyantaḥ janma duḥkham pumāṃsaḥ

original: yanniḥsaṅgas tvaṃ phalasyānatebhyas tat kāruṇyaṃ kevalaṃ na svakāryam // BhKir_18.24 //
analyzed: yad niḥsaṅgaḥ tvam phalasya ānatebhyaḥ tat kāruṇyam kevalam na sva kāryam

original: prāpyate yad iha dūram agatvā yat phalaty aparalokagatāya /
analyzed: prāpyate yat iha dūram a gatvā yat phalati apara loka gatāya

original: tīrtham asti na bhavārṇavabāhyaṃ sārvakāmikam ṛte bhavatas tat // BhKir_18.25 //
analyzed: tīrtham asti na bhava arṇava bāhyam sārvakāmikam ṛte bhavataḥ tat

original: vrajati śuci padaṃ tv ati prītimān pratihatam atir eti ghorāṃ gatim /
analyzed: vrajati śuci padam tu ati prītimān pratihatam atiḥ eti ghorām gatim

original: iyam anagha nimittaśaktiḥ parā tava varada na cittabhedaḥ kvacit // BhKir_18.26 //
analyzed: iyam anagha nimitta śaktiḥ parā tava vara da na citta bhedaḥ kvacid

original: dakṣiṇāṃ praṇatadakṣiṇa mūrtiṃ tattvataḥ śivakarīm aviditvā /
analyzed: dakṣiṇām mūrtim tattvataḥ śiva karīm a viditvā

original: rāgiṇāpi vihitā tava bhaktyā saṃsmṛtir bhava bhavaty abhavāya // BhKir_18.27 //
analyzed: rāgiṇā api vihitā tava bhaktyā saṃsmṛtiḥ bhava bhavati abhavāya

original: dṛṣṭvā dṛśyāny ācaraṇīyāni vidhāya prekṣākārī yāti padaṃ muktam apāyaiḥ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā dṛśyāni ācaraṇīyāni vidhāya prekṣā kārī yāti padam muktam apāyaiḥ

original: samyagdṛṣṭis tasya paraṃ paśyati yas tvāṃ yaś copāsti sādhu vidheyaṃ sa vidhatte // BhKir_18.28 //
analyzed: samyak dṛṣṭiḥ tasya param paśyati yaḥ tvām yaḥ ca upāsti sādhu vidheyam sa vidhatte

original: yuktāḥ svaśaktyā munayaḥ prajānāṃ hitopadeśair upakāravantaḥ /
analyzed: yuktāḥ sva śaktyā munayaḥ prajānām hita upadeśaiḥ upakāravantaḥ

original: samucchinatsi tvam acintyadhāmā karmāṇy upetasya duruttarāṇi // BhKir_18.29 //
analyzed: samucchinatsi tvam acintya dhāmā karmāṇi upetasya duruttarāṇi

original: saṃnibaddham apahartum ahāryaṃ bhūri durgatibhayaṃ bhuvanānām /
analyzed: saṃnibaddham apahartum a hāryam bhūri durgati bhayam bhuvanānām

original: adbhutākṛtim imām atimāyas tvaṃ bibharṣi karuṇāmaya māyām // BhKir_18.30 //
analyzed: adbhuta ākṛtim imām ati māyaḥ tvam bibharṣi karuṇā maya māyām

original: na rāgi cetaḥ paramā vilāsitā vadhūḥ śarīre 'sti na cāsti manmathaḥ /
analyzed: na rāgi cetaḥ paramā vilāsitā vadhūḥ śarīre sti na ca asti manmathaḥ

original: namaskriyā coṣasi dātur ity aho nisargadurbodham idaṃ tavehitam // BhKir_18.31 //
analyzed: namaskriyā ca uṣasi dātuḥ iti aho nisarga durbodham idam tava īhitam

original: tavottarīyaṃ karicarma sāṅgajaṃ jvalanmaṇiḥ sāraśanaṃ mahānahiḥ /
analyzed: tava uttarīyam kari carma sa aṅgajam jvalat maṇiḥ mahān ahiḥ

original: srag āsyapaṅktiḥ śavabhasma candanaṃ kalā himāṃśoś ca samaṃ cakāsati // BhKir_18.32 //
analyzed: sraj āsya paṅktiḥ śava bhasma candanam kalā himāṃśoḥ ca samam cakāsati

original: avigrahasyāpy atulena hetunā sametabhinnadvayamūrti tiṣṭhataḥ /
analyzed: avigrahasya api atulena hetunā sameta bhinna dvaya mūrti tiṣṭhataḥ

original: tavaiva nānyasya jagatsu dṛśyate viruddhaveṣābharaṇasya kāntatā // BhKir_18.33 //
analyzed: tava eva nā anyasya jagatsu dṛśyate viruddha veṣa ābharaṇasya kānta tā

original: ātmalābhapariṇāmanirodhair bhūtasaṃgha iva na tvam upetaḥ /
analyzed: ātma lābha pariṇāma nirodhaiḥ bhūta saṃghaḥ iva na tvam upetaḥ

original: tena sarvabhuvanātiga loke nopamānam asi nāpy upemayaḥ // BhKir_18.34 //
analyzed: tena sarva bhuvana atiga loke na upamānam asi na api upemayaḥ

original: tvam antakaḥ sthāvarajaṅgamānāṃ tvayā jagat prāṇiti deva viśvam /
analyzed: tvam antakaḥ sthāvara jaṅgamānām tvayā jagat prāṇiti deva viśvam

original: tvaṃ yogināṃ hetuphale ruṇatsi tvaṃ kāraṇaṃ kāraṇakāraṇānām // BhKir_18.35 //
analyzed: tvam yoginām hetu phale ruṇatsi tvam kāraṇam kāraṇa kāraṇānām

original: rakṣobhiḥ suramanujair diteḥ sutair vā yal lokeṣv avikalam āptam ādhipatyam /
analyzed: rakṣobhiḥ sura manujaiḥ diteḥ sutaiḥ vā yat lokeṣu avikalam āptam ādhipatyam

original: pāvinyāḥ śaraṇagatārtihāriṇe tan māhātmyaṃ bhava bhavate namaskriyāyāḥ // BhKir_18.36 //
analyzed: pāvinyāḥ śaraṇa gata ārti hāriṇe tat māhātmyam bhava bhavate namaskriyāyāḥ

original: tarasā bhuvanāni yo bibharti dhvanati brahma yataḥ paraṃ pavitram /
analyzed: tarasā bhuvanāni yaḥ bibharti dhvanati brahma yatas param pavitram

original: parito duritāni yaḥ punīte śiva tasmai pavanātane namas te // BhKir_18.37 //
analyzed: paritas duritāni yaḥ punīte śiva tasmai pavanātane namaḥ te

original: bhavataḥ smaratāṃ sadāsane jayini brahmamaye niṣeduṣām /
analyzed: bhavataḥ smaratām sadā āsane jayini brahma maye niṣeduṣām

original: dahate bhavabījasaṃtatiṃ śikhine 'nekaśikhāya te namaḥ // BhKir_18.38 //
analyzed: dahate bhava bīja saṃtatim śikhine neka śikhāya te namaḥ

original: ābādhāmaraṇabhayārciṣā cirāya pluṣṭebhyo bhava mahatā bhavānalena /
analyzed: ābādha maraṇa bhaya arciṣā cirāya pluṣṭebhyaḥ bhava mahatā bhava analena

original: nirvāṇaṃ samupagamena yacchate te bījānāṃ prabhava namo 'stu jīvanāya // BhKir_18.39 //
analyzed: nirvāṇam samupagamena yacchate te bījānām prabhava namaḥ stu jīvanāya

original: yaḥ sarveṣām āvarītā varīyān sarvair bhāvair nāvṛto 'nādiniṣṭhaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ sarveṣām āvarītā varīyān sarvaiḥ bhāvaiḥ na āvṛtaḥ na ādi niṣṭhaḥ

original: mārgātītāyendriyāṇāṃ namas te 'vijñeyāya vyomarūpāya tasmai // BhKir_18.40 //
analyzed: mārga atītāya indriyāṇām namaḥ te vijñeyāya vyoma rūpāya tasmai

original: aṇīyase viśvavidhāriṇe namo namo 'ntikasthāya namo davīyase /
analyzed: aṇīyase viśva vidhāriṇe namaḥ namaḥ ntika sthāya namaḥ davīyase

original: atītya vācāṃ manasāṃ ca gocaraṃ sthitāya te tatpataye namo namaḥ // BhKir_18.41 //
analyzed: atītya vācām manasām ca gocaram sthitāya te tad pataye namaḥ namaḥ

original: asaṃvidānasya mameśa saṃvidāṃ titikṣituṃ duścaritaṃ tvam arhasi /
analyzed: a saṃvidānasya mama īśa saṃvidām titikṣitum duścaritam tvam arhasi

original: virodhya mohāt punar abhyupeyuṣāṃ gatir bhavān eva durātmanāpi // BhKir_18.42 //
analyzed: virodhya mohāt punar abhyupeyuṣām gatiḥ bhavān eva durātmanā api

original: āstikyaśuddham avataḥ priyadharma dharmaṃ dharmātmajasya vihitāgasi śatruvarge /
analyzed: āstikya śuddham avataḥ priya dharma dharmam dharmātmajasya vihita āgasi śatru varge

original: samprāpnuyāṃ vijayam īśa yayā samṛddhyā tāṃ bhūtanātha vibhutāṃ vitarāhaveṣu // BhKir_18.43 //
analyzed: samprāpnuyām vijayam īśa yayā samṛddhyā tām bhūtanātha vibhu tām vitara āhaveṣu

original: iti nigaditavantaṃ sūnum uccair maghonaḥ praṇataśirasam īśaḥ sādaraṃ sāntvayitvā /
analyzed: iti sūnum uccais maghonaḥ praṇata śirasam īśaḥ sa ādaram sāntvayitvā

original: jvaladanalaparītaṃ raudram astraṃ dadhānaṃ dhanurupapadam asmai vedam abhyādideśa // BhKir_18.44 //
analyzed: jvalat anala parītam raudram astram dadhānam dhanuḥ upapadam asmai vedam abhyādideśa

original: sa piṅgākṣaḥ śrīmān bhuvanamahanīyena mahasā tanuṃ bhīmāṃ bibhrat triguṇaparivārapraharaṇaḥ /
analyzed: sa piṅgākṣaḥ śrīmān bhuvana mahanīyena mahasā tanum bhīmām bibhrat triguṇa parivāra praharaṇaḥ

original: parītyeśānaṃ triḥ stutibhir upagītaḥ suragaṇaiḥ sutaṃ pāṇḍor vīraṃ jaladam iva bhāsvān abhiyayau // BhKir_18.45 //
analyzed: parītya īśānam tris stutibhiḥ upagītaḥ sura gaṇaiḥ sutam pāṇḍoḥ vīram jaladam iva bhāsvān abhiyayau

original: atha śaśadharamauler abhyanujñām avāpya tridaśapatipurogāḥ pūrṇakāmāya tasmai /
analyzed: atha śaśadhara mauleḥ abhyanujñām avāpya tridaśa pati purogāḥ pūrṇa kāmāya tasmai

original: avitathaphalam āśirvādam āropayanto vijayi vividham astraṃ lokapālā viteruḥ // BhKir_18.46 //
analyzed: avitatha phalam āśiḥ vādam āropayantaḥ vijayi vividham astram lokapālāḥ viteruḥ

original: asaṃhāryotsāhaṃ jayinam udayaṃ prāpya tarasā dhuraṃ gurvīṃ voḍhuṃ sthitam anavasādāya jagataḥ /
analyzed: asaṃhārya utsāham jayinam udayam prāpya tarasā dhuram gurvīm voḍhum sthitam an avasādāya jagataḥ

original: svadhāmnā lokānāṃ tam upari kṛtasthānam amarās tapolakṣmyā dīptaṃ dinakṛtam ivoccair upajaguḥ // BhKir_18.47 //
analyzed: sva dhāmnā lokānām tam upari kṛta sthānam amarāḥ tapaḥ lakṣmyā dīptam dinakṛtam iva uccais upajaguḥ

original: vraja jaya ripulokaṃ pādapadmānataḥ san gadita iti śivena ślāghito devasaṃghaiḥ /
analyzed: vraja jaya ripu lokam pāda padma ānataḥ san gaditaḥ iti śivena ślāghitaḥ deva saṃghaiḥ

original: nijagṛham atha gatvā sādaraṃ pāṇḍuputro dhṛtagurujayalakṣmīr dharmasūnuṃ nanāma // BhKir_18.48 //
analyzed: nija gṛham atha gatvā sa ādaram pāṇḍu putraḥ dhṛta guru jaya lakṣmīḥ dharmasūnum nanāma
